319501080.content: Just like when someone once held her in that dark prison, Ver opens her arms and gently hugs her former self.

319501083.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501083.content: Sorry, I'm always saying the wrong thing. I shouldn't have talked about that.

319501084.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501084.content: You don't have to think about those things anymore...

319501086.content: Hearing the voice of her young self tremble uncontrollably, Ver remembers the feelings from that year that she'd buried and nearly forgotten. A terrible anguish rises in her heart, but then she feels something like a warm embrace.

319501087.content: The tears are warm. Knowing how desperately the child in her arms needs this comfort, all she wants to do is pass every bit of it to her.

319501088.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501088.content: ...I know it isn't easy to forget things like that. Just like how getting to the outside world isn't easy.

319501089.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501089.content: I was like you once, too. I was always alone and afraid, and I thought I'd be okay if I could just hide. I was too afraid to even look outside...

319501090.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501090.content: But, Ver... Can I call you Ver?

319501092.content: She presses her face into the child's hair, each soothed by the sound of the other's breathing. Ver smiles and gently pats her young self's back until she gradually stops shaking.

319501093.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501093.content: Everything in this world is a part of our lives. Not even fairy tales are all make-believe.

319501094.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501094.content: Pain, darkness—all of those things we want to hide from are gone now.

319501095.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501095.content: You don't need to fear the outside world anymore, and you don't need to fear tomorrow. All your dreams can be good dreams. You... don't need to keep wondering whether you should exist.

319501096.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501096.content: There are lots of people in this world. There are both good and bad people, sure, but the good outnumber the bad.

319501097.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501097.content: You're going to meet so many good people. They're going to love and protect you, and you're going to love and want to protect them as well.

319501098.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501098.content: You'll learn so many things and make endless wishes. Your days will be full, you'll be able to rest when you're tired, and you'll lie in bed so excited for tomorrow that you can't fall asleep.

319501099.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501099.content: You'll realize... that all this time, all you needed to do was look up, and there would be so many beautiful things for you to see. Things that we always missed out on...

319501100.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501100.content: You'll look back and think that you were so silly. All you needed to do was look up...

319501102.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501102.content: You'll be the strongest girl in the world.

319501103.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501103.content: You'll be... the happiest girl in the world.

319501104.content: Ver kisses her lightly on the forehead, then shifts the girl and the doll in her arms until they're upright. Little Ver stares blankly at the strange older girl before her, not reacting for some time. Finally, she somewhat bashfully turns away.

319501105.content: Ver shakes her head, sensing that she's apparently underestimated just how introverted her younger self is. Still, she's said all that she wanted to say, and she trusts that her past self will understand it and feel a weight has been lifted.

319501108.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501108.content:
Let's give you a checkup!
Now where did I put it... Ah, here it is.

319501109.content: Managing to remember the reason she came here, Ver takes out one of the bracelets Thoth gave her and helps little Ver put it on.

319501111.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501111.content: No, I'm... just a doctor's assistant. After we finish your checkup, we'll go and see a really good doctor. She'll definitely know what to do.

319501112.speaker: 小薇儿
319501112.content: She's even better than Doctor Gloria?

319501113.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501113.content: Shh... It's a good thing she isn't here.

319501114.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501114.content: Don't you say that in front of Doctor Gloria. She'll definitely have something to say about that.

319501115.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501115.content: "Good grief, I'm at my wits end. You may not like the nutritional meals I've prepared for you or my nightly inspections, but at least I'm still a professional when it comes to the sacred work of health care."

319501116.speaker: 小薇儿
319501116.content: But the nutritional meals really... ugh...

319501117.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501117.content: Are like pure medicine with no sugar!

319501118.content: Her eyes opening wide, little Ver has an expression on her face like she's met her soul mate. She nods repeatedly.

319501119.content: They giggle together, and just then, a chirp from the bracelet signals that the examination is complete. Ver removes it, then eagerly opens her terminal to view the report. Her face quickly twists.

319501120.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501120.content: I can't understand half of these terms and data... It's too complicated for me.

319501124.content: Little Ver's gaze is slightly evasive. Try as she might, she can't get the rest of her words out, a though they've been blocked by a habit formed of accumulated shadows.

319501125.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501125.content: Are you asking if I can help you?

319501127.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501127.content: There's nothing wrong with asking others to help with important things that you can't do yourself.

319501128.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501128.content: Okay! Miss Verthandi, what is your request?

319501129.content: Ver gently runs her fingers through the girl's hair. Then, assuming a serious manner, she raises the right hand of the doll in her arms.

319501130.content: Still not accustomed to such geniality, little Ver lowers her head and casts her gaze over to the corner of the wall to her left.

319501132.speaker: 小薇儿
319501132.content: Can you help Tarina get better? She lives next door, and her condition is more serious than mine. It hurts just to see how sick she is...

319501134.content: Relaxing her body and tone, Ver puts the bracelet away. A hint of determination emerges in her soft gaze.

319501135.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501135.content: I came to visit her, too, and figure out just what kind of illness she has.

319501136.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319501136.content: She's your friend, and she's also mine. Don't worry, I'll definitely find a way to cure her.

319511001.content: As soon as she opens the door, she sees Gloria standing just outside. As she turns to close the door, she sticks out her tongue at little Ver, still sitting on the edge of the bed.

319511002.speaker: 格罗娅
319511002.content: Very few people can talk to Ver for that long.

319511003.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511003.content: Ah, hahaha... Maybe we're on similar wavelengths.

319511004.speaker: 格罗娅
319511004.content: Childhood trauma has a strong impact on one's personality development. It's extremely difficult to overcome.

319511005.speaker: 格罗娅
319511005.content: Your identity aside, I agree that perhaps you seeing Ver was not a bad thing.

319511006.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511006.content: What's the matter with my identity? I'm really not a bad person.

319511007.content: Gloria doesn't say anything, but her eyes amply convey her suspicion of Ver's OPRIC identity.

319511008.content: Ver gives up on trying to change Gloria's impression of her—she knows that any explanation she could give might only backfire in the end.

319511009.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511009.content: Ver said that Tarina is in the room next door. Could I...

319511010.speaker: 格罗娅
319511010.content: You may, but this time I can't allow you to be alone with her.

319511012.speaker: 小院长
319511012.content: Because I don't trust you that much yet.

319511013.content: Following the sound of the voice, Ver looks to see the Prez walking over from the depths of the hallway.

319511014.speaker: 小院长
319511014.content: Gloria and I will go in with you. Tarina's condition is unique, so I can't allow a stranger to come into contact with her as they please.

319511015.speaker: 小院长
319511015.content: Don't do anything strange. I'm guessing you wouldn't like a repeat of what happened yesterday afternoon.

319511017.speaker: 小院长
319511017.content: Why do you insist on seeing Tarina? Having "met before" isn't a very compelling reason.

319511018.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511018.content: I just want to see how she's doing. Ver said her condition is serious and that she often hears her cry out in pain.

319511019.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511019.content: I don't know anything about medicine, but I do know some doctors. Maybe they've seen a similar case before and can help.

319511020.speaker: 小院长
319511020.content: And how do you know that Saint Sophia doesn't have a cure for her?

319511021.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511021.content: Um... Well, it seems like both of them have been sick for a long time now.

319511022.speaker: 小院长
319511022.content: So you knew their situations from the beginning, and you came here to see them with the intention of curing them. No wonder...

319511024.speaker: 小院长
319511024.content: "Be happy. You're both going to get..."

319511025.content: The Prez recites the words without emotion, like an English teacher reading a low-scoring essay out loud. Ver's face flushes bright red.

319511026.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511026.content: Prez! Why would you say that out loud?

319511027.speaker: 小院长
319511027.content: Didn't you write that? There's no point in covering your ears.

319511028.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511028.content: But why did you memorize it? How many times did you read it? That's just creepy!

319511029.content: With the tables suddenly turned, the Prez's eye twitches. They fidget uncomfortably and their expression grows increasingly embarrassed.

319511030.speaker: 格罗娅
319511030.content: The Prez has a very good memory.

319511031.speaker: 小院长
319511031.content: Really? Right, of course. Gloria did say you could memorize something just by glancing at it.

319511032.speaker: 小院长
319511032.content: ...Anyway, it's a fair thing to wish for—isn't it, Verthandi?

319511034.content: Ver is startled to hear her real name, but then she realizes that the Prez is looking past her at little Ver, whose head is just poking out from behind her door.

319511035.speaker: 小薇儿
319511035.content: ...Yes. I do hope we can all get better.

319511036.speaker: 小薇儿
319511036.content: You were the president of this place the whole time, #{nickname}#?

319511037.speaker: 小院长
319511037.content: "Acting" president. We don't know where the real president went, though, so I guess that's more or less correct.

319511038.content: In a departure from their usual sophistication, the Prez suddenly turns cautious upon seeing Ver, like a parent whose secret was discovered by their child and they're not sure how to explain themselves.

319511039.speaker: 小院长
319511039.content: Sorry, I didn't hide it from you intentionally. I just thought there was no point in knowing it.

319511040.speaker: 小薇儿
319511040.content: Of course not. You're amazing, #{nickname}#. You're pretty much the same age as me...

319511042.content: The Prez starts coughing out of nowhere, seemingly forgetting to breathe for a moment. Thinking she'd said something wrong, Ver quickly purses her lips.

319511043.speaker: 小院长
319511043.content: I-I'm fine... What brought you out here?

319511044.speaker: 小薇儿
319511044.content: The door wasn't closed all the way. When I heard your voice, I...

319511045.content: The Prez turns and looks coolly at "Norn." Ver wants to say that it was an accident, but it looks like she won't need to explain.

319511046.speaker: 小薇儿
319511046.content: I'd like to see Tarina too—she had an episode yesterday. Could Norn and I see her together?

319511047.speaker: 小院长
319511047.content:
Of course. It'll be good for you to go out for a bit.
Gloria.

319511048.content: Receiving the go-ahead, Gloria asks no further questions. She presses the doorbell outside Tarina's room and turns on the intercom.

319511049.speaker: 格罗娅
319511049.content: Tarina, you have a visitor. May we come in?

319511051.speaker: 格罗娅
319511051.content: Yes, a young woman named Norn.

319511052.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511052.content:
Norn?
Oh, okay... Please come in.

319511053.content: The door unlocks. Gloria gives Ver a nod, then moves aside with steady, precise steps.

319511054.content: Ver stares blankly at the bare door. For a moment, she imagines decorating and hanging Tarina's name on it.

319511055.content: But ultimately, it's just a plain, unremarkable door. Much like how her comings and goings left behind no trace other than the words still resonating in her ears.

319511056.content: Ver gingerly pushes the door open.

319511060.content: They all gather at the edge of the bed to admire the photo Gloria took. Tarina puts her hands together in wholehearted appreciation.

319511061.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511061.content: Too bad the Prez's face is all blurry.

319511062.speaker: 小院长
319511062.content: Nothing we can do about that. You only get to choose between a photo and the real deal.

319511063.speaker: 小院长
319511063.content: We haven't disturbed your rest with this sudden commotion, have we?

319511064.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511064.content: No. I used to get big groups of people coming to see me when I was at the hospital in Init. That was much crazier.

319511065.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511065.content: Besides—luckily for you, I like a bit of excitement. Not like Ver.

319511066.speaker: 小薇儿
319511066.content: You know the Prez too, Tarina?

319511067.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511067.content: Mm-hm. I thought it was strange that the Prez wouldn't let me tell you. Looks like someone couldn't help themselves.

319511068.speaker: 小院长
319511068.content: Everything happens for a reason. In this case, an accident was responsible.

319511069.content: The Prez smiles wryly at Ver, nearly calling her out.

319511070.speaker: 小院长
319511070.content: Tarina needs to rest—we can't keep disturbing her forever. Was there anything else, Norn?

319511071.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511071.content: Actually—I wanted to ask why you came to see me.

319511073.content: The bracelets that can monitor vital signs are still in Ver's bag, but she can't think of a good enough reason to take out such suspicious items in front of the Prez.

319511074.content: Just as Ver's attempt to think on her feet fails, Tarina looks at her. As if suddenly understanding what Ver is thinking, Tarina beats the Prez to the punch and speaks first.

319511075.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511075.content: Prez, I'd like to speak to Norn alone for a moment. Would that be okay?

319511077.speaker: 小院长
319511077.content: I know you're full of tricks. What are you plotting this time?

319511079.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511079.content: You and I both know that it's been a long time since I had a visitor. I've missed it.

319511080.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511080.content: Besides, I think there's something Norn would like to tell me... I know you haven't met her before, but you can just tell by looking at her that she's not a bad person, right?

319511082.speaker: 小院长
319511082.content: I don't think that's a compliment—what are you getting all worked up for...?

319511083.speaker: 小院长
319511083.content: Are you sure, Tarina? I'm not comfortable leaving you alone with a stranger.

319511084.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511084.content: We've met before, haven't we? She's not a stranger.

319511085.speaker: 小院长
319511085.content: That's bold of you... Is there something else you want?

319511086.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511086.content: Hmm... The weather's nice today. I'd like to go out for a walk.

319511087.speaker: 小院长
319511087.content: No. That's your chance used up. Think it over more carefully next time.

319511088.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511088.content: Next time, I'll say the same exact thing.

319511090.content: Tarina opens up the notebook in her hands, revealing row upon row of dainty letters. Some have a check mark next to them, but most do not.

319511091.content: Among them, "Go outside to play" has been outlined with a color pen, as well as several little decorative patterns, giving it the prominence of a poster title.

319511092.speaker: 小院长
319511092.content: A reminder, Norn—talking and playing in her room is fine... but keep it brief.

319511093.speaker: 小院长
319511093.content: The only thing you are prohibited from doing, under any circumstances, is taking Tarina out of her room—if you're interested in her wellbeing, that is.

319511097.speaker: 小院长
319511097.content: ...I'll reiterate: Do not take Tarina out of her room.

319511098.content: Tarina cheerfully waves goodbye to the Prez, who clearly still has doubts about Ver. With an eyeroll, the Prez takes little Ver by the hand and leaves the room.

319511099.speaker: 小薇儿
319511099.content: Prez, Norn really isn't a bad person.

319511101.speaker: 小院长
319511101.content: You usually hide at the sight of strangers. What made you trust her so quickly? What did she say to you?

319511102.speaker: 小薇儿
319511102.content: I... I'm not sure. But she was very nice, just like you.

319511104.speaker: 小院长
319511104.content: I can see why you two got along. Both of you like saying silly things.

319511105.speaker: 小薇儿
319511105.content: It's... It's not silly. I'm telling the truth...

319511106.speaker: 小院长
319511106.content: She'd better not be up to something.

319511107.speaker: 小院长
319511107.content: I've never told anyone that you and Tarina are staying here. How did she even find that out?

319511108.speaker: 小薇儿
319511108.content: Don't be mean to Norn, okay?

319511109.speaker: 小院长
319511109.content: Hey, don't make ME out to be the bad guy...

319511110.speaker: 小院长
319511110.content: I was going to ask you later if you'd like to go out and play tonight.

319511111.content: Once Gloria shuts the door, leaving the two of them alone, Ver finally breathes a sigh of relief. She still thinks that the Prez's attitude toward her changed rather quickly, but since everything's worked out, she decides not to worry too much about it.

319511112.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511112.content: So why have you come here, Norn?

319511114.content: Ver stops, then sees Tarina shake her head with a smile.

319511115.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511115.content: If you want me to keep it a secret, I won't tell anyone.

319511116.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511116.content: When I was in Init, lots of people I'd never met before came to see me. The doctors would say that they were well-meaning people and I needed to be on my best behavior.

319511117.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511117.content: They'd take pictures, do performances, make donations, talk to me... Many really were good people who were concerned about me. But I also knew that not all of them came just to visit me.

319511118.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511118.content: I wasn't upset, though, because... as I said, I like a bit of excitement.

319511119.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511119.content: But I would have preferred that they be honest with me.

319511120.content: Tarina sighs, seemingly with some regret. She then gives the bewildered Ver a earnest look.

319511123.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511123.content: I don't know why—that's just the feeling I'm getting. It's like I can tell what you're feeling... Did I guess wrong?

319511124.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511124.content: No... The truth is, I didn't just come here to see you.

319511125.content: Under Tarina's curious gaze, Ver produces the second bracelet from her bag and puts it on the girl.

319511126.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511126.content: I want to cure you, Tarina.

319511127.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511127.content: I see. Thank you... I don't mean to be rude, but lots of doctors have said that. Nothing ever came of it in the end.

319511128.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511128.content: Well, let's just say that another person wants to try. Besides... you've never given up either, have you?

319511129.content: Tarina looks into Ver's eyes and seems to see a familiar determination within them—a hope that's more convincing than a smile, like seeing her own reflection in a window.

319511130.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511130.content: ...Looks like you can tell what I'm feeling too, Norn.

319511131.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511131.content: Anyway, there's nothing wrong with trying. This bracelet can read your vital signs. It won't take long.

319511132.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511132.content: I noticed your notebook earlier. Is that your wish list?

319511134.content: Not precious about her privacy, Tarina passes the notebook to Ver.

319511135.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511135.content: It's not a wish list so much as a bucket list, I suppose.

319511136.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511136.content: Right, this one's been completed now... You helped me check that one off.

319511139.content: Most of the goals in the notebook are relatively straightforward, from "Cook a meal by myself" to "Watch an entire rain storm." Of course, there are more peculiar ones as well, like "Learn a Xu Heng dialect."

319511140.content: From the looks of it, this girl is trying to find new ways to make life trapped in this room more interesting. Simply put, they're all things that can be achieved inside this room.

319511141.content: The other one, however, has been stacked on the top line in a series of colorful outlines.

319511142.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511142.content: If you went out to play, where would you go?

319511143.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511143.content: Hmm... I've thought about it a lot, but I think anywhere would be fine.

319511144.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511144.content:
If I could pick one, maybe an amusement park filled with people?
Or a field I could run around without ever reaching the end, where I could just sleep on the grass if I got tired.

319511145.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511145.content: But the Prez will never let me out while I'm still ill. I'd faint as soon as I got out the door...

319511146.content: The bracelet suddenly emits a tone of unknown meaning, interrupting Tarina, but then quickly resumes operating as normal.

319511148.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511148.content: My friend gave me this bracelet, so I'm not sure... I'm sure it's nothing, though.

319511150.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511150.content: Don't worry. Once I find a doctor to look at the report, we'll know what's going on.

319511151.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511151.content: Once your illness is cured, I'll take you somewhere. I know lots of fun places. Amusement parks, fields—Ain Soph has it all.

319511152.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511152.content: We can also bring Ver, the Prez, and Doctor Gloria... It would be even more fun with everyone together.

319511153.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511153.content: Right—when's your birthday? We could celebrate it together! We could go out and pick your favorite cake and a birthday present...

319511154.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511154.content: Could you slow down a moment, Norn...?

319511155.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511155.content: Sure, sorry. Anyway, don't worry about your illness. It's definitely a problem with the bracelet, not you...

319511156.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511156.content: I wasn't thinking about that. Doctor Gloria often tells me that I'm overly optimistic.

319511157.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511157.content: What I wanted to say was... I know you're really concerned about me, Norn. But isn't it time you told me why?

319511158.speaker: 塔琳娜
319511158.content: Not knowing the reason for your concern is actually what worries me.

319511159.content: As her excitement and anticipation slowly wane, Ver realizes that the biggest problem with this conversation is that Tarina doesn't seem to know who she is.

319511160.content: Smiling apologetically, Ver takes hold of Tarina's hand. Ver is briefly gripped by a tingling sensation in her body, but she's unsure if it's an effect of her battle with Gremory or simply nerves.

319511161.content: But she doesn't pay it much mind. She removes the bracelet, its examination now complete, and runs her hand over Tarina's hair.

319511162.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319511162.content: ...Because I'm the one that should be thanking you.

319521002.content: The delectable scent of cooking meat wafts out from the grill. Humming her own version of some tune, Ver swings her legs back and forth from her chair while her upper body sways around like a roly-poly toy.

319521003.content: With few other diners in the restaurant at this time in the afternoon, the owner sits at the table next to Ver's, ready to personally serve this especially hungry customer.

319521005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319521005.content: Mm-hm! I just saw two very good friends of mine I hadn't seen in years.

319521006.speaker: 烤肉店老板
319521006.content: Is that so? Why don't you call your friends over to join you, then?

319521007.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319521007.content: I'd like to, but that might be difficult for them right now. I'll definitely bring them here in the future, though!

319521008.speaker: 烤肉店老板
319521008.content: Aw. Well, that's a shame. Today happens to be the last day of our promo event—it's 12 percent off the entire menu. The more you eat, the more you save!

319521009.content: Slowly coming to a halt, Ver puts down the slice of meat she was about to eat and looks at the owner in astonishment.

319521010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319521010.content: The last day? Does the discount end at midnight?

319521011.speaker: 烤肉店老板
319521011.content: That's right. Are you coming back tonight? Should I reserve a table for you?

319521012.speaker: 烤肉店老板
319521012.content: Well, hello there, kiddos. Come on in—we have plenty of seats open.

319521015.speaker: 小院长
319521015.content: There's nothing to be afraid of—this is the owner of the restaurant. We're being invited in to eat.

319521016.content: Little Ver doesn't respond. She continues to hide behind that familiar figure, clutching those hands to feel safe.

319521017.speaker: 小院长
319521017.content: It's just the two of us. And don't rip us off just because we're kids.

319521018.speaker: 烤肉店老板
319521018.content: Now what makes you think I'd do anything like that? I'm gonna give you kids extra at no charge. Come on in and have a seat.

319521019.content: Seeing the two of them enter the restaurant in the distance, Ver—seated on a streetside bench with a drink in her hand—shakes her head in amazement.

319521020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319521020.content: It really is exactly like before.

319521021.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319521021.content: When the Admin first took me out to eat barbecue, it was on this same day and at this same restaurant.

319521022.content: At this moment, Ver is acutely aware of the changes and constancies in this parallel World Line. Even with her intervention, many things will continue on their original course, spurred on by factors she has no power to change.

319521023.content: She checks her terminal for what may be the one hundredth time, but there are still no messages. Her watch hasn't received anything either. After worrying all day about Gremory's disappearance, it's like the hyperspace is giving Ver a vacation.

319521024.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319521024.content: And I still don't know if Thoth went back to the bookstore. Why hasn't she contacted me this whole time...?

319521025.speaker: ？？？
319521025.content: Hey. That bookstore you were talking about—where is it?

319521026.content: A medium-sized shadow appears in the light of a street lamp and just barely covers Ver. When she looks up, she comes face-to-face with a pair of eyes piercing through the darkness like a coyote's.

319521028.speaker: 洛肯
319521028.content: I'm touched that you still remember my name, Sergeant.

319521030.speaker: 洛肯
319521030.content: Taking a holiday, obviously. Even CORG has enough sense to think about campsite safety.

319521031.speaker: 洛肯
319521031.content: Besides, anyone would go stir-crazy after being stuck in the same place forever.

319521032.speaker: 洛肯
319521032.content: I heard you mention the captain's bookstore. Take me there.

319521033.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319521033.content: But I still have things to do... It's called the "Land of Moons." You can search for it on your map.

319521034.speaker: 洛肯
319521034.content: I don't have one of those.

319521036.speaker: 洛肯
319521036.content: A communicator. CORG won't let me use one.

319521037.content: Lokken raises her bare wrists for Ver to see. Though her body is equipped with a good number of auxiliary devices, none appear to be a communicator.

319521038.speaker: 洛肯
319521038.content: I'm not authorized to take any actions when I'm on leave. I can't even look at a tactical map. Ugh... it's so annoying.

319521039.speaker: 洛肯
319521039.content: Point is, take me there. I wanna see Captain Thoth.

319521041.speaker: 洛肯
319521041.content: Maybe she took a vacation too? Who knows. The tin can guarding the camp said she went to Sudburg.

319521042.speaker: 洛肯
319521042.content: Where else would she go in Sudburg, other than the bookstore?

319521044.content: The matter turns more serious when this question occurs to her. Ver has only just remembered that Thoth—who doesn't have an alias—warned her not to use her real name.

319521045.speaker: 洛肯
319521045.content: I asked you a question, Sarge. Can you stop acting like you didn't hear me?

319521047.speaker: 洛肯
319521047.content: ...Well, that wasn't what I wanted to hear.

319521048.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319521048.content: I haven't heard a word from Thoth. I don't know what your mission is, either, so it's none of my business.

319521051.speaker: 洛肯
319521051.content: Who says I need to have a mission to do that? I just want to hang out with her.

319521052.content: Lokken produces a gaming device from her pocket and waves it at the dumbstruck Ver.

319521053.speaker: 洛肯
319521053.content: She's come all the way to Molander. If I don't find her now, she'll probably be gone by the time Nordburg is dealt with.

319521054.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319521054.content: There are so many people in CORG. Why do you need to hang out with Thoth, specifically? Don't you have any other friends or... gaming groups... or something like that?

319521055.speaker: 洛肯
319521055.content: Nope. What's any of that got to do with me? I'd be lucky if those cowards didn't wet their pants just from looking at me...

319521056.speaker: 洛肯
319521056.content: What about you? You don't seem scared of me. We can play whatever you want, and I can just teach you if you don't know how.

319521057.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319521057.content: ...If you were just a little nicer, I'm sure you'd have no problem finding someone to play with.

319521058.content: Lokken stares at Ver for a while, then rolls her eyes, snorts, and puts the gaming device back in her pocket.

319521059.speaker: 洛肯
319521059.content: Forget it. A "model student" like you wouldn't get it, anyway.

319521060.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319521060.content: I'm serious. When I was in the Source Layer yesterday, you wanted to pick a fight with me the moment we met. If that's how you are with everyone you meet, it's no wonder they're all afraid of you.

319521061.speaker: 洛肯
319521061.content: A weapon that stops working by itself isn't a weapon.

319521062.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319521062.content: Says who? You have an Access Key, don't you?

319521063.speaker: 洛肯
319521063.content: Like I said, you wouldn't get it...

319521064.speaker: 洛肯
319521064.content: I don't know how you wormed your way into OPRIC, and I don't care, either. Just... don't tell me what to do.

319521065.content: Lokken raises a finger, bends over, and presses it against Ver's lips. She then stuffs her hands back into her pockets and continues to saunter down the street.

319521066.speaker: 洛肯
319521066.content: I won't mess around next time, Sergeant. Don't bother hiding behind Captain Thoth.

319521067.content: As she watches Lokken fade into the distance, Ver is utterly mystified. But when she thinks of Lokken's personality, what she said also starts to make sense.

319521068.content: After sitting in chairs and ruminating for a while, the two children emerge from the restaurant. Rather than return to the medical center, however, they head in the opposite direction.

319521069.content: Ver hurriedly gets up and follows them. Even she's not sure why she's doing this—maybe it's because she has nothing better to do, or because she wants to protect them. Or maybe it's just because she wants to relive her first outing.

319521070.content: But when she sees her most cherished memory replay right before her eyes, Ver clasps her hands behind her back and gets a spring in her step. Not only does she see the World Line's changes and constancies, she feels a fulfillment that has only grown deeper with time.

319531001.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
319531001.content: All traces of the incident have been removed. All follow-up tasks pertaining to confidentiality have also been put in place.

319531003.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
319531003.content: You don't have to, ma'am. This is our job. It's an honor to be of assistance to you...

319531004.content: The soldier gives Ver a pristine salute, as though it was for a guard of honor examination, then jogs back over to the CORG cordon.

319531005.content: The city is big, so a commotion in a few streets in the middle of the night isn't going to trigger widespread panic. This also gives CORG time to censor what news gets out.

319531006.speaker: 小院长
319531006.content: Thank you. We're lucky you were following us.

319531007.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319531007.content: Oh, you knew I was there?

319531008.speaker: 小院长
319531008.content:
We knew you didn't mean us harm, so we pretended not to see you.
But those things... Do they have something to do with you?

319531009.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319531009.content: I... I can't say. But please believe me—I would never hurt you guys.

319531010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319531010.content: And do you want to know something else?

319531011.content:
"There's bound to be something else coming in behind the Cleansers."
An accurate assessment, and Ver suddenly remembers how the Admin had analyzed the intel.

319531012.speaker: 小院长
319531012.content: I know we all have clearance, but I don't think you should tell us. Saying something might not be for the best, right?

319531013.content: Ver looks at the Prez in surprise. She isn't sure if her "might not be for the best" remark is a reference to the World Line's stability.

319531014.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319531014.content: I'll ask a superior I know—she might know the reason. I don't want something like this to happen again.

319531015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319531015.content: I'm sorry. And you were having so much fun before I showed up...

319531016.speaker: 小院长
319531016.content: Don't beat yourself up about it. It wasn't your fault.

319531017.speaker: 小院长
319531017.content: It's getting late—we should lock up. I'll go back and check on Ver. You should get going, too.

319531019.content:
The Prez reaches Ver's door. The interior seems just as quiet as always.
She notices the door is ajar. Did Ver leave it open deliberately, or does she have a careless visitor?

319531020.content: Knocking twice on the door, the Prez pushes it open. Ver is sitting on the edge of her bed facing the window, her eyes gazing outside.

319531022.speaker: 小薇儿
319531022.content: Just the sky and the moon.

319531023.speaker: 小薇儿
319531023.content: It's just like you, Tarina, and Norn said. Looking at the outside world.

319531024.content: Ver turns around, her lips pursed. Her eyes look like they've been dyed a strange color.

319531026.speaker: 小院长
319531026.content: She... had something to take care of.

319531027.speaker: 小院长
319531027.content: I'm surprised. I thought you would have been crying from fear.

319531028.speaker: 小薇儿
319531028.content: I was a little, at first... But then I saw Norn fighting those machines to protect us, and I wasn't so scared anymore.

319531029.speaker: 小薇儿
319531029.content: Norn is awesome. I want to be just like her!

319531030.speaker: 小院长
319531030.content: Well, it's always good to have a goal... But don't you think you're getting a little ahead of yourself?

319531031.speaker: 小薇儿
319531031.content: Because I saw everything! Norn doesn't want to admit it, but it must be true. Look...

319531032.content: Ver holds up the book in her hand and flips to one of the illustrations. It depicts an elven knight holding a jeweled sword, standing right in the middle of Kingdom Street and single-handedly fending off an entire army.

319541001.content: Ver doesn't think she's ever stayed up all night. Even after her Awakening as a Modifier, she has continued to keep the same routine she had as a human.

319541002.content: She wasn't particularly tired last night, but her body still instinctively wanted a bed to sleep on for the night, so she went back to the bedroom in the bookstore. She didn't see Thoth, so she slept right through to morning.

319541003.content: But Modifiers aren't human. If both were to miss a night's sleep, a Modifier would still feel just as sharp and alert when danger strikes.

319541004.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319541004.content: ...Is someone going through my stuff? Am I being burgled?

319541005.content: She clambers out of bed and tiptoes through the darkness. Sure enough, she can see someone moving behind the bookcase.

319541006.content: Ver isn't one to let her enemies off lightly. She darts forward and pins the thief to the floor.

319541009.content: Suddenly recognizing her intruder, Ver quickly lets her go. The Prez stands back up, shakes out their arms and then rubs their head, before finally sinking down onto an adjacent stool.

319541010.speaker: 小院长
319541010.content: I just came in to take a look. Did I frighten you?

319541011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319541011.content: The bookstore isn't open for the day yet. I thought you were a burglar.

319541012.speaker: 小院长
319541012.content: If it's closed, then why was the door open?

319541013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319541013.content: This is my friend's store—I'm just sleeping here. I didn't lock the door when I got back last night, just in case she needed to get in.

319541015.speaker: 小院长
319541015.content:
I just wanted to see what you were doing...
I heard you examined Ver and Tarina yesterday. Are you treating them?

319541017.speaker: 小院长
319541017.content: I didn't know there was anything you... or CORG could do. If it weren't for last night, I wouldn't have asked.

319541018.speaker: 小院长
319541018.content: But if, and I mean if, there's a chance... you know it won't change the outcome, right?

319541019.content: Seeing Ver is shocked and about to ask something, Prez shakes her head to stop her.

319541021.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319541021.content: I didn't actually think too much about it. You can't always just sit there and weigh up all the options, then decide it's not worth doing.

319541022.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319541022.content: Friends should always help and protect each other... A good friend from my childhood told me that.

319541023.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319541023.content: And let's just say I've got some things I need to make up for. Ver has only just gotten back to her old self, and Tarina still has so much left to do on her wish list...

319541024.speaker: 小院长
319541024.content: Are you sure they're just "acquaintances"? Has anyone ever told you you're a people pleaser?

319541027.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319541027.content:
N-nothing...
Is that what you came here to ask me?

319541028.speaker: 小院长
319541028.content: Yeah, that's all I needed to know. After all, you don't look like someone who's good at lying.

319541029.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319541029.content: People have told me that before. Thank you for believing me.

319541030.speaker: 小院长
319541030.content: Now let's forget I locked you in your office and nearly caused your old injury to flare up again.

319541031.content: The Prez smiles and goes to leave, waving goodbye to Ver. Just before the door handle can be moved, the door is pushed open by someone from outside.

319541032.content: Two people inside, two people outside. Four pairs of eyes examine each other, and the atmosphere becomes tense.

319551001.speaker: 小院长
319551001.content: ...I'll leave you three to it. I'll be back when I'm in the mood for a new book.

319551002.speaker: 托特
319551002.content:
Come back any time.
Take care.

319551003.content: As she watches the Prez leave, the smile on Thoth's face flickers to betray her worry and helplessness, but she quickly regains her composure and goes back into the store.

319551004.speaker: 宁希达
319551004.content: You're telling me that kid is the dean of Saint Sophia? Hmm... Sounds a little sus to me.

319551005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319551005.content: It didn't cross my mind either...

319551006.speaker: 宁希达
319551006.content: Captain Thoth, do you know this Prez? She didn't seem to just go without asking too much.

319551007.speaker: 托特
319551007.content: I don't really know her, but I feel like she can be trusted.

319551008.speaker: 托特
319551008.content: Let's just put the Saint Sophia stuff to one side for now. It shouldn't interfere with our plans.

319551010.speaker: 托特
319551010.content: Investigating where the Visbanes come from. Don't tell me you've forgotten already.

319551011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319551011.content: Of course not... It's just that I feel like you're very busy, but there isn't much for me to do except deal with the Cleansers.

319551012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319551012.content: Oh, that reminds me—I came across some Cleansers on the beach last night when you didn't come back. What happened? What are they doing on the Surface Layer?

319551013.speaker: 托特
319551013.content: It's hard to say for sure. There could be something on the Surface Layer that's attracting them, or maybe there's an anomaly in the Plane Layer.

319551014.speaker: 托特
319551014.content: Let me vaccinate you all first. When the collapse meter approaches the threshold, situations like this direct interference of the Surface Layer by Gaea will happen more frequently, and we basically won't have time to do anything else.

319551015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319551015.content: Happen more frequently? Then what about Molander?

319551016.content: Thoth looks at Ningishzida, who's deep in thought, but only answers Ver with a shake of the head.

319551018.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319551018.content: I'm much better. I used your strategy of using my Access Key to guide my Divine Power in every battle now. I think I'm all better.

319551019.speaker: 托特
319551019.content: I'm glad to hear it. Otherwise, I wouldn't have allowed you to go to the Source Layer.

319551020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319551020.content: Are you going to find that place I went to? I thought you said yesterday that you wanted to wait a couple more days?

319551021.speaker: 托特
319551021.content:
Well, we have a chance now and I don't want to waste it.
Ningishzida.

319551022.speaker: 宁希达
319551022.content: CORG is having a day off tomorrow. No investigations into the Source Layer and that space rift.

319551023.speaker: 宁希达
319551023.content: So if you go in, you won't bump into anyone and you should be able to find what you're looking for.

319551025.speaker: 宁希达
319551025.content: Um, I think it's best if the medic stays in the rear...

319551026.speaker: 托特
319551026.content: Ningishzida is going to keep an eye on CORG for us. If they spot us or decide to continue the investigation after all, she can notify us through our watches.

319551027.content: Thoth pulls up a map of Molander. The data has definitely been taken from CORG's internal systems—even the defenses stationed in the northern restricted zone are clearly marked.

319551028.speaker: 托特
319551028.content: Norn, you, I, and some other agents will enter the restricted area, pretending to be representing OPRIC, and establish a Source Layer entry/exit point where the space rift is.

319551029.speaker: 托特
319551029.content: Once we're in the Source Layer, try and see if you can find that area you were talking about. If not, retrace your steps, then head east until you reach the research facility... here.

319551030.speaker: 托特
319551030.content: I have no idea what kind of security they have there, but I think your OPRIC identity should get you in. Once you have the data, don't come back to us—just leave Nordburg straight away.

319551032.speaker: 托特
319551032.content: Ningishzida, plug this flash drive into any public terminal in the camp with network access. It'll blind CORG's security systems to our presence.

319551033.speaker: 宁希达
319551033.content: And what do we do if we're caught?

319551034.speaker: 托特
319551034.content: Well, that's why you're here for this special training session. So you know how to handle any emergencies that crop up.

319551035.speaker: 托特
319551035.content: I've set this terminal up here to have roughly the same kind of security as the Nordburg camp. Go into the bedroom and familiarize yourself with the blocker program first. I'll come and check on you soon.

319551036.content: Ningishzida leaves in a hurry, like a student who's been given too much homework. Ver moves to follow, but is stopped by Thoth.

319551037.speaker: 托特
319551037.content: Do you really not know where I went last night? I have something for you.

319551038.content: Ver raises an eyebrow, and Thoth pulls a small, house-shaped wooden sign from her backpack and hands it to her.

319551039.content: The sign has cherry blossoms painted on the front. In the corner of one of them, a hole has been drilled and a red and white string passed through. Attached to it are two small bells.

319551040.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319551040.content: Is this a Sasanami wish plaque? Did you go on a day trip to Sasanami?

319551041.speaker: 托特
319551041.content:
How would I have had time for that? It was delivered by courier.
Look on the other side.

319551042.content: Ver turns the plaque over and reads the inscription. As she does, her eyes widen and she involuntarily brings her hand to her mouth. Tears form in the corners of her eyes.

319551044.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319551044.content: That isn't how the Admin talks to me, though...

319551045.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319551045.content: Did the Admin send this? How's the mission in Sasanami going?

319551046.speaker: 托特
319551046.content: There was a slight hiccup with the Akishika family, but it's all resolved now. They're currently resting in Sasanami, and afterwards, they might go visit the Karasugos.

319551047.speaker: 托特
319551047.content:
Oh yes, I think Ningishzida was posted there at some point.
If there's nothing urgent, I'd best be leaving.

319551049.content: Ver grins as she fiddles with the wooden plaque. As she puts it in her pocket, her hand brushes against something else in there.

319551051.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319551051.content: Thoth, here are those wristbands you gave me. I examined them both—the full reports are in there.

319551052.speaker: 托特
319551052.content: Oh, really? Someone was a busy bee yesterday.

319551053.content: Thoth takes the wristband and hooks it up to her terminal. A screen of complicated medical data pops up.

319551054.content: Thoth quickly scans the report as Ver stands to one side, somewhat nervous. She sees Thoth's eyes suddenly widen, and the scrolling of the screen comes to a stop.

319551056.speaker: 托特
319551056.content: Tarina's illness is... a very rare disease...

319551057.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319551057.content: Well, it must be—otherwise, she wouldn't have ended up...

319551060.content: Thoth continues reading the report, more carefully now and with her brow constantly furrowed, although the rest of her expression remains passive. Only once she gets to the end does she let out a sigh.

319551061.speaker: 托特
319551061.content: Let's take care of things one by one. Get tomorrow sorted out first, and then I'll help you think of a way to help her.

319551063.speaker: 托特
319551063.content: I told you, there's no need to be so polite...

319551064.speaker: 托特
319551064.content: Right—let's go and see how Ningishzida's studies are coming along.

319561001.speaker: 托特
319561001.content: One, two, three, four... I haven't miscounted, right? How are we short two people?

319561002.speaker: 拉斐尔
319561002.content: I heard President Red Fox gave them a top secret mission they couldn't get out of.

319561003.speaker: 托特
319561003.content: Well, that's a handy excuse for everything...

319561004.content: The ten of them—eight agents and two Mods—are standing inconspicuously at various points in the street, mere steps away from the CORG restricted area.

319561005.content: Ver and Thoth are sitting on a bench with drinks when Thoth's terminal rings.

319561007.speaker: 宁希达
319561007.content: You've sent people back, so now is a good time. But the situation isn't quite how I pictured it...

319561008.speaker: 宁希达
319561008.content:
Captain Thoth, I know why they're not going to the Source Layer today.
It's not a day off—it's because there was Visbane activity out in the suburbs, so lots of people have been sent out to investigate that.

319561009.speaker: 托特
319561009.content: The suburbs? I don't remember that...

319561011.speaker: 托特
319561011.content: She must be involved. But why today of all days?

319561012.speaker: 宁希达
319561012.content: Do you think it's because we unmasked her, and now she's come to get rid of all the witnesses?

319561013.speaker: 宁希达
319561013.content: Or maybe the Visbanes have just decided to destroy the world early... Oh no, my manga...

319561014.speaker: 托特
319561014.content:
We can't let things out of our control affect us.
Look on the bright side: This is good for our plan.

319561015.speaker: 托特
319561015.content:
Assemble.
Raphael, go and knock on the door. You know what to say.

319561016.speaker: 拉斐尔
319561016.content: Roger, Captain. No one knows them better than me.

319561019.speaker: 宁希达
319561019.content: Ahh, I'm sorry. It's just, I was treating a CORG soldier the other day who was also called Raphael.

319561020.speaker: 拉斐尔
319561020.content: Hahaha, should I be offended that you don't recognize me?

319561022.speaker: 拉斐尔
319561022.content: It was during this same operation ten years ago that I started following Captain Thoth. I still remember you, Dr. Ningishzida.

319561023.content: Ver and Thoth pull up their hoods, and the ten of them follow Raphael's lead. From a street milling with ordinary people, a squad suddenly forms and walks quickly toward the CORG checkpoint.

319561024.content: The soldier stationed there gets up to stop them, but the size of the group and their hard stares give him the impression that this is a convoy of senior leaders, and he backs down.

319561025.speaker: 科尔盖士兵B
319561025.content: Okay, that's the restricted area up ahead.

319561026.content: Raphael doesn't say anything, but he reveals his watch with a practiced hand. The checkpoint scanner identifies the OPRIC signal, and the door automatically opens.

319561028.speaker: 拉斐尔
319561028.content: We're on a top secret mission for the president.

319561029.content: As they pass by the soldier trying to stop them, Raphael places a hand on his shoulder and squeezes with such force it silences him.

319561030.speaker: 拉斐尔
319561030.content: I can see in your eyes that you're curious about our mission. That's not a quality CORG needs in its soldiers. Don't stick your nose in things that aren't your business, rookie.

319561031.speaker: 拉斐尔
319561031.content: Now, tell me. It's 10:11 hours Standard Time on September 8th, 2305. What did you see here?

319561033.content: Raphael pats the soldier's shoulder, then catches up with the rest of his squad, who have already entered the restricted zone.

319561034.speaker: 托特
319561034.content: What did I tell you? "Top secret mission for the president" really is a handy excuse for everything.

319571002.speaker: 宁希达
319571002.content: Yeah, that's right. Just keep going forward.

319571003.speaker: 宁希达
319571003.content: According to the map, there's something big that looks like a CORG high security area up ahead. But I reckon all the monitoring equipment will be off at the moment. Let me rerun some checks...

319571004.content: The evacuated Nordburg is eerily quiet, like the end of the world has come. Beyond the labyrinthine streets and buildings, the giant space rift continues to approach.

319571005.content: Ver hasn't seen a soul since she's been here. It's like being in a ghost town. The only thing stopping her from freaking out is the sound of Ningishzida's voice in her earpiece.

319571006.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571006.content: How are Captain Thoth and everyone else getting on?

319571007.speaker: 宁希达
319571007.content:
It sounds like they've found something, but I don't understand what they're talking about.
Don't worry about it—you can trust them to get the job done.

319571008.speaker: 宁希达
319571008.content: How's everything on your end? How much more time will it take you?

319571009.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571009.content: Ten minutes, maybe, if I don't need Divine Power.

319571011.content: She walks for a while in silence, then hears Ningishzida let out a long sigh.

319571013.speaker: 宁希达
319571013.content: No, no, I'm just sitting here at camp. Not tired at all.

319571014.speaker: 宁希达
319571014.content: ...Norn, can you tell me again what happens to me in ten years' time?

319571015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571015.content: Huh? You want to talk about that now?

319571016.speaker: 宁希达
319571016.content: I kinda want to know, but I also don't want to. It doesn't really have anything to do with me, but it also does.

319571017.speaker: 宁希达
319571017.content: You just so happen to have ten minutes left. If there's nothing else to do, we can talk as much as you want.

319571018.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571018.content: I don't even know how to talk about it. A Mod's appearance doesn't change, and their personality generally doesn't, either. Actually, I haven't noticed any difference in you.

319571019.speaker: 宁希达
319571019.content: Ugh. So I'm destined to always be a weakling?

319571020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571020.content: What are you talking about? You're so brave! We'd all be lost without you!

319571021.speaker: 宁希达
319571021.content:
But whenever I see an enemy in the Plane Layer, I always run off and hide in the corner.
... It's not that I don't want to go. I love going out on missions with you guys.

319571022.speaker: 宁希达
319571022.content: I just never request to get sent out into the field. I stay in the hospital all day. Sometimes I wonder if I'm even a real Modifier.

319571023.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571023.content: Why would you think you're not? The Medics, the Cryptics, the Intelligence Office... Everyone plays a vital role.

319571024.speaker: 宁希达
319571024.content: But they're not the same, are they? The captains all know that people are needed to do these things, so they stay in the Logistics Department. I'm just scared to...

319571025.speaker: 宁希达
319571025.content: So when I found out you guys have come from ten years into the future, it got me thinking... Am I any braver in ten years' time, or am I still a burden to everyone?

319571026.speaker: 宁希达
319571026.content: Although Captain Thoth has told me that I will save many people in the future, I can't quite see how I'll manage to do that yet...

319571027.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571027.content: You don't have to think so hard. Just do it when the time comes.

319571029.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571029.content: Really. Thoth was telling me just yesterday that you went on a mission to Sasanami to deal with a Cognizant Visbane.

319571031.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571031.content: So, you'll just keep growing and get better over time. I may be with the Special Task Force, but I was scared of Visbanes too at the beginning. But I'm completely used to them now.

319571032.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571032.content: Of course, we always feel a little awkward and inept when doing something for the first time. But the truth is, all our past experiences and everything we've learned have prepared us for that very first step.

319571033.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571033.content: Even if you don't know what the end result would be, or even if you make mistakes sometimes... as long as you do it, you'll become better and better.

319571034.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571034.content: While I do firmly believe that having a medic behind us is vital to any mission, if you want to try something else too, I'm sure you can do it!

319571037.speaker: 宁希达
319571037.content: I mean... I did take on a Cognizant Visbane. It was terrifying but... I'm still here, aren't I?

319571039.content: Ver is bemused by this exchange and wants to continue, but then her earpiece starts to crackle with loud static.

319571040.content: She hadn't noticed it, but the connection on her terminal is almost completely gone. A message from Ningishzida pops up on her watch.

319571041.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571041.content: "You won't have much signal around there. Be careful."

319571042.content: Ver keeps walking, looking around in all directions but not seeing anything of concern. The map indicates that the CORG research institute disguised as a chamber of commerce is just up ahead.

319571043.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571043.content: (I'm with OPRIC, I'm with OPRIC, I'm with OPRIC, I'm with OPRIC, I'm with OPRIC...)

319571044.content: While seeming to chant a magic spell, Ver walks into a research institute that's just as deserted as Nordburg.

319571045.content: As soon as she's verified her false identity, a secret door to the basement opens with an ominous and bone-rattling rumble. Ver covers her ears as she ducks through the crack.

319571047.content: The research institute looks like it was abandoned some time ago. All of the equipment is switched off, and there's no sign of anyone anywhere. It's so quiet, it's eerie.

319571048.content: Ver has the vague sense she's seen some of this equipment before, but she's not here to explore. Her heart in her throat, she follows the route Thoth indicated on the map until she reaches the archives.

319571049.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319571049.content: Well, that was easier than I thought... Did Thoth send me out on a child's mission to get me out of the way?

319571050.content: She can speculate on Thoth's motives however much she wants, but at the end of the day, this mission still needs to be done by someone.

319571051.content: Ver finds the archive's host computer and switches it on using the room's back-up power supply, like Thoth showed her. She then searches for "Project Forgetower" and downloads all of the resulting documents onto the flash drive Thoth gave her.

319571052.content: No alarms are triggered and the data copies across without incident, and Ver begins to feel uneasy at how easy this all is. She clutches the storage disk in her pocket tightly and leaves without looking back while trying to raise the rest of her team.

319571054.content: Her earpiece still buzzes with nothing but static. It's as though the entire building is full of electrical interference.

319571055.content: Right as Ver is typing out a message to Thoth on her watch, the sound of something heavy crashing to the ground almost makes her jump out of her skin.

319571058.speaker: ？？？
319571058.content: You know, when you go into someone else's house, you should at least greet the host.

319581001.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319581001.content: ...Lokken, what are you trying to do?

319581002.speaker: 洛肯
319581002.content: The game needs to have a winner and a loser... Are you refusing to admit defeat because you want to be a good student? I can see how out of breath you are, you know!

319581003.speaker: 洛肯
319581003.content: If you keep being this stubborn, you might actually not survive!

319581004.content: Ver really doesn't want to admit defeat, partly because she's very competitive, and partly because she doesn't even know why they're fighting and it's making her mad.

319581005.content: However, she gets her emotions under control when she feels her terminal and watch both vibrate at the same time.

319581007.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319581007.content: Hold on a sec... Okay, okay, you win. Do you mind if I take this?

319581008.content: Lokken tuts, annoyed at the insincerity of Ver's concession of defeat. Nevertheless, she tells the AGI Mechas to stop.

319581009.speaker: 洛肯
319581009.content: She's not a sore loser, I'll give her that...

319581010.speaker: 托特
319581010.content: Finally—where have you been?... Hello, do you copy?... Why is the signal so bad?

319581012.speaker: 洛肯
319581012.content: Hey, can you turn it up a little bit?

319581015.speaker: 洛肯
319581015.content: I don't like secrets. Put it on loudspeaker, I want to hear. Otherwise I'll start things up again.

319581016.content: Lokken looks serious, so Ver has to switch on the communicator's loudspeaker mode.

319581017.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319581017.content:
It's Lokken... No, it's nothing.
I'm in the institute, and I've got what you wanted. What's the matter?

319581018.speaker: 托特
319581018.content: It's a long story. We found the location you were talking about, and there's a structure in the middle that might be what we're looking for... But Turing and Gremory are there, too.

319581023.speaker: 托特
319581023.content: No, but it was worse than that... The Cleansers came, hundreds of them, and it looks like they're heading for the Structure.

319581024.speaker: 托特
319581024.content:
Turing wants to protect the Structure too, so we've temporarily joined forces.
You need to go to camp and call for backup. Tell CORG to send everyone they can spare...

319581026.content: Hearing Lokken whoop in excitement, Ver turns to look at her and sees she's already running off, up the stairs.

319581028.speaker: 洛肯
319581028.content: Sounds like you need people to help take on the Visbanes! So you could use somebody like me!

319581029.speaker: 洛肯
319581029.content: Tell Captain Thoth to hold the fire. I'll be there ASAP.

319581030.content: There's an explosion like a bomb going off, and a large crack appears in the steps. Lokken's body flickers like a ghost as she sprints out of the exit.

319581031.content: Ver stares open-mouthed, clueless as to what Lokken is up to. She sends Ningishzida a quick message telling her to get help, then takes off after Lokken.

319591001.content: Lokken is fast, and her destination is extremely clear. It's as though someone is controlling her.

319591002.content: Running though the streets of Nordburg in pursuit of the space rift, Ver and Lokken enter the Source Layer one after the other.

319591004.content: The Source Layer is filled with a thousand-meter belt of violet light. It reminds Ver of the color of the space that had surrounded her before.

319591005.content: Equipment brought in by CORG agents is set up along the perimeter of the light belt. It feels like this equipment is the only reason the light belt persists.

319591008.speaker: 洛肯
319591008.content: This is all very exciting, isn't it? I wonder what kind of Cognizant Visbanes we'll see inside?

319591009.content: Lokken licks her lips, then, without warning, scurries back to where Ver is.

319591010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319591010.content: Are you sure you want to go in? I don't want to be a downer here, but Turing is incredibly strong. We've never beaten him.

319591011.speaker: 洛肯
319591011.content: If we couldn't go in unless we were sure we would win, what would we even be needed for?

319591012.speaker: 洛肯
319591012.content: Let's go! This will be fun!

319591013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319591013.content: No! Thoth didn't give the... Ahhh!

319591014.content: Lokken grabs Ver's arm and forcefully drags her along, like a bloodhound that's picked up a scent, before making them both leap into the belt of light.

319591015.content: All of their usual senses are muffled, as though they were underwater. The noise seems even louder when they resurface.

319591016.speaker: 托特
319591016.content: Norn? What are you doing here?

319591018.speaker: 洛肯
319591018.content: Wow! Captain Thoth, this is intense! Looks like I came at just the right time!

319591019.content: Just three days ago, this place was calm and tranquil. Now it's swarming with Cleansers from all directions as they besiege the Structure in the center.

319591020.content: There seem to be two main squads trying to stop these bizarre machines from reaching the Structure. One is made up of CORG agents, while the other only has two people but is fending off 70% of the wave.

319591021.speaker: 图灵
319591021.content: CORG reinforcements? The one in front is strong.

319591023.speaker: 托特
319591023.content: Lokken, how did you find this place?

319591024.speaker: 洛肯
319591024.content: Paracaesar asked me to come, duh.

319591025.content: Lokken rolls up her sleeves, shakes the watch on her wrist, then charges into the battle with the CORG agents.

319591026.speaker: 洛肯
319591026.content: Well, don't just stand there, Verthandi!

319591027.content: The battle seems to be trailing off, and no more Cleansers appear. Ver and Lokken's arrival hastens the inevitable ending, and before long all remaining Cleansers have been dispatched.

319591028.content: As the third party's strength wanes, the other two gradually increase the distance between them.

319591029.speaker: 拉斐尔
319591029.content: Captain, shall we make the first move?

319591030.speaker: 托特
319591030.content: There's no rush—he just agreed. Let's talk...

319591031.speaker: 洛肯
319591031.content: Talk? With those two over there?

319591032.speaker: 洛肯
319591032.content: Captain Thoth, are you crazy? They're the enemy.

319591033.speaker: 托特
319591033.content: I don't care what Paracaesar sent you here to do—I'm the commander here.

319591034.speaker: 洛肯
319591034.content:
Yeah yeah yeah, you're the commander.
I'm just not interested in whatever it is you're commanding.

319591035.content: Lokken's eyes remain fixed on Turing and Gremory as she talks, and she does nothing to hide the fact that they're the people she's staring at.

319591036.speaker: 洛肯
319591036.content: Turing's the man, Gremory's the woman?

319591038.content: Without warning, Lokken suddenly launches herself toward Turing, who's still talking with Gremory.

319591039.content: The black ghost flashes with red and green light and then, in the blink of an eye, Lokken appears above Turing and strikes at his head with her Access Key.

319591040.content: Turing raises his left hand and blocks the blow with seemingly little effort, then grabs Lokken by the elbow before the tentacles can wrap themselves around his arm.

319591042.content: Before the CORG agents even have time to raise their weapons and react, Turing has viciously hurled Lokken to the side and slammed her into the floor.

319591045.content: But Ver doesn't listen. She runs over to Lokken and helps her up. Lokken spits out a mouthful of blood, but the hostile sneer is still on her face.

319591046.speaker: 洛肯
319591046.content: Do I look like I need help getting up?

319591047.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319591047.content: I told you Turing was strong. Don't go over there again. It doesn't matter what he's found.

319591048.speaker: 洛肯
319591048.content: ...Why do you care about me more than CORG does?

319591049.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319591049.content: You might be a pain in the butt, but you're still a Mod.

319591050.speaker: 洛肯
319591050.content: A Mod... Hahahaha, a Mod!... (Cough cough)

319591051.content: Although she doesn't know what Lokken finds so funny, Ver still props her up and walks her back to the CORG team.

319591052.speaker: 托特
319591052.content: Turing, Gremory, I trust you haven't forgotten the deal we just made?

319591053.speaker: 图灵
319591053.content:
I'm a man of my word. Everyone has the right to find out the truth.
But if she tries to attack me again, you're going to regret it.

319591055.speaker: 托特
319591055.content: Stop talking and take a team to collect the data now.

319591056.content: The agents fan out and begin running tests on the Structure. Not a single one of them registers any fear, even though the powerful enemies that had been trying to kill them just now are still present.

319591057.speaker: 图灵
319591057.content: Miss Thoth, when did CORG find out about our real identities?

319591058.speaker: 托特
319591058.content: The second they caught you on the city surveillance cameras.

319591059.speaker: 图灵
319591059.content: Surveillance cameras? That's all it took?

319591060.speaker: 托特
319591060.content: Of course not. CORG has data on every human being's soul, plus technology that detects Bane Energy. It wasn't hard to realize there was something off about you two.

319591061.speaker: 图灵
319591061.content: So I wasn't as undercover as I thought. But why did they wait until now to act against us?

319591062.speaker: 图灵
319591062.content: As far as I'm aware, most Modifier are disgusted by what you call "Visbanes,"

319591063.speaker: 托特
319591063.content: Visbanes are a threat to human civilization, so we must eliminate them. Are you two also a threat to humans?

319591064.speaker: 图灵
319591064.content: We are not interested in killing.

319591066.content: Ver listens to this exchange, dumbfounded. She can't tell if Thoth is being genuine or not.

319591067.content: Neither turns out to be overly communicative, though, and the dialog doesn't progress much. It's not until the agents pack up their equipment that Turing turns to look at Thoth again.

319591069.speaker: 拉斐尔
319591069.content: We've finished collecting all of the indicators Director Paracaesar requested, and we have what you wanted as well.

319591071.speaker: 图灵
319591071.content:
Ten minutes on the dot.
And now, per our agreement, please leave.

319591073.speaker: 托特
319591073.content: A deal's a deal. We got what we came for. Let's move out!

319591074.content: The agents follow Thoth to the edge of the platform, while Ver still needs to help Lokken walk. The agents then jump off of the edge, disappearing into the void below.

319591075.content: Thoth waits for the last two stragglers. Just as they're about to reach her, Lokken stops in her tracks.

319591076.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319591076.content: Come on, Lokken. You need to forget about them.

319591077.speaker: 洛肯
319591077.content: Captain Thoth... are you sure your mission is complete?

319591078.speaker: 托特
319591078.content: Yes. Whatever it is Turing wants to accomplish, it has nothing to do with us.

319591079.speaker: 洛肯
319591079.content: Oh... then you guys should go back.

319591080.content: Ver and Thoth both have the same bad feeling about what's about to happen, and it's confirmed when they see Lokken smile.

319591081.content: She places a hand on each of their chests and gives a slight push to tip them over the edge. She waves down at them as they fall.

319591083.speaker: 洛肯
319591083.content: ...I look forward to playing with you again.

319601002.speaker: 托特
319601002.content: No. What on earth was Paracaesar thinking...?

319601003.speaker: 托特
319601003.content: No, no—how could I think Paracaesar had anything to do with this?

319601004.content: Everyone makes it safely back to the Source Layer. The only person missing is Lokken. The violet light still glows in the distance, but it looks like a one-way channel.

319601005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319601005.content: Thoth, we have to go back and save her. She's staying to fight Turing!

319601006.speaker: 托特
319601006.content: You heard what Turing said. If Lokken attacks him, he'll treat us like the enemy the next time we return.

319601007.speaker: 托特
319601007.content: You know more about Turing than I do. Even if the watch does protect against the hyperspace...

319601009.speaker: 托特
319601009.content: I suggest you forget I said anything.

319601010.speaker: 托特
319601010.content: The data we collected from the Structure matches up with the clues we found perfectly. We can essentially confirm that the Structure is somehow related to the source of Visbanes.

319601011.speaker: 托特
319601011.content: Initially, CORG didn't find this place at all. If Turing and Gremory were up to something important in Molander and we didn't realize it, it would seem like this is the only reasonable explanation.

319601012.speaker: 托特
319601012.content: Your Administrator has confronted Turing before, and I hear they're also searching for the source of Visbanes. I have a feeling that this is where they're getting clues from.

319601013.speaker: 托特
319601013.content: So it seems very likely that Turing has come into contact with the Structure in the past, and that it's their final goal.

319601014.speaker: 托特
319601014.content: We can't stop him. Or, more accurately, we can't deal with the consequences of stopping him.

319601015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319601015.content: So you're saying it's okay if Lokken doesn't make it?

319601016.speaker: 托特
319601016.content: That's not what I meant. We at least need to wait for back-up to arrive...

319601017.speaker: 拉斐尔
319601017.content: Captain Thoth! The entrance is closing!

319601018.content: As everyone watches, the light curtain slowly begins retracting from its edges, like a castle drawbridge being shut. Before long, it is so weak, there's little point in keeping the monitoring displays on.

319601021.content: The sudden sound of footsteps draws Thoth's attention away from the spectacle of the shrinking light curtain, but it's too late. Ver has taken off at top speed, climbing onto the closest platform and leaping into the fading light.

319601022.content: She disappears into the void just as the light does.

319601023.speaker: 托特
319601023.content: You must be kidding me, Verthandi... Are you trying to scare me to death?

319601024.speaker: 拉斐尔
319601024.content: What are your orders, Captain Thoth?

319601025.speaker: 托特
319601025.content: ...We're not going back just yet. Scan the entrance once more.

319601026.speaker: 托特
319601026.content: Even if she needs to be transported back to the Surface Layer for medical attention, we can't go until we have the report from the Engineering Department.

319601027.content: Her terminal suddenly sounds, and Thoth fumbles to answer it. He doesn't take note of the name on the screen until she hears the voice in her earpiece.

319601028.speaker: 托特
319601028.content: I know you're watching. You should have shown up earlier.

319601030.speaker: 图灵
319601030.content: You can try a thousand more times and it still won't work.

319601031.content: Turing shakes his head as he parries yet another attack. Seeing Lokken battered, bruised, and exhausted brings what could almost be described as pity to his eyes.

319601032.speaker: 图灵
319601032.content:
I think we've wasted enough time.
I've sealed this place off, so no one's coming to rescue you.

319601033.speaker: 洛肯
319601033.content: You're right, we have wasted enough time... So why aren't you making your next move?

319601034.speaker: 图灵
319601034.content: Your Divine Power is impure. You're not like those other Modifiers. You have no reason to hate me.

319601035.speaker: 洛肯
319601035.content:
I don't care how strong you are—can you just stop spouting nonsense?
I'm a Modifier. I don't need a reason to kill Visbanes.

319601037.content: Lokken's face darkens upon hearing this, before her expression is consumed by hatred and she launches another frenzied attack against Turing.

319601038.speaker: 洛肯
319601038.content: I'm scared of... someone else killing you instead of me!

319601040.content: Turing shakes his head again, then casually waves his palm at a nearby wall. Lokken is violently thrown into it by some powerful force.

319601041.content: As she crumbles to the ground, Turing forges a sharp spike from a chunk of rock and sends it flying in Lokken's direction.

319601043.content: Ver opens her eyes just in time to see this happening. She throws herself between Lokken and the spike without a second thought.

319601044.content: The spike hits her shield at a steep angle and is deflected less than a meter away from Lokken. The force of the impact still causes Ver to stagger back.

319601045.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319601045.content: I made it. Are you okay?

319601047.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319601047.content: Oh yeah, sorry. I can see that you're injured. I shouldn't have asked.

319601049.content: Turing frowns upon seeing Ver arrive. With his ability to modify the laws of physics, he is extremely sensitive to changes in energy.

319601050.speaker: 图灵
319601050.content: What do you have inside of you?

319601051.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319601051.content: Sorry, I didn't come here to chat. You continue with what you were doing. I'm just going to take Lokken home.

319601052.speaker: 图灵
319601052.content: Oh no no no, she's not important...

319601053.content: Turing hurries over to Ver and scrutinizes her like she's an interesting exam topic.

319601054.speaker: 图灵
319601054.content: Do you ever feel... confused about yourself? Like this?

319601055.content: Turing turns his palm toward Ver, then quickly clenches his fist. She suddenly feels an intense, searing pain in all of her organs. She instantly begins to sweat and is forced to lean on her sword to stay standing.

319601057.content: As though drawn out by Turing's power, a corrosive and destructive energy begins to emanate from Ver, leaving patterns of strange crimson lines on her skin.

319601059.content: Ver's vision is gradually blurring from the pain. She forcefully clutches her chest, but it feels like she's grabbed hold of a sword instead.

319601060.content: She struggles to toss this sword aside, and boy, does she try every maneuver possible... But the harder she tries, the more it feels like the sword has become a part of her body, like a dream demon that has wrapped itself around her, from her arms to her heart.

319601063.content: The glimpse of what flashed before Ver has taken her breath away. She falls into a trance-like stance, as if some kind of balance deep within her has been disturbed.

319601064.content: The ground beneath the platform starts to crack from the pressure of Ver's energy, and the look of surprise on Turing's face grows. Then, finally, he lowers his hand, as if he's made some important discovery.

319601065.speaker: 图灵
319601065.content: Well, I certainly wasn't expecting this.

319601066.speaker: 图灵
319601066.content: I would very much like to talk to you again once I've found the "revelation" here. Maybe I can help you... or maybe we can help each other.

319601067.content: Ver is completely drained, and it's all she can do to clutch her sword with both hands to stop herself from keeling over. She doesn't even register what Turing said, or the cold look on Lokken's face, for she's busy taking in great gulps of air.

319601069.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319601069.content: Nothing... Keep an eye on Turing.

319601070.content: But Turing is no longer interested in either of them. He's returned to the Structure, where he slowly levitates in the air and then extends a Bane Energy crystal in his hand toward the center of the Structure.

319601072.content: The Structure appears to react to Turing's proximity, for its core begins to glow with a dazzling white light.

319601073.content: Noticing the change, Ver looks up. What's left of the color in her face drains away, and she uses her remaining strength to drag Lokken behind a wall to take cover.

319601074.speaker: 洛肯
319601074.content: What are we taking cover from?

319601075.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319601075.content: Turing's about to have a very bad day.

319601076.content: Turing overhears their conversation just as his hand comes into contact with the Structure, but before he can comprehend what she means, a circular shock wave explodes outward from the Structure's core.

319601077.content: The very air seems to vibrate as the shock wave moves through it, and it's powerful enough to send even Turing flying. It's all he can do to keep himself steady, but the Bane Energy around his arms has almost completely dissipated.
