319601080.content: But Turing appears somewhat lost in thought, though he quickly raises his hand to summon a shield made up of both Divine Grace and Bane Energy above him.

319601081.speaker: 图灵
319601081.content:
There's nothing more we can gain from this place.
Gremory, get ready to go.

319601082.content: A giant fireball, almost sun-like, has appeared out of nowhere in the previously empty sky. Turing has raised his shield just in time—a millisecond later, the fireball blasts him with a beam of light that knocks him out of the air and onto the platform.

319601083.content: Space-time seems to rip open with the roar of the light beam, and flowers can be seen blooming on the other side. Then, in the blink of an eye, the two Cognizant Visbanes disappear and the light beam abruptly stops.

319601084.speaker: 洛肯
319601084.content: What in the world was that?

319601085.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319601085.content: I don't think it's over yet...

319601086.content: Ver is still looking up, and Lokken follows her gaze.

319601087.content: Like a swarm of bees emerging from their hive, an endless stream of Cleansers drop out of the fireball and head straight for the Structure.

319611001.content: The aftermath of the explosion gradually subsides, and Ver breathes a sigh of relief. She pokes her head out from behind the wall to look at the Structure.

319611002.content: It's disappeared. All of the Cleansers must also have been vaporized in the explosion, and the area is now as quiet as a theater after the shows are long finished.

319611004.content: Ver runs to the edge of the platform and looks down. She thinks there's something slightly different about it now, compared to before.

319611005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319611005.content: Hey, let's just wait for Thoth to find us. Back-up should be here any minute now.

319611006.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319611006.content: But if we're stuck here for too long, will they ever manage to find us? We'd be done for.

319611007.speaker: 洛肯
319611007.content: Wouldn't that be a good thing?

319611008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319611008.content: Huh? How would that be a good thing?

319611009.speaker: 洛肯
319611009.content: Wouldn't it be nice for it to just be me and you?

319611010.content: Lokken stands up and leans against the wall, looking down at Ver.

319611011.speaker: 洛肯
319611011.content: You know Turing would never kill you?

319611012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319611012.content: I did think that, but I can't be sure.

319611013.speaker: 洛肯
319611013.content: Is it because you're the same as him?

319611014.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319611014.content: What are you talking about? Don't trust anything he says.

319611015.speaker: 洛肯
319611015.content: I don't trust him... but I don't trust you, either.

319611016.speaker: 洛肯
319611016.content: That energy coming out of you before? That was Bane Energy. In its purest form. No mistake.

319611017.speaker: 洛肯
319611017.content: You're the same as Turing—you have both Divine Grace and Bane Energy inside of you. You've been "contaminated."

319611018.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319611018.content: Don't talk like that! I think I was infected by Bane Energy before, but I'm getting better now.

319611019.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319611019.content: Thoth and the other agents all know about it, and they don't think it's a problem.

319611020.speaker: 洛肯
319611020.content: So why are they so accepting toward you, then?!

319611021.content: Startled by Lokken suddenly raising her voice, Ver doesn't know what to say and just stammers.

319611022.speaker: 洛肯
319611022.content: Don't you think it's unfair? You get to live like a human, make all the mistakes you want, and everyone will just forgive you, sympathize with you, support you...

319611023.speaker: 洛肯
319611023.content: I've never had any of that, but I don't care. All I want is one thing: to be able to go and do what Mods are supposed to do, and get rid of all the Visbanes in the world.

319611024.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319611024.content: Lokken, I don't think you understand...

319611025.speaker: 洛肯
319611025.content:
No, now is not the time for you to speak. I want you to listen to me!
Have you had people call you "junk" before? I've spent my whole life not being able to live up to other people's expectations, so they just treat me like trash.

319611026.speaker: 洛肯
319611026.content: And I know why Director Paracaesar called me that. She must have thought there was no way I could be a match for someone like Turing.

319611027.speaker: 洛肯
319611027.content: But it's not true. It's not true...Ha!

319611028.content: Lokken chuckles, and her eyes suddenly harden. Just like what happened when the two of them first met in the Source Layer, without warning, she raises her weapon and swings it at Ver.

319611030.speaker: 洛肯
319611030.content: Someone like you was clearly exactly like me in the beginning, but now look at the difference between us! Compared to me, you're the one who's junk, Verthandi.

319611031.speaker: 洛肯
319611031.content: I have a purpose now. I'm a weapon that can kill Turing, and I can do it on my own! Anyone else is just a bit player, a nobody!

319611032.speaker: 洛肯
319611032.content: No one is watching what's happening here right now. Even if you fell, nobody would know...

319611033.content: Lokken resumes a fighting stance and cocks her head to one side, staring at Ver.

319611034.speaker: 洛肯
319611034.content: Do you remember? I told you a long time ago, phoney, that I'd be more serious the next time we met.

419065.content: Things Shouldn't Have Turned Out This Way

419067.content: All The Way To The End

1101905001.content: I walk alone in this world cloaked in fog.

1101905002.content: I have but one thought left in my mind: keep moving forward no matter what. I must keep on going for everyone's sake.

1101905003.content: I mustn't stop. This is the way I resist, and the only thing I can do.

1101905004.content:
I suddenly come to a point where the path ahead of me is clear of the fog, and I can now see her figure in the distance like always, like a shining beacon in the darkness.
Just how much effort will it take to get to that place?

1101905005.speaker: 我
1101905005.content: Wait for me. I'm coming to be with you...

1101905006.content:
I have to get to her, for I mustn't let her keep on fighting by herself.
I summon all the strength left in me to run toward her.

1101905007.content:
But I can hear cracking sounds in the ice under my feet, and I soon fall into a freezing cold and bottomless abyss.
It feels like I'm drowning. I continue falling, falling, falling...

1101905009.content: I sit up in my bed as I gasp desperately for air. My pajamas are soaked in the cold sweat from my back.

1101905010.content: I look over at the digital clock on the bedside table. It's 03:22 in the morning.

1101905011.content:
I walk toward the bathroom testily, and stand under the shower to wash away the sweat on my body.
Once done, I plop onto the sofa, and stare in a daze at the message from Mimir that's appeared on the table.

1101905012.content: Symptom: Insomnia     Duration: 34 days and counting

1101905014.speaker: 我
1101905014.content:
Do not blindly confront the Behemoth Type Visbane head-on!
Draw the attention of the BT to disrupt its actions. And look out for its attacks!

1101905016.speaker: 我
1101905016.content:
There are still some Primal Type Visbanes in the area. Destroy them and keep them from joining forces with the BT!
Then, once you eliminate the Primal Type Visbanes, provide support immediately!

1101905017.speaker: 新人修正者B
1101905017.content: Bah! With our training, those Primal Type Visbanes are easy as pie to deal with!

1101905018.speaker: 我
1101905018.content: Last man is to keep up the long-range attack. Don't let it get out of here!

1101905019.speaker: 新人修正者C
1101905019.content: Roger that. Aiming rocket... and fired!

1101905020.content: The rookie Modifiers fight the Visbanes by harnessing their various strengths and expertise, and the battle unfolds exactly as I expected.

1101905021.content: Eventually, through everyone's efforts, the BT is eliminated without much danger.

1101905022.speaker: 新人修正者A
1101905022.content: We... did it!!!! We really destroyed that BT!!!

1101905023.speaker: 我
1101905023.content: Don't let your guard down just yet. Survey your surroundings first to prevent nasty surprises.

1101905024.speaker: 新人修正者A
1101905024.content:
Ah, yes, sorry Admin!
...We've checked the surrounding area and no Bane Energy has been detected. We're safe.

1101905025.content: Hearing these words, I finally rest easy, and the tension in my body slowly disappears.

1101905026.speaker: 我
1101905026.content: I hereby declare the operation over. Thanks, everyone, for your hard work.

1101905027.speaker: 我
1101905027.content: You were assigned to this operation as you were the Modifier squad that was closest to the scene. Although you are rookies who've yet to complete your training, you managed to defeat the exceedingly powerful BT anyway. Well done.

1101905028.speaker: 新人修正者A
1101905028.content: We were only able to successfully eliminate the Visbane thanks to your battlefield experience and command, Admin.

1101905029.speaker: 我
1101905029.content:
Thank you.
You may come back now. The other Modifiers will now take over the scene. And don't forget about that final evaluation you have tonight.

1101905030.speaker: 新人修正者B
1101905030.content: Huh. But we just eliminated this really powerful Visbane, Admin. Can't you apply some discretion and let us pass already?

1101905031.speaker: 我
1101905031.content: I wish I could do that. But unfortunately, I have to discharge my responsibilities toward you and follow the procedures, too.

1101905033.speaker: 我
1101905033.content: But what I can say for sure is that your squad has already outperformed most rookie squads, and I believe you can easily pass the evaluation. I wish you the best of luck, and I look forward to seeing you on the battlefield in the future.

1101905035.content:
I hang up on the call and try to move my stiff neck.
While there were some unexpected situations along the way, the rookies did manage to complete their training mission in the end.

1101905036.content: Just as I'm thinking about what to do next, I smell a faint fragrance. I turn back to see a figure standing behind me.

1101905037.content: The figure is the same as the one that's been ahead of me all this time in my dream.

1101905039.speaker: 我
1101905039.content:
Shu!
You know, you shouldn't skulk around without a sound like that.

1101905040.speaker: 休
1101905040.content: Command requires focus, and I didn't want to distract you since I'm here for something else.

1101905041.speaker: 我
1101905041.content: Let me guess... Are you here about the rookie training today?

1101905042.speaker: 休
1101905042.content: That's right. I'd like to look in on the group of Modifiers that joined us recently.

1101905043.speaker: 我
1101905043.content: I get you. After all, you were the one who was in charge of training the rookies previously, Shu.

1101905044.speaker: 休
1101905044.content: Well, the job is all yours now. How are you finding it so far?

1101905045.speaker: 我
1101905045.content: Well, I've familiarized myself with the training flow, and I'm now also able to deal with unexpected situations like what happened earlier.

1101905046.speaker: 休
1101905046.content: That's good to hear. The General Office can get quite busy as it is, and you're the only one holding the fort. My concern is that the rookie training will only place a greater burden on you.

1101905047.speaker: 我
1101905047.content:
I can handle it on my end, Shu. And I'm glad to be of help to you.
But how's your work at the board of directors going, Shu?

1101905048.speaker: 休
1101905048.content: It's been going well for me too.

1101905049.speaker: 休
1101905049.content: A rookie team dealing with a BT... I didn't think we'd run into the same situation as your first command mission.

1101905051.speaker: 休
1101905051.content: The stand-in commander at that time has really come into their own. And now you've even become the subject of admiration for our rookie Modifiers!

1101905052.speaker: 我
1101905052.content: I couldn't have done it without your guidance, Miss Shu.

1101905053.speaker: 我
1101905053.content:
You can leave the training of the rookies to me.
But looking at your face... is there something else still bothering you, Shu?

1101905054.speaker: 休
1101905054.content: It's just that I happened to hear something, and wanted to check in with you.

1101905056.speaker: 休
1101905056.content: The Modifiers who perform the night patrols tell me that they often see the lights on in your office. Have you been working all-nighters lately, Admin?

1101905057.speaker: 我
1101905057.content: Not really. Sometimes I wake up in the middle of the night and can't get back to sleep. When that happens I usually just come back in to work.

1101905058.speaker: 休
1101905058.content: You do look rather poorly, Admin. Are you aware of that?

1101905060.content: I look at the reflection of my face on the screen. I do look a little wan, with bloodshot eyes and heavy dark circles around them.

1101905061.speaker: 休
1101905061.content: Also, what's with this pile of empty coffee cans on your desk? Did you drink them all in one night?

1101905062.speaker: 我
1101905062.content: Of course not. The pile's from the past few days. I'll clear it out later.

1101905063.speaker: 休
1101905063.content: Do you need to take a rest?

1101905064.speaker: 我
1101905064.content: No. I won't be able to sleep even if I do lie down. And I still have work to do.

1101905065.speaker: 休
1101905065.content: You still have work to do? Let me take a look.

1101905066.content: Shu then takes out a notebook and a pen, and writes something down.

1101905067.content: This is what Shu always does: write things down using the good ol' notebook and pen. But I've never learned just what she's writing down in her notebook.

1101905068.speaker: 休
1101905068.content: According to the work calendar, your work for the morning should already be completed, Admin. And all that's left for you is the evaluation and training for our rookie Modifiers later in the evening.

1101905069.speaker: 我
1101905069.content: Looks like you've got my schedule at your fingertips, Shu... But what did you just write in your notebook?

1101905070.speaker: 休
1101905070.content: Are you curious about what's inside?

1101905072.content: I'd be lying if I said I'm not. Other people's secrets are like honey, full of temptation.

1101905074.content: I shake my head vigorously, for reason tells me that this is the correct answer.

1101905075.speaker: 休
1101905075.content: Quite the emphatic answer. But you can tell me if you're really curious, you know.

1101905076.speaker: 我
1101905076.content: I've been seeing you write in that notebook of yours since the day I started working at Aether Gazer, and I've been wondering what it is that you've been writing in there.

1101905077.speaker: 休
1101905077.content: I usually jot down the interesting things that happen each day, as well as thoughts about the day's work. Of course, I also journal every day.

1101905078.speaker: 我
1101905078.content:
Not many people use a physical notebook to journal these days. Why not do that on an electronic device instead?
After all, with an electronic device, you can access and modify content whenever you want.

1101905079.speaker: 休
1101905079.content: But there's the risk of someone else sneaking a look at it if it's on an electronic device.

1101905080.speaker: 我
1101905080.content:
Someone else sneaking a look...? That's impossible.
With your level of authority in Aether Gazer, no one should be able to access—

1101905084.speaker: 我
1101905084.content: But surely Odin wouldn't violate someone else's privacy just like that...?

1101905085.speaker: 休
1101905085.content: Well, you know how Odin is.

1101905086.content: ...Now that I think about it, if Odin knew that Shu was writing an electronic journal, she'd certainly take a peek at it.

1101905087.speaker: 休
1101905087.content: There are things I don't want her to know, too. You know, like my secrets.

1101905088.speaker: 休
1101905088.content: So, Admin, based on your work calendar, you do have some free time right now, am I right?

1101905090.content: I get the sense that Shu wants some help from me.

1101905091.speaker: 休
1101905091.content: I want to head out for a bit. Since you can't get to sleep, would you like to come with me?

1101905092.speaker: 我
1101905092.content: Sure, not a problem at all. Are you heading out to take a look at the companies that Aether Gazer has investments in?

1101905094.speaker: 我
1101905094.content: Then what are you planning to do?

1101905095.speaker: 休
1101905095.content:
To take a walk and get some fresh air.
Just come out with me. Your morning work is done, anyway.

1101905096.content: 10:00. At a park on the outskirts of Ain Soph's Core City.

1101905097.content: I'm at this beautiful park, far away from the city and the maddening crowd. Here, as I breathe in the air scented with the fragrance of grass and trees and feel the sunshine on my skin, a rare calm starts to come over me.

1101905098.speaker: 我
1101905098.content: (Exhales) I feel so much better already.

1101905099.speaker: 休
1101905099.content: Have you been here before, Admin?

1101905100.speaker: 我
1101905100.content: I've been to the parks in the city several times, but this is my first time at this one.

1101905101.speaker: 休
1101905101.content: You can do mountain hiking here. The view from the top of that hill there is gorgeous. Would you like to go and take a look, Admin?

1101905102.speaker: 我
1101905102.content: Now that you've told me, it'd be a real shame if we didn't go. Let's get ourselves to the top of that hill, then.

1101905103.content:
Shu is moving up the hill rather slowly, probably with my physical condition in mind.
Midway up the hill, I see some wooden benches...

1101905104.speaker: 休
1101905104.content: Do you want to take a break, Admin?

1101905105.speaker: 我
1101905105.content: Don't you underestimate my stamina, now. I can go on a little longer.

1101905106.content:
We reach the top of the hill a half hour later.
The grass in the verdant clearing is swaying in the wind, and there is also ample shade provided by some trees. There's also a fence on the edge looking out over a panoramic view. The city with its skyscrapers looks tiny in the distance.

1101905108.speaker: 我
1101905108.content:
I love that you can get a good view of both nature and Ain Soph from here.
Is this where you come to unwind, Shu?

1101905109.speaker: 休
1101905109.content: I come here once in a while to look at the scenery and Core City.

1101905110.speaker: 休
1101905110.content: See how Core City looks so small and fragile from here? It makes me even more determined to keep it, and Ain Soph, safe.

1101905111.speaker: 我
1101905111.content: Don't worry. You aren't fighting alone. We are all here with you.

1101905114.speaker: 休
1101905114.content: I was just thinking... how you've really come into your own, Admin.

1101905115.speaker: 我
1101905115.content: It's all thanks to your guidance.

1101905116.speaker: 休
1101905116.content: (Clears throat) You know, sometimes, besides enjoying the scenery, I also do other things when I'm here.

1101905117.speaker: 休
1101905117.content: This place doesn't get many visitors. Makes it the perfect place to vent your emotions.

1101905119.speaker: 休
1101905119.content: For me, it means letting out the stress I feel on a day-to-day basis.

1101905120.speaker: 休
1101905120.content: Do you know what a "tree hollow" is, Admin?

1101905121.speaker: 我
1101905121.content: It's a reference to the hollowness of trees.

1101905122.speaker: 休
1101905122.content: Yes, that's more or less the literal definition. But in modern society, it's also a place where you can express your true feelings.

1101905123.speaker: 休
1101905123.content: That's right. And today, where most folks live with high levels of stress every day, the term "tree hollow" has taken on a new meaning.

1101905124.speaker: 我
1101905124.content: So why have you brought me here...? Don't tell me this is your "tree hollow," Shu?

1101905125.speaker: 休
1101905125.content: The top of the hill isn't my "tree hollow," Admin. Look up.

1101905126.content: I lift my head, but all I see is the sky of the purest blue and wisps of cottony-white clouds.

1101905127.speaker: 我
1101905127.content: I don't see anything apart from the sky.

1101905128.speaker: 休
1101905128.content: What if you try to think of the sky as someone you can talk to?

1101905129.speaker: 我
1101905129.content: The sky? But if I were to yell at the sky, everyone around me would hear me... Hold on, your Divine Power lets you control the air. If you used the air to cloak the sound, no one would hear you!

1101905130.speaker: 休
1101905130.content: Good guess, Admin. Let me show you.

1101905131.content: Shu places her hands on both sides of her mouth, takes a deep breath, then opens her mouth and looks up at the sky. But no sound comes out.

1101905132.content: At the very same time, a gust of wind moves over the top of the hill, rolling across the grass and across her face before sweeping everything up into the sky.

1101905133.speaker: 休
1101905133.content: Want to give it a try, Admin? I'll silence whatever you say so you can speak freely, like I just did for myself.

1101905134.speaker: 我
1101905134.content: Interesting... I'll give it a try.

1101905135.content: I walk over to the fence, take a deep breath, and open my mouth as I look up at the sky...

1101905136.speaker: 我
1101905136.content: STUPID COGNIZANT VISBANES!!! I HATE ALL OF YOU!!! BEGONE FOREVER!!!

1101905137.content: As my mouth starts moving, so does the wind. There's not a sound to be heard, and to a random observer, I look just like an actor in a silent movie.

1101905139.speaker: 休
1101905139.content: Do you want to try it again?

1101905140.speaker: 我
1101905140.content: Of course! It's not every day I get to do this. I have to go for a few more rounds!!!

1101905142.speaker: 我
1101905142.content: Why is it that my salary doesn't keep up with price increases in Ain Soph????

1101905143.speaker: 我
1101905143.content: I've worked so much overtime, I'm sick of seeing Ain Soph at four in the morning!!!

1101905144.speaker: 我
1101905144.content: It's always revisions, revisions, revisions!!! And then—they always want the first version anyway!!! Why??? And can we stop doing that, please???

1101905145.content: I yell at the sky with every ounce of strength I have in me, so much so that I even feel a little short of breath.

1101905147.content:
Shu hands me a very much needed bottle of water.
I take a huge gulp and immediately empty half of it.

1101905150.speaker: 我
1101905150.content: Thanks for bringing me here, Shu.

1101905152.content: Shu flashes me an odd smile, then slowly leans to one side of the fence and goes into the same shouting posture as before.

1101905154.content: This message is delivered in a very, very soft voice that floats into my ears.

1101905155.content: Shu puts down her hands, turns around, and looks at me.

1101905159.content: Was that just a creation of my tired brain?

1101905160.speaker: 休
1101905160.content: Let's head back now, Admin. It's almost noon.

1101905161.content: Back at Aether Gazer, Shu and I make a beeline for the cafeteria, where we find a place to sit with our trays of food.

1101905162.speaker: 休
1101905162.content: That's a lot bigger of a plate than you usually get, Admin.

1101905163.speaker: 我
1101905163.content: That's because my stomach's growling. Climbing that hill and yelling really takes a lot out of you. And it's been almost half a day since I last ate something.

1101905166.speaker: 休
1101905166.content: ...I said, you can call on me anytime if you ever need to vent again.

1101905167.speaker: 我
1101905167.content: But you must be quite busy yourself, Shu. I mean, there's your work with the board of directors and the investment portfolio, plus whatever duties you're taking on for Odin...

1101905168.speaker: 休
1101905168.content: You don't have to worry about that, Admin. If you give me a little advance notice, I'll make the necessary arrangements and free up the time for you.

1101905169.content: I place the food in my mouth while looking up at Shu, who's sitting opposite me, every now and then.

1101905170.content: There's something different about you today, Shu.

1101905171.speaker: 我
1101905171.content: How did you learn about that park? It's quite far from Aether Gazer after all.

1101905172.speaker: 休
1101905172.content: ...Odin was the one who first brought me there.

1101905173.speaker: 休
1101905173.content: Although Odin is often away from Aether Gazer, that one time, she looked me up and took me to the park to relax.

1101905174.speaker: 休
1101905174.content: There, she told me that I needed to stay focused on why I wanted to be in Aether Gazer in the first place.

1101905175.speaker: 我
1101905175.content: ...Huh? I can't believe Odin would say something so thoughtful.

1101905176.speaker: ？？？
1101905176.content: What's so odd about me taking one of my kids out for a breather?

1101905177.content: I turn my head and see Odin standing right behind me.

1101905179.speaker: 奥丁
1101905179.content:
That's a rather strange question you're asking. Why shouldn't I be back at my own company?
What are you having?

1101905180.speaker: 我
1101905180.content: Just your regular cafeteria meal. Wanna have some, Odin? And don't just stand there. Sit down and make yourself comfortable.

1101905181.content: But Odin doesn't sit down. She simply smiles playfully and locks eyes with me.

1101905182.content: Looks like the attempt to distract and confuse has failed...

1101905183.speaker: 我
1101905183.content: Will I be fired tomorrow for walking into the office with my left foot first?

1101905184.speaker: 奥丁
1101905184.content: Who knows? Or maybe it'd be for walking in with your right foot first.

1101905185.speaker: 我
1101905185.content: In that case... I should go talk to somebody at CORG to see if they'd hire an ex-Aether Gazer staff member.

1101905186.speaker: 奥丁
1101905186.content: Enough of the banter. Enjoy your meal, you two. I'll get going since I have something to attend to.

1101905188.speaker: 奥丁
1101905188.content: You're already doing me a huge favor by making sure that things at Aether Gazer run smoothly.

1101905189.speaker: 奥丁
1101905189.content: Things are working out well at Division Nine. I have high expectations for the both of you for the future.

1101905190.speaker: 休
1101905190.content: Don't stress out the Administrator like that.

1101905191.speaker: 奥丁
1101905191.content: You call that stress? But back then you also—

1101905193.content: For some reason, Shu cuts Odin short.

1101905195.content: Odin looks at me for quite some time before she turns to Shu.

1101905196.speaker: 奥丁
1101905196.content: I see that you're playing the role of mentor here.

1101905197.speaker: 休
1101905197.content: ...Don't you have something to attend to?

1101905198.content: As Odin looks at her rather teasingly, Shu looks down, as if she's been caught out.

1101905199.content: Fortunately, this situation doesn't last too long. The corners of Odin's mouth curl up slightly. Then, she gets on her feet to leave.

1101905200.speaker: 奥丁
1101905200.content:
I am indeed in a bit of a rush.
I'm off, then. You take good care of the Administrator, now.

1101905202.content: I look at Shu in absolute befuddlement.

1101905204.content: After that, we ate our lunch in silence. As I'm eating, I wonder what the "secret" Shu just mentioned could be.

1101906001.content: 14:00. Shopping street in Core City, Ain Soph.

1101906002.speaker: 我
1101906002.content: I've got no idea what gifts I should get for the rookie Modifiers... I really should have asked them what they like.

1101906003.speaker: 休
1101906003.content:
But if you'd done that, they'd have guessed what you were up to.
Based on what you know about the new Modifiers, Admin, what would you get?

1101906004.speaker: 我
1101906004.content: Is this part and parcel of the manager's job too...? No, I've got absolutely no idea what to get them. What do you think would make a suitable gift?

1101906005.speaker: 休
1101906005.content: Since you're getting them something to celebrate the fact that they've passed the evaluation, you should get something meaningful.

1101906006.speaker: 我
1101906006.content: That makes a lot of sense... Hold on, this whole gift thing is also a test of my abilities too, isn't it? Will I get a reward too if I pass the test?

1101906007.speaker: 休
1101906007.content: Sure, we can do that. What do you want?

1101906008.speaker: 奥丁
1101906008.content:
I am indeed in a bit of a rush.
I'm off, then. You take good care of the Administrator, now.

1101906011.speaker: 我
1101906011.content:
Just tell me one thing.
What exactly is that "secret" you were talking about at the cafeteria during lunch?

1101906014.content: Shu and I wander around the shops to look for the perfect gift. I walk into a stationery and gift store and pick up a mug on the Recommended Products rack for a closer look.

1101906015.speaker: 我
1101906015.content: Mugs with a design of your choice... Maybe I should get them custom mugs with their photos on them. I think they'll like it.

1101906017.content: Having settled on the gift, we return to Aether Gazer to prepare for the evening's rookie evaluation.

1101906019.content: At the training ground, the three rookie Modifiers are busy dodging attacks from the Visbane projections. Every now and then when the Visbanes land a hit, a harsh warning sounds.

1101906020.speaker: 新人修正者A
1101906020.content: Hang in there, everybody! Just 30 more seconds!!!

1101906022.content: The countdown on the screen above finally reaches zero, and the Visbane projections immediately vanish. The last squad dodge test is finally over.

1101906023.content: The three rookie Modifiers stare eagerly at the screen, not even bothering to wipe off the beads of sweat on their foreheads. After seeing their scores, they anxiously shift their gaze to Shu and me, who are standing outside the training ground.

1101906024.content: Shu and I take a look at each other and nod.

1101906025.speaker: 我
1101906025.content: Congratulations, you've passed the final evaluation.

1101906027.content:
The three rookies hug each other in jubilation, their cheers filling the training room.
We choose not to interrupt them, but rather to watch on silently with smiles on our faces instead. After all, this victory belongs to them.

1101906028.speaker: 新人修正者A
1101906028.content: Admin, Miss Shu, thank you for all your guidance!

1101906029.speaker: 新人修正者B
1101906029.content: Ugh, I've been so nervous the last few days. Now I can finally sleep well.

1101906030.speaker: 新人修正者C
1101906030.content: Thank you, Admin, for all the guidance you've given us during this time.

1101906031.speaker: 我
1101906031.content: It's really all the hard work you've put in that you should thank for helping you pass this evaluation.

1101906032.speaker: 休
1101906032.content: That's right. Small improvements made day to day eventually lead to significant change. Please keep up the good work.

1101906033.speaker: 新人修正者A
1101906033.content: I didn't expect to meet you here, Miss Shu. What a treat! I've heard a lot about you from Admin and the other Modifiers.

1101906034.speaker: 我
1101906034.content: Sounds like someone is much more popular among the rookies than I thought.

1101906035.speaker: 休
1101906035.content: Don't be cheeky... Congratulations on passing the evaluation. Here's a gift from me and Admin. We hope you like it.

1101906036.content: Shu and I hand them the bags containing their gifts.

1101906037.speaker: 休
1101906037.content: So, congrats once again, and welcome to the Aether Gazer family.

1101906038.speaker: 休
1101906038.content: #{nickname}#, congrats again on passing your test.

1101906040.speaker: 休
1101906040.content: Admin, no matter when in the future, please don't forget—

1101906045.speaker: 我
1101906045.content: I'm fine. Sorry, I was distracted.

1101906046.speaker: 我
1101906046.content: Like Shu said, please keep up the good work!

1101906047.content: ...What exactly did Shu say at the time though? I can't seem to remember now.

1101906048.content:
Shu and I restore the simulation room to its original state after the rookies leave.
I stare at the scores on the screen in a daze.

1101906049.content: I can see the rookies' scores clustered in the middle of the list, which is topped by a ridiculously high score in first place.

1101906050.speaker: 休
1101906050.content: I can't believe that no one has broken the record I set back then yet.

1101906051.speaker: 我
1101906051.content: So you were the one who set the record, Shu? I'd have thought it was Odin or Thor.

1101906052.speaker: 休
1101906052.content: Poseidon and I set that record during our squad evaluation a few years ago. As we were also rookies at the time, we were required to complete the evaluation process too.

1101906053.speaker: 休
1101906053.content: I just didn't think that our score would be still at the top of the list now. But it's only a matter of time before someone better comes along.

1101906055.speaker: 我
1101906055.content: By the way, why don't you make a run and try to set a new record, Shu? The opportunity doesn't come by every day, you know.

1101906056.speaker: 我
1101906056.content: Come to think of it, although I've heard of the title of "Gusty Lance" for a while now, I don't think I've ever seen you fight.

1101906057.speaker: 休
1101906057.content: So you want to see if I've become rusty, Admin?

1101906058.speaker: 我
1101906058.content: Not really. It was just a thought.

1101906061.speaker: 休
1101906061.content: But you have to go through dodge training with me, Admin.

1101906062.speaker: 我
1101906062.content: What? You want us to team up for training? No, no, no. To set a new record we'll have to set the difficulty level to the highest. I can't possibly handle that.

1101906063.speaker: 休
1101906063.content: But I saw how you were looking at the rookies earlier, Admin. You want to take a stab yourself, don't you?

1101906065.speaker: 休
1101906065.content: One sees better with an objective eye.

1101906067.speaker: 休
1101906067.content: Don't be nervous. Just think of it as a dance.

1101906069.content: After Shu finishes configuring the simulation at the control panel, she takes me by the hand and we walk to the center of the training ground.

1101906070.speaker: 我
1101906070.content: Shu, what did you mean by "dance" just now?

1101906071.speaker: 休
1101906071.content: I seem to recall that you know the waltz, Admin.

1101906072.speaker: 我
1101906072.content: Yes, I learned it in Omorfies. But why do you ask?

1101906073.speaker: 休
1101906073.content:
That'd do. Just follow my lead.
We're about to begin.

1101906075.speaker: 休
1101906075.content: I choose to run the ballroom simulation and set the visibility of the Visbane projections to zero.

1101906076.speaker: 我
1101906076.content: ...So we won't be able to see the Visbanes at all...? That means we won't even know where the attacks are coming from!

1101906077.speaker: 休
1101906077.content:
Relax.
Where the enemy will appear, when they will attack, and the range of its attacks... I remember it all.

1101906078.speaker: 休
1101906078.content: Did you know, Admin? I always come here to train after work. I've completed dodge training so many times, I've lost count.

1101906080.speaker: 休
1101906080.content: Since you're unable to avoid Visbane attacks coming your way even when you can see them, it's better to hide them from sight and let me take the lead.

1101906081.content: The countdown at the top of the screen is nearing zero. Dodge training is about to begin.

1101906082.content: Before I can react, Shu places my left hand on her shoulder and holds my right hand.

1101906084.content: As the first musical note sounds, Shu takes me one step forward. Our waltz has begun.

1101906085.content: I may be dancing a waltz with Shu, but the score on the screen is going up exponentially.

1101906087.content:
I step on Shu's foot by accident, and I'm about to apologize to her when I can feel Shu exert some force behind me.

Shu is gripping my hand tightly. Her fingers are long and slender, but very soft.

I can feel the warmth of Shu's body, which is now pressed against my abdomen. My breathing becomes increasingly rapid.

Shu's hair brushes against the tip of my nose, and I smell an elegant fir-and-mint scent.

I swear I can even taste a dreamy sweetness like that of gardenia in my mouth.

1101906092.content:
I look into Shu's eyes and take in the emotion she's conveying to me.

Along with the sounds of the waltz, I can also hear the beating of my heart in my chest.

As our bodies become more in sync with each other, our dance steps also become faster and more passionate.

I've forgotten why I'm here. All I want now is to fully give myself to this waltz.

1101906096.content:
The sound of beeping.
The countdown at the top of the screen has reached zero. Dodge training is over.

1101906099.content:
Shu pulls my arm down from her shoulder and moves it to the back of her shoulder bone.
I can't say no to her steady gaze.

1101906100.speaker: 休
1101906100.content: And now it's your turn to lead.

1101906101.content: With our bodies spinning and our feet moving forward, Shu and I begin our second round of the waltz.

1101906102.content:
As the pace of the waltz gradually slows, I realize that it's about to end.
And just before the final note, I take Shu through the final pivot.

1101906103.content: The waltz comes to an end and the ballroom scene disappears. I now finally have a chance to look at the screen. Shu and I have finished second overall in the dodge training we just completed.

1101906104.speaker: 休
1101906104.content: Oh, we were so close to setting a new record.

1101906105.speaker: 我
1101906105.content: I suppose it's asking for too much to do that on your very first attempt with me.

1101906106.speaker: 我
1101906106.content: But it was a lot of fun! Want to try again next time when we get the chance?

1101906107.speaker: 休
1101906107.content: Of course. Just don't step on my foot again next time... Admin, are you alright?

1101906108.speaker: 我
1101906108.content:
I'm okay... Just feeling a little tired, that's all.
I'm just a bit worn out from all the hiking, shopping, and dancing today.

1101906109.speaker: 休
1101906109.content: "A bit worn out"? You almost tripped and fell back there. You need to rest. I'll go back with you.

1101906110.speaker: 休
1101906110.content: Take a hot shower when you're back in your room, then get some good sleep.

1101906111.speaker: 我
1101906111.content: You're right. Maybe what I need is a good rest.

1101906113.content: I leave the simulation room with a little physical support from Shu. The scent follows us as we go. Now I finally know where it was coming from.

1101906114.content: Shu helps me to my bed.

1101906116.speaker: 我
1101906116.content: Don't worry, I'm fine. I just need a good rest tonight.

1101906118.speaker: 我
1101906118.content: Yeah. Thanks for spending time with me today, Shu.

1101906121.content: Shu leaves. I lie in bed, and I can feel the sleepiness and fatigue well up from deep inside my body, perhaps due to my recent insomnia, or perhaps because I've been out with Shu all day.

1101906122.content: I close my eyes and quickly fall asleep with the lingering scent of her perfume.

1101906123.content:
The foggy dream world is still cold and lonely.
I can see Shu, her back facing me, somewhat in the fog ahead.

1101906125.content: I open up my stride with some difficulty as I try to catch up to her.

1101906126.content: Then, all of a sudden, I feel a gust of wind coming at me from behind. The vision of Shu in front of me blurs, then vanishes along with the disappearing fog.

1101906127.content: A sky of the purest blue and wisps of cottony-white clouds. Without a doubt, this is where Shu and I were, at the top of that hill.

1101906129.content: I hear a voice that I'm intimately acquainted with. I turn around to see Shu.

1101906131.content:
I slowly walk toward Shu. Unlike that ghostly vision before, the Shu in front of me seems a lot more real.
I slowly reach out my hand to her...

1101906132.content: But will she also vanish like that ghostly figure in the fog?

1101906133.content: Instead, Shu also reaches out to me and takes me by the hand.

1101906134.speaker: 休
1101906134.content: You're already doing amazingly well, Admin.

1101906135.content: Her gentle voice is like a warm spring breeze dissipating the confusion and anxiety in my heart. My tired heart slowly heals.

1101906136.content: 07:00. I wake up drowsily as my terminal rings out. The morning sun is already shining into the room through the window.

1101906137.content:
Incredibly, I did not experience any insomnia the night before. In fact, I slept very soundly.
Both the fatigue that'd been accumulated over days, and the sense of pressure that wouldn't go away, have disappeared. And more importantly, the bad dream that's been haunting me has changed.

1101906138.speaker: 我
1101906138.content: ...Amazing. I must thank Shu properly for this.

1101906139.content: I buy a few cans of coffee from the vending machine in the hall, then walk over to my office and sit down in my office chair as usual, ready to start the day's work.

1101906140.speaker: 我
1101906140.content: First, the battle report for our rookie Modifiers—hold on, what's going on???

1101906141.content: According to the task list on my computer, someone has already checked off some of my tasks for today, including the mission report for the rookie squad.

1101906142.speaker: 我
1101906142.content: Don't tell me we received a visit from the three little elves last night...?

1101906145.content: I turn to where the sound is coming from, and see Shu lying on the couch, her outerwear draped over her like a blanket.

1101906146.content: I gingerly tiptoe over. My little exclamation earlier did not wake her.

1101906147.content:
I take off my coat and gently put it over Shu.
There are a few strands of her hair on her face. I brush these strands behind her ears, and smell the same elegant scent I smelled while dancing with her the night before.

1101906148.content:
I return to my seat and continue with my work.
Half an hour later, I hear her rouse.

1101906149.speaker: 休
1101906149.content: Ha... I think this coat is...

1101906153.speaker: 休
1101906153.content:
Mmhmm.
After I said goodbye to you last night, I walked by the General Office and felt a little nostalgic. So I came in to take a look.

1101906154.speaker: 休
1101906154.content:
I was sitting on the couch and looking out the window when I fell asleep.
You know, in the past, when I had to work overtime, whenever I became tired I would lie on the couch to rest and finally fall asleep.

1101906155.speaker: 我
1101906155.content: ...Well, you did a little more than reminisce about the past.

1101906156.speaker: 我
1101906156.content: Were you the one who helped me complete the training reports for the rookie Modifiers?

1101906157.speaker: 休
1101906157.content: Looks like it was a bad idea for me to fall asleep here.

1101906158.content: Shu nods matter-of-factly, knowing that she's been exposed.

1101906159.speaker: 休
1101906159.content: I looked at your work log last night, Admin. You've done quite a bit of work of late, and very well too.

1101906160.speaker: 休
1101906160.content:
Apart from your day-to-day work, you've also come up with some plans for the future that are pretty well thought out.
You really have come into your own, Admin.

1101906161.speaker: 我
1101906161.content: Thank you for the praise. But surely you can access all these from your own terminal too.

1101906162.speaker: 休
1101906162.content: I was worried that someone who was already physically and mentally overloaded would show up to pull another all-nighter, so I decided to keep watch here. Little did I expect to be woken up by you.

1101906164.speaker: 休
1101906164.content:
Who else could it be?
Mind giving me a can of coffee, Admin?

1101906165.content:
I take the coffee over to the couch, where I hand it to Shu, who's already sat up.
I take the opportunity to sit next to Shu.

1101906166.speaker: 休
1101906166.content: So, did you sleep well last night?

1101906167.speaker: 我
1101906167.content: I slept like a baby. Even my nightmare was turned into a sweet dream with you in it.

1101906168.speaker: 休
1101906168.content: (Clears throat) May I know what the nightmare was about?

1101906169.speaker: 我
1101906169.content: …I've been having the same nightmare for the past month. I find myself lost on the ice in a white fog, and you're always far ahead of me.

1101906170.speaker: 我
1101906170.content: Every time I try to catch up with you, only to fall into an icy abyss.

1101906171.speaker: 休
1101906171.content: How about your dream last night, then?

1101906172.speaker: 我
1101906172.content: Everything was different. I was no longer in a foggy icescape but at the top of the hill in that park we were in yesterday. More importantly, you were right next to me.

1101906173.speaker: 我
1101906173.content: I was able to get better because you helped me relieve my stress yesterday, Shu. Thank you.

1101906174.speaker: 休
1101906174.content: Well, you have to relieve your stress once in a while to stay emotionally healthy.

1101906175.speaker: 我
1101906175.content: I get that. But when I'm at work, I always ask myself if I can do better. I want to make myself even more useful.

1101906176.speaker: 休
1101906176.content: I can say definitively that you've certainly come into your own, Admin. Not just as a manager at Aether Gazer but also as a commander of Modifiers against Visbanes.

1101906177.speaker: 休
1101906177.content: From where I'm looking, you're already doing outstandingly, Admin.

1101906178.speaker: 我
1101906178.content: Yeah, but if there are other outstanding people around you, you can't help but want to catch up with them.

1101906179.speaker: 我
1101906179.content: After all, I've always regarded you as my role model, Shu.

1101906180.speaker: 休
1101906180.content: It's poor form to tease your mentor... Since you've recovered both in body and mind, it means I've achieved my goal for yesterday.

1101906181.content: Shu may be speaking seriously, but I can see the corners of her mouth curl up slightly, and a hint of red has also appeared on her cheeks.

1101906182.speaker: 我
1101906182.content: ...Was I really doing so poorly before?

1101906183.speaker: 休
1101906183.content:
Looks like you really had no idea what was happening to you.
You might have been able to withstand the physical fatigue a little longer, Admin, but mentally, you were already on the brink.

1101906184.speaker: 我
1101906184.content: But how did you know that?

1101906185.speaker: 休
1101906185.content: From the look in your eyes.

1101906187.speaker: 休
1101906187.content:
Yesterday at the office, I thought I was looking at myself, Admin.
From what you were saying about your dream just now, I realized that what you were looking at in your dream was the ghost of me.

1101906188.speaker: 休
1101906188.content: As for the reason, I more or less understand. That's because I used to be just like you.

1101906189.speaker: 我
1101906189.content: You used to be like me...?

1101906190.speaker: 奥丁
1101906190.content: You call that stress? But back then you also—

1101906191.speaker: 我
1101906191.content: Is this about what Odin said back at the cafeteria?

1101906192.speaker: 休
1101906192.content: I'm surprised you still remember that, Admin.

1101906193.speaker: 我
1101906193.content: Well, it did bother me a little...

1101906194.speaker: 休
1101906194.content: That's because Odin knew what I was like at that time. When she saw you, Admin, she realized that you were in a situation similar to what I was in before.

1101906195.speaker: 我
1101906195.content: I see. That's why Odin told you to take good care of me.

1101906196.speaker: 休
1101906196.content: It's my responsibility as your mentor to find out what difficulties you're facing and lend a hand to help you solve them.

1101906197.speaker: 我
1101906197.content: So how was it like for you back then?

1101906198.speaker: 休
1101906198.content: That was when I first started working at Aether Gazer. I was constantly worried that I was not doing enough, or well enough, and that I would cause serious trouble for Aether Gazer because of that.

1101906199.speaker: 休
1101906199.content: I took Odin as my role model. I wanted to work even harder and follow in her footsteps.

1101906200.speaker: 休
1101906200.content:
Over time, I developed insomnia due to the stress and anxiety I was feeling.
At first, I didn't even realize that was happening to me, for I was so focused on catching up with Odin.

1101906201.speaker: 休
1101906201.content: But Odin noticed something was wrong with me, so she took me to the park we were at yesterday so that I could relieve some of my stress.

1101906203.speaker: 我
1101906203.content: So you're saying that what we did yesterday is exactly the same as what you and Odin did in the past.

1101906204.speaker: 休
1101906204.content: Well, I did feel a little awkward when Odin found out what was happening. But seeing you get better is enough for me.

1101906205.speaker: 休
1101906205.content: And now, to prevent you from getting lost again, it's mentorship time.

1101906206.content: I stare at Shu's slightly languid and smiling face in a daze.

1101906208.speaker: 休
1101906208.content: Admin, no matter when in the future, please don't forget—

1101906209.speaker: 休
1101906209.content: Rome wasn't built in a single day. Growth takes time to happen. And sometimes, you will get lost along the way.

1101906210.speaker: 休
1101906210.content: And when you do find yourself lost, remember that the answer is right there inside you. Allow your heart to tell you how to proceed next and remind you of what you originally set out to do.

1101906211.speaker: 休
1101906211.content: But don't despair if you can't find the answer that way. I'll be there to help you.

1101906212.speaker: 休
1101906212.content: You aren't just my student. You're someone who's really important to me. I will be right there with you.

1101906213.content: These are the words that Shu said to me the day I became the Administrator of Aether Gazer's Division Nine.

1101906214.content: It's been a while, and along the way, I seem to have forgotten what Shu said to me at the time.

1101906215.speaker: 我
1101906215.content: ...Thank you, Shu, for helping me recall something important.

1101906216.speaker: 休
1101906216.content: ...Seems like I don't need to worry about you anymore.

1101906217.speaker: 休
1101906217.content:
Since your problem has been resolved, Admin, I should get back to my work too.
Thanks for the coat, Admin.

1101906218.content: Shu gently places my coat over my head as she stands up to leave my office. The perfume left on the coat lingers in my nostrils.

1101906222.content: Shu, who's standing at the door, first shows a look of surprise. Then, as if she's read my thoughts, she breaks out into a warm smile which feels like a gentle spring breeze.

1101906223.speaker: 休
1101906223.content: You're worried over nothing. Would I still help you if, one day in the future, you find yourself in a similar situation again...? But of course!

1101906224.speaker: 休
1101906224.content: You're my dear student. I will always watch out for you and give you the help you need when you need it.

1101906225.speaker: 休
1101906225.content: ——And there are some things I have yet to teach you. So keep your eyes peeled, Admin.

411141001.content: Paracaesar stands in front of the high-speed equipment, staring at the violent energy collisions being shown on the holographic screen and occasionally giving instructions to the other researchers beside her.

411141002.speaker: 托特
411141002.content: Director, when you say not to intervene until the very last minute, what do you mean exactly?

411141003.speaker: 托特
411141003.content: Ver has made some progress in controlling her Divine Grace, but if we let Lokken go and fight her now, it'll just end in a lose-lose situation.

411141004.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411141004.content: It's actually the perfect opportunity to test both Verthandi and 0700.

411141005.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411141005.content: She only exists for opportunities like this, doesn't she?

411141006.content: The Lokken on screen is oblivious to the fact that her every move is being programmed by Paracaesar.

411141007.content: She thinks she's challenging Ver through her own free will, but in actual fact the only decision she took was to deliver the first blow.

411141008.speaker: 托特
411141008.content: How long are we going to watch for?

411141009.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411141009.content: Until Verthandi's abnormal energy reaches the second Critical Point. That's the extent to which she is able to control her power.

411141011.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411141011.content: Stop meddling in things that are above your pay grade.

411141012.content: Paracaesar cuts the call and revokes Thoth's Hyperspace Source Layer access.

411141013.content: Having expended so much energy at the beginning of the fight, Lokken is now at a disadvantage. This made Lokken more restless and irritable.

411141015.speaker: 研究员A
411141015.content: It's nearly maxed out already, Director.

411141017.speaker: 研究员A
411141017.content: 0700 has an extreme personality, and we don't have any models to predict how she will react. We should proceed with caution.

411141018.speaker: 研究员A
411141018.content: Plus, we need to ensure Verthandi's safety. What if 0700 breaks through the restrictions and launches a suicide attack at her?

411141020.content: As she says this, the screen lights up with the flash of an explosion. The ensuing smoke and dust not only hinder visibility, but even interfere with the communication signals.

411141021.content: When the dust clears, Lokken is lying on the ground while Ver is nowhere to be seen.

411141023.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411141023.content: Did Turing pull Verthandi out? Interesting.

411141024.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411141024.content: Come in, Thoth. Take someone to get Lokken out of there.

411141025.speaker: 托特
411141025.content: Are we going to eliminate her? It seems such a waste.

411141026.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411141026.content: She'll already be dead by this time in 2305, and CORG is about to delete her files.

411141027.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411141027.content: By all means, keep her alive if you think she'll be useful for the experiment. But if anything happens, it'll be on your head.

411141029.content: That evening in the CORG Research Center.

411141030.content: Thoth pushes the door open and is hit by a strong gust of wind imbued with Divine Grace. She feels a sharp pain on her cheek, and blood drips to the floor.

411141032.content: Thoth wipes the blood off her cheek and picks up the card from the floor. It's a Joker, grinning up at her maliciously.

411141033.speaker: 洛肯
411141033.content: Sorry, I thought you were a minion coming to cart me off to the underworld.

411141038.speaker: 托特
411141038.content: No. Who told you to throw cards at me anyway?

411141039.content: Lokken stares wistfully at her hand of cards, occasionally flicking one in Thoth's direction.

411141040.speaker: 托特
411141040.content: You'll never win if you don't try.

411141041.speaker: 洛肯
411141041.content: I don't mind letting you win.

411141042.content: She says this, but every time she's about to lose, Thoth seems to play a bad card that keeps her in the game.

411141043.speaker: 洛肯
411141043.content: If you're going to play, at least play properly.

411141044.content:
Lokken sits up straighter as she examines the last remaining cards in her hand.
Thoth's expression remains calm, but she's watching Lokken's face out of the corner of her eye.

411141046.content: Lokken selects a card and throws it down on the table in front of Thoth.

411141047.speaker: 托特
411141047.content: You have a new mission, starting today.

411141048.content: Lokken's hand freezes midair as she changes her mind about which card to play.

411141049.speaker: 托特
411141049.content: The director is going to tell you personally what you have to do next.

411141052.speaker: 托特
411141052.content: If you don't want to do it, I can let her down gently.

411141054.content: Lokken tosses another card on the table, leans back in her chair and stares up at the chandelier.

411141055.speaker: 洛肯
411141055.content: Very funny... As if that woman is going to give me another job to do.

411141057.speaker: 洛肯
411141057.content: What's the point? I lost ages ago.

411141059.speaker: 洛肯
411141059.content: Don't you have the other Joker?

411141061.speaker: 洛肯
411141061.content: She must be the director's biggest headache at the moment.

411141062.speaker: 托特
411141062.content: You're right, the director is keeping a close eye on her. Your mission is probably going to depend on her status.

411141063.speaker: 托特
411141063.content: But what I wanted to say has nothing to do with Verthandi or the director.

411141064.content: Thoth reveals the blank card in her hand and places it in front of Lokken.

411141065.speaker: 托特
411141065.content: Lokken, you're entitled to have a say in where you go next and what you do.

411141066.speaker: 托特
411141066.content: Because this world... isn't real. It's just a CORG simulation.

411141067.speaker: 托特
411141067.content: You, the version of me that exists here, this entire city, is a copy and it's about to be deleted.

411141069.speaker: 洛肯
411141069.content: What's the difference? It's not like the world I lived in before this was any more real.

411141070.content: Still, Lokken's face crumbled at the sudden revelation, and she covered her eyes and took a deep breath.

411141071.speaker: 洛肯
411141071.content: Damn, that woman really is crazy...

411141073.content: Thoth shakes her head as she picks up the cards and puts them back in their box.

411141075.speaker: 托特
411141075.content: You can do whatever you like besides the mission. I'll square it off with the director.

411141076.speaker: 托特
411141076.content: But, in exchange... I want you to answer my questions about the 07 series.

411141079.speaker: 洛肯
411141079.content: No, wait. I just had this sudden feeling of... nostalgia?

411141080.speaker: 洛肯
411141080.content: What did you want to know?

411141081.speaker: 托特
411141081.content: During your battle just now, I was listening in on what Paracaesar was saying to the other scientists.

411141082.speaker: 托特
411141082.content: 07 protobodies are equipped with a control system, right?

411141083.speaker: 托特
411141083.content: I just want to know exactly how it works.

411141084.speaker: 洛肯
411141084.content: I mean, I don't understand the science behind it, but...

411141085.speaker: 洛肯
411141085.content: Our lives are controlled by that thing, and it can end us at any time.

411141086.speaker: 托特
411141086.content: Can the control system... be overridden?

411141088.speaker: 洛肯
411141088.content: But the scientists back then were crazy, carrying out all sorts of experiments on us, and they must have explored this question.

411141089.speaker: 洛肯
411141089.content: The earliest 07 protobodies were mass produced and highly defective.

411141090.speaker: 洛肯
411141090.content: Of course, I'm nothing like them...

411141092.speaker: 托特
411141092.content: I've got something I need to take care of. You rest here while your wounds heal.

411141093.speaker: 托特
411141093.content: And if you're ever feeling down, just look up and talk to the sky. Maybe I'll be listening.

411141094.speaker: 洛肯
411141094.content: What are you, a wizard or something?

411141095.speaker: 托特
411141095.content: Don't you want a wizard on your side?

411141097.speaker: 洛肯
411141097.content: I'm sorry about your face just now, by the way.

411141099.content: Thoth points at her cheek, where her Divine Power is visibly healing the small cut.

411141100.speaker: 托特
411141100.content: Just give your wounds some time, Lokken.

411151001.speaker: 托特
411151001.content: What's so strange? The two of you have already spent two days with her and didn't even realize that it wasn't me.

411151002.speaker: 托特
411151002.content: Right, I'm off. Look after yourselves!

411151003.content: Thoth walks down an alley in Old Town as she looks through her private messages.

411151004.content: Although she's worried about Verthandi and Ningishzida, she still has business that needs taken care of.

411151006.content: Thoth leaves Hyperspace and returns to the bookstore, where she sifts through all of the intel she currently has on Artificial Modifiers.

411151008.speaker: 托特
411151008.content: (If I want to replace the chip, it'd be safest to use one from the same series...)

411151009.content: The simple protective housing on the table will regularly feed back real-time data on the chip, which will become more difficult to reinstall as time goes by.

411151010.speaker: 托特
411151010.content: I've got to hurry... And the "insurance" that Paracaesar mentioned...

411151011.content: The program that's hacked into the CORG Information Center returns some new intel: development of the next gen protobodies has nearly come to an end.

411151012.content: A disposal application for the old protobodies has already been sent off to Red Fox, so it won't be long until they're all replaced.

411151013.speaker: 托特
411151013.content: The old protobodies... I have an idea...

411151014.content: She scrolls down to a name she hasn't contacted in a long while, and hesitates for a second before pressing call.

411151015.speaker: 马尔杜克
411151015.content: That's right, move it all over there. And be careful!

411151017.speaker: 马尔杜克
411151017.content: I need to keep these darned kids occupied if I don't want them going out causing trouble.

411151019.speaker: 托特
411151019.content: I'm reviewing some information I've got about Project Forgetower, and there are some details I wanted to talk to you about.

411151020.speaker: 马尔杜克
411151020.content: Anything I know about that will be out of date by now.

411151021.speaker: 托特
411151021.content: Out of date is exactly what I need.

411151022.speaker: 托特
411151022.content: Do you remember the 07 series of Artificial Mods? There was one batch that Paracaesar was particularly happy with, and she prepared lots of spare protobodies for mass production.

411151023.speaker: 马尔杜克
411151023.content: Yeah, I remember, there were some in Rostach. You said last month that the 07 series has been declared a failure.

411151024.speaker: 托特
411151024.content: Those spare protobodies—do you know what happened to them after the Quakes?

411151026.speaker: 托特
411151026.content: I'm just helping out a friend with something.

411151027.speaker: 马尔杜克
411151027.content: I do hope you're not talking about Paracaesar's favorite kind of "something."

411151029.speaker: 马尔杜克
411151029.content: ...Fine. You helped us settle down in Akkadian, so I guess I can trust you.

411151030.speaker: 马尔杜克
411151030.content: The 07 protobodies were cheap to make and no one wanted them taking up vital assets, so their production was shifted to other Neuhansa subsidiaries.

411151031.speaker: 马尔杜克
411151031.content: A lot of those factories are still in operation, but I don't know if they'll still have the protobodies you're looking for.

411151032.speaker: 托特
411151032.content: Paracaesar is planning on upgrading all of those protobodies. Based on past experience, the factories may process all of the products centrally.

411151033.speaker: 托特
411151033.content: I've heard that a lot of products earmarked for disposal tend to have a habit of popping up on the black market instead... Have you heard any rumors to that effect?

411151034.speaker: 马尔杜克
411151034.content: I haven't been in Rostach lately, and it's not easy getting information out of the guys who've stayed behind to keep an eye on things.

411151035.speaker: 托特
411151035.content: It is easy, as long as the price is right.

411151036.speaker: 托特
411151036.content: I've sent over what I can give you. Take a look at your terminal.

411151037.speaker: 马尔杜克
411151037.content: Okay, let me finish this job I'm working on now and I'll get back to you later with an answer.

411151038.content: The call drops. Thoth sighs and goes back to her terminal screen to continue searching for information about Neuhansa.

411151039.speaker: 托特
411151039.content: Factories that have partnered with CORG... But there can't have been many with the security clearance to work on something like Forgetower...

411151041.content: Her eyes rest on the personnel file for this factory employee.

411151043.content: Thoth retrieves some other files and compares them. She notices that Jolin's resume has some suspicious gaps in it.

411151044.content: Even when she logs in as an admin to access the files in the CORG Security Center, she still can't see where Jolin was for those missing years.

411151046.content: A vivid memory suddenly pops up in Thoth's mind, and she retrieves the logs from Liberty's trial ten years ago.

411151047.speaker: 托特
411151047.content: He testified in court as a witness... and then disappeared off the face of the earth.

411151049.content: The shrill ring of her terminal interrupts her train of thought. It's a message from Marduk.

411151050.speaker: 马尔杜克
411151050.content: "Those goods have been seen on the black market, but they've changed hands multiple times and the range of supply has been greatly expanded.

411151051.speaker: 马尔杜克
411151051.content: Here's a rough list. The target should be on there somewhere."

411151052.speaker: 托特
411151052.content: I need to get going now...

411161001.content: The final target is pinned down to a factory in northern Neuhansa.

411161002.content: According to official record, the factory is responsible for the manufacture of AGI Mecha transmission parts. It is late at night and raining heavily, but there are still security guards patrolling the factory grounds.

411161004.content: Thoth sneaks past the guards and slowly makes her way toward a fleet of parked trucks.

411161006.content: The sentries switch on the AGI Mecha floodlights, and the shadows between the trucks are illuminated.

411161007.speaker: 科尔盖士兵D
411161007.content: Achoo! It's freezing, hurry up with that, will ya?

411161008.speaker: 科尔盖士兵C
411161008.content: Must have been my eyes playing tricks on me.

411161009.speaker: 科尔盖士兵D
411161009.content: Come on, the bosses want this all shipped tonight.

411161010.speaker: 科尔盖士兵C
411161010.content: Those last few aren't loaded yet, are they?

411161011.speaker: 科尔盖士兵D
411161011.content: What's taking them so long? I'll go look.

411161012.content:
The soldier at the back curses and grumbles as he goes, not noticing Toth at his heels.
Several trucks parked deep in the factory still have their back doors open, and a worker is carefully handling the goods with a Mecha.

411161013.speaker: 科尔盖士兵D
411161013.content: Hey man, how much longer is this gonna take?

411161014.speaker: 工厂员工
411161014.content: Almost done. When we were taking them out of the warehouse, we noticed some of the crates had been opened.

411161015.speaker: 工厂员工
411161015.content: We were worried the goods might've been damaged, so we had to open everything to check. It took a while.

411161016.speaker: 科尔盖士兵D
411161016.content: But all good now? Even if stuff's damaged, it's still gotta go out tonight.

411161017.speaker: 工厂员工
411161017.content: Er, the supervisor wants us to go by the book.

411161018.speaker: 科尔盖士兵D
411161018.content: Damn it. Well, hurry up then.

411161019.content: Thoth opens her terminal and hacks into the truck's self-driving system with almost zero effort. The destination that's been set is out in the suburbs somewhere, but isn't marked on the map.

411161020.speaker: 托特
411161020.content: (A lot of the route cuts through the forest... It should be pretty easy to escape from there.)

411161021.content: The last crate is loaded into the truck, and the worker turns round to give the waiting CORG soldier the thumbs up.

411161022.content: The trucks roar to life and one by one trundle out of the factory gates, followed closely behind by airborne AGI Mechas with infrared imaging sensors.

411161023.content: The crates in the truck's cargo hold are stacked six feet high. A surveillance AGI Mecha flies to and fro between the boxes.

411161024.content: However, the images it sends back are the fakes Thoth has inserted herself.

411161025.content: She places her scanner on top of one of the crates, and begins extracting the data to her terminal. Just as she's about to start cutting the crate open, a muffled noise grabs her attention.

411161027.content: She activates her energy shield just in time to deflect the incoming arrow. The truck must be booby-trapped!

411161028.content: Suddenly, she sees the flash of a blade. It stops an inch from her face, the hand holding it trapped in place by her translucent thread.

411161029.speaker: 男人
411161029.content: I knew there was something tasty in here.

411161030.content: The surveillance mecha must have sensed strange movement, and it flies over to them.

411161032.speaker: 托特
411161032.content: Starting a fight here is not going to end well for you.

411161033.speaker: 男人
411161033.content: You too. So, what say you take your strings back?

411161034.content: Thoth stays immobile, and squints at the red-haired man in front of her.

411161036.content: His eyes widen in surprise, but he quickly masks it with a playful smile.

411161037.speaker: 伊森
411161037.content: I never dreamed I'd get this famous at such a young age.

411161038.speaker: 伊森
411161038.content: Let me guess, you're one of those Aether Gazer Mods?

411161040.speaker: 伊森
411161040.content: I more than just know of them. I've been looking for them for years to talk about old times!

411161041.content: A surprising force suddenly erupts from the man, cutting Thoth's thread clean off. The energy wave from his blade slices through the crate like it's made from butter, and the goods inside tumble out onto the floor.

411161042.speaker: 托特
411161042.content: Removing your power restraints will only make you die faster.

411161043.speaker: 托特
411161043.content: You need to be smarter than that if you want to find your replacement body parts.

411161044.speaker: 伊森
411161044.content: You think you know me, girl?

411161045.speaker: 托特
411161045.content: I know that the power module in your right arm is almost as old as I am. I give it less than a day before it becomes as useful as scrap metal.

411161046.speaker: 托特
411161046.content: And that injury to your right knee was caused by a defect with the transmission device. You've tried your best to patch it up, but none of it's worked.

411161047.speaker: 伊森
411161047.content: You're observant, I'll give you that.

411161048.content: Ethan doesn't take his eyes off Thoth, but after a few seconds he slowly lowers his blade.

411161049.speaker: 托特
411161049.content: So, shall we talk this through instead?

411161050.speaker: 伊森
411161050.content: It won't do either of us any good if we make any more noise than we already have.

411161051.speaker: 伊森
411161051.content: So... who the hell are you?

411161052.speaker: 托特
411161052.content: That's not important. What is, is that I can help you find the protobody parts you need. Unfortunately, there aren't any in this truck.

411161053.speaker: 伊森
411161053.content:
How can you be sure of that?
Wait... Are you with CORG?

411161054.speaker: 伊森
411161054.content: I thought you'd had training. Turns out you're just a thieving low-life.

411161055.speaker: 托特
411161055.content: You're one to talk. Look, let's strike a deal.

411161056.content: Thoth hands Ethan a square box.

411161057.speaker: 托特
411161057.content: Install that in your left arm. It'll keep you going a while longer.

411161058.content: Ethan strokes the module gently, an intriguing smile on his face.

411161059.speaker: 伊森
411161059.content: And what is it you want from me?

411161060.speaker: 托特
411161060.content: Cover me until we get the parts we need.

411161061.speaker: 伊森
411161061.content: Tsk tsk, I take back what I said before. You don't know me at all.

411161062.content: Ethan goes to the door of the cargo hold and places his hand on the button to open the door.

411161063.speaker: 伊森
411161063.content: I have no intention of helping someone from CORG...

411161065.content: The truck comes to a sudden halt, causing all the spilled goods to roll across the floor and crash into the door.

411171001.content: After the truck suddenly hit the brakes, a CORG soldier jumps out to talk to another young man wearing a CORG uniform who is approaching through the rain.

411171002.speaker: 年轻男性
411171002.content: There's been an incident up ahead and you're going to have to divert your route. The director sent me here to make sure the goods arrive safely.

411171004.speaker: 科尔盖士兵C
411171004.content: Agent... Anubis. What's going on up there? Visbanes again?

411171005.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171005.content: Yeah, Visbane activity was detected on the main road a few days ago, so we've had to close it for safety.

411171006.speaker: 科尔盖士兵C
411171006.content: Fine... It's just that we're on a tight schedule here. Can you reconfigure the self-driving system for me?

411171008.content: The trucks pull over to the side of the road. Anubis stares at the huge vehicles, seemingly lost in thought.

411171009.speaker: 科尔盖士兵C
411171009.content: Do you need to inspect the cargo again?

411171010.content: Anubis walks over to the one of the trucks. The rear door locking indicator flickers in the darkness.

411171011.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171011.content: Let's open it up and see.

411171012.content: The CORG soldier walks over and sees that the door hasn't been locked properly. If there had been any bumps in the road, the goods are probably scattered all over the floor now.

411171013.content: He nervously opens the rear door, expecting the worst. Luckily, the crates have only moved a little bit.

411171014.speaker: 科尔盖士兵C
411171014.content: I'm sorry, I must have missed that during the inspection... Let me move them back.

411171015.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171015.content: I'm gonna have to inspect all the others now.

411171016.speaker: 伊森
411171016.content: I said you can let go now. It's very narrow here, if you don't let go, I'm gonna break my arm.

411171018.content: Thoth steps out from behind a crate and looks back coldly. The man who had been pinned against the wall by the crate has been freed from her thread.

411171019.speaker: 伊森
411171019.content: That was some fast thinking. Do you think he saw us?

411171020.speaker: 托特
411171020.content: I'm not sure. But he's a Modifier, so don't make a sound.

411171021.speaker: 伊森
411171021.content: Do you still wanna keep going? What if he arrests you?

411171022.speaker: 托特
411171022.content: You wouldn't be taking this risk either if it wasn't for something valuable.

411171023.content: Ethan glances at Thoth and nods. He doesn't say anything further about what it is he wants, nor does he ask her.

411171024.speaker: 伊森
411171024.content: So, you say you can help me find the parts I need. How?

411171025.speaker: 托特
411171025.content: It's very likely that these trucks are heading to the CORG recycling facility. We'll probably be able to find the right replacement parts for you there.

411171026.speaker: 托特
411171026.content: And even if we don't, we'll be able to find an old printer to print them up for you.

411171027.speaker: 伊森
411171027.content: That sounds way too risky. Why don't we just steal a couple of crates and exchange the goods for what we want on the black market?

411171029.speaker: 托特
411171029.content: I've heard that there's a woman in the Children of Iron who's been augmented almost as much as you. Isn't she here too?

411171031.speaker: 托特
411171031.content: So, she's in worse shape than you. Is she even able to walk anymore?

411171033.speaker: 伊森
411171033.content: Let's get one thing straight: If I help you out, it doesn't make us friends. I'm out of here as soon as I get what I came for.

411171035.content: Thoth hands Ethan a mini comms device.

411171036.speaker: 托特
411171036.content: Use this to contact me if you need it.

411171037.speaker: 托特
411171037.content: One more question—are these your buddies?

411171038.content: Thoth points to the yellow dots on her terminal, which are surrounded by roving red circles.

411171039.speaker: 托特
411171039.content: There were cloaked surveillance mechas following this convoy—that's what the red circles are. Your people are getting too close, they're gonna get caught.

411171040.speaker: 伊森
411171040.content: Dammit, I told them to wait for me at the base.

411171041.content: Ethan takes out his own comms terminal and makes a call. It's immediately picked up, but the voice on the other end can't be heard over the sound of the rain.

411171042.speaker: 伊森
411171042.content: I hate this thing! It never works in the rain.

411171043.speaker: 托特
411171043.content: Wait, that could be our chance...

411171045.content: The truck starts rumbling as it prepares to drive its new route.

411171046.speaker: 托特
411171046.content: I need to see what's going on outside.

411171047.content: Thoth activates her enhanced visuals system, and her sensors begin to silently scan.

411171048.speaker: 托特
411171048.content: Hmm, based on the direction they're headed, they're not going to be unloading anytime soon. I reckon the rain's too heavy, so they're going to wait at a rest station until it clears.

411171049.speaker: 托特
411171049.content: That engineer accompanying the convoy must have an access pass for the recycling facility. We need to take it and make a copy without anyone noticing.

411171050.speaker: 伊森
411171050.content: You're the one with all the fancy tech. Can't you just hack our way in?

411171051.speaker: 托特
411171051.content: I could, but it would leave a footprint. And I don't have enough data to guarantee success.

411171052.speaker: 伊森
411171052.content: Jeez, guess we're gonna have to do what you suggested then. If things go south...

411171053.speaker: 托特
411171053.content: ...It'll be because of your friends out there.

411171054.content: Thoth shows him the map on her terminal as the yellow dots get even closer to the convoy. Two of them come into contact with the red circles.

411171055.content: The commotion outside is only partially dampened by the sound of the rain. Ethan leans against the wall and covers his face with his hands.

411171056.speaker: 托特
411171056.content: Are you worried they'll sell you out?

411171057.speaker: 伊森
411171057.content: No. They wouldn't betray their own, and they're more than capable of taking care of CORG soldiers.

411171058.speaker: 伊森
411171058.content: I'm worried that they'll think something's happened if they can't get hold of me. I'm gonna have to do something. Wanna help?

411171059.content: The rain continues to hammer the road outside the rest stop. Anubis stands by the convoy, staring coldly at the two handcuffed youths as he hands them back their IDs.

411171061.speaker: 男青年A
411171061.content: Yeah, at the factory over there.

411171062.speaker: 阿努比斯
