411171062.content: Well, why aren't you heading back there along the main road? Why did you sneak over here via the side road instead?

411171063.speaker: 男青年A
411171063.content: I wasn't aware it was a crime to take the scenic route, officer.

411171064.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171064.content:
It's not.
But why are you even going to the factory at this late hour?

411171065.speaker: 男青年B
411171065.content: There's been an emergency and the boss has called everyone in.

411171066.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171066.content: So, why weren't you going along the main road? It's quicker, after all.

411171067.speaker: 男青年B
411171067.content: Well... Fine, you caught us. We actually decided to slack off work because they said there was gonna be a meteor shower tonight. We were gonna go to the top of the hill to see if we could see anything.

411171068.speaker: 男青年B
411171068.content: But then it started raining, so we knew we wouldn't see anything. And then the boss's call came though, so we thought we might as well head back.

411171069.content: The young man hands Anubis his terminal. The page that's open is a real-time forecast of when the meteor shower will be visible.

411171070.content: Anubis looks back at the hill they were talking about, then opens a map on his own terminal and shakes his head.

411171071.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171071.content: So, you're telling me you were skipping work to go to that hill, then halfway there got the call from your boss and decided to head back?

411171072.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171072.content: If that's true, you would have taken the shortest route to the hill and the shortest route back. Which doesn't explain how you wound up here.

411171073.speaker: 男青年A
411171073.content: It's dark and we don't have signal out here. We got lost on the way back.

411171074.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171074.content: You didn't bring anything to help guide the way?

411171077.content: The CORG soldiers start rifling through their bags. They take out wrenches, pliers, a hammer, knives, pistols...

411171078.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171078.content: Hardly your typical stargazing equipment, is it?

411171079.speaker: 男青年A
411171079.content: We work at the factory, we always have this kind of stuff on us.

411171081.speaker: 男青年A
411171081.content: They're for self-defense. It's wild out here, so we brought them just in case.

411171082.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171082.content: You've got an answer for everything.

411171083.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171083.content: I don't want to presume you're guilty, but I do want you to understand that withholding the truth from a CORG agent is a very serious offence.

411171084.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171084.content: So, I'm going to ask you one more time: What are you doing out here?

411171085.speaker: 男青年A
411171085.content: We've already told you, officer. We work at that factory up ahead.

411171086.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171086.content: Really? What are your worker ID numbers so we can check?

411171087.content: The young man's expression freezes for an instant. He glances down at his terminal, then looks back up at Anubis with an apologetic smile.

411171088.speaker: 男青年A
411171088.content: Er... Sorry, officer, I'm new there so I don't remember off the top of my head. Let me check.

411171090.content: As the two of them fumble on their terminals, the sound of AGI Mechas activating can suddenly be heard from behind the convoy.

411171091.content: Anubis turns to look, but it's just a person in plain clothes walking over holding an umbrella in one hand and a convenience store bag from the rest stop in the other.

411171092.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171092.content: Director Harnett, is something the matter?

411171093.speaker: 工程师
411171093.content: I haven't sat in a car going that fast in a while, it made me feel a bit queasy. I got out to buy some motion sickness patches.

411171094.speaker: 工程师
411171094.content: Speaking of which, when are we heading out again?

411171095.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171095.content: We've had to take a diversion so the journey will be a bit longer than anticipated, I'm afraid.

411171096.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171096.content: I was just about to ask you to come over, actually. We've got something of a situation... Do you recognize these two? They say they work at your factory.

411171098.content: The engineer lowers the umbrella and examines the two suspects, who have gone quite pale. They lower their heads and exchange furtive glances with each other.

411171099.speaker: 工程师
411171099.content: Oh, it's you two. What are you doing here?

411171100.content: The young man is stunned. He looks up at the engineer and sees something familiar about him.

411171102.speaker: 工程师
411171102.content: What, you don't even know who I am? Have you two only just joined or something?

411171103.content: The two can scarcely conceal the surprised look on their faces at this sudden turn in events, but they manage to once they see the engineer glaring at them.

411171104.speaker: 工程师
411171104.content: Did you finish that urgent order? I don't know what you're doing running around out here in the middle of the night, but you should be heading back if you want to keep your jobs!

411171105.speaker: 男青年A
411171105.content: We're sorry, we're sorry, we're going back straight away...

411171107.speaker: 工程师
411171107.content: Officer, if these two kids go back now, they're going to be punished. Why don't you let them ride with me? That way we can say they were away on company business.

411171108.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171108.content: I never knew you were so compassionate toward your employees.

411171109.speaker: 工程师
411171109.content: Well, they don't have an easy job, plus they're new, so I can afford to be lenient for once.

411171110.speaker: 阿努比斯
411171110.content: ...We can do that, I'll add them to the list of support personnel. But please keep an eye on them and make sure they don't go anywhere near anything confidential.

411171112.speaker: 工程师
411171112.content: Oh, look at that, looks like the rain's stopping. Shall we set back off?

411171113.content: Anubis nods and opens the door for him. A translucent thread falls from his sleeve and dissolves in a puddle on the ground.

411181001.speaker: 工程师
411181001.content:
That was a close call.
Good thing I remembered to bring the bionic mask.

411181002.content: The engineer breathes a sigh of relief as he hears the engine roar to life. He peers into the shadows among the crates at the back of the truck.

411181004.speaker: 托特
411181004.content: Yes, I am, but... don't you think this is all just a little too easy?

411181005.speaker: 工程师
411181005.content: It's easy because we're prepared. It's no accident that they knew how to answer when interrogated, or the unspoken agreement we've developed between each other.

411181007.speaker: 托特
411181007.content:
Oh, he's fine, he's sound asleep.
But that's another concern—I don't think you can fool Anubis that easily.

411181008.speaker: 工程师
411181008.content: Do you really think he saw through me?

411181009.speaker: 托特
411181009.content: He's cracked every single case he's worked on ever since he joined the Egregious Crimes Department.

411181010.speaker: 工程师
411181010.content: Well, they'd be a pretty poor Mod if they couldn't get to the bottom of human cases with all those CORG resources and tech at their disposal.

411181011.speaker: 工程师
411181011.content: Are you sure that device will work?

411181012.speaker: 托特
411181012.content: Yes. I'll turn it on as soon as we reach the recycling center. If there's strong interference, the vehicle's scanner will temporarily stop working.

411181013.speaker: 托特
411181013.content: It all depends on whether it buys us enough time to get in, and whether your two guys can help us out.

411181014.speaker: 工程师
411181014.content: This burglary business is making me nervous.

411181015.speaker: 托特
411181015.content: As long as you know that I'm not your enemy, we'll be fine.

411181018.content: An AGI Mecha can be heard unloading cargo outside. Thoth stands by the door open button, her floating blade already in her hand ready to strike.

411181019.content: Her terminal picks up a strange mechanical noise, and her expression immediately changes as she takes two steps back.

411181022.content: The door slams open and dozens of small mechas flood into the truck, protected by an invisible energy web. Ethan's blade swings into action before Thoth can do anything.

411181023.speaker: 伊森
411181023.content: Man, I hate it when you're right.

411181024.speaker: 托特
411181024.content: Get out, there's an interference pulse incoming!

411181025.content: Ethan charges out of the truck and barges into the group of assembled CORG soldiers outside, knocking them to the ground. A smoke bomb goes off, distorting the display in their visual terminals.

411181028.content: Ethan continues to move with his hand covering his nose and mouth, when he suddenly hears Olheim's shouts through the terminal.

411181029.speaker: 伊森
411181029.content: What are you guys doing here?

411181030.speaker: 奥利海姆
411181030.content: We're just outside the factory, bro! We got worried when we lost comms with those two kids after receiving your orders, and we followed them here.

411181031.speaker: 伊森
411181031.content: They're fine, I'm about to go in the factory. You secure the perimeter.

411181033.speaker: 伊森
411181033.content: I have help... Don't worry about me.

411181034.speaker: 托特
411181034.content: Jammer activated. We have one minute to get in through that side door.

411181036.speaker: 伊森
411181036.content: Olheim, I'll bring those two kids out. They're in the truck at the back. I want you all to get a safe distance away and hide, understood?

411181038.content: Ethan hangs up and dashes off into the smoke, his infrared imager feeding straight into his optic nerve. Unseen, he slashes open the truck door carrying his two subordinates.

411181040.speaker: 伊森
411181040.content: Get out of here. Olheim's waiting for you over there.

411181041.speaker: 迷铁之家成员A
411181041.content: How... How are we supposed to get out of here?

411181042.speaker: 伊森
411181042.content: Not by wasting time gabbing, that's for sure—

411181043.speaker: 阿努比斯
411181043.content: You should listen to him, Ethan. Escape is not a wise choice.

411181044.speaker: 伊森
411181044.content: Oh, Anubis... Long time no see.

411181045.speaker: 阿努比斯
411181045.content:
If this is how the Children of Iron greet people these days, I'll take it.
When did you manage to sneak into the convoy?

411181046.speaker: 伊森
411181046.content: When did you find out I was here?

411181047.content: Answering a question with another question means he doesn't want to tell the truth. Upu roars and the red light on Ethan's blade flashes as the two enter into combat.

411181048.content: The smoke gradually clears. The CORG soldiers instinctively rush in to Anubis' defense, which is exactly what Ethan was hoping they'd do. He runs toward them instead, using his power advantage to smash through their ranks.

411181050.speaker: 伊森
411181050.content: Ask Anubis if you make it out of this alive.

411181051.content: Angered by the feint but not letting it show on his face, Anubis charges toward Ethan with Upu. However, his attack is less ferocious than before now that Ethan has taken hostages.

411181052.speaker: 伊森
411181052.content: Surely there's a better way to settle this?

411181055.speaker: 迷铁之家成员A
411181055.content: Boss! Behind you! You're being surrounded!

411181056.content: The younger subordinate shouts his warning to Ethan as he escapes from the truck, indifferent to the soldiers chasing after him.

411181058.speaker: 伊森
411181058.content: The Children of Iron aren't so easy to kill either.

411181059.content: Ethan kicks the hostage into Anubis, then swiftly sheathes his blade, picks up his subordinate, and dashes through the side door into the building.

411181061.speaker: 阿努比斯
411181061.content: No, our mission is to protect the goods.

411181063.speaker: 阿努比斯
411181063.content: Sweep the perimeter. He's bound to have other lackeys out there.

411181064.speaker: 阿努比斯
411181064.content: I'll report this to the director. Check they haven't taken anything from the trucks, and send the injured to the medical AGI Mecha.

411181065.speaker: 阿努比斯
411181065.content: Keep the factory locked down. As soon as we receive the official arrest warrant, we'll bust into the recycling center and seize them.

411191001.content: The recycling center is furnished like all other CORG lab centers, and everything is swathed in a dim green light.

411191003.content: Ethan checks the young man over for injuries.

411191004.speaker: 迷铁之家成员A
411191004.content: Oh... That's not my blood. I think I broke a soldier's nose when I bashed into him. There was so much blood...

411191005.content:
He tries to wipe the blood from his clothes, but he only spreads it out and makes it worse.
He looks up and suddenly spots Thoth standing next to his boss.

411191009.speaker: 伊森
411191009.content: Watch out for her. If she tries to pull anything, we'll...

411191010.speaker: 托特
411191010.content: We don't have time for your little jokes. I've run a rudimentary scan of the building, and these are the locations most likely to be the older labs.

411191011.speaker: 托特
411191011.content: We'll be more efficient if we split up and search. What do you think?

411191012.speaker: 伊森
411191012.content: Sure, but he's going with you.

411191013.speaker: 迷铁之家成员A
411191013.content: Aw, don't leave me with her, boss...

411191015.speaker: 伊森
411191015.content: If things get dicey out there, you'll only get in my way. Besides, she could probably use your help.

411191016.speaker: 托特
411191016.content: And what can he do, exactly?

411191018.speaker: 托特
411191018.content: Now now, there's no need to be rude. Don't worry, you helped me get in here so I'm going to stick to my side of the bargain and find the parts you need. You can trust me.

411191020.speaker: 伊森
411191020.content: That Anubis could burst in here at any minute. We best get a move on.

411191021.speaker: 托特
411191021.content: Wait... Did you bring that communicator you used in the truck?

411191022.speaker: 伊森
411191022.content: That old thing? Why do you want it?

411191023.content: Ethan hands it over to Thoth, who looks it over. There's an engraved insignia in the top-left corner that looks somewhat familiar to her.

411191025.content: Thoth exits back to the home screen and silently opens the user profile page.

411191027.content: Ethan snatches his terminal back, but Thoth has already seen everything she needed to see.

411191028.speaker: 托特
411191028.content: It's been bothering me how you managed to get your hands on CORG intel... And it's from this?

411191029.speaker: 伊森
411191029.content: This has nothing to do with our deal.

411191030.speaker: 托特
411191030.content: I know you don't want to expose your sources. But have you ever stopped to think that the answers you're looking for have been right there in your pocket this entire time?

411191032.speaker: 托特
411191032.content: Don't act dumb with me. That's the Spealght logo. Now that Eugene's dead, there's only one Spealght employee left with access to CORG intelligence.

411191033.speaker: 托特
411191033.content: Why would Jolin agree to help you? Or should the question be, how did you force Jolin to help you?

411191034.speaker: 伊森
411191034.content: How do you know all this stuff?

411191035.speaker: 托特
411191035.content: I like to keep myself informed.

411191036.speaker: 伊森
411191036.content: Why do you think Eugene died and Jolin was not only spared, but even sent to Aether Gazer?

411191037.speaker: 托特
411191037.content: So, it wasn't just your skills with a blade that helped so many people evade arrest by CORG.

411191038.content: Ethan sneers and taps his forehead.

411191039.speaker: 托特
411191039.content: But if he's the one who sent you here, then your goal is obvious.

411191040.content: Ethan brings up a list of parts on his old terminal, and shows it to Thoth.

411191042.speaker: 托特
411191042.content:
This is all military grade stuff. No wonder Jolin didn't make them for you.
Okay, let's split up.

411191043.speaker: 伊森
411191043.content: Hang on a second. I've given you quite a lot, I think it's about time you were honest with me for a change.

411191044.speaker: 托特
411191044.content: What did you want to know?

411191045.speaker: 伊森
411191045.content: Do you really not know what my first question is, or do you just not want to tell me? I don't even know what your name is.

411191046.speaker: 托特
411191046.content: And you think this is the time to ask?

411191047.content: Thoth shakes her head and projects her ID card against the wall for Ethan to read.

411191048.speaker: 伊森
411191048.content: General manager of the Land of Moons bookstore... Thoth...

411191050.content: Ethan walks over to a secluded corner in the recycling center basement, and holds his terminal against the scanner.

411191053.content: Some old protobodies are hanging up in a round test chamber, like a tomb. The harsh light accentuates the protobodies' true colors.

411191054.content: Ethan walks over to one of them. The surface of the half-human, half-mechanical structure is studded with the burned-off ends of old tubing.

411191055.content: He stands there contemplating it for a moment, then moves on to the next.

411191056.speaker: 伊森
411191056.content: These must be the ones Jolin was talking about...

411191057.speaker: 托特
411191057.content: What do you think? Will it work?

411191058.speaker: 伊森
411191058.content: I'm not sure, I'll give it a try.

411191059.content: Ethan's hand hovers over the chest of one of the protobodies. Its eyes are still open and staring blankly ahead.

411191061.speaker: 托特
411191061.content: They're still in the test phase, so they haven't been given full consciousness yet.

411191063.content: The old lab echoes with clanking sounds as Ethan strips some small modules from the protobodies.

411191064.speaker: 伊森
411191064.content: So many tests... Haven't they gotten the results they want yet?

411191065.speaker: 托特
411191065.content: They're going to continue until the Visbanes have been wiped from existence.

411191066.speaker: 托特
411191066.content: More precisely, when Paracaesar thinks there's no chance of them ever reappearing again.

411191068.content: Ethan zones out at the mention of that name, until he suddenly feels a cold breeze against his shoulder. He instinctively swivels and knocks over a group of protobodies.

411191070.speaker: 伊森
411191070.content: If it isn't CORG's lapdog. You're fast.

411191071.speaker: 阿努比斯
411191071.content: I told you the next time I saw you, I'd arrest you.

411191073.speaker: 伊森
411191073.content: I know, it's just that this Sephirah Zone is so big and there's not really anywhere we can go.

411191074.content: Their blades clash in a shower of sparks. Ethan is repelled backward by Anubis's superior strength, and is barely able to keep his balance.

411191077.content: His bionic muscles power up and his blade slashes manically, forcing Anubis into a corner.

411191079.content: Ethan ignores Thoth's shouts through his terminal as he charges toward Anubis. Bullets graze his back as he swings his blade wildly.

411191081.content: With a howl, the spirit dog leaps from his mask and clamps its jaws on Ethan. The Divine Power courses through Ethan's body and tears through all his augment tubing.

411191082.speaker: 伊森
411191082.content: So many of you and just one of me. What's wrong, you afraid of losing?

411191084.content: Anubis calmly gives the order and all of the surrounding CORG soldiers immediately open fire. Ethan quickly shakes off the dog and hides behind a test bench just in time.

411191085.speaker: 伊森
411191085.content: Hey, where are you guys? The ceiling's about to come down!

411191088.content: Anubis finds the frequency of Ethan and Thoth's communication channel and shuts it down. Ethan switches off his terminal and flees out the door with his blade.

411191090.content: A sharp pain tears through Ethan's body. He clutches his arm and sinks to his knees.

411191092.content: Anubis raises his hand to tell the soldiers to stop, and walks over to handcuff Ethan.

411191094.content: Ethan is covered in injuries, the most life-threatening of which is a gunshot wound near his ribcage.

411191095.speaker: 伊森
411191095.content: What you waiting for, chief? Worried your sword isn't sharp enough?

411191096.content: Anubis glares at Ethan, cuffs him and then switches on his terminal.

411201001.content: At the same time, in another lab.

411201003.speaker: 托特
411201003.content: The enemy have control of the comms channels here, so we had to go dark in case they find our location.

411201004.speaker: 托特
411201004.content: Ethan's body is already nearly at breaking point.

411201006.speaker: 迷铁之家成员A
411201006.content: He's done so much to help you, you've gotta think of something!

411201007.speaker: 托特
411201007.content: I'm trying! You shouting at me isn't helping.

411201008.speaker: 托特
411201008.content: Anubis didn't order his men to kill Ethan on the spot. I think he'll be fine.

411201009.content: Thoth browses through the design blueprints on the workbench terminal, trying to ignore the young man frantically shouting in his ear.

411201010.speaker: 托特
411201010.content: (Are these designs for a recycling sorting and identification system? This will definitely be helpful to Ethan.)

411201011.speaker: 托特
411201011.content: (But Project Forgetower... Aren't these needed for Project Forgetower?)

411201012.content: Thoth connects a flash drive to the workbench and has hacked her way in within minutes. She examines the protobody she has finally found while she waits for the design to download.

411201013.speaker: 托特
411201013.content: Pink hair, 07 series... This must be the one...

411201014.content: She suddenly hears a loud noise in her audio terminal. She squints as she adjusts the frequency settings.

411201015.content: Control and counterattacks are little more than a question of timing. This is something Thoth has had a lot of practice with.

411201017.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411201017.content: I'm not getting any matches on file. Are you sure these are the same Children of Iron as last time?

411201018.speaker: 阿努比斯
411201018.content: Yes, he's their leader. He's an augmented individual called Ethan.

411201019.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411201019.content: Ethan... What's he doing snooping around the recycling center?

411201020.speaker: 阿努比斯
411201020.content: His augments are damaged and we believe he's searching for spare parts.

411201021.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411201021.content: Oh... Then we won't even need the flashguns then. What about his underlings?

411201022.speaker: 阿努比斯
411201022.content: We've sent tracking mechas to find them.

411201023.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411201023.content: Good. We must make sure no data leaves the building.

411201024.content: The conversation ends. A short while later, Ethan's subordinate runs into the lab carrying the module components from the list.

411201026.speaker: 迷铁之家成员A
411201026.content: I don't know if this is enough... Are you going to be able to rescue him?

411201027.speaker: 托特
411201027.content: That depends on if you can get these parts out of here safely.

411201028.speaker: 托特
411201028.content: I can only override two AGI Mechas to escort you. Any more and CORG might find out what we're up to.

411201029.speaker: 托特
411201029.content: The recycling center has three exits. One of them will take you back to the road you came up on.

411201030.content: The blueprints downloaded, Thoth removes the flash drive and passes the protobody to the kid, before taking some of the components from his hand.

411201032.speaker: 托特
411201032.content: There seems to be a lack of mutual trust between us, so I need a few more chips to seal the deal.

411201033.speaker: 托特
411201033.content: Okay, you need to get all of this stuff out of here. Your boss will be fine as long as none of it gets damaged.

411201034.content: The young man nods vigorously and hurries from the room, carrying the protobody and the other components Thoth found.

411201035.content: Thoth looks at the dot on her terminal screen that represents Anubis. It's getting closer to the convoy outside the recycling center.

411201036.content: In the darkened truck, the medical AGI Mecha provides regular readouts of the patient's condition. Ethan is lying in the corner, his more serious injuries already bandaged up.

411201041.speaker: 阿努比斯
411201041.content: The system detected Divine Grace residue when we arrested you.

411201042.speaker: 阿努比斯
411201042.content: And this is a restricted CORG area that ordinary Mods don't know about.

411201043.speaker: 阿努比斯
411201043.content: Your friend is in much more trouble than you are. If you don't cooperate, we might have to pin all the blame on you instead...

411201046.speaker: 伊森
411201046.content: If the friend you're talking about is that woman... then yeah, she could be what you say.

411201049.content: Anubis is standing beside the AGI Mecha, and checks Ethan's vitals while he waits for the answer.

411201050.speaker: 伊森
411201050.content: It was something strange... like... Nope that's not it, that's the name of the person who owns the bookstore in my building back home.

411201051.speaker: 伊森
411201051.content: Ow ow ow! If you're gonna treat me, then treat me. But if you're gonna torture me, then just torture me. Can you just make up your mind?

411201053.content: The teasing expression on Ethan's face fades away. He doesn't need Anubis to tell him that his body's failing. His fingers and toes are already going numb.

411201054.content: He knows the pain he just felt wasn't Anubis trying to torture him—he's adjusting the mecha's settings to try and save him.

411201055.content: Ethan fumbles with a small button on his chest while keeping an eye on Anubis.

411201056.speaker: 伊森
411201056.content: Chief, last time I saw you, you were the hotshot head honcho working on a big case. Why have you been demoted to working as a security guard in the middle of nowhere?

411201057.speaker: 阿努比斯
411201057.content: Please answer my question. Who is your accomplice? If you don't tell me within two minutes, I'll turn off the mecha.

411201059.speaker: 伊森
411201059.content: Is your boss breathing down your neck? Let me guess: Paracaesar?

411201060.speaker: 伊森
411201060.content: Kingu told me about last time. You helped the people of Rostach, didn't you?

411201061.speaker: 伊森
411201061.content: You saw things in a different way to how she did. You weren't there for very long, but you understood those people.

411201062.speaker: 伊森
411201062.content: Even with Kingu gone, those who are left aren't just going to sit quietly in that hell hole. They're gonna make themselves heard.

411201063.speaker: 伊森
411201063.content: I mean... I've hijacked a Photon Rail or two in my day, but that was just to survive...

411201064.speaker: 伊森
411201064.content: What I'm getting at, chief, is... Don't you guys want another source now that the old guy's not in Rostach anymore?

411201065.content: He's cut off by the beeping of a notification. Anubis steps away from the console and looks him dead in the eyes.

411201066.speaker: 阿努比斯
411201066.content: Since you refuse to provide us with the name of your accomplice, I have no choice but to take you back to CORG HQ for further questioning.

411201067.speaker: 阿努比斯
411201067.content: But before I do, I'll need you to give me details of all your augments so I can request the most suitable treatment.

411201068.speaker: 伊森
411201068.content: Huh? Did I hear you right, chief? You're not going to kill me?

411201069.speaker: 阿努比斯
411201069.content: Your punishment is for the courts to decide, not me.

411201070.speaker: 伊森
411201070.content: But what do your laws say about punishing... "people" like me?

411201072.speaker: 阿努比斯
411201072.content: Do you want to die to escape taking responsibility for your crimes?

411201073.speaker: 伊森
411201073.content: Hehe, my time hasn't come yet!

411201074.content: Ethan hurls a minibomb at Anubis without warning. The explosion is minimal, but it instantly fills the truck with thick smoke.

411201075.content: Anubis runs over to stop Ethan from escaping, and the two of them collide in the smoke. The sound attracts the soldiers stationed outside.

411201078.content: After their experience in the factory, the soldiers don't take their chances with Ethan and instead drive him back with bullets. Taking advantage of his confusion, Upu leaps up from Ethan's blind spot and pins him to the ground.

411201079.content: Ethan doesn't have the strength left to escape the spirit dog's grip. Anubis walks over slowly, a flashgun pointed directly at Ethan's head.

411201080.speaker: 伊森
411201080.content: Save me or kill me. The choice is all yours, chief.

411201081.speaker: 阿努比斯
411201081.content: I've already given you a chance.

411201082.content: Just as Anubis is about to pull the trigger, Ethan's body is suddenly pulled to the side in defiance of all physics.

411201083.content: Anubis's mouth drops open. He thinks he sees something in the air, but he's too surprised to chase it.

411201085.content: A group of Children of Iron members materialize out of the shadows to catch Ethan, brandishing their blades menacingly to keep Upu back.

411201086.speaker: 奥利海姆
411201086.content: No! Who did this to you, boss?

411201087.speaker: 伊森
411201087.content: Stop hollering and just get out of here!

411201088.speaker: 奥利海姆
411201088.content: Where's that woman who was helping you?

411201090.content: Realizing all of his attention is being absorbed by the voices coming through his earpiece, Ethan switches off his communicator and slips out with his subordinates under the cover of darkness.

411201093.content: The spirit dog looks mournfully in the direction that Ethan made his escape, then takes a few steps back and silently returns into Anubis's mask.

411201094.content: Anubis stands there in silence, then dismisses the confused CORG soldiers with a wave of his hand. His eyes are fixed in the last spot he saw Ethan.

411201095.content: Left all alone, Anubis removes his mask.

411201096.speaker: 阿努比斯
411201096.content: ...You were the last person I expected, Captain Thoth.

411211001.content: The soldiers busy themselves with either chasing after the Children of Iron or counting the convoy's losses. Nobody thinks to question the woman with the badge continuing to work diligently in the recycling center.

411211002.content: After checking there was no one else around, Anubis once again looks into the empty space and speaks.

411211004.speaker: 托特
411211004.content: So, you are as sharp as they say.

411211005.content: Thoth retracts her camouflage cloak woven from thread and sheathes her blade as she walks calmly over to Anubis.

411211006.speaker: 阿努比斯
411211006.content: If you'd have left with Ethan, I wouldn't have had any proof against you.

411211007.speaker: 托特
411211007.content: But if you'd have suspected it, I know you would have found some eventually. Even without the top brass' support.

411211008.speaker: 阿努比斯
411211008.content: Are you so sure about that?

411211009.speaker: 托特
411211009.content: I know very well what it's like to be hunted down.

411211010.speaker: 阿努比斯
411211010.content: I'm simply doing my job. Speaking of which, you've violated Articles 10, 23, and 172.

411211011.speaker: 阿努比斯
411211011.content: But you report directly to Director Paracaesar, and I can't believe you'd have defected to the Children of Iron. So, I'd like to know why you did it before I press charges.

411211012.speaker: 托特
411211012.content: Are you worried I'm on a secret mission for Paracaesar?

411211013.speaker: 阿努比斯
411211013.content: Yes. Although I have heard rumors that things between you and the director are strained at the moment.

411211014.speaker: 托特
411211014.content: So, you don't know why I was transferred to the Egregious Crimes Department?

411211015.speaker: 阿努比斯
411211015.content: Your crimes will be even more egregious if you fabricate facts about two other directors.

411211016.speaker: 托特
411211016.content: Report it to the departments afterwards if you're still unsure. It's not like you'll have much of a say once Red Fox and Kamau take over the case.

411211017.speaker: 阿努比斯
411211017.content: Stop being evasive and tell me why you did it.

411211018.speaker: 托特
411211018.content:
Can't you guess?
The report you submitted after returning from Rostach has been classified Top Secret.

411211020.speaker: 托特
411211020.content: Some of the experiments carried out under Project Forgetower are crimes against humanity, and the adverse effects have spilled out beyond the scope of the experiment itself.

411211021.speaker: 托特
411211021.content: Just because it's a top-level project at the R&D Center doesn't mean you can just do whatever you want.

411211022.speaker: 阿努比斯
411211022.content: What does this have to do with the Children of Iron?

411211023.speaker: 托特
411211023.content: I'm not responsible for their reasoning. I do know that they know all about Project Forgetower, and that they've chosen to collaborate.

411211024.speaker: 阿努比斯
411211024.content: And just because you want to uncover the truth doesn't mean you can just do whatever you want.

411211025.speaker: 托特
411211025.content: At least I didn't hurt anyone.

411211026.speaker: 阿努比斯
411211026.content: Will the results of your investigation be published internally?

411211027.speaker: 托特
411211027.content: I don't think so. There are too many people with their own theories, and the bosses don't want to rock the boat.

411211028.speaker: 阿努比斯
411211028.content: So, you're just going to carry on like this?

411211029.speaker: 托特
411211029.content:
Unless there's a better way for everyone.
And I mean "everyone."

411211030.content: Anubis nods and falls silent. Finally, he turns on his terminal to check what his soldiers are doing.

411211031.speaker: 阿努比斯
411211031.content: There isn't much time. Is there anything else you'd like to add to your completely one-sided, uncorroborated statement?

411211037.content: Thoth arrives at the location marked on the map and walks down a hidden alleyway. People are crouched on either side, their tension palpable. When their leader sees that there isn't anyone else following Thoth, he breathes a sigh of relief and walk over to greet her.

411211038.speaker: 迷铁之家成员A
411211038.content: Careful, boss. She could be undercover!

411211039.speaker: 伊森
411211039.content: Don't be ridiculous. Why would she need to do that when she can just have us all arrested in one fell swoop?

411211040.speaker: 奥利海姆
411211040.content: Don't worry, there's three of us and only one of her. She wouldn't dare start anything.

411211041.speaker: 托特
411211041.content: Is that really the kind of thing you should be saying to an undercover agent?

411211043.speaker: 托特
411211043.content: I gave you time to escape, but it doesn't mean I'm one of you.

411211044.speaker: 伊森
411211044.content: I'm surprised. That Anubis didn't look like the type you could reason with.

411211045.speaker: 托特
411211045.content: It's internal CORG stuff. That's all you need to know.

411211046.speaker: 托特
411211046.content: Our deal isn't over yet, Ethan.

411211048.speaker: 迷铁之家成员A
411211048.content: Then give our boss what you promised! Otherwise, we won't give you that... that protobody thing you want!

411211049.speaker: 托特
411211049.content: You wanted so much stuff, how did you expect me to carry it all?

411211050.speaker: 托特
411211050.content: I have one last question for you, Ethan. Tell me the truth and I'll give you everything you want.

411211051.speaker: 托特
411211051.content: Do you know where Jolin is now?

411211054.speaker: 伊森
411211054.content: If anything's gonna kill me, it'll be your yapping.

411211057.content: The two figures stand alone in the empty alley.

411211058.speaker: 伊森
411211058.content: What do you want him for?

411211059.speaker: 托特
411211059.content: He knows a lot, and he's already in big trouble with you. I'm going to make him an offer he can't refuse.

411211060.speaker: 托特
411211060.content: Tell me where I can find him. I promise nothing will come back to you.

411211061.speaker: 伊森
411211061.content: This "offer"... Is it from CORG, or you?

411211062.speaker: 托特
411211062.content: If it's from CORG, then please don't lie to me by calling it an "offer."

411211063.content: They continue talking until they're interrupted by the screeching of a car's brakes nearby. A battered old SUV pulls up in the street and Olheim jumps out.

411211066.speaker: 迷铁之家成员A
411211066.content: You can bet I've guarded it with my life and not a single piece has been damaged.

411211067.speaker: 迷铁之家成员A
411211067.content: But I don't know about whatever that Thoth woman has brought... Hey, where did she go?

411211068.content: Ethan and Olheim turn to look back in the alleyway, and see it's empty except for the moonlight. When they turn back, they see someone has opened the trunk to the SUV.

411211069.content: Ethan's terminal buzzes in his pocket. He takes it out and sees he has received an anonymous message.

411211070.content: "There's something else I need to take care of, so goodbye for now."

411211071.content: "If you ever get sick of living like a fugitive, you can message me through the Land of Moons website."

411211073.content: A small AGI Mecha is hovering right above the SUV, holding all of the components Thoth left and a flash drive with their blueprints.

411211074.speaker: 迷铁之家成员A
411211074.content: Is that all the stuff we need to save you and sis?

411211075.speaker: 迷铁之家成员A
411211075.content: What a relief! I was very worried about you there for a sec, bro!

411211077.speaker: 伊森
411211077.content: What is she up to? Does she want me to sign up?

411211078.content: Ethan looks at the website that's loaded on his terminal. A silver bird is pointing users to a registration page.

411211080.content: The engine roars to life and the SUV speeds away from the factory. The AGI Mecha remains in the air, watching them leave.

411211081.content: Suddenly, a mechanical arm emerges from the window and shoots the mecha down.

411221001.content: Thanks to the information Ethan gave her about Jolin, it doesn't take Thoth long to track down which research institute he's working for now.

411221002.speaker: 托特
411221002.content: He's actually registered as an investor... but Paracaesar is the one responsible for all staff transfers.

411221003.speaker: 托特
411221003.content: He's under close surveillance, but he's available for interview from certain media outlets?

411221004.content: Thoth is reading through various press releases about the institute's employees, and it's piquing her interest.

411221005.content: All of the employees are renowned and respected researchers who promise an excellent return on investment.

411221006.speaker: 托特
411221006.content: This must be where they hold their interviews...

411221007.content: Footage from the local attraction Valleyrand Theme Park pops up, and Thoth promptly saves it to her terminal.

411221008.content: It shows a number of ex-military AGI Mechas flying in the sky and releasing fireworks above children's heads.

411221009.speaker: 托特
411221009.content: Is this the kind of thing you're nostalgic for, Mr. Jolin?

411221011.content: Thoth pins the journalist badge to her chest and adjusts herself in the mirror.

411221012.speaker: 托特
411221012.content: The last time I dressed up as a reporter was to get close to #{nickname}#...

411221013.content: Even though there's no one else there, Thoth looks awkward and shy as she relives that memory.

411221014.speaker: 托特
411221014.content: Sigh... If only I'd been more calm and collected back then.

411221015.speaker: 托特
411221015.content: I'll hold up my end of the bargain very soon...

411221016.content: As soon as Jolin steps foot in the park, a flying AGI Mecha swoops over to greet him, kicking up a large gust of wind.

411221017.content: The children behind him scream in excitement as the fireworks burst up into the sky in a million different colors.

411221018.speaker: 托特
411221018.content: I'm sorry for disturbing you at your busiest time of day.

411221019.speaker: 乔林
411221019.content: Don't apologize. I'm just surprised the city is interested in hosting such an exhibition.

411221020.content: A service AGI Mecha trundles over to them, a pixelated smile on the screen where its face is.

411221023.speaker: 托特
411221023.content: I'll have a water please. Anything for you, Mr. Jolin?

411221024.speaker: 乔林
411221024.content: I'll have a ginger ale if you've got one.

411221025.content: The mecha deftly takes out two bottles from the chilled storage container in its chest and hands them to Thoth and Jolin.

411221026.speaker: 乔林
411221026.content: I haven't had one of these in years.

411221027.speaker: 托特
411221027.content: If I remember correctly, you designed this "Popper" mecha 20 years ago to conserve military supplies in extreme environments.

411221028.speaker: 托特
411221028.content: It was rare at the time to see a humanoid mecha for military use, and it was very popular with the soldiers. And now they've been converted to civilian use and you can see them everywhere, like in restaurants or parks, for example.

411221029.speaker: 托特
411221029.content: Which brings me to the first question I'd like to ask you today: What inspired you to come up with this initial design?

411221030.speaker: 乔林
411221030.content: I wouldn't say I was "inspired"... I think I just wanted to address an unmet need that had always bothered me.

411221031.speaker: 乔林
411221031.content: Can we walk? I think the main hall is over there, and I don't wanna get in the way of the kids.

411221032.content: Jolin walks north toward the park's main exhibition hall. He's much thinner than he was last time Thoth saw him, and he appears to have a problem with his left leg.

411221033.speaker: 乔林
411221033.content: What's it been, sixteen years? You're still so young, and I'm an old man now.

411221035.speaker: 乔林
411221035.content: I probably wouldn't have done if Ethan hadn't warned me. Sixteen years, it's a long time.

411221036.speaker: 乔林
411221036.content: That's what memory's like, you know? You gradually come to forget the things that seemed so very important at the time. And all I did back then was write a report...

411221037.speaker: 乔林
411221037.content: If you don't mind me asking, how is Liberty these days?

411221038.speaker: 托特
411221038.content: Come on now, you know full well what CORG does when someone commits a "serious breach of protocol."

411221039.speaker: 乔林
411221039.content: I guess I should be glad my name is even attached to the factory, even though I don't do anything there.

411221040.speaker: 托特
411221040.content: I did hear that CORG didn't punish you after the incident, and just sent you back to Spealght. I think that's a fair reflection of CORG's attitude.

411221041.content: The gravel road leading to the hall is practically deserted, and the two of them slow down the pace.

411221042.speaker: 乔林
411221042.content:
I knew the interview was just a pretext.
I can't think of any other reason you'd be here apart from news about Liberty.

411221043.speaker: 乔林
411221043.content: I've done so many things these past years that I have to keep to myself, and now Spealght is gone. I'm tired and I'm fed up.

411221044.speaker: 乔林
411221044.content:
You chose a good spot here.
Come on, ask me what you came to ask me.

411221046.content: The hubbub of the park suddenly fades out, blocked by Divine Power. Jolin is stunned for a few seconds, then comes to a realization.

411221047.speaker: 乔林
411221047.content: No wonder you were the one they sent to investigate Liberty.

411221048.speaker: 乔林
411221048.content: The "insider," or should I say the "bystander," was you, wasn't it?

411221049.speaker: 托特
411221049.content:
Ethan must have told you what happened at the recycling center.
No one can stand by forever when it's something they care deeply about.

411221050.speaker: 乔林
411221050.content: But it's hard to go back once you've crossed the line. You'll be carrying that burden for the rest of your life...

411221051.speaker: 乔林
411221051.content: What do you want to know? But let me warn you, those projects were all CORG top secret, so I don't know much about them.

411221052.speaker: 托特
411221052.content: I was hoping you'd help me resurrect an Artificial Mod.

411221054.speaker: 托特
411221054.content: I have the chips and protobody, but Paracaesar has installed a self-destruct system.

411221055.speaker: 托特
411221055.content: The only people who understand how the system works are those who were involved in Project Forgetower. So, I need your help.

411221056.speaker: 乔林
411221056.content: Do you understand what you're asking of me?

411221057.speaker: 托特
411221057.content: An engineer who abetted a wanted Aether Gazer criminal shouldn't really be surprised to be receiving an offer like this.

411221058.speaker: 乔林
411221058.content: This is nothing like the situation with Ethan.

411221059.speaker: 乔林
411221059.content: Project Blacksteel is finished. Bioaugmented people like Ethan are worthless now.

411221060.speaker: 乔林
411221060.content: But Project Forgetower is still ongoing, and all the equipment related to it is classified as registered CORG assets. If we're found out...

411221061.content: Thoth's reassuring smile seems to dispel Jolin's doubts, but then he remembers something and the frown returns.

411221062.speaker: 乔林
411221062.content: As you just reminded me, miss, you know full well what CORG does when someone commits a "serious breach of protocol."

411221063.speaker: 托特
411221063.content: But there are some things you don't need reminding of, Mr. Jolin. Like the past decisions you made time and time again.

411221064.speaker: 托特
411221064.content: Which is more important: CORG's idea of "order," or our own principles?

411221065.speaker: 乔林
411221065.content: Sigh... If I were to help you, who is it you want to resurrect?

411221067.speaker: 乔林
411221067.content: The 07 series... Has her Divine Grace circuit been activated?

411221068.speaker: 托特
411221068.content: Yes—if the test logs I've read are to be believed. She has the ability to have "visions," but at the expense of her memory. I don't think that's a normal protobody function.

411221069.speaker: 乔林
411221069.content: Well, that's a problem. You know better than me that a Mod's consciousness will change once they're awakened. The Divine Grace circuit may be a part of their protobody, but once it's activated it may also have an irreversible effect on the chip containing their personality.

411221070.speaker: 乔林
411221070.content: Installing an activated chip into a new protobody is a bit like transplanting a Mod's consciousness into her pre-awakened self. There might be some... problems...

411221072.speaker: 乔林
411221072.content: Loss of control, followed by a complete override by a natural predator's instinct.

411221073.speaker: 托特
411221073.content: I think I've seen that recently...

411221074.speaker: 乔林
411221074.content: Project Forgetower was originally established in order to manufacture weapons, and the basis of the personality network is to destroy all of CORG's enemies. She'll be twice as dangerous as you imagine her to be.

411221075.speaker: 乔林
411221075.content: What do you want to resurrect her for anyway? Do you think you know a way to make her obey your orders?

411221076.speaker: 托特
411221076.content: For... Let's just say it's for a better future.

411221077.speaker: 托特
411221077.content: You'll see what I mean if that day ever comes. And if not, then just think of this as a weird private joke.

411221078.content: Thoth shakes her head and laughs, unable to continue explaining.

411221079.speaker: 乔林
411221079.content: Well then, let me remind you that if you're not planning on using her, you'd better think about uninstalling all of her combat modules. Including her Divine Grace circuit.

411221080.speaker: 乔林
411221080.content: It'll make it much harder to bring her back, but you'll be safer when you do.

411221082.speaker: 托特
411221082.content: You're making it sound like an incompatibility between her consciousness and her body. If that's true, then perhaps there's a solution we can try.

411221083.speaker: 乔林
411221083.content: Not one that I can think of.

411221084.speaker: 托特
411221084.content: It's not exactly safely, but it is something I've got experience using.

411221085.speaker: 托特
411221085.content: Mr. Jolin, do you remember the Neural Network?

411231001.speaker: 托特
411231001.content: Okay, reboot initiated. This video should record everything that happens next.

411231002.speaker: 托特
411231002.content: Allow me to point out that activating her Divine Grace circuit is going to be very taxing for a Modifier at my level. If an alternative method cannot be found, I wouldn't recommend she uses her abilities too often.

411231003.speaker: 托特
411231003.content: Finally, don't talk about this to anyone, #{nickname}#.

411231004.content: Thoth taps the camera set up in the corner of the room, then returns to the console for the final checks.

411231005.speaker: 托特
411231005.content: Environmental monitoring is good, the Divine Grace circuit is clear, the protobody is intact, minimum charge completed... Checking chip data...

411231006.speaker: 托特
411231006.content: Consciousness network functional, storage location good, storage module recording, error rate... 99%?!

411231007.speaker: 托特
411231007.content: Does that mean she's completely lost her memory? What... What happened to you?

411231008.content: Thoth inserts the chip in the protobody and dons the Neural Network receiver. She takes a deep breath and runs the command to switch on the protobody.

411231009.content: When the sound of a second heartbeat begins to reverberate around the room, Thoth picks up the flying dagger from the table and waits, poised to defend herself. But seconds pass and the protobody remains motionless.

411231010.speaker: 托特
411231010.content: (Is the memory loss so severe that she can't reboot?)

411231011.content: She swaps the hand holding the dagger and opens the real-time monitoring display on the console. As soon as she sees that the status of the Assisted Combat System is "Active," she realizes that she's been fooled.

411231012.content: The pink-haired girl sits up. Her lifeless left eye shines with rays of golden light that gather into a cross over her pupil.

411231013.content: A white and gold knight extends from behind her and parries Thoth's dagger attack with its wings.

411231015.content: Thoth glances at the Neural Network launcher on the console, and is about to press it when the white-gold knight raises its spear at her.

411231016.content: Thoth's instinct tells her to jump back, just in time for her to miss the burning energy beam that shoots across the room from the spear, melting everything in its path—including the thread Thoth was using to bring the launcher close to her.

411231018.content: The knight continues its onslaught, leaping around the girl to attack Thoth. The workshop is soon in ruins.

411231019.content: But Thoth was prepared for this eventuality. Despite not being able to activate the Neural Network, she's still able to disconnect the protobody's power supply as she leaps away.

411231020.speaker: 托特
411231020.content: (She can run for about 30 minutes on minimum charge. I'll just let her tire herself out.)

411231021.speaker: 托特
411231021.content: (I just hope it won't damage the chip...)

411231022.content: As she cautiously walks around the mechanical knight, Thoth notices that the girl's gaze is not on her, but on the camera in the corner.

411231025.content: The pink-haired girl shrinks away and gestures as though she's holding something, but her hands are empty.

411231027.content: The girl looks up at Thoth as though she's sensed something, and the knight comes to a stop.

411231028.content: Thoth doesn't really understand what's happening, but she knows she needs to use her thread to get her hands on the Neural Network launcher.

411231032.content: The girl glares at Thoth and the knight raises its spear decisively. Thoth knows she has to press the button now.

411231034.content: Her consciousness slowly ebbs away as the Neural Network kicks to life, and the world turns to black before being eaten away by white dots.

411231035.content: At the end of the nothingness is a caged room, surrounded by darkness and impossible to see inside.

411231038.content: The girl is sitting on the bed, hugging her knees and staring into a white lamp. There is nothing else in the room except a desk, a coffee table, and a picture book that looks like it's made for children.

411231039.speaker: 托特
411231039.content: Is this room your entire memory?

411231041.speaker: 托特
411231041.content: Isn't there anyone else you know? Or somewhere else you can remember?

411231043.speaker: 托特
411231043.content: Does this book belong to you? Why don't you see if it triggers any other memories?

411231044.content: Thoth picks up the book and waves it in the girl's direction, but she doesn't respond. Thoth drops it with a frown, not even sure if the girl can hear her.

411231045.speaker: 托特
411231045.content: Do you really have no other memories? Have they been wiped? No, CORG wouldn't have let you go if they'd wiped your memory.

411231046.speaker: 托特
411231046.content: Are you sure there isn't something you've not told me, #{nickname}#? Why did you want to resurrect an Artificial Mod with no memories?

411231047.content: Skuld still doesn't react to the sound of that name. This is the first time Thoth has ever felt completely at a loss. She sighs and leans against the wall, staring out into the darkness.

411231048.speaker: 托特
411231048.content:
Your predecessor never shut up, so why are you so quiet?
Is it because there's actually nothing in your brain, and you don't even know how to talk?

411231049.speaker: 托特
411231049.content: If you can understand me, sit there and don't make a sound.

411231051.speaker: 托特
411231051.content: Okay, so you do understand me.

411231052.speaker: 托特
411231052.content: You don't remember anyone or anything except this room. I don't see why though, it's hardly anything special...

411231053.speaker: 托特
411231053.content: You know, I think I might have been here myself before—it looks like the training base for the CORG reserve troops. They said it was somewhere for us to get accustomed to the pressure of working for CORG.

411231054.speaker: 托特
411231054.content: And how did that turn out? I spend each and every day rushing around, unable to even find a place where I can just sit in peace without being interrupted. They gave me the power to walk in this world, and yet I'm still in exactly the same place.

411231055.content: Thoth stretches her hand out into the darkness and examines the outline of her fingers.

411231056.speaker: 托特
411231056.content: Maybe I'm still a dumb rookie even after all these years, trapped in this tiny room on a training base because I don't want to think about how complicated life is outside.

411231057.speaker: 托特
411231057.content: Are you the same? Or maybe you're not, because you were born to be one of CORG's tools, and you have nothing except the orders given to you...

411231058.speaker: 托特
411231058.content: But are we really the same as we used to be? Have we ever yearned for something more? Have we ever expected something more?

411231059.content: Thoth slowly curls her fingers into a circle and peers through the middle, as though she's looking for stars in the night sky.

411231060.speaker: 托特
411231060.content: I've seen a lot of people like us, birds trapped in a cage. Even though we don't know how far we can fly when we're free, that doesn't stop us wanting to reach the moon.

411231061.speaker: 托特
411231061.content:
Is that what you want to do?
To see the outside world?

411231062.content: Skuld's eyes flicker and her hand tentatively reaches out to grab the picture book Thoth had let fall to the floor. She slowly brings it closer to her.

411231063.speaker: 托特
411231063.content: I'm sure #{nickname}# didn't want to save you just so you could continue living like someone's property.

411231064.speaker: 托特
411231064.content: Do you know why, then? Because this room we're sitting in, that book in your hands... You're the only one who can remember them.

411231065.content: Thoth walks over to Skuld and clasps her right hand. She gently places the book in the girl's lap.

411231066.content: The cover depicts a white rabbit and a mouse.

411231067.speaker: 托特
411231067.content: What is it you've depleted all your memory trying to find?

411231068.content: Skuld strokes the book cover and blinks. Thoth thinks she can see a gleam in her eyes.

411231070.content: She opens the book to the first page. It's blank.

411241007.speaker: 托特
411241007.content:
My home. Your body is still recovering.
Come.

411241008.content: Thoth pulls Skuld over to a couch, opens a photo album and hands it to Skuld. Skuld stares at her, panic-stricken, and curls herself up in a defensive ball.

411241009.speaker: 托特
411241009.content: I'm the same as you, I'm a Modifier too. I'm... #{nickname}#'s friend.

411241010.speaker: 托特
411241010.content: This is what #{nickname}# looks like. Look familiar?

411241012.content: Skuld looks at the photo and her eyes seem to gradually go out of focus, as though she's searching her memory for something, but in the end, she just shakes her head.

411241014.content: Thoth scrolls the album screen until she reaches a photo of a CORG laboratory.

411241015.content: Skuld's eyes immediately widen and she leaps from the couch to hide behind the refrigerator in the kitchen.

411241016.speaker: 托特
411241016.content: Okay, I'll put it away. How about we get you a change of clothes and something to eat...

411241017.content: Thoth is hardly ever at home, so there's not much in the fridge.

411241018.content: She manages to rustle up an omelet with rice, and sets it down on the coffee table with some tea and milk.

411241020.speaker: 托特
411241020.content: Yes, I've got to go back to work soon and I find it easier to concentrate on an empty stomach.

411241021.speaker: 托特
411241021.content: I don't know what you like, so I hope this is okay.

411241022.content: The girl picks up the fork like it's a strange instrument, and awkwardly uses it to shovel small bites of food into her mouth.

411241024.speaker: 托特
411241024.content: Here. Don't speak with your mouth full.

411241025.content: Thoth pours Skuld some water. She goes to sip it and then stops, eyeing the tasteless liquid in the glass in confusion.

411241026.speaker: 托特
411241026.content: We can try something else. Perhaps stimulating your taste buds more will help your sense of taste to recover.

411241027.content: Skuld picks up the tea pot and pours herself half a mug of tea, which she picks up and immediately takes a big gulp from.

411241030.content: Skuld clatters the mug back on the table and sticks out her scalded tongue.

411241032.content: As if anticipating this, Thoth adds milk until the dark tea turns the same color as maple syrup, leaving beautiful trails on its surface as it's stirred.

411241034.content: Skuld takes another cautious sip. It's really hard to tell what she likes from her expression, but she guzzles the rest of the tea down.

411241035.speaker: 托特
411241035.content: Can you just wait here for me while I do my work?

411241037.content: Thoth puts Skuld out of her mind completely while she's in work mode, although she does hear the occasional noise of Skuld rifling through her belongings.

411241038.speaker: 托特
411241038.content: Don't touch that vase on top of the bookcase.

411241040.content: She hears the sound of footsteps as Skuld runs this way and that.

411241041.content: It's been a long time since she's shared her home with anyone.

411241042.speaker: 托特
411241042.content: There's a blanket on the couch if you get cold.

411241044.content: Thoth finishes reviewing two files, and looks up to see that Skuld is nowhere to be found.

411241046.content: She's surprised to see Skuld emerge from the kitchen, carefully holding in her sleeves something that looks like a very hot mug.

411241050.content: The warm milk is sweet and comforting, and Thoth instantly feels better.

411241051.speaker: 托特
411241051.content: Did you add sugar? Where did you find it?

411241052.speaker: 诗蔻蒂
411241052.content: In a jar... I tried all of them.

411241053.speaker: 托特
411241053.content: Wait, you've got something red in the corner of your mouth. Is that chili paste?

411241054.content: Skuld unconsciously licks it away, then immediately screws up her face.

411241056.content: By the time Thoth has finished tidying up in the kitchen, it's already past midnight.

411241058.speaker: 诗蔻蒂
411241058.content: Yeah... but this book is so interesting.

411241059.content: She has a manga open on her lap. It tells the story of a silver mechanical bird that flies between worlds, having adventures on the way.

411241060.speaker: 托特
411241060.content: Where do you want to sleep tonight?

411241061.content: The girl tilts her head as though she doesn't understand the meaning of "sleep."

411241062.speaker: 托特
411241062.content: You don't have to sleep if you don't want to.

411241063.content: Thoth brings two pillows over and throws them on the floor next to the bookcase. The two of them then lie down and read to pass the time.

411241064.content: Thoth's terminal suddenly rings with a message from Hodur.

411241065.speaker: 霍德尔
411241065.content: "Admin's gone to Sasanami with the Pheasant Squad, and Division Nine has lost all contact."

411241066.speaker: 霍德尔
411241066.content: "I'll let you know if I hear anything."

411241070.content: Skuld holds up the book for Thoth to see.

411241071.speaker: 诗蔻蒂
411241071.content: The little bird can exchange its life to achieve its desires?

411241072.speaker: 诗蔻蒂
411241072.content: "Desires"... They must be something very special.

411241073.speaker: 托特
411241073.content: No, they're just an ordinary concept.

411241074.speaker: 托特
411241074.content: For example, right now you want to read instead of going to bed. That's a "desire."

411241075.speaker: 托特
411241075.content: But some desires can be very powerful when they are repeated again and again.

411241076.speaker: 托特
411241076.content: They can give you the courage to do something you thought was impossible.

411241079.content: The girl mumbles a name whose meaning not even she herself is aware of.

411241080.speaker: 托特
411241080.content: You'll remember your desires eventually, don't worry.

411251001.content: Thoth spends a peaceful night in, then heads out first thing in the morning to get the things Verthandi needs.

411251002.content: When she gets back, Skuld is still half asleep. Thoth looks at her and wonders what the next steps should be.

411251003.speaker: 托特
411251003.content: Skuld, do you think you can look after yourself while I'm not here?

411251004.speaker: 诗蔻蒂
411251004.content: Look after myself? You mean like this?

411251005.content: Skuld copies what Thoth did to her last night by patting herself on the head.

411251006.speaker: 托特
411251006.content: Er, more than that. Like, can you eat and sleep?

411251008.content: Skuld leans against the bookcase and takes two big bites out of a sandwich Thoth has brought her, then closes her eyes and pretends to fall asleep.

411251010.speaker: 托特
411251010.content: Skuld, would you like to go live with someone else for a while?

411251011.speaker: 诗蔻蒂
411251011.content: Why? Do you not like having me here?

411251012.speaker: 托特
411251012.content: Of course I do. It's just that, it'll be dangerous for you here.

411251014.speaker: 托特
411251014.content: We don't need to worry too much about it now, but... There are people who want to see you, and I want to make sure you're okay before you meet them.

411251016.speaker: 托特
411251016.content: Remember that person in the photograph I showed you the other day? Perhaps it'll jog your memory if you were to meet them.

411251018.speaker: 托特
411251018.content: Now, it's quite far away so if you run into any trouble, I want you to use this to contact me. It has a signal inside, so all you have to do is press here... and you'll hear my voice.

411251019.speaker: 托特
411251019.content: Keep it hidden and don't let anyone see it, okay?

411251020.content: Thoth hands Skuld the customized terminal and teaches her how to use it. Skuld nods enthusiastically, and stuffs the device deep into her pocket.

411251022.content: Thoth thinks for a second, then brings up some photos of the Jivitabad slums.

411251023.speaker: 托特
411251023.content: It might look a bit dirty, but the people there will look after you. You shouldn't go...

411251024.speaker: 诗蔻蒂
411251024.content: So many people... Is this the "outside"?

411251025.content: Skuld examines the photograph closely and mutters to herself, her eyes filled with images of this unknown world. It's not until Thoth stops speaking that she even notices that she was.

411251026.speaker: 诗蔻蒂
411251026.content: What did you just say, Thoth?

411251028.speaker: 托特
411251028.content: Have fun in Shashvat. Look after yourself.

411251029.content: In a bustling corner of Jivitabad, an open-air cafe is doing a roaring trade. Sparrow-sized AGI Mechas flit from table to table, bringing people their orders.

411251031.content: Lokken pushes her cup away from her and grimaces at the dark brown liquid in her cup. She starts thinking about how she can ask for a refund.

411251032.content: Her communicator rings exactly on time. She sits up straight and answers the call.

411251034.speaker: 托特
411251034.content: I told you, it's not that easy for me to contact you.

411251035.speaker: 洛肯
411251035.content: Bah, are you still keeping me a secret from CORG? Do you really think any of Paracaesar's people are going to remember me after 20 years?

411251036.speaker: 托特
411251036.content: I hope you're taking this more seriously than you sound.

411251037.speaker: 洛肯
411251037.content:
Yeah yeah, I never get to relax what with you reminding me to be careful every single day...
What do you want, anyway? I'm very busy.

411251038.speaker: 托特
411251038.content: I need you to come to Ain Soph to watch over someone for me while I'm away.

411251039.speaker: 洛肯
411251039.content: "Watch over"? What do you take me for? A prison, or a kindergarten?

411251040.speaker: 托特
411251040.content: She's another ghost. She doesn't belong in a prison or a kindergarten, does she?

411251041.content: Lokken doesn't answer. Bitter memories rise in her mind like that disgusting drink she just tried.

411251042.speaker: 洛肯
411251042.content: This had better not be another one of your bad jokes.

411251043.speaker: 托特
411251043.content: You'll find out when you see her.

411251044.content: Lokken sighs and nods. Staring at the cup on the table, she pays her check and stands up to leave.

411251045.speaker: 洛肯
411251045.content: Life's never boring with you around is it, Captain Thoth?

319141001.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319141001.content: Isn't this Aether Gazer's training room?

319141002.content: Verthandi pushes open the door to the basement of the bookstore, and instantly, it seems that she's traveled back to the Division Nine training room back at Aether Gazer. Yes, that's right. She'd recognize this place anywhere, being a member of the Special Task Force and all.

319141003.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319141003.content: Why is this here at the bookstore?

319141004.speaker: 宁希达
319141004.content: It was just a regular basement before this. Those agents who came with you yesterday fixed this up for us.

319141005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319141005.content: Agents... yesterday... that's a little fast, isn't it?

319141006.speaker: 宁希达
319141006.content: I think they had some remote guidance. And maybe they had some kind of assembly manual to refer to, like you do with furniture. I've put this in just for you, as I realize that we have to get you back in fighting form as soon as possible.

319141007.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319141007.content: Um, are you sure? I've completed all the general training units and I don't see how they can help me recover?

319141008.speaker: 宁希达
319141008.content: Well... since the treatment has already begun, let's just trust the doctor, shall we?

319141009.speaker: 宁希达
319141009.content: Let's give this a try. Get yourself to the center of the room.

319141010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319141010.content: But wouldn't we be a nuisance to the neighbors doing this here?

319141011.speaker: 宁希达
319141011.content: No, we made sure to use soundproofing materials. I gave the room a run, and it looks like you have to be directly upstairs in the bookstore to hear anything at all.

319141012.speaker: 宁希达
319141012.content: This is why I wanted you to wake up earlier and train before the bookstore opens for business. That way, nobody will hear you.

319141013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319141013.content: But the bookstore isn't really open for business anyway...

319141014.content: In accordance with Ningishzida's instructions, Ver positions herself in the center of the training room. Ningishzida is holding a tablet computer, and it looks like she's concentrating really hard, making Ver wonder if she actually knows how to use it.

319141016.speaker: 宁希达
319141016.content: I... Just hold on another minute... Wow, this is one long user manual...

319141017.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319141017.content: Take your time. I'm not going anywhere anyway.

319141018.speaker: 宁希达
319141018.content: Mmm, I'll be done soon... Model library, combat parameter configuration, projection position, and simulation force field calibration...

319141021.speaker: 宁希达
319141021.content: Should the Captain Thoth from here drop by, do we tell her about the end of the world?

319141022.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319141022.content: I think she'd know by now? Anyway, Thoth says we don't have to keep any secrets from her. Besides, we've worked with her for two days already.

319141023.speaker: 宁希达
319141023.content: It's been only four days so far excluding today. Which two days were those, I wonder...

319141025.content: The two girls look at each other in puzzlement for a while before deciding to give up.

319151002.speaker: 洛肯
319151002.content:
Fancy you, having the gall to ask me without having first finished watching the replay!
I've never been so seriously hurt before. Anyone else in my shoes would have already perished.

319151003.content: Lokken walks into the room, closes the door, drags a stool, and sits in a corner with one leg over the other knee. Ver looks at her in befuddlement. Why, she doesn't even look "seriously hurt" at all.

319151004.speaker: 洛肯
319151004.content: You can stop staring. Unlike you people, I just need a bit of time to patch up these scratches.

319151005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319151005.content: "Patch up," huh... But why are you here?

319151006.speaker: 洛肯
319151006.content: What do you mean by that? Haven't you heard? That I'm staying here too?

319151007.speaker: 洛肯
319151007.content: Surely you knew that someone was staying here before you barged in here yesterday?

319151009.content: Ver stares at Lokken in shock. After all, this underground facility feels utterly dead to her. It's no exaggeration to say it's just a massive lab.

319151010.speaker: 洛肯
319151010.content:
Well, you said no the last time I asked you over to play.
So, unfortunate as it is, we can only encounter each other in a situation like this now.

319151011.speaker: 洛肯
319151011.content: I'll ask you again: are you absolutely sure that what happened yesterday wouldn't happen again?

319151012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319151012.content: What are you thinking of doing?

319151013.speaker: 洛肯
319151013.content: Me? Relax. I'm not interested in a freak like you. I'm not interested in getting corrupted by your Bane Energy like I almost was yesterday, either.

319151014.speaker: 洛肯
319151014.content: Besides, the Director's already told me about the experiment. So it doesn't really matter what I become, does it?

319151016.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319151016.content: As a punishment, as well as a preamble to a new mission for her.

319151017.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319151017.content: In our timeline, in the year 2305, Lokken died while attempting to close a space rift. But here, she's alive. To use her as an experimental aid would be most beneficial to our efforts to stabilize the world line.

319151019.content: This piece of information is new to Ver, and different from what Thoth just told her. Or is it..? Arguably, the deceased Lokken did "leave" CORG in a way...

319151020.speaker: 洛肯
319151020.content: Why are you staring at me like that again? I'm not bothered at all.

319151022.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319151022.content: Thoth should have already told you that we want you to recuperate here, and that no one wants to hurt you.

319151023.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319151023.content: All we need you to do is to stay in this place for observation and treatment while refraining from contact with the outside world. We'll let you go once we're sure that you have control over yourself.

319151024.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319151024.content: So you mean to say that you're locking me up in here?

319151025.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319151025.content: No, we're watching over you here.

319151026.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319151026.content: No way, Ningishzida and I have agreed to train together every morning. Besides, I've other things to do...

319151027.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319151027.content: I'm not asking for your opinion here, Verthandi.

319151028.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319151028.content: The hyperspace is my experiment. My space, my rules.

319151029.content: As Paracaesar's words become increasingly strident, the atmosphere in the interrogation room also becomes more and more tense.

319151030.content: But the thought of Thoth and Ningishzida, Saint Sophia, and her promises has made Ver unable to accept Paracaesar's plan.

319151031.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319151031.content: Still, no way... If you insist on keeping me here, you may as well send me back to "reality."

319151032.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319151032.content: I'm sorry, but I must go now.

319151033.content: Ver stands up and walks out the door without paying any further heed to the projection of Paracaesar in the chair. Lokken is leaning back into her corner, and makes no move to stop her.

319151034.content: But as she leaves the interrogation room, she finally realizes why Paracaesar and Lokken appeared so nonchalant just seconds earlier—an entire herd of AGI Mechas and soldiers have gathered to stop her.

319151035.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319151035.content: I'm warning you, you don't want to see me mad.

319151036.speaker: 科尔盖士兵B
319151036.content: Please return to the interrogation room.

319151037.content: Ver can see the muzzles of countless black firearms pointed at her. She purses her lips as her hands tremble slightly, then finally takes a step back with her right foot.

319151038.content: She then summons her Access Key as she goes into battle stance.

319161001.speaker: 小院长
319161001.content: You weren't really expecting an honest answer from me, were you?

319161002.content: To Ver's great disappointment, Prez does nothing but slowly turns both their palms upwards, indicating that they have nothing to share with their captors. Despite their obvious discomfiture, however, they are firmly sticking to their guns.

319161003.speaker: 小院长
319161003.content: I don't care what sort of trouble "I" got into in your world. If I lost my memories, it means that I wasn't very successful at whatever I was doing.

319161004.speaker: 小院长
319161004.content: But I won't betray myself, no matter what.

319161005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319161005.content: How would that be betraying yourself? I just want to help our Admin remember who they are.

319161006.speaker: 小院长
319161006.content: That "Admin" you speak of... is me?

319161008.content: Then, Prez cocks their head and touches their nose somewhat awkwardly, as if something just came to mind.

319161009.speaker: 小院长
319161009.content: I can't tell you, no matter if you are friend or foe, since I'm not sure if I'm ready at that time... Well, looking at your faces, I probably am not.

319161010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319161010.content: Not even a single clue? Maybe a place, a name, or anything else that can help Admin remember...

319161011.speaker: 小院长
319161011.content: No way. No matter what I say or whom I tell, the final outcome will never be what I'd want to see.

319161012.speaker: 小院长
319161012.content: If you believe me, just let me go and pretend that you didn't see me today.

319161013.speaker: 托特
319161013.content: But don't you want to leave some useful information for yourself? For the day you begin to recover your memories?

319161014.speaker: 小院长
319161014.content: Maybe. But again, the result won't be what I'd want to see.

319161016.speaker: 托特
319161016.content: Aren't you going to take your alarms with you before you leave? Those things don't belong in the Plane Layer.

319161017.content: Prez frowns in puzzlement, and takes a closer look at Ver's and Thoth's Access Keys and dress.

319161018.speaker: 小院长
319161018.content: Don't you know your tech? While the sensor head of the cloaking device does look a bit like those you see in some alarms, you should be able to tell them apart.

319161019.speaker: 托特
319161019.content: Cloaking device?? What are you trying to hide???

319161020.speaker: 小院长
319161020.content: Fine, I guess the technology of world line branches is still a black box to you. I mean, it's not easy to grasp even for developers.

319161021.speaker: 小院长
319161021.content: But you people should've at least sent someone more tech-savvy... Did you really not know how many flaws there are in your so-called "Plane Layer"?

319161022.speaker: 小院长
319161022.content: Why do you think so little of Gaea's surveillance methods? Had I not installed these cloaking devices the night you went to the beach, who knows how many more Cleansers would have streamed into the Surface Layer?

319161024.content: Ver turns her head to look at Thoth, who's looking more than a bit concerned.

319161025.speaker: 小院长
319161025.content:
What is that look on your face?
Please tell me the two of you didn't dismantle them because you thought them to be alarms?!

319161027.content: Prez, eyes wide in dismay, slaps their forehead audibly with their right hand. But before they can say a word, the alarm on the watch sounds again.

319161028.speaker: 小院长
319161028.content: Great, they're coming again. You two can clear up the mess you made.

319161029.speaker: 小院长
319161029.content: I'll go fix the cloaking device. And for goodness' sake, stop messing with them!!!

319171002.content: The wounded evil dragon hovers over the dark and dilapidated ruins. Drow the Elf, who's wearing a red cloak, is dodging its breath that is coming down like a rain of fire.

319171003.content: Just as the evil dragon crashes into the ground, Drow takes cover behind a collapsed stone pillar. Then, she leaps onto the dragon's back and unleashes her most powerful attack.

319171004.content: It's a secret sword combo with 32 consecutive moves. But fail to connect once, and the character will be immobilized for a long, long time...
