319171006.content: Lokken puts down the gaming device before the screen goes gray, but remains seated on the steps. She looks up at Ver who's been in a half-squat behind her.

319171007.content: It is night. The duo lock eyes with each other, though they can't quite discern the other's facial expression in the dimness.

319171008.speaker: 洛肯
319171008.content: Is there anything I can do for you?

319171009.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319171009.content: No, I just woke up and was about to head out. Then I saw you playing the game and decided to watch for a while.

319171010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319171010.content: Didn't you have any throwing weapons in your backpack? You were dangerously low on health when you charged that thing!

319171011.speaker: 洛肯
319171011.content: If I am to win, I'm to do so fair and square. I refuse to win like a coward.

319171013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319171013.content: Yeah. The Legend of the Knight franchise was real popular when I was a kid.

319171014.speaker: 洛肯
319171014.content: When you were a kid? Oh... you mean right now.

319171015.speaker: 洛肯
319171015.content: Not bad. That means you've always had good taste.

319171016.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319171016.content: Well, "good taste" may be pushing it... But is this the genre of games you like?

319171017.speaker: 洛肯
319171017.content: What genres do you think I like?

319171018.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319171018.content: Maybe shooting games or horror games, or that kind of very scary shooting game where someone just pops out of nowhere and kills you...

319171019.speaker: 洛肯
319171019.content: (Scoffs) Horror games are all jump scares and no substance.

319171020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319171020.content: But how do you get "substance" in the digital format...?

319171023.content: Ver pouts, but can't bring herself to be mad at Lokken. She sees that the latter is looking down at her gaming device again and is reopening a game save file. For a brief moment, it's as if she's seeing the girl who's squatting in the corner of the room.

319171024.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319171024.content: Do you want to go in? You've been sitting here all afternoon.

319171025.speaker: 洛肯
319171025.content: Aren't you worried that I'd scare away the customers?

319171026.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319171026.content: You're actually okay when you're on your device. Um, I don't mean to say that you're scary... or maybe just a little... ugh, never mind.

319171027.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319171027.content: What I'm saying is, surely you can't possibly sit out here the entire night?

319171029.speaker: 洛肯
319171029.content: You already know why I'm here. My job is to watch you. I just need to be somewhere where I can keep an eye on you.

319171030.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319171030.content: That doesn't matter. No matter what job you've been given, you should be kind to yourself.

319171031.content: As if she's just messed up in the game because she was distracted, Lokken presses the pause button, frowns, and ponders for a moment. Then, finally, she looks at Ver, baffled.

319171033.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319171033.content: Nope. You have to give yourself the motivation to do your job.

319171034.speaker: 洛肯
319171034.content: Looks like I wasted my breath on you yesterday.

319171035.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319171035.content: Yesterday... Please don't do absurd things like that again.

319171036.speaker: 洛肯
319171036.content:
Yeah, yeah, yeah, you're right.
Those who have the power to choose will always make the right choice...

319171037.speaker: 洛肯
319171037.content: Let me ask you: if, one day Gaea were to want you to eliminate all of mankind, would you do it?

319171039.speaker: 洛肯
319171039.content: Are you sure you'd be able to defy Gaea?

319171040.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319171040.content: What kind of a hypothetical question is this? You might as well ask me what I'd do if we saw the moon rise first thing tomorrow morning!

319171041.speaker: 洛肯
319171041.content:
Would you please just think through things a little more???
Gaea isn't divine. The Observators themselves are human after all.

319171042.speaker: 洛肯
319171042.content: And do you know what human beings are? They are a bunch of individuals who sooner or later forget their regrets and simply keep on making the same mistakes.

319171043.speaker: 洛肯
319171043.content: That's why they need us Modifiers. Think about it. What do you think we're supposed to be "modifying" or correcting?

319171044.content: It looks like Lokken has more to say, but there's no time for her to finish her thought. She licks her lips, and her eyes narrow slightly. She takes a glance at Ver, who's also gone on high alert.

319171045.content: The two of them summon their Access Keys. In a flash, they're no longer face to face, but have their backs against each other instead. The light from their Divine Grace has given them just enough to see their attackers, enough for them to know that these are things that shouldn't be here in the first place.

319181003.content: The muffled sound coming from the basement sounds like the 5:30 AM alarm. Ver yawns and climbs out of bed. Her eyes are still semi-closed by the time she arrives at the training room.

319181004.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319181004.content: Good morning, Ningishzida... What are you doing?

319181005.content: Inside the training room, Ningishzida is standing on a step ladder with a small hammer in her hand. She's pounding at the wall like a woodpecker, and the noise of this hammering wakes up Ver instantly.

319181006.content: The room has been transformed overnight. Now, the walls are covered with balloons, ribbons, and stickers, and there're even a few sofa cushions scattered on the floor. In the corner, there's a new lounge area with a table and some chairs, and the bookshelf next to the drinks chiller is filled with comic books.

319181007.speaker: 宁希达
319181007.content: Remodeling, of course. This may be a training room, but I'm sure we could all do with a pick-me-up anyway.

319181008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319181008.content: It does look good... Did you do all these by yourself?

319181009.speaker: 宁希达
319181009.content: Mmhmm! Heh, I did this mostly because I like it this way, you know. A little more colorful and livelier.

319181010.speaker: 宁希达
319181010.content: Where's Lokken? Isn't she here yet?

319181011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319181011.content: I'm not sure. She went off quietly last night. Maybe she went to look for a place to sleep.

319181012.speaker: ？？？
319181012.content: It was nice to sleep on the rooftop, with the cool weather and all.

319181013.content: Any sleepiness Ver might have had has been dispelled a second time by the voice coming from behind her. She turns around and sees Lokken, who has visible dark circles under her eyes.

319181014.speaker: 洛肯
319181014.content: Are you going in or not? You're blocking the way.

319181015.content: Ver steps aside for Lokken without much thought. As she watches Lokken walk into the training room, all she feels is a mixture of incongruity on all levels.

319181016.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319181016.content: So you slept on the rooftop last night?

319181017.speaker: 洛肯
319181017.content: Why not? There wasn't anybody there, and it's got a good view. You can't find a better place than that.

319181018.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319181018.content: Are you sure? Look at your dark eye circles. You look like a raccoon.

319181019.speaker: 洛肯
319181019.content: Oh, these? These are from the gaming. This was the first time I didn't have a schedule to adhere to, and I kind of just forgot the time.

319181020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319181020.content: Do you really like gaming that much...?

319181021.speaker: 洛肯
319181021.content: So, this is the "rehabilitation" you two were talking about?

319181022.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319181022.content: We haven't started yet. Wanna join us?

319181023.speaker: 洛肯
319181023.content: Why should I? I'm neither injured nor ill.

319181024.content: Lokken immediately makes herself right at home. She plops herself down in the lounge area, casually reaches for a bottled drink, and starts flipping a magazine she picked up from the table.

319181025.speaker: 洛肯
319181025.content: You guys continue with whatever you're doing. Don't mind me.

319181026.content: Ningishzida and Ver share a look with each other. Since they have no reason to chase her away, all they can do is to ignore her and start the training.

319181027.content: It all starts off in a fashion similar to the day before. At first, Lokken shows no interest in the weak Visbanes projected by the simulation. However, when the Bane Energy in Ver's body starts depleting, she puts down the book in her hand and leans forward little by little.

319181029.speaker: 宁希达
319181029.content: Huh? Are you talking to me?

319181031.content: At first, Ningishzida has no desire to explain what is going on. However, after seeing the look of impatience on Lokken's face, she decides to lean in closer and give her a brief rundown of Ver's condition.

319181032.speaker: 洛肯
319181032.content: Oh... That I'm actually familiar with.

319181033.speaker: 宁希达
319181033.content: Oh, have you suffered from the same thing before?

319181034.content: Lokken shrugs, and jumps into the training area without saying another word. A few punches and kicks from her later, the "Visbanes" are all gone.

319181035.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319181035.content: Do you wish to join in, Lokken?

319181036.speaker: 洛肯
319181036.content: This sort of kiddie play is not for me... But I can't sit back and watch this anymore.

319181037.speaker: 洛肯
319181037.content: Why go to such pains just to expend your power? Don't forget what I specialize in.

319181039.speaker: 洛肯
319181039.content:
Looks like you remember it very well.
Hey, Green Mop, all I need you to do is watch that Divine Power Suppressor carefully. Leave the rest to me.

319181040.speaker: 洛肯
319181040.content: I'm just sitting around doing nothing anyway. I might as well help you train.

319191002.content: It's six in the morning. Ver has rushed to the training room in a state of excitement, but she doesn't see Ningishzida there.

319191003.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319191003.content: Oh, no. Is she mad at me for being late...?

319191004.speaker: 宁希达
319191004.content: What are you talking about? I'm over here.

319191005.content: Ver shifts her line of sight a little lower, towards the sound of Ningishzida's voice, and spots a sofa cushion. Ningishzida is lying face down on it, almost blending into the cushion like camouflage.

319191007.speaker: 宁希达
319191007.content: I am lying flat on my tummy.

319191009.speaker: 宁希达
319191009.content: Well, Tho-Tho's coming back today. I think it's best that we don't tire you out in case she has a mission for you.

319191010.speaker: 宁希达
319191010.content: Besides, you've been recovering rather well. Taking a rest day wouldn't hurt.

319191011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319191011.content:
Okay then.
But it would feel odd not to move my limbs in the morning now.

319191012.content: Ver walks over to the training area, summons her Access Key, and brandishes it in the air a few times. She suddenly raises her eyebrows when she spots her reflection on the blade.

319191013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319191013.content: Ningishzida, I'd like to try something.

319191014.content: Ver sprints over to Ningishzida and squats down next to her to play her a video. Ningishzida's legs slowly stop shaking as she watches, and her eyes grow really wide.

319191015.speaker: 宁希达
319191015.content: You were the one who smashed into the mountain?!

319191016.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319191016.content: Hard to imagine, right? I was just as shocked when I saw this clip for the first time.

319191017.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319191017.content: It was pandemonium then, and it was quite some time before I regained consciousness. By the time I woke up, I was already here, and I could not for the life of me recall how I did that.

319191018.speaker: 宁希达
319191018.content: Oh... No wonder you were hurt.

319191019.speaker: 宁希达
319191019.content: You were saying you wanted to try something... Do you want to smash into a mountain again?

319191020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319191020.content: Nothing as crazy as that. I just want to see if I can summon up that feeling again.

319191021.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319191021.content: Thoth said that Gaea will send something even more powerful to destroy the Plane Layer, and said I could try to see if I can stop it. If I can return to the state I was in the video, I may have a chance.

319191022.speaker: 宁希达
319191022.content: Then do you know what you have to do?

319191023.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319191023.content: I'm not sure. I only know that there's another form of energy inside my body. At that time, I'd summoned it with great difficulty in my desperation to save Admin. I'll have to apply the same kind of effort here again.

319191024.speaker: 宁希达
319191024.content: Alright, then... But be careful! We don't want you to destroy the training room!

319191025.speaker: 宁希达
319191025.content: If I destroy the bookstore, we won't have to wait for Gaea to send out its super controller or something. Because Tho-Tho will kill us first.

319192001.content: Ningishzida turns off the simulation system, and the projected Visbanes immediately vanish. However, Ver doesn't put away her Access Key, but instead holds on to the hilt of her sword with both hands. She looks like she's not feeling well at all.

319192003.content: Ningishzida breaks out into a cold sweat as she looks down at the tablet in her hand and sees the Divine Grace reading. She stops walking towards Ver and retreats into a corner, holding her head and all curled up into a ball with a circle of shields around her.

319192004.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319192004.content: (Thank goodness she didn't get any closer to me...)

319192005.content: Ver is unable to utter a single word. This time, she hasn't passed out, and nor does she feel any ill effects from Bane Energy. Instead, it feels like she's brimming with power.

319192006.content: But this isn't necessarily a good thing—it's like taking a bucket to the well to draw water only to find that the well has suddenly turned into a fountain. The amount of power she's feeling inside her is so overwhelming, she can't quite breathe.

319192007.content: All she can do is to try her darndest to direct the excess Divine Grace to her Access Key and at the same time keep her Divine Power from flaring. Then, she finally sticks her sword, which has become increasingly heavy, into the ground.

319192008.speaker: 宁希达
319192008.content: Did you mean to say "Divine Power Suppressor"???

319192009.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319192009.content: (It's a little too late for that now, isn't it?!)

319192010.content: Ningishzida hurriedly pulls out the tablet again, but it looks like she's too late. Even worse, she can hear footsteps coming from outside the door.

319192011.speaker: 宁希达
319192011.content: I'm so sorry, Norn! I'm so sorry, Tho-Tho!!!

319192012.content: The Divine Grace response triggered in Ver is at its apogee. The sword in her hand shakes momentarily, and there's a flash of golden light, then a long crack in the ground.

319192013.content: The earth trembles for a moment, and Ningishzida can hear the tinkling sounds of bottles and cans knocking against each other inside the drinks chiller. Fortunately, the trembling ends soon enough and doesn't develop into a disaster.

319192014.content: The trembling has dislodged some dust from various surfaces, including the top of the main door of the bookstore, and it just so happens that this dust is falling on the person who's walking in on Ver and Ningishzida right now...

319192015.speaker: 托特
319192015.content: What in the world did the two of you do?!

319201002.content: Rushing to the alert location in the Plane Layer, Thoth's movements are as swift as ever. Strangely, Ningishzida and Lokken are nowhere to be found.

319201004.speaker: 托特
319201004.content: Based on your training logs, the two of us should suffice. We need people on the Surface Layer as well, should the unexpected happen.

319201006.content: Thoth shakes her head and points to the Spatial Collapse Warning Factor on her watch.

319201007.content: Ver only realizes now that the meter is already half full. That single, unassuming tick she'd only just seen now feels like a lifetime ago.

319201008.speaker: 托特
319201008.content: Unless there's something we missed or anything you haven't told me yet, then we can now conclude that Gaea could bypass the Plane Layer at any moment, detect the Surface Layer, and attack it.

319201009.speaker: 托特
319201009.content: Hyperspace is becoming increasingly unstable, which will increase the frequency and severity of Gaea's counteractions. The Surface Layer is also weak right now.

319201010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319201010.content: I see... How much time do we have?

319201011.speaker: 托特
319201011.content: I don't know. The hyperspace experiment has never reached this phase before, and Gaea is more complex than we thought. We have no way of predicting what could happen next.

319201012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319201012.content: What? I thought CORG managed Gaea and knew everything about it.

319201014.speaker: 托特
319201014.content: How did it go over there? Is Tarina doing any better?

319201015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319201015.content: Yeah, it helped. We still didn't know what exactly happened by the time I received the alert, but the Prez agreed to let me go back to try a few more times.

319201016.speaker: 托特
319201016.content:
Good.
Now, focus on combat. She's going to be okay.

319201017.content: Maybe it's hearing the news about Tarina while the Cleansers are nearly at hand, but Thoth's reaction is anything but pure joy.

319201018.content: But Ver doesn't give it any more thought, or rather, her focus is abruptly shifted to another matter—The number of Cleanser signals on the map is unusually small.

319211002.speaker: 托特
319211002.content: A mysterious attack, Ningishzida's death, the appearance of Turing and Gremory, and... Tarina's survival.

319211003.content: Thoth checks the meter as soon as the Cleansers have been dealt with. It's the same as it was half an hour ago in the medical center.

319211006.speaker: 托特
319211006.content:
It was only 57.4 at nightfall, but now it's already 72.
Such a significant deviation must have something to do with tonight's events.

319211007.speaker: 托特
319211007.content: Remember how I told you that there were two incidents from Molander in this year that CORG couldn't figure out?

319211008.speaker: 托特
319211008.content: We've confirmed the cause of the space rifts. As for the high energy source in this area now... It's a few days earlier than recorded, but I think this is it.

319211009.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319211009.content: Can we find out what it is?

319211010.speaker: 托特
319211010.content: Something's obfuscating the truth. We'll need time if we want to get to the bottom of it.

319211011.speaker: 托特
319211011.content: I'm going back to the book shop. What about you?

319211012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319211012.content: I need to go see if Tarina's woken up yet.

319211013.content: As if guessing Ver's plan, Thoth doesn't dissuade her. Instead, she smiles encouragingly.

319211014.speaker: 托特
319211014.content: I may have no basis for saying this, but she'll be fine.

319211016.speaker: 托特
319211016.content: But I must remind you that, although the high energy source only appears in the historical records once, we're no longer experiencing history.

319211017.speaker: 托特
319211017.content: If we face an attack like that again, I don't want you to even think about trying to fight it. Just get out of the way.

319211018.speaker: 托特
319211018.content: Look at me and promise me this.

319211019.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319211019.content: You know I can't just stand back and watch something like that happen.

319211020.speaker: 托特
319211020.content: In that case, I'd rather see you out now.

319211022.content: With a sigh, Thoth straightens out Ver's battle-tousled bangs.

319211023.speaker: 托特
319211023.content: Don't do anything foolish. Think of the people on the outside.

319211024.speaker: 托特
319211024.content: Ningishzida is still alive and well in the Axis World, and the Administrator must be waiting for you to return.

319211025.speaker: 托特
319211025.content: But if you get yourself killed, the people you want to see and the wishes you want to fulfill for yourself and others will never come to be.

319211026.speaker: 托特
319211026.content: The day we first met, I told you that I'd bring you back safe and sound.

319221001.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319221001.content: This explains everything... Why Tarina passed away as soon as I got better.

319221002.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319221002.content: It was her heart all along.

319221003.content: Ver still hasn't gotten over the news as she stands with Thoth in a street deep in Nordburg.

319221004.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319221004.content: Tho-Tho, how could Tarina's heart cure me even through her illness is so severe?

319221009.speaker: 托特
319221009.content: Tarina's illness is the result of a problem with Gaea. Her organs should be perfectly healthy, so perhaps Gaea affected her in a special way.

319221010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319221010.content: Really? Or are you just guessing?

319221013.speaker: 托特
319221013.content: It's nothing. What I'm saying is that this is likely the first time that Cleanser signals have appeared in the Surface Layer and Plane Layer simultaneously. We'd better focus our attention on that.

319221014.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319221014.content: Are you worried about Lokken? We'll be in serious trouble if she breaks the Plane Layer herself.

319221015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319221015.content: We also got into a fight last night, and I didn't see her when I went out this morning. I wonder if she's mad at me.

319221016.speaker: 托特
319221016.content: Isn't she always talking about how she's a "tool?" Tools don't feel things like anger.

319221017.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319221017.content: You don't see her that way too, do you?

319221018.speaker: 托特
319221018.content: Of course not. She's a person too.

319221019.speaker: 托特
319221019.content: We're not far from the CORG research institute. I've instructed them to impose emergency measures. There's a good amount of CORG security equipment nearby that we'll use to contain the Cleansers.

319251003.speaker: 塔琳娜
319251003.content: I'm good, Miss Norn. You can take a rest. There's no need to keep an eye on me.

319251004.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319251004.content: Absolutely not. Taking you out is risky enough.

319251005.content: Ver takes Tarina's hand, scared she might get lost in the crowd. Although, there doesn't seem to be anyone on the streets.

319251006.content: The far-off sky, the outskirts of the city, buildings here and there on the street... More and more colors have faded away, and the citizens seem to have disappeared too.

319251007.content: CORG cordons, local militia, confused and angry groups of protestors... The forecast sunny day has turned cloudy and oppressive.

319251008.speaker: 塔琳娜
319251008.content: It doesn't seem like it does in the books and on the television...

319251009.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319251009.content: It's like Thoth said. Time's running out.

319251010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319251010.content: Did Thoth ever explain why she told you those stories?

319251012.content: Tarina suddenly turns shy and awkward. It's a new look for her.

319251013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319251013.content: Something you're meant to keep secret?

319251014.speaker: 塔琳娜
319251014.content: No... She said she was worried you wouldn't know whether to tell me or not. And that you might not be able to explain.

319251016.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319251016.content: Are you thirsty? Let's get a drink.

319251018.content: Ver takes the two drinks from the storekeeper and checks the flavors written on the sides of the cups. She passes the peach juice to Tarina.

319251019.content: But, just as she holds out her hand, the familiar alarm tone sounds from her watch. She quickly mutes it and presses the drink into Tarina's hand.

319251020.speaker: 塔琳娜
319251020.content: Shouldn't you check it? Last time that happened, when you were looking after me, you rushed right off.

319251022.content: Ver sips at her apple juice and, for some strange reason, recalls the taste of jasmine tea. A faint but invigorating bitterness.

319251023.speaker: 托特
319251023.content: There's no point in avoiding something you care so much about. We might as well try before it's too late.

319251024.speaker: 洛肯
319251024.content: You should be more careful with your things. Don't blame me if you lose it again next time.

319251025.speaker: 塔琳娜
319251025.content: It's okay. If you have somewhere else to be I can make my own way back.

319251026.speaker: 塔琳娜
319251026.content: It wasn't as if I was planning a big day out, anyway. It was just going to be the two of us. And we'll get Ver to join us next time.

319251028.content: Ver's about to check the map when she notices the progress bar on her watch is coming to full. A call comes in from Thoth.

319251030.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319251030.content: I'm not sure I like the location tracking... I took Tarina out for a walk.

319251034.speaker: 托特
319251034.content: Listen, I don't know if Tarina can hear us, so sorry if this comes as a shock to her. Engineering has come up with something solid. The Controller will arrive in the hyperspace this afternoon.

319251035.speaker: 托特
319251035.content: You've probably already seen the progress bar. Today's the last day. If you're still unable to fight, I'll let Director Paracaesar know and...

319251036.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319251036.content: I've already promised I'll give it a shot.

319251037.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319251037.content: Tho-Tho, I see on the map that a Cleanser will land near here. Allow me to deal with it?

319251039.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319251039.content: Now who's forgetting how quick us Mods heal?

319251042.content: The call ends and Ver drains her apple juice in a single gulp. She throws the cup away and returns to Tarina.

319251043.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319251043.content: You were right. I'm needed on a mission now.

319251045.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319251045.content: Huh? Absolute no-no. Combat's too dangerous for you.

319251046.speaker: 塔琳娜
319251046.content: It really is combat, huh? Hey, was Ver telling the truth? You're really an elven knight?

319251047.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319251047.content: Uh... She must have been confused.

319251048.speaker: 塔琳娜
319251048.content: Oh, admit it, what does it matter now? If you can't say and do brave things at a time like this, when can you?

319251049.speaker: 塔琳娜
319251049.content: Miss Norn, let me watch you fight? I hear you're quite the sight.

319261001.speaker: 托特
319261001.content: What are you all doing here? I distinctly recall ordering you to leave.

319261002.content: Thoth and Ver are leaving the bookstore, where they stopped to pick up their personal effects, when they see the agents formed up in a line, armored and armed. The determined smiles, though, aren't military issue.

319261003.speaker: 拉斐尔
319261003.content: Unfortunately, you hung up before confirming your order. Thus making it invalid.

319261004.speaker: 拉斐尔
319261004.content: And, based on our considerable experience, we judged that you would require our assistance.

319261006.speaker: 拉斐尔
319261006.content: Yes. My idea, but not my orders. We all agreed. Very democratic.

319261007.content: Thoth rubs at her forehead a moment, using her arm to hide the smile she can't keep from her lips.

319261012.content: Raphael hands his gun to Bernini and drops to the ground, where he pumps out 20 push-ups in short order before standing to attention again.

319261014.content: Thoth opens up the tactical map. Incursion alerts are going off all over town. She silences the alerts. When there are two suns overhead, you don't need alerts to tell you something's wrong.

319261015.content: She nods to Ver, who's standing to her rear, and then turns serious again. She looks over her team and draws her Access Key.

319261016.speaker: 托特
319261016.content: You win. You want overtime, you got it.

319271002.content: The beams of light traversing the city fade away, replaced by fragments of digital data drifting across the sky. The air fills with a cold, dead scent, something lifeless and inorganic.

319271003.content: The agents look up. That hole in the clouds and the fiery ball beyond it are no longer visible, blocked out by a humanoid form descending. Something regular in shape, exquisite in construction... and made for combat.

319271004.content: A triangular crystal core at its back rotates slowly, a rainbow of energy flowing inside it. Sometimes the different colors of light merge to form a single shade, matching that of the beams which had just devastated the town. Beautiful, deadly, and here to pass judgment.

319271006.content: Raphael is looking at Thoth, but the latter has her eyes fixed on the terminal with nary an expression on her face. After about a second or two, she looks up again and shakes her head at her subordinates.

319271007.speaker: 托特
319271007.content: ... The Director has ordered that we're to pull back from the scene as the Controller is more powerful than anticipated.

319271008.speaker: 拉斐尔
319271008.content: What? After all this work we've put in?

319271009.speaker: 托特
319271009.content: By the Director's reckoning, we've already fulfilled the objectives of the experiment...

319271010.speaker: 托特
319271010.content: Didn't you hear me? You will not squander your lives here. Retreat!

319271012.content: Though still unwilling, the agents eventually obey the order given to them. One by one, they send transportation requests from their watches, and then transform into streams of digitized light bound for the Axis World.

319271013.speaker: 托特
319271013.content: It's too risky, Ver. We're aborting and heading home.

319271015.speaker: 洛肯
319271015.content: Go on, abort! Haha. I love a boss battle and I'll have it all to myself.

319271016.speaker: 洛肯
319271016.content: Baloney, get moving. Captain Thoth gave an order.

319271017.speaker: 贝尼尼
319271017.content: Hey, you know I don't like that nickname. And what about you?

319271018.speaker: 洛肯
319271018.content: What about me? Just be a good little human and let me look after you.

319271019.content: Up on the roof, Lokken laughs and grabs a remote control unit from Bernini's hand. She uses it to aim the point-defense cannon at the airborne Controller.

319271020.content: The magnetically accelerated projectiles stream from the muzzle, forming a tongue of flame aimed at the Controller. It's moving so fast, it looks as if it'll continue into orbit.

319271022.content: The rounds reach the shield surrounding the Controller and burst into flame with an ear-piercing roar. The physical impact alone is enough to send cracks across the surface of the barrier.

319271023.speaker: 洛肯
319271023.content: Huh. Strong on attack, weak on defense.

319271024.content: The shield collapses and the cannon fire reaches towards the Controller, passing through it and onwards into the sky. Lokken breathes a sigh of relief, but it's too soon. The Controller is unharmed. Lokken's eyes narrow.

319271026.content: Whatever it is, it disappears. A chill runs down Lokken's spine and she spins around. She sees the Controller standing behind Bernini, a crystal shining brightly.

319271027.content: There's no time to shout a warning. Lokken pulls Bernini to her rear and raises her Access Key to stop the beam of light from the crystal.

319271028.content: The Access Key stands up to the blast, but it's making ominous creaking noises. It won't last long under this onslaught. Lokken pushes Bernini off to the side and raises her free hand to help block the attack.

319271031.content: With no more argument, Bernini gives a nod of gratitude and respect, and leaves the hyperspace.

319271032.content: Lokken sighs, and then gives a little laugh. She can sense her Access Key is about to shatter, and she herself is pinned down, unable to even move a leg to dodge.

319271033.speaker: 洛肯
319271033.content: Guess I wasn't even good enough to be reserve. What a failure. I don't even make a good container.

319271034.speaker: 洛肯
319271034.content: But I got a thank-you, at least. Feels good.

319271036.content: The unexpected shout causes Lokken to tense up momentarily, but before she can look around a hurricane blasts past her and the pressure pinning her arms in place eases up.

319271037.content: She lowers her arms. She looks about but the rooftop is, apart from herself, deserted. She hears a crash come from down on the plaza and she runs to the edge of the roof to look down. And then she rolls her eyes, as if someone's played a cheap trick on her.

319271038.speaker: 洛肯
319271038.content: Even now, she's showing off... Well, she sure seems ready.

319271039.content: Even Ver feels a bit odd in the suit of black armor. But the sword in her hand? As natural as natural can be. As if she was born with it.

319271041.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319271041.content: I knew it. I don't know my own strength and now look what's happened...

319271042.speaker: 托特
319271042.content: I didn't know you had an Access Key like that. Are you okay?

319271043.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319271043.content: I'm good. Better than ever, I think.

319271044.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319271044.content: Leave the rest to me, Tho-Tho. I can take it down.

319271045.speaker: 托特
319271045.content: I would still prefer you fall back.

319271046.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319271046.content: But you said it was up to me, right? And I said I'd try, right?

319271047.speaker: 托特
319271047.content: But I don't know what will happen.

319271048.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319271048.content: Me neither. But I'd rather find out here and now, than go back and have everyone scratch their heads over it.

319271049.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319271049.content: Think of it as the last stage in my rehabilitation exercises. But I think I can handle it now.

319271050.content: Ver shakes her head gravely as she watches the Controller, apparently unharmed, emerge from the vast hole in the ground.

319271051.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319271051.content: Anyway, I've got an appointment to keep this afternoon.

319271052.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319271052.content: I promised... To protect everyone's wishes, to the very end.

319621001.content:
She's looking at her own dream.
There it is, an entire expanse of sky, all pure and clean and constant.

319621002.content:
She sees the girl under the tree.
She's looking out at the world that sits snug in the full embrace of the heavens.

319621003.content: She walks into the dream and towards the girl. She hears that tune that hasn't been hummed by anyone in ages, flowing across vast stretches of time.

319621006.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319621006.content: I finally found you. And I didn't manage to thank you the last time.

319621007.speaker: 塔琳娜
319621007.content: It's nothing. I only woke you up just as you were falling asleep. Now you know how to stay safe.

319621008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319621008.content: There are still so many things I don't know... And it's the same this time. I passed out before I could defeat Lokken.

319621009.speaker: 塔琳娜
319621009.content: Do you not know, or do you not wish to know?

319621010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319621010.content:
I don't know why...
Never mind, there's no use speculating now.

319621011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319621011.content: So, am I only able to see you when I pass out? Isn't there any other way?

319621012.speaker: 塔琳娜
319621012.content: Do you simply wish to see me, or is there something you want to ask me?

319621013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319621013.content: I want to know why you're able to speak to me, what it is that you do every day, and why you want to help me. Stuff like that...

319621015.content: Tarina smiles and holds out her hand to Ver. But her hand feels cold in Ver's.

319621016.speaker: 塔琳娜
319621016.content: I don't think it'd help you for me to tell you all that.

319621017.speaker: 塔琳娜
319621017.content: Don't worry, I believe you'll understand very soon.

319621018.speaker: 塔琳娜
319621018.content: Because you've already taken that very first step.

319621019.content: The leaves are rustling overhead, and the silent world stops for a moment, as if it's beginning to fade away, and also as if it's starting to disintegrate.

319621020.content: Ver stares dumbly at Tarina, whose body is like feathers, peeling off into the ether piece by piece as she continues to smile.

319621021.content:
Ver can no longer touch her, and lets go of her hand.
The sky releases its embrace of the world, and the dream takes leave of Ver.

319631001.speaker: ？？？
319631001.content: Ver regains her consciousness. It looks like she fell asleep for a bit.

319631002.speaker: ？？？
319631002.content: Are you sure she was being corroded? I've never seen a Modifier recover that quickly.

319631003.speaker: ？？？
319631003.content: That's exactly what I need to figure out, thanks.

319631004.speaker: ？？？
319631004.content: Like we agreed earlier, you have ten minutes. And like earlier, you do your thing and I do mine.

319631006.content: Ver is struggling to open her eyes. Thankfully, the lighting in the room is rather dim, just enough for her to identify the three people in the room.

319631007.content: When a person is hallucinating, they may not realize that what they're seeing isn't real. However, when they're in reality, they can be absolutely sure that this is a reality that is not affected by their state of mind.

319631010.speaker: 托特
319631010.content: Relax. The battle is over. You are safe here.

319631011.content: Ver sits up while holding her head. She was lying on what seems to be an operating table. She looks over at Thoth blankly, since she hasn't associated the word "safe" with the other two in the room.

319631013.speaker: 托特
319631013.content: She took quite a hit but is still alive. She's with CORG now.

319631015.content: Rather fuzzy but otherwise real images flashed through her mind, causing a phantom pain in her. It's as if the energy in her is still out of control and tearing through her.

319631018.speaker: 托特
319631018.content: Do you still remember what happened?

319631019.content: Ver trembles slightly. She then shakes her head while avoiding Thoth's gaze rather rigidly.

319631020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319631020.content: I only remember that she was trying to pull all my Divine Grace out of me. And then I passed out.

319631021.speaker: 托特
319631021.content: Then we'll talk about this again when we get back.

319631022.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319631022.content: Are you sure that we can go back...? And where am I? And why are they here?

319631023.content: Ver looks over at the two Cognizant Visbanes, not understanding why Thoth is with them. Interestingly, they do not feel hostile.

319631024.speaker: 图灵
319631024.content: We're in Molander, inside an abandoned building. We're not far from that bookstore of yours.

319631025.speaker: 图灵
319631025.content: It was Gremory who brought you out. Like I said, maybe we can have a chat and be of help to each other.

319631027.speaker: 托特
319631027.content: He's not lying to you. You were already gone by the time CORG had opened another passage into there.

319631028.speaker: 托特
319631028.content: I found you by using the tracker on you. They don't intend to do anything to you.

319631029.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319631029.content: I'm not going to thank them for that.

319631030.speaker: 格莫瑞
319631030.content: I didn't save you to hear your thanks, little girl.

319631031.speaker: 图灵
319631031.content: Relax. What I want is the truth, and what you people want is peace. Although our objectives are not the same, they aren't in conflict either. At least for now, there is no reason for us to take up arms against each other.

319631032.speaker: 图灵
319631032.content: Miss Thoth has accepted my proposal for a conversation. I commend her willingness to agree to this arrangement.

319631033.content: Turing nods at Thoth in acknowledgment as he stands at an appropriate distance from the two Modifiers.

319631034.speaker: 图灵
319631034.content: You Modifiers are also looking for the origin of Visbanes. So I've been thinking, since we want the same thing, maybe we can work together on this.

319631035.speaker: 图灵
319631035.content: I cannot bring myself to believe the Prime Modifiers. Their position doesn't permit them to have this conversation. But you two seem to be different.

319631036.speaker: 图灵
319631036.content: Answer my questions, and in return, I'll tell you what I saw when I touched the Keep.

319631037.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319631037.content: The Keep? Are you referring to that place that explodes?

319631038.speaker: 图灵
319631038.content: Yes. Tell me, do you also hear its "voice" too?

319631039.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319631039.content: No. But I have this urge to touch it whenever I see it.

319631041.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319631041.content: What do you mean by you "knew it"? Why do you keep thinking that's a keep?

319631042.speaker: 图灵
319631042.content: Something used to be imprisoned in there. But that didn't happen in this era, and probably not the one before that either.

319631043.speaker: 图灵
319631043.content: There are signs of two energies mixed together, and these energies should have come from the builder of the Keep and the thing imprisoned inside.

319631044.speaker: 托特
319631044.content: Assuming what you said is true, which of these two do you think is the "origin" of Visbanes?

319631045.speaker: 图灵
319631045.content: It could be either one of them. What I know now for sure is that both parties have left this "Keep" and could be anywhere in Gaea at this moment.

319631046.speaker: 图灵
319631046.content: The thing imprisoned inside seems to have escaped. And as the prison was broken, the energy that flowed out from it formed an unstable connection between that space and the Source Layer.

319631047.speaker: 图灵
319631047.content: Put simply, the space rift you were investigating in Nordburg is the Surface Layer reflection of the changes in the spatial structure of the Source Layer.

319631048.speaker: 托特
319631048.content: What do you plan to do next?

319631049.speaker: 图灵
319631049.content: I will look for them based on their energy signatures. You must have collected the related data as well.

319631050.speaker: 图灵
319631050.content: I've said enough, Norn. Now it's your turn.

319631051.content: While Ver doesn't really want to give Turing the time of day, the information he just shared seems really valuable. Furthermore, she's not sure what Turing would do if she doesn't acquiesce to the proposed quid pro quo.

319631052.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319631052.content: What do you wish to know?

319631053.speaker: 图灵
319631053.content: Where the Bane Energy in your body came from, and how it feels when you use it.

319631054.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319631054.content: I should be the one asking you! Why is it that after Gremory and I fought—

319631055.content: Ver stops abruptly, for she just realized that she's posing a question about something that would only happen ten years down the road from the present time. Thankfully, it looks like she hasn't let anything important slip yet.

319631057.speaker: 格莫瑞
319631057.content: I didn't hurt her. If anyone was on the losing end, it's me.

319631058.speaker: 格莫瑞
319631058.content: Little girl, you don't look like you're suffering from the negative effects of Bane Energy in your body. Don't you feel that the energy is actually protecting you...?

319631060.content: "These wounds will protect us. Don't resist."

319631061.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319631061.content: You're not fooling me with that lie.

319631062.speaker: 图灵
319631062.content: You hesitated. What did you recall?

319631063.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319631063.content: I have nothing to do with the Bane Energy that's inside me. I don't know where it came from, but I do know that it'll disappear soon.

319631064.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319631064.content: I'm unable to answer your questions. Bane Energy is something I am meant to fight, and I've never, ever thought of using it.

319631065.speaker: 图灵
319631065.content: I don't understand this. Why are you going to such lengths to deny what is happening with you?

319631066.speaker: 图灵
319631066.content: Your existence will not change simply because you deny it. Shouldn't you think about the reason for this existence and what you can do about it instead?

319631067.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319631067.content: I know what I should be doing... I have to go back now.

319631068.content: Ver gets up on her feet and walks towards Thoth, who's waiting by the door. But Turing is standing between Ver and the door, and is showing no intention to step aside.

319631069.speaker: 图灵
319631069.content: I don't know what you're thinking. But the fact is that there are signs that both Divine Grace and Bane Energy are co-existing in your body right now.

319631070.speaker: 图灵
319631070.content: This is in clear contravention of Gaea's design principles, and certainly not something that should be happening in a Modifier.

319631071.speaker: 图灵
319631071.content: Don't you understand? This is something you have to face. Avoiding the issue will only make you more confused.

319641002.content: As she steps outside onto the familiar streets, Ver is finally energized by the smell of sunshine and morning breeze.

319641003.content: Molander looks as unhurried as it always does, even with the hordes of people and contradictions it has taken in due to the evacuation of Nordburg. No one actually knows what happened behind that cordon.

319641004.speaker: 托特
319641004.content: That cordon should be lifted soon.

319641005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319641005.content: Because that space rift has disappeared?

319641006.speaker: 托特
319641006.content: Yep. If what Turing says is right, that space should never have had any contact with the Sephirah Zones to begin with.

319641007.speaker: 托特
319641007.content: And now, without an energy source, that link is severed and the Source Layer is back to normal. Naturally, that'd mean that the space rift is no longer there.

319641008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319641008.content: Do you really trust Turing, Thoth?

319641009.speaker: 托特
319641009.content: Why? Are you mad at me because I made a deal with him?

319641010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319641010.content: No, I know that you had very good reason to do that... But I just can't bring myself to trust him when I remember that he's committed so many atrocities with his Visbanes.

319641011.speaker: 托特
319641011.content:
Well, how do I put it...? You're right.
Remember what Ningishzida said yesterday? That there are Visbanes lurking in the outskirts?

319641012.speaker: 托特
319641012.content: Turing launched a Visbane attack against CORG's encampment in Nordburg to prevent CORG from bringing in reinforcements. Ningishzida was hurt too.

319641014.speaker: 托特
319641014.content: So, when I saw Turing inside that building just now, I had zero intention of talking terms with him.

319641015.speaker: 托特
319641015.content: But then he said to me, "Please take a seat, it was a pleasure working with you yesterday." That Visbane attack on our encampment was but "a risk mitigation tactic."

319641016.content: Thoth pauses. There's a hint of fatigue in her eyes as she shakes her head at Ver.

319641017.speaker: 托特
319641017.content: Never, ever trust your enemy, even if you have to strike a deal with them for the time being.

319641018.speaker: 托特
319641018.content: Since all Turing wants is the "truth," I hope that one day he'll come to understand that welcoming death with equanimity is the ultimate truth destiny has in store for us.

319641019.content: This is the first time since Ver entered the hyperspace that she's felt such cold detachment from Thoth, so much so that whatever else she's feeling now seems so trivial in comparison.

319641020.content: Fortunately, this moment doesn't last very long. Thoth is soon back to her usual self and continues to lead the way.

319641021.speaker: 托特
319641021.content: Nordburg is now in ruins, although admittedly it'd been left abandoned for nearly five years before that, and development had only recently restarted there just before the attack...

319641022.speaker: 托特
319641022.content: We've still caused too much of an impact. The hyperspace may have much less time than I thought.

319641023.content: Thoth looks down at the bar on her watch, which has progressed significantly, and lets out a soft sigh.

319641024.speaker: 托特
319641024.content: Do you really not remember what happened when you and Lokken fought?

319641025.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319641025.content: ... That wasn't me at the time.

319641027.speaker: 托特
319641027.content: I have no reason to force you to do anything. But if you need any help, just let me know.

319641029.content: Thoth nods, the worry still evident. But just as she turns around Ver grabs hold of her arm again.

319641030.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319641030.content: Captain Thoth, have you... ever hurt someone before? You know, for no rhyme or reason...

319641031.speaker: 托特
319641031.content: We all do things for a reason. It's just a matter of whether the reason is known or understood at the time. Once you find the reason, you'll also find the solution.

319641032.speaker: 托特
319641032.content: As for hurting other people... Things can, and do, get messy in CORG.

319641033.speaker: 托特
319641033.content: Ver. Sometimes the belief that what you're doing is right is even more important than the deed itself.

319651002.speaker: 托特
319651002.content: Since you miss this place so much, you should really stay put and not go anywhere.

319651003.content: Thoth brings out some snacks from her room and places them in a pile in front of Ver. Then, she peels open just a single piece of chocolate for herself, and slumps into the lounger at the front desk.

319651004.speaker: 托特
319651004.content: This time, you've helped us find leads to how Visbanes came about, as well as figure out where that space rift in Nordburg came from. So, our biggest tasks have been completed.

319651005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319651005.content: Isn't this a task too, though?

319651006.content: Ver reaches into her pocket for the flash drive. As she does so, she seems to touch something else inside, leading her to feel a momentary daze. But thankfully, she quickly recovers and hands Thoth the drive.

319651007.speaker: 托特
319651007.content: Personal favors don't count... Nicely done. Thanks.

319651008.speaker: 托特
319651008.content: Now, CORG has to maintain the existence of the hyperspace for as long as possible, and there'll no longer be any more operations of this scale. All you need to do is to continue recuperating.

319651009.speaker: 托特
319651009.content: At least Turing was right about one thing: your body is still being affected by the Bane Energy. You've passed out twice in less than five days. It should be related to this somehow.

319651010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319651010.content: Is that so? I remember feeling like I was in a daze both times before I lost consciousness...

319651011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319651011.content: Oh, by the way, just what happened to Lokken yesterday? Was Turing the one who injured her?

319651012.speaker: 托特
319651012.content: I'll let her tell you when she apologizes to you.

319651013.speaker: 托特
319651013.content: She was the one who started it. So why are you so concerned about her now?

319651014.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319651014.content: Mmm... I'm not happy about what happened, but I keep thinking that there must've been some kind of misunderstanding.

319651015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319651015.content: What is she doing now? I mean in the year 2315. Please tell me she's not picking fights with other Modifiers still.

319651017.content: Thoth swallows the chocolate to cover up her brief moment of hesitation. Then, as if she's suddenly thought of something, she smiles.

319651018.speaker: 托特
319651018.content: She's already left CORG by then.

319651019.speaker: 托特
319651019.content:
Don't worry, she's as sturdy as an oak. She didn't die or anything.
But you, however, should start behaving more like a patient.

319651020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319651020.content: ... You know, I actually don't feel anything right now.

319651021.speaker: 托特
319651021.content: It'll be too late by the time you do feel something.

319651022.speaker: 托特
319651022.content: Besides, are you really sure that you're feeling alright? ... You don't have to tell me the answer.

319651024.speaker: 托特
319651024.content: Anyway... The Cleansers attacked the Plane Layer again last night, and there are more of them now. I'll need your help only for this matter now, so don't go anywhere otherwise.

319651025.speaker: 托特
319651025.content: Actually, to be more precise... Allow me to give you a preview. The experiment ends when Gaea sends out an advanced weapon called the Realm Controller to destroy the hyperspace.

319651026.speaker: 托特
319651026.content: If you've recovered enough by then, you can try to see if you can stop that thing. Of course, it's entirely up to you, whether you want to do it.

319651027.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319651027.content: Oh, okay. I'll give it a try then.

319651028.speaker: 托特
319651028.content: Don't say yes just yet... the Realm Controllers are not going to be easy to deal with. You'll be dead meat if you challenge one in your current state.

319651029.speaker: 托特
319651029.content: I've talked to a doctor, and she'll help you draw up a recovery plan. We're going to try and see if we can use your Divine Grace to get rid of that Bane Energy.

319651031.speaker: ？？？
319651031.content: Hello? Hello??? Is anybody home...? Hmm, the door's left open...

319651032.content: Ver can see some light green hair, tied up in a bunch, from behind the half-open front door of the bookstore. Then the hair shakes a little, and a smallish head with eyes wide open in curiosity appears.

319651033.speaker: 托特
319651033.content: Hey, we were just talking about you. Come on in.

319651035.content: Ningishzida's jaw drops at the sight of Ver. She walks into the bookstore, gingerly shuts the door, and then suddenly throws herself at Ver and gives her a bear hug. She is so agitated that some of her tears have even landed on Ver's face somehow.

319651036.speaker: 宁希达
319651036.content: NORN!!! IT'S SO WONDERFUL TO SEE YOU!!!

319651037.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319651037.content: Hold on, Ningishzida, I'm fine... Why are you crying?

319651038.speaker: 宁希达
319651038.content: But how would I know, when I'm not allowed to tag along with the both of you...?

319651039.speaker: 宁希达
319651039.content: The whole bunch of you went to the Source Layer and never returned. I couldn't get in touch with you either, which was why I thought that...

319651040.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319651040.content: I'm alright. In fact, I was just wondering how you are. Thoth heard that you were hurt in the attack on the CORG encampment.

319651041.speaker: 宁希达
319651041.content: Well, I'm okay now. I'm a doctor, so I know how to treat myself. But you, are you really alright? It seems that...

319651042.speaker: 宁希达
319651042.content: Oh, never mind. It's a good thing you're alright. We're all alright.

319651043.content: Ningishzida lets go of Ver and briefly rubs her slightly red eyes.

319651044.speaker: 宁希达
319651044.content: Where have you been? You guys were out the whole day.

319651045.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319651045.content: Well, how do I put it simply...

319651046.content: Ver tells Ningishzida what happened with Turing, but omits the part about the battle with Lokken.

319651047.speaker: 宁希达
319651047.content: A Cognizant Visbane... And the boss to boot?!

319651048.speaker: 宁希达
319651048.content: What do we do now? Should I check with Boss Odin to see if she can come by?

319651049.speaker: 托特
319651049.content: No, don't do that. If Odin and Turing end up fighting here, we may just be helping Turing with his plan.

319651050.speaker: 托特
319651050.content: In the historical records, Turing hasn't appeared yet. And that's not because he's a shy or an introvert or something.

319651051.speaker: 托特
319651051.content: He's not our target anyway. Since he doesn't want to reveal his identity, we shan't rattle him either.

319651052.speaker: 宁希达
319651052.content: That's right. Let's not do anything about him then...

319651053.speaker: 托特
319651053.content: We were just talking about Norn's recovery plan...

319651054.speaker: 宁希达
319651054.content: Oh, yes, yes. I nearly forgot about that.

319651055.content: Ningishzida produces a sheet of folded paper from her pocket, unfolds it, and hands it to Ver.

319651056.speaker: 宁希达
319651056.content: This copy's for you, Norn. Let me know if you have any questions.

319651058.speaker: 宁希达
319651058.content: Mmhmm. Ningishzida's physical rehabilitation program starts today!

319651059.speaker: 宁希达
319651059.content: I'll be doing this with you. Neither of us is allowed to slack off!

319651060.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319651060.content: Wake up call... at f-five in the morning?! Is that a typo???

319651061.speaker: 宁希达
319651061.content: Morning exercise is good for you. Keeping regular and early bed hours is also good for you. Besides, you need to keep the bookstore open during the day anyway.

319651062.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319651062.content: What does my training have to do with the bookstore? I don't think we get any customers here anyhow.

319651063.speaker: 托特
319651063.content: You didn't have to point that out, you know...

319651064.speaker: 宁希达
319651064.content: Of course the two are related. See the "Simulation Training" there on the program? I put it in just for you.

319651065.speaker: 宁希达
319651065.content: Captain Thoth, should we go down for a look?

319651066.content: Thoth gets up from the recliner and hands a key to the bookstore to Ningishzida.

319651067.speaker: 托特
319651067.content: The two of you can go. I have to go back to attend to something.

319651069.speaker: 托特
319651069.content: The outside. Remember that physical exam I performed on you?

319651071.speaker: 托特
319651071.content: You help me get what I need, and I'll definitely try my best to help you. And that is a deal, isn't it?

319651072.speaker: 托特
319651072.content: When I'm here, the version of "me" from here will come by every now and then for a look. You may just treat her as me, and you don't have to keep anything secret from her.

319651074.speaker: 托特
319651074.content: What is it? You don't look pleased.

319651075.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319651075.content: I... don't know the version of you from here. It feels so strange just thinking about it. How am I supposed to treat her as you?

319651076.content: Thoth chuckles a little to herself.

319651077.speaker: 托特
319651077.content: What's so strange? The two of you have already spent two days with her and didn't even realize that it wasn't me.

319661001.content: Not even Ver had expected that the session would go so smoothly. She's relieved as she feels the Bane Energy leave her little by little.

319661002.content: In the end, Ver only leaves the training room after three hours. Whatever fatigue that resulted from the training is completely overshadowed by her joy at returning to some resemblance of past prowess and routine.

319661003.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319661003.content: Thank you so much, Ningishzida. It's true what they say: go see a doctor when you're ailing.

319661004.speaker: 宁希达
319661004.content: Heh, don't get complacent just yet. Doctor Ningishzida is rather rigorous, you know. There's tomorrow and the day after tomorrow... You are not allowed to sleep in until you're cured.

319661005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319661005.content:
I don't mind that at all.
But don't you have to return to Aether Gazer? The Nordburg mission must be over by now.

319661006.speaker: 宁希达
319661006.content: Well, we get off-time after field missions. Since I rarely travel anyway, I may as well spend a few more days here.

319661007.speaker: 宁希达
319661007.content: Besides, knowing what I know now, I don't really want to go back anyway... The thought of the world destroyed is such a frightening one.

319661008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319661008.content: I'm sorry that we got you involved in this, Ningishzida. It must be so hard on you.

319661009.speaker: 宁希达
319661009.content: Please don't say that. And let's talk about something else. I don't want to sound all whiny and sad.

319661010.speaker: 宁希达
319661010.content: Most importantly, I've promised to stay here and help you two. Now that I'm also an agent, I can't possibly run away!

319661011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319661011.content: Then shall we go together when the Cleansers attack again?

319661012.content: Ningishzida's look of exhilaration vanishes in an instant. She flings herself on the bookshelf next to her, clinging like a koala and shaking her head rather vigorously.

319661014.speaker: 宁希达
319661014.content: We'd better think about what to do when Captain Thoth comes by. Like, if I want to talk to one of them about the other, how can I tell who I'm talking to?

319661016.speaker: 宁希达
319661016.content: Right??? There's no telling the difference!

319661017.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319661017.content: Then... how about calling the one with us "Thoth," and the one you saw the first time "Captain"...?

319661018.speaker: 宁希达
319661018.content: Mmm, no, that's a little weird. I mean, they're both captains.

319661019.speaker: 宁希达
319661019.content: Is Captain Thoth also known by another name by any chance? That's quite common with Modifiers, isn't it? You know, noms de guerre and all that. Or the names they were known by before they awakened...

319661020.content: Ningishzida turns to a business search engine and types in the name "Land of Moons." Her eyes grow big at the result the search returned.

319661021.speaker: 宁希达
319661021.content: There really is another name! This bookstore is registered to a person called "Ygritte."

319661022.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319661022.content: Is this Captain Thoth's former name?

319661023.speaker: 宁希达
319661023.content: We can ask her to find out! I don't think this is considered a secret?

319661024.content: Ver and Ningishzida can hear a key inserted into the door. They turn their heads like two startled little birds, then stare at the door motionlessly.

319661027.speaker: 托特
319661027.content: Where did you hear this name from?

319661028.content:
The person with the key is of course Thoth. The problem is, neither of them can tell which one this is.
Thoth doesn't come right in, but stands at the door instead, as if she's studying the two of them.

319661029.speaker: 宁希达
319661029.content: We found it online. Is that you?

319661030.speaker: 托特
319661030.content: No. Ygritte was my friend. This bookstore was originally hers.

319661031.speaker: 宁希达
319661031.content:
Oh, we guessed wrongly then.
Then you are...

319661033.content: Then, with a wave of Thoth's hand, a swarm of CORG soldiers rush into the bookstore, then handcuff Ver as the two of them watch on curiously.

319661035.speaker: 托特
319661035.content:
Norn, you're under arrest.
For falsely assuming the identity of an OPRIC operative.

319671004.content: An armed soldier pulls open the heavy side door of the vehicle, and Ver alights to find herself outside the abandoned research institute where she met Lokken before.

319671005.content: It is then that Ver gets a glimpse at what is going on...

319671008.speaker: 拉斐尔
319671008.content: Good. I hope you'll remain as truthful with us later on.

319671009.speaker: 托特
319671009.content: Okay, the Director is here. I'll take her in, and you folks stay here and make sure nothing about this gets out.

319671011.content: Thoth hops out from the front passenger seat of the vehicle and waves to Ver, who quickly follows her into the institute.

319671012.content: Ver waits until she's completely sure that the CORG agent outside would not hear her that she finally heaves a sigh of relief and tugs at Thoth's clothing.

319671013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671013.content: Thoth, are you seriously arresting me? Can't you think of another way?

319671014.speaker: 托特
319671014.content: Are you saying that you've been falsely accused of impersonating an OPRIC operative?

319671015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671015.content: Well, not really... But this was also masterminded by CORG!

319671016.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671016.content: The other Thoth has told me that you know about the experiment.

319671017.content: After closing the secret door at the entrance to the underground lab, Thoth stops for a moment on the steps and looks back at Ver.

319671018.speaker: 托特
319671018.content: Please don't mention that once we're past these stairs.

319671019.speaker: 托特
319671019.content: Since she told you that, then you must know that I'm not the one who wants you here.

319671020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671020.content: Are you referring to that "Director" they were talking about?

319671021.speaker: 托特
319671021.content: Be careful when you speak with her. Remember not to spill any secrets.

319671023.content: Thoth nods and walks down one more step before stopping again. This causes Ver to almost bump into her from behind.

319671024.speaker: 托特
319671024.content: So, at the bookstore just now... why did you and Ningishzida mention Ygritte out of the blue?

319671025.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671025.content: We didn't know how to differentiate the two of you, and so we decided to look up any other names you might have...

319671026.speaker: 托特
319671026.content: I see. You can call me Thoth then. The other one you can call Tho-Tho.

319671028.speaker: 托特
319671028.content: She'll like it, I assure you.

319671030.content: Unlike the dark and bleak dungeon of the day before, here, Ver can see CORG soldiers standing guard everywhere along the way.

319671031.content: The soldiers probably already know what is going on, as none come up to them to question them until Thoth stops in front of a particular room.

319671032.speaker: 科尔盖士兵B
319671032.content: Captain Thoth, you'll have to wait outside. No onlookers are allowed during the interrogation.

319671034.content: The soldier shakes their head without saying anything more. Then, they open the door for Ver and gesture at her to enter.

319671035.content: Ver looks at Thoth, not sure what to do. Thoth moves back to the sidelines and squints a little as she nods at Ver.

319671037.content: The layout of this room is that of a typical interrogation room. Here, Ver can see a table and various surveillance devices.

319671038.content: Ver sits down at the table and a soldier closes the door, instantly blocking out all noise from the outside. The room is now so quiet it feels rather uncanny.

319671039.content: Just as Ver is getting restless, the holographic projector on the ceiling lights up, sending a hologram of a person into the seat opposite her. It's almost like there really is a person sitting there.

319671042.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671042.content: I'm head of Supreme Directorate secretariat, Director of the Egregious Crimes Department, head of the R&D Center and person-in-charge of strategic partnership with Aether Gazer at CORG.

319671043.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671043.content: I'm also the overseer of this experiment. I'm Paracaesar.

319671044.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671044.content:
Oh, I've heard of you before, Director Paracaesar...
So, you... you're from the outside, too?

319671045.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671045.content: I was the one who instructed Thoth to take you in here. The interrogation is just a formality. I mean, I can't allow CORG to throw you into jail because of the experiment.

319671046.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671046.content: I understand now. Thank you, Director Paracaesar... May I ask a question?

319671048.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671048.content: Does Admin know I'm here? That's the Administrator of the General Office of Division Nine at Aether Gazer. Their name is #{nickname}#...

319671049.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671049.content: I know whom you're talking about. We worked with them in Sasanami.

319671050.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671050.content: This experiment is a CORG secret. Under no circumstances may you tell anyone about this.

319671052.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671052.content: So you don't want #{nickname}# to know about this, then?

319671053.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671053.content: Well, since Admin is on a mission, there's no point in distracting them. I'll have all the time in the world to tell Admin when we meet again.

319671054.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671054.content: If it isn't strictly necessary to tell them, I hope you will keep this classified.

319671055.content: A document is projected in front of Ver. Looks like Paracaesar is able to operate the equipment with remote commands.

319671056.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671056.content: I'm not saying that you can't say anything at all. But we need you to keep the parts about CORG, including how the experiment works, CORG's actions in this experiment, and OPRIC identity verification procedures to yourself.

319671057.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671057.content: Oh, that's understandable. I'll be careful then.

319671058.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671058.content: Hopefully you won't let anything slip... Also, there's one more thing we have to talk about.

319671059.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671059.content: Lokken mistakenly had a clash with you, and that is entirely on CORG. Though originally all we wanted to do was to apologize to you, we noticed something that calls for further investigation.

319671060.content: The terminal in the room projects another screen, and a video begins to play. Ver's eyes become as wide as saucers as soon as she sets eyes on it.

319671061.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671061.content: This... Lokken and I... This is what happened yesterday...

319671062.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671062.content: Lokken was wearing a body cam. Otherwise we wouldn't have known what happened.

319671063.content: Ver can feel something was wrong as she watches Lokken's attempt to extract her Divine Grace. Then, as the Ver on screen goes out of control and passes out, Ver feels a chill descend upon her, and she hurriedly looks down in fear.

319671064.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671064.content: Who else knows that you can turn this way? Your Administrator? Odin?

319671065.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671065.content: Neither. This has never happened to me before.

319671066.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671066.content: Then it looks like CORG must take responsibility for this occurrence.

319671067.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671067.content: You've seen it for yourself. You pose an exceptional risk when you're out of control. From a safety point of view, I do not believe it appropriate to allow you free rein of movement.

319671068.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671068.content: You don't have to be that spooked. I'm not usually like that anyway.

319671069.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319671069.content: Besides, Thoth and Ningishzida are already working on treating my illness. In fact, I gave things a shot just this morning and it's working really well. Your risk will be gone as soon as I'm cured.

319671070.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
319671070.content: That is what you think will happen. Where's the evidence? Can you actually guarantee that it won't happen again?

319671073.content: The door opens all of a sudden. Ver turns around, and instinctively every alert switch in her flips on.

319671074.content: But the interloper doesn't seem to care about the change in Ver. Instead, she's leaning lazily against the door frame, with what looks like a piece of gum in her mouth.

319671075.speaker: 洛肯
319671075.content: The Director may believe you, but too bad you'll have to convince me today, too.

319681004.content: It's like being awakened from a dream, though the scene before her eyes is a hellscape even more cruel than the nightmare she's just escaped from.

319681005.content: What remains of the Access Key is like the embers of despair, with the ruins of the high-rise buildings telegraphing the end of a scarred civilization. The clouds are now black from the rising smoke, which is melting into a sky that's already darkened.

319681007.content:
Water drops are falling on the stone slabs, their splashing akin to thunder in an otherwise dead quiet world.
Her head is lowered from the weight in her hand, and she's looking blankly at the blood drop hanging precariously from the tip of her sword.

319681008.content: She stares blankly at the reflection of a familiar figure behind her on the blood-stained blade.

319681010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319681010.content: Admin? No, no, it wasn't me! I...

319681011.speaker: ？？？
319681011.content: "Why did you do that... to everyone....?"

319681012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319681012.content: ... I don't remember anything. This can't be me...

319681013.speaker: ？？？
319681013.content: "And if it isn't you, who is it?"

319681019.content: The shaking right hand finally loses its grip, and the now-unrestrained golden light and black flames from the fallen sword surge towards Ver, as if to devour her.

319681020.content: But the scare is merely momentary, for they no longer have their fuel. Just as the light and black flames are about to engulf Ver, they dissipate like fireworks in the night sky.

319681022.speaker: 科尔盖士兵B
319681022.content: Hmm? Hold your fire! Hold your fire!

319681023.content: The barrage from the CORG soldiers and AGI Mechas slowly comes to a stop, and through the Divine Grace shield that has become awfully thin the soldiers finally get a clear glimpse of the girl behind it.

319681024.content: All she is doing is leaning against the wall of the hallway, taking great gulps of air. Something in her eyes suggests she's rather occupied with her present predicament, rather than the eyes focused on her.

319681025.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319681025.content: ... Was that... a dream... Thank... goodness...

319681026.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319681026.content: I... want to... but... I can't continue any longer...

319681027.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319681027.content: But... no... I must... I must see everyone...

319681028.content: She has no idea how much time has passed, nor what has happened around her. All she knows is that all the strength in her body has been exhausted in the extended tug-of-war with the energy inside her.

319681029.content: As the world swirls around her, she can vaguely feel someone holding her by her arm and speaking anxiously in her ear. Though she has no idea who it is, she knows she can lean on them...

319681031.content: Ver is starting to feel the waves of pain. But it's a good sign, like how one starts to feel giddy while recovering from a lack of oxygen to the brain.

319681032.speaker: ？？？
319681032.content: That's all she needs to prove, Director. Let's follow the standard procedures from here on out.

319681033.speaker: ？？？
319681033.content: She's passed the test. I had no intention to detain her to begin with.

319681034.speaker: ？？？
319681034.content: Then I believe my presence is no longer needed here? I mean, only the Director's word counts anyway.

319681036.content: By the time her vision is back to normal, Ver is back in her original seat inside the interrogation room. It's as if her attempted flight from the lab never even happened.

319681037.content: However, the projection of Paracaesar in the opposite chair has disappeared, and in Paracaesar's place is a woman dressed like an administrative officer. And the person who's sitting by the door now is not Lokken, but Thoth.

319681039.speaker: 托特
319681039.content: Nicely done, Norn. Don't ever lose yourself again.

319681040.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319681040.content: Where did Director Paracaesar and Lokken go? And who is this...?

319681041.speaker: 托特
319681041.content: She's with the secretariat of the Supreme Directorate. She's the one who will continue to manage this case on behalf of President Red Fox.

319681042.speaker: 托特
319681042.content: I'm just sitting in. Don't mind me.

319681043.speaker: 秘书处书记官
319681043.content: First, I'll start by asking certain basic questions about you. I'd appreciate your cooperation.

319681047.speaker: 秘书处书记官
319681047.content: Is that a code name? Or a name you were previously known by?

319681054.content: Ver is about to say "OPRIC" when she suddenly remembers that she was sitting here previously on the charge of "impersonating OPRIC personnel," and she can't help but look over at Thoth with a self-conscious look on her face.

319681055.content: Thoth does not say a thing. Instead, she folds her hands on her abdomen, and gently taps on her left wrist with her right index finger.

319681056.speaker: 秘书处书记官
319681056.content: Please focus and answer my question.

319681058.speaker: 秘书处书记官
319681058.content: Please allow us to verify your identity in that case.

319681059.content: Ver sticks out her hand. The expressionless secretary takes out a scanner from a briefcase and points it at her watch.

319681060.speaker: 秘书处书记官
319681060.content: Sergeant OB2024, identity verification complete. Thank you for your service.

319681061.speaker: 秘书处书记官
319681061.content: As you've entered a classified facility without prior authorization, the Supreme Directorate has decided to suspend you from OPRIC for the time being.

319681062.speaker: 秘书处书记官
319681062.content: Should you disclose any secret information during the period of your suspension, you will be dealt with like any other Modifier. Do you have any questions or objection to this?

319681064.speaker: 秘书处书记官
319681064.content: Excellent. That concludes the handling of this case. I shall report all information as it was presented to me here upon my return.

319681065.content: The secretary puts away the scanner, gets up from her seat, and gives a nod to Thoth. Then, she leaves the interrogation room with zero hesitation or dawdling.

319681066.content: As the door closes, Ver heaves a sigh of relief. Once she's sure that no one else is coming in, she shifts her chair over to where Thoth is sitting.

319681067.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319681067.content: Looks like a big shot was here... Did this secretary lady know about the experiment? Like, she didn't even question my claim that I'm OPRIC.

319681068.speaker: 托特
319681068.content: No, she doesn't. But she believed you because the OPRIC identity verification cannot be faked, since that falls within the purview of the Council of Observators.

319681069.speaker: 托特
319681069.content: All permissions related to the Council are written in the very base layer of Gaea, and are not affected by time and space. Which means that a permission granted by the President in the year 2315 is equally valid in 2305.

319681071.speaker: 托特
319681071.content: But now that you've been suspended from OPRIC, you won't be able to move around as an OPRIC operative anymore... But I suppose you won't need to, anyhow.

319681072.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319681072.content: Yeah, I won't need that identity if all I'm doing is to recuperate at the bookstore...

319681073.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319681073.content: Thoth, were you the one who helped me inside here earlier?

319681074.speaker: 托特
319681074.content: Well, the secretary was already here. I couldn't possibly watch you get interrogated from a sick bed.

319681075.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319681075.content:
Thanks a lot.
Were you the one who called that secretary here?

319681076.speaker: 托特
319681076.content:
Just who do you think I am?
If there's a matter that concerns OPRIC, you can count on the President's presence one way or another.

319681077.speaker: 托特
319681077.content: I had no idea why Director Paracaesar would break the rules this time, but the beans are going to spill soon. After all, you aren't the only "OPRIC operative" in here.

319681078.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319681078.content: Are you referring to the other agents?

319681079.speaker: 托特
319681079.content: Mmhmm. And this is something Tho-Tho already anticipated. There are agents who are following you around the clock, and when I arrested you at the bookstore they must have been steps away from intervening.

319681080.speaker: 托特
