319681080.content: I was willing to bring you here because I knew that the President would get you out. I mean, he needs his OPRIC operatives to keep his secrets...

319681081.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319681081.content: Are you saying that President Red Fox is keeping something from Director Paracaesar? Are you sure it's okay for me to hear this?

319681082.content: Thoth looks at the curious Ver, and simply shakes her head with a smile. She leans back in her chair a little tiredly and directs her gaze at the holographic projector mounted on the ceiling.

319681083.speaker: 托特
319681083.content: This is probably something outsiders aren't aware of.

319681084.speaker: 托特
319681084.content: CORG... isn't exactly a monolithic organization.

319691002.speaker: 托特
319691002.content:
It was all a misunderstanding.
I'll show her the way out, you fellows can continue with whatever you're doing.

319691003.content: A misunderstanding? The agents standing outside look at each other in bewilderment. After all, that arrest earlier was made with quite a bit of commotion.

319691004.content: But the Raphael of 2305 is nowhere as experienced as the Raphael of 2315. As commanded, he quickly gathers his men to leave.

319691006.speaker: 托特
319691006.content: The Visbanes attacked Nordburg and the outskirts yesterday. The impact of the space rift is almost comparable to that of a Quake. As you know, the post-incident cleanup can be quite a bear.

319691007.speaker: 托特
319691007.content:
Don't give me that look. I know you want to help, but we have other things to do.
We don't have much time left. The progress bar has advanced by nearly half in five days.

319691008.speaker: 托特
319691008.content: As for the incident where you ran into Cleansers on the Surface Layer over at the beach, our techs have checked it out and they say that the problem may lie in the Plane Layer.

319691009.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319691009.content: Then... should we go take a look in the Plane Layer?

319691010.speaker: 托特
319691010.content: Even if you don't wish to rest, surely your body needs a breather.

319691011.speaker: 托特
319691011.content:
Besides, it's almost time...
Take a walk with me?

319691012.content: Like two idlers walking into a busy construction site, Ver and Thoth come to the neighborhood where the space rift was.

319691013.content: The rift itself is gone, as are the CORG cordon barriers. Engineering teams are filing into Nordburg to evaluate the reconstruction plans and costs for each disaster-stricken area.

319691014.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319691014.content: There's been so much damage. It wasn't like this when I was here yesterday.

319691015.speaker: 托特
319691015.content: The Visbanes came out of the blue. Nobody expected Turing to be so aggressive. Many of our soldiers, even the Logistics Department, were caught flatfooted...

319691016.speaker: 托特
319691016.content: But on the bright side, at least it gave us a convenient excuse for cordoning off the city. We've also told the public that a Quake occurred.

319691017.content: Ver does not respond, for she knows how awful Thoth must be feeling. After all, for Thoth, all these dead people are not just memories of the past but part of her very own reality.

319691018.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319691018.content: Thoth... How did you feel when you learned about the hyperspace situation?

319691020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319691020.content: Because according to... um... Tho-Tho, Ningishzida and I have already met you before. When you were pretending to be her.

319691021.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319691021.content: But I can't tell the two of you apart at all. It's like the two of you think exactly the same way and have exactly the same attitude towards the hyperspace.

319691022.speaker: 托特
319691022.content: So you think I should be having a meltdown or something?

319691023.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319691023.content: Aren't you at least a little bit upset?

319691024.speaker: 托特
319691024.content: Sure, it was horrifying to hear that the world you live in, your past, and everything around you... are all false.

319691025.speaker: 托特
319691025.content: But to tell another person about the experiment is to possibly drive them mad with the knowledge.

319691026.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319691026.content: Yeah. I guess your average person wouldn't take well to the news.

319691027.speaker: 托特
319691027.content: Ha ha. That's why I chose to stay on at CORG.

319691028.speaker: 托特
319691028.content: I mean, isn't this exactly what CORG is about? To give your absolute all to protect this world, no matter how harsh the truth is?

319691029.speaker: 托特
319691029.content: So what if the hyperspace is not real? Since the very reason for its existence is the eradication of the Visbanes, I'll just have to take this as a new mission. It's just that it happens to be a mission I have no chance of surviving, that's all.

319691031.speaker: 托特
319691031.content: Why not? For CORG, the meaning of life does not lie in one's existence. It's about what we achieve in the end.

319691032.speaker: 托特
319691032.content: Even if the higher-ups have their own plans and the folks in middle management are playing whatever games they play, at the end of the day, we all share the same goal.

319691033.speaker: 托特
319691033.content: You're talking about a bunch of people who walk their own path and who refuse to sit back in silence, who are self-righteous, and who'd do anything to protect human civilization.

319691034.speaker: 托特
319691034.content: You can say they're cruel, you can disagree with their actions, or even question whether they are truly just, but you cannot deny that they're living for what are noble ideals.

319691035.speaker: 托特
319691035.content: For me, the worst outcome is not extinction, but no progress at all... Hmm, I've got pretty good timing, I must say.

319691036.content: An alarm sounds from Ver's watch, indicating an attack in the Plane Layer. Thoth stops, smiles, and pats Ver on the shoulder.

319691037.speaker: 托特
319691037.content: So, I'll have to leave the future in yours and Tho-Tho's hands.

319701001.content: The experienced duo successfully eliminate all the Cleansers in this attack, which seem to be fewer than the first attack. Fortunately, no mishaps occurred.

319701003.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319701003.content: I feel very good, actually. With Tho-Tho's and Ningishzida's help, and all the breaks I get, I won't get tired out.

319701004.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319701004.content: I think we're pretty close to the bookstore. Shall we just make our exit to the Surface Layer here?

319701006.content: Thoth pulls up the map; it looks like all the Realm Cleansers have been eliminated. However, there's still a very eye-catching yellow dot on the map.

319701007.speaker: 托特
319701007.content: The Engineering Department thinks there may be a problem at this location. Let's go take a look since we're already here.

319701008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319701008.content: Isn't that where the beach is?

319701009.speaker: 托特
319701009.content: Hmm. If it were a coincidence, it'd be a really great one.

319701010.content: The geographical structures of the Surface Layer and the Plane Layer are exactly the same. What we see in the hyperspace as Molander on the Surface Layer can be considered as a rendering based on the Plane Layer.

319701011.content: The yellow dot on the map was not far from the two of them, and it doesn't take much walking to get there. However, before they reach their destination, with no warning at all Thoth stops with a look of consternation on her face. Her antennae are definitely up.

319701013.speaker: 托特
319701013.content: See that tiny camera at the bottom left corner of the wall over there? Someone has placed an alarm here.

319701014.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319701014.content: Oh, where the flashing red light is? So, that means that we aren't the only ones who can get in here?

319701015.speaker: 托特
319701015.content: I wonder who it is... And why place an alarm here...? Is it possible that they're still here???

319701016.content: Thoth smashes the hidden camera with her blade, then starts running towards the location marked on the map. Ver hurriedly follows, and the duo soon find themselves on the street near the beach.

319701017.content: As soon as they turn the corner, they see the back of a figure sprinting away from them. Thoth hurls her blades at the figure, and two cold beams of light fly past her target in the blink of an eye. Then, they suddenly stop in midair, turn around, and point themselves directly at the target's chest.

319701020.speaker: ？？？
319701020.content: It really is the two of you.

319701021.content: Seeing that there's no hope of escape, the figure raises their hands and turns around. Ver's eyes widen in astonishment, though Thoth seems completely nonplussed.

319701022.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319701022.content: Prez??? How did you get here to the Plane Layer?!

319701023.speaker: 小院长
319701023.content: If the place exists, there's always a path to it. I became curious after the string of strange happenings...

319701024.speaker: 小院长
319701024.content: Too bad I was caught by you two. But then again, I suppose it doesn't matter now.

319701025.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319701025.content: Um... so... you know everything now?

319701026.speaker: 小院长
319701026.content: Well, I can't exactly say if I "know" yet.

319701027.speaker: 小院长
319701027.content: So, um... Miss Thoth. Do you mind telling me just what exactly is going on? How is it that a branch of the world line can exist for so long?

319701028.speaker: 托特
319701028.content: I'm not at liberty to divulge too much about a CORG experiment.

319701029.speaker: 小院长
319701029.content: An experiment, is it... No wonder this place looks like this. So this Plane Layer place exists because you've made use of the rules Gaea uses to search for branch-offs, I'm guessing?

319701030.speaker: 小院长
319701030.content: Never mind. No matter what you people are planning to do, it looks like there isn't much time left anyway.

319701031.content: Prez shrugs their shoulders and stuffs the tablet computer they're holding into their backpack.

319701032.speaker: 托特
319701032.content: Tell me, what are you doing here?

319701033.speaker: 小院长
319701033.content: What do you think? I have no desire to die that soon. I was trying to see if I could change the security level of this branch so that it can stay around longer.

319701034.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319701034.content: Is it even possible to do something like that?

319701036.speaker: 小院长
319701036.content: Yeah, it's impossible. I mean, I'm not the one who developed Gaea, and I can't get past what is the best firewall known to mankind.

319701037.speaker: 小院长
319701037.content: I'm looking at Norn and then I'm looking at you. Looks like you aren't surprised at all?

319701038.speaker: 托特
319701038.content: Even more surprising things will happen in the future.

319701039.speaker: 小院长
319701039.content: Did you people come from the future? Do you know me?

319701040.speaker: 托特
319701040.content: She's the one who knows you. But you didn't have your memories then.

319701042.content: Thoth flashes a smile of satisfaction when she sees Prez's barely disguised reaction to the revelation.

319701043.speaker: 托特
319701043.content: So, would you like to tell me who you were before you lost your memories?

319711001.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319711001.content: How many more of them are there???

319711003.content: It was like Ver and Thoth were chasing away a swarm of bees after accidentally poking a beehive. By this time, the two of them have spent quite some time traveling around the Plane Layer, and now they're both exhausted.

319711005.speaker: 托特
319711005.content: They should have gone back already. They weren't going to tell us anything anyway. And don't even think about trying to get clever with them in the hopes that they'd divulge some information by accident.

319711006.speaker: 托特
319711006.content:
Prez was serious just now. It's not that they didn't want to share. They couldn't.
Keeping secrets secret protects us and the Administrator too.

319711007.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319711007.content: I still don't understand. Admin is clearly troubled by their amnesia, and it doesn't look like Prez has any tragic memories to forget...

319711008.speaker: 托特
319711008.content: "Tragic memories"? Are you trying to scare yourself or the Administrator?

319711009.speaker: 托特
319711009.content: If they're meant to remember, they will remember. #{nickname}# has been with Aether Gazer for only half a year or so. Give them a little more time.

319711010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319711010.content:
That does make sense. Alright, then...
Are you going to tell Tho-Tho what happened?

319711011.speaker: 托特
319711011.content: Why, are you worried that if word gets out the Administrator would get into hot soup with CORG?

319711012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319711012.content: A little... I know very well Admin's history may not be pleasant or clear-cut. But now that it looks like they know all the secrets, it's a little mind-boggling.

319711013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319711013.content: Imagine this for a second: if it were someone else who knew as much, do you think CORG would capture them and erase their memory?

319711014.speaker: 托特
319711014.content: But of course, CORG would be a lot more circumspect with you folks from Division Nine.

319711015.speaker: 托特
319711015.content: I will tell Tho-Tho about this. We agreed that we wouldn't keep anything from each other. But don't worry, Tho-Tho won't do any harm to #{nickname}#.

319711018.content: Thoth gently pokes Ver in the forehead, then opens up the map again.

319711019.speaker: 托特
319711019.content: Our mission isn't over yet. Let's go over there for a look.

319711020.content: The duo return to the seaside street where the yellow mark is. Just like when they first got here, they see nothing remarkable about the street or the buildings here.

319711021.content: Thoth looks down at her map, checking their position again and again against the coordinates provided by the Engineering Department. They're clearly dead center in the zone indicated, but still, she isn't seeing anything.

319711023.content: Thoth has also noticed an unusual reflection on her watch dial. She raises her head and squints her eyes.

319711024.content: The one similarity between this sky in the Plane Layer and the "Keep" is that both are devoid of any color. The brightness here is uniform and cold, as if it's all diffused light here. There is no color or light source to be seen.

319711025.content: But Thoth continues to squint her eyes at the sky, even though from the perspective of a bystander, there's still nothing to be seen up there.

319711026.content: Only when she is standing precisely at the coordinates marked does she finally see a blazing sun.

319721001.speaker: 中年男人
319721001.content: Hey, Barley, the quotation for the repair of this street has been finalized. Would you take a look at it?

319721003.speaker: 中年男人
319721003.content:
The faster the business is done, the better, isn't it?
What are you looking at out here?

319721004.speaker: 工程师
319721004.content: Those kids, boss. Do you think they're here to make trouble?

319721005.speaker: 中年男人
319721005.content: What do you think? They're already standing there.

319721006.speaker: 工程师
319721006.content: No, no, you don't understand. I've had some experience and training myself. These kids aren't your average punks.

319721007.speaker: 中年男人
319721007.content: Why are you so sure that they're here to make trouble? But if they're undercover cops? Martial arts instructors? Or CORG agents???

319721008.speaker: 中年男人
319721008.content: Why do you keep thinking that people have it in for you? Did the sight of that house with the roof peeled off scare you out of your wits or what?

319721009.speaker: 中年男人
319721009.content: Maybe they're just hanging out? Let's go, let's go...

319721010.speaker: 拉斐尔
319721010.content: Bernini, why do you think those two men keep looking over at us? Do you think they know what we're up to?

319721011.content: A mystified Raphael shakes his head in reply. He then leans against a railing, straightens out the creased cuffs of his shirt, and puts out the cigar in his hand.

319721012.speaker: 贝尼尼
319721012.content: Could it be that you may be a little too attention-grabbing with that look of yours?

319721014.content: Bernini and the other agents beside him nod. While Raphael looks just like any other CORG agent when he's in uniform, when he's in his civvies his physique and demeanor become especially eye-catching.

319721015.speaker: 贝尼尼
319721015.content: Must we wait for Miss Verthandi here?

319721016.speaker: 拉斐尔
319721016.content: What else can we do? Any further, and we'll trip the research institute's alarms.

319721017.speaker: 拉斐尔
319721017.content: The captain specifically told us to take good care of her before she went back. Since we've nothing else to do in the hyperspace, we might as well treat this like a vacation.

319721018.speaker: 贝尼尼
319721018.content: Yeah, you say that, but... What are we going to say to her when we see her? This is so odd, isn't it? Wouldn't it look like we're trying to kidnap her or something?

319721019.speaker: 拉斐尔
319721019.content: Hey, hey, hey, you saw on the vid how she sent Gremory scurrying in Xu Heng. Kidnap her? Us?

319721020.speaker: 贝尼尼
319721020.content: Have you read her dossier? It's only been less than a year since she awakened and joined Aether Gazer. No matter how powerful she is, she's just a girl who's barely twenty.

319721021.speaker: 拉斐尔
319721021.content: Pfft. So you're afraid that we'll scare her, but you aren't afraid of what I'd do to you???

319721022.content: Bernini rolls his eyes, and leans back into the same railing, which is now slightly unsteady under the weight of two people.

319721023.speaker: 贝尼尼
319721023.content: It's not the same. Your life as a sweet young thing ended the moment you joined CORG.

319721024.speaker: 拉斐尔
319721024.content: I see. I'll make sure that you don't take part in the next recruitment drive, then.

319721025.content: Raphael looks at Bernini, a little exasperated. In the dying light, he spots a figure walking towards them from the research institute, and he quickly pats his young coworker on the back.

319721028.speaker: 洛肯
319721028.content: Ooh, look who we have here.

319721029.speaker: 洛肯
319721029.content: What are you people doing here?

319721030.speaker: 拉斐尔
319721030.content: We're waiting for Verthandi. Have you seen her?

319721031.speaker: 洛肯
319721031.content: That freak? Who knows where she is. I think she left with Thoth though.

319721032.speaker: 贝尼尼
319721032.content: Who did you just call a freak? Verthandi is the rising star among the rookie Modifiers right now, you know.

319721033.speaker: 洛肯
319721033.content: Yeah, yeah, yeah, whatever. Y'all can continue worshiping her for all I care. I'm off.

319721035.speaker: 洛肯
319721035.content: And what business is it of yours?

319721036.speaker: 拉斐尔
319721036.content: Lokken. Although you're now assisting with our experiment with the knowledge of Director Paracaesar and Captain Thoth, it doesn't mean that you are allowed to do whatever you want.

319721037.speaker: 拉斐尔
319721037.content: If we find out that you've committed a disciplinary violation, the punishment for you will be—

319721038.speaker: 洛肯
319721038.content: —appropriate for a junior employee of CORG with zero exceptions and no compensation, blah blah blah... I'm sick of hearing this already.

319721039.speaker: 洛肯
319721039.content: Don't worry, I have no childish interest in getting into trouble. I'm out here now only because someone has promised me freedom.

319721040.speaker: 洛肯
319721040.content: You do whatever you're doing. It's not my problem.

319721041.content: Although the agents are left a little unhappy by the exchange, they have no real way to deal with Lokken, and so can only watch her walk away.

319721042.content: And then they stand there waiting for almost another hour.

319721043.content: While the agents have no other task on hand and have undergone the requisite professional training, the length of the wait makes them rather uneasy.

319721044.speaker: 贝尼尼
319721044.content: Should we change into our gear and head in there for a look?

319721045.speaker: 拉斐尔
319721045.content: You know how President Red Fox is. If the secretary has gone in, everything must be fine inside. And it's not like our credentials are fake or something...

319721046.speaker: 贝尼尼
319721046.content: Hold on, everyone... look over there.

319721047.content: The agents turn around at the same time to see Thoth walking towards the institute. They quickly realize what is going on, and their faces change.

319721048.content: Thoth quickly walks past the agents without taking even a single glance at them, and the agents do not greet her either, as if the two sides don't know each other at all.

319721049.content: The agents finally breathe a sigh of relief when they turn their backs to Thoth.

319731002.content: The confetti is raining down with a vengeance. Ver instinctively dodges, only to find that it's all a holographic projection. She puffs out her cheeks when she sees the electronic confetti popper in Ningishzida's hand, and proceeds to vigorously rub Ningishzida's face between her palms.

319731003.speaker: 宁希达
319731003.content: Stop, stop, you're giving me hamster cheeks...

319731004.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319731004.content: Where did you get that confetti popper from? And how did you know when I was coming back?

319731005.speaker: 宁希达
319731005.content: Well... Um... How do I put it...

319731006.content: As Ver slowly pushes Ningishzida back into the store, she spots the "answer" sitting behind the counter, then slowly releases Ningishzida's face.

319731007.speaker: 宁希达
319731007.content: She was the one who told me.

319731009.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319731009.content: Weren't you just at the research institute?

319731010.speaker: 洛肯
319731010.content: But just look at the time! It's been two hours since you left the place with Captain Thoth.

319731011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319731011.content: Then why are you here...? That chair is not for you. It's Thoth's.

319731012.content: Ningishzida isn't quite sure how to thaw the sudden frostiness that has descended upon the bookstore, and decides to do the only thing she knows to do: step aside, out of the range of potential trouble.

319731013.content: Surprisingly, Lokken doesn't appear to be offended by Ver's statement, and gamely gets off the seat.

319731014.speaker: 洛肯
319731014.content:
Why do you think they're asking me to assist on this experiment?
I hear that CORG has found what they're looking for, and the only task left is to buy as much time as possible.

319731015.speaker: 洛肯
319731015.content: You were supposed to be the one doing that, and now the job has fallen upon me too. So let's just get along since we're on the same job.

319731016.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319731016.content: Are you here to monitor me?

319731017.speaker: 洛肯
319731017.content: Well, if you want to see it that way.

319731018.content: Lokken walks around the cramped bookstore with her hands behind her back, and peers inside momentarily.

319731020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319731020.content: No. We don't have any beds to spare you.

319731021.speaker: 洛肯
319731021.content: Oh... Where do I sleep, then?

319731022.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319731022.content: Why are you asking me? Didn't Director Paracaesar or Captain Thoth make any arrangements for you?

319731023.speaker: 洛肯
319731023.content: No. They know that I'm more than capable of settling a trivial matter like this myself.

319731024.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319731024.content: Then... how are you going to settle this?

319731026.content: Lokken shrugs, pulls out a gaming device from her pocket, and walks out of the store by herself. Then, she plants herself cross-legged on the steps at the door.

319731027.speaker: 洛肯
319731027.content: Come get me if you run into something serious. But don't you dare bother me if it's a trivial matter.

319731028.content: She then pops a piece of gum into her mouth before turning her back to the door. Ver and Ningishzida hear no more from her, and all they can see is her body moving oh-so-slightly as she mashes at the buttons of her device.

319731029.speaker: 宁希达
319731029.content: Do we just let her be?

319731030.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319731030.content: I don't even know why she's here. Who knows, maybe she'll just go off on her own after a while.

319731031.speaker: 宁希达
319731031.content: Um... She may be a little scary, but she doesn't look like a bad person to me right now. Should we just let her in? She looks so alone out there.

319731032.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319731032.content: What if she makes a mess of the bookstore? How are we going to answer to Thoth then?

319731033.speaker: 宁希达
319731033.content:
I don't think that's gonna happen. She's been here for almost an hour now, but she hasn't done anything.
Do you dislike her, Norn?

319731034.content: Ver hesitates for a moment, but decides against telling Ningishzida about the fight she had with Lokken.

319731035.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319731035.content: Well, I don't dislike-dislike her... Let's just wait for Tho-Tho to come back first.

319731037.content: Ver repeats to Ningishzida what Thoth told her at the research institute, and the latter nods readily in acceptance... After all, it's just a name.

319731038.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319731038.content:
Okay, I'm feeling sleepy.
I'll go take a nap. I've been fighting all morning.

319731039.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319731039.content: I'll head out to Saint Sophia in a bit. If Thoth isn't back by then, would you watch the store please?

319731040.speaker: 宁希达
319731040.content: Of course. The store never gets any customers anyway... But what if she wants to come in?

319731041.content: Ver glances outside, over at Lokken's back again. The latter, whose head is still lowered, doesn't seem to have not heard the conversation between the two.

319731042.content: Ver purses her lips, and her eyes become soft once more after the bout of forced vigilance. Then, she shakes her head and walks inside the store.

319731043.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319731043.content: Just make sure she doesn't break anything.

319741001.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
319741001.content: All traces of the incident have been removed. All follow-up tasks pertaining to confidentiality have also been put in place.

319741003.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
319741003.content: You don't have to, ma'am. This is our job. It's an honor to be of assistance to you...

319741004.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
319741004.content: Do you think we're going to see an incident like this for the third time any time soon? If so, I'll draft a contingency plan as soon as I get back.

319741005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741005.content: I don't think so. Not for now.

319741006.speaker: 科尔盖士兵A
319741006.content: Alright, then. Although we do not know the severity of this matter, we will do all that we can to work with you.

319741007.content: The soldier, still holding a salute as if they're in an honor guard, turns around and returns to the hubbub of work behind the cordon.

319741008.content: Ver waves rather apologetically to the soldier, then takes advantage of the commotion on the street to step back to the side where her two "accomplices" are waiting.

319741010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741010.content: Thank goodness there aren't any casualties. And they should be able to keep this incident under wraps...

319741011.speaker: 洛肯
319741011.content: What's there to be worried about? CORG are experts at information management. We're the ones who should be worried.

319741012.speaker: 洛肯
319741012.content: Someone once told me that Cleansers only appear in the Data Plane Layer. So which of you would like to offer me an explanation now?

319741013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741013.content: Thoth and I did spot a few unusual things when we were last in the Plane Layer. That may explain what happened. I'll go take another look tomorrow.

319741014.speaker: 宁希达
319741014.content: Huh? What time tomorrow? Don't forget about your rehabilitation session in the morning.

319741015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741015.content: Why would you even remember this at a time like this?

319741016.speaker: 宁希达
319741016.content: Because this is what I do!

319741017.speaker: 洛肯
319741017.content: "Rehabilitation"? What rehabilitation? She looks perfectly fine to me!

319741018.content: Ningishzida, unsure if she could share this information, looks at Ver questioningly. Then, her communicator rings.

319741019.speaker: 宁希达
319741019.content: Oh no. What does my supervisor want with me now?

319741020.content: Ningishzida gestures at Ver and Lokken to keep quiet, then walks away with the microphone of her terminal covered to keep any unwanted sound from her environment from getting picked up.

319741021.speaker: 宁希达
319741021.content:
That's right, I'm still in Molander...
What disaster report? No one told me?

319741022.speaker: 宁希达
319741022.content: Why am I sounding so perky this time of the night? Um... I'm on vacation, you know. So of course I have to stay up and read all the comics I can. I'm only halfway through that stack of comic books I bought the last time.

319741023.speaker: 宁希达
319741023.content: Plus, I found this old bookstore here, and they have...

319741024.content: Ningishzida doesn't seem to be very aware of her movements. She's walking rather mechanically as she speaks, and is moving further and further away from the other two.

319741027.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741027.content: Huh??? Did you just apologize to me?!

319741028.speaker: 洛肯
319741028.content: I'm saying, I shouldn't have called you dumb. She's the dumb one here.

319741029.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741029.content: I won't tell her you said that since you helped cover my back just now.

319741030.speaker: 洛肯
319741030.content: I wouldn't have bothered with you had someone not said they didn't want you to die. That was such a silly thing to bother myself with.

319741031.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741031.content: You're lying. That's not what you think at all.

319741032.speaker: 洛肯
319741032.content: What do you think you know, miss smarty pants?

319741033.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741033.content: I can read the feelings of others. And I do that pretty well.

319741034.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741034.content: You always pretend that you don't care, but that's not true at all. I didn't tell Ningishzida about our fight because I knew you didn't mean it.

319741035.speaker: 洛肯
319741035.content: Ha! Are you saying that I don't have the guts to try that again?

319741036.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741036.content: There you go again. It's so obvious.

319741038.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741038.content: Well.. it's just that every time you talk about yourself and start scoffing, you end up looking very sad.

319741039.content: The smile on Lokken's face freezes, then gradually disappears. She stares at Ver until the latter looks away awkwardly. The edges of her mouth then curl up, as if she's won some face-off, and then she pulls out her gaming device and knocks Ver on the head with it.

319741040.speaker: 洛肯
319741040.content: Fine, fine, you've proven that you aren't a dummy. Stop trying to act smart.

319741041.speaker: 洛肯
319741041.content: But I meant what I said just now. I mean, it's all well and dandy that you people are here to look for whatever. But is there really a point in continuing to fight Gaea like this?

319741042.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741042.content: I trust CORG. I know we aren't doing anything bad at the very least.

319741043.speaker: 洛肯
319741043.content: (Scoffs) Fine. It's up to you to decide whom you want to trust.

319741044.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741044.content: Don't you think that way too? Then why are you still helping us?

319741045.speaker: 洛肯
319741045.content: A mission's a mission. There are no whys or wherefores.

319741046.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319741046.content: Is that so...? You seem to think differently from Thoth. She says that the folks from CORG are going along with this experiment because of their ideals.

319741047.speaker: 洛肯
319741047.content: She's referring to herself. Don't tar me with the same brush.

319741048.speaker: 洛肯
319741048.content:
First of all, you're wrong to think of me as "somebody with CORG."
Furthermore, not everyone is qualified to have ideals.

319741049.speaker: 洛肯
319741049.content: As for my question just now: if Gaea wants me to exterminate mankind, I will do so. Or rather, I have no choice but to do so.

319741050.speaker: 洛肯
319741050.content: Certain things are with you from the moment you are born. You can't get rid of them, and neither can you resist them. Life is a lot easier once you accept this fact.

319741051.speaker: 洛肯
319741051.content: All these things you people talk about, the destruction of the world, the clones... It makes no difference to me. What a tool should do is to play its role when it's needed, and that's enough.

319741052.speaker: 洛肯
319741052.content: Even if Director Paracaesar were to tell me right now that I'm a Visbane and I should kill myself, I'll do it as long as it's true.

319741053.content: Ningishzida is coming back to the two with an unhappy expression on her face. Lokken raises her game device to Ver's face and waves it in front of her, as if to rouse her from a daze.

319741054.speaker: 洛肯
319741054.content: Maybe the version of me from when you are has considered living in another way. But the two of us are not the same.

319741055.speaker: 洛肯
319741055.content: Rather than think about things I'll never have, I'm better off spending my free time playing video games instead.

319751002.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751002.content: That's fast. So how many are there?

319751003.speaker: 塔琳娜
319751003.content:
224.
May I use the drone to count them? I never know when I'm double counting.

319751004.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751004.content: Of course. It's completely up to you how you want to use the present I gave you.

319751005.content: Tarina puts the newly assembled drone outside the window. The drone immediately starts hovering in midair, having detected the drop to the ground below.

319751006.content: The two of them lean on the window ledge, looking out at the scenery in the courtyard. They can't quite see the streets outside, as their view is blocked by the dense forest outside, and there's only one osmanthus tree standing in the yard.

319751007.speaker: 塔琳娜
319751007.content: Make a count, Cloudy. How many osmanthus flowers do you see on the ground?

319751009.speaker: 无人机
319751009.content: Assuming we're counting stamens with petals attached to them, there are 239 flowers in total.

319751010.speaker: 塔琳娜
319751010.content: Okay... you may come back now.

319751011.content: The drone returns to Tarina, who carefully puts it aside before flashing a sheepish smile at Ver.

319751012.speaker: 塔琳娜
319751012.content: The drone wins. After all, it can spot the ones that I can't.

319751013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751013.content: That was a pretty good attempt and not far off from the actual number. The next time we go to the yard together to check, we won't miss any.

319751014.speaker: 塔琳娜
319751014.content: Ha ha. Don't let Prez hear you. Or you're going to get a "reminder" again.

319751015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751015.content: I don't care. Once Thoth finds a way to cure you, you'll be able to go anywhere you like.

319751016.content: Tarina's smile fades a little. She thinks for a moment and takes out the notebook with her bucket list in it. There, she writes "Counting osmanthus flowers with my friend" at the very end, and then puts a check mark next to it.

319751017.speaker: 塔琳娜
319751017.content: So, this "Thoth" you speak of... tell me more about her. How is she like?

319751018.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751018.content: Mmm... Actually, I haven't known her for very long. But how do I put it... I just feel that I can trust her. Maybe because she's saved me before.

319751019.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751019.content: She's really clever, and really graceful. She's also really capable, much more capable than I am, in fact.

319751020.speaker: 塔琳娜
319751020.content: I see. Do you envy her then, Norn?

319751021.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751021.content: Envy? I don't think so. Everyone has their own strengths, as well as the things that vex them or make their lives miserable too.

319751022.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751022.content: Just look at Thoth for example. She may know a lot, but she's always pondering something. If it were me, all that thinking would have long fried my brain.

319751023.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751023.content: I'd wanted to ask her to come today. But unfortunately, she's working overtime.

319751024.speaker: 塔琳娜
319751024.content: Overtime? Then there's no need to envy her.

319751025.content: The two girls are chatting and laughing with each other when they hear a knock on the door. They turn around and see Gloria and Ningishzida standing outside.

319751026.content: Ningishzida smiles and waves to Tarina, though Gloria looks a little serious.

319751028.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751028.content: Ningishzida, Doctor Gloria, where did you go off to just now?

319751029.speaker: 格罗娅
319751029.content: Doctor Ningishzida and I were discussing certain academic questions.

319751030.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751030.content: Is that why you insisted on coming with me...?

319751031.speaker: 宁希达
319751031.content: Um… I didn't have a full picture of their symptoms before, so I thought maybe I'd be better able to find a solution if I find out more…

319751032.speaker: 格罗娅
319751032.content: Doctor Ningishzida may be young, but her knowledge of medicine is extraordinary. Plus, with her abilities as a Modifier, she'll definitely be an outstanding physician in the future.

319751033.speaker: 宁希达
319751033.content: Ahaha... You exaggerate. I wasn't able to answer several of your questions just now, and I couldn't figure out a solution in the end either.

319751034.speaker: 格罗娅
319751034.content: You're welcome to drop by for more discussions in the future.

319751035.speaker: 格罗娅
319751035.content: Please wait here, Miss Norn. Prez will be here in a minute.

319751036.content: Like a waiter at a dinner party, a service AGI Mecha is serving up water in the reception area. By now, Ver has had some practice with it, and it shows in her movements.

319751037.speaker: 宁希达
319751037.content: Why do you want to see Prez? Is this some kind of secret one-on-one?

319751038.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751038.content: Prez was the one who sent me a message asking to see me. I suppose if we're doing this face to face it must be about something confidential?

319751039.speaker: 宁希达
319751039.content:
Oh, then I won't be joining you then.
May I go play with Ver and Tarina for a little while longer then?

319751041.speaker: 宁希达
319751041.content:
Heh, I'm good with kids, you know.
Just come get me when you're ready to go, Norn.

319751042.speaker: 格罗娅
319751042.content: You'll have to excuse me too, ladies.

319751043.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751043.content: Sure. I'll wait for Prez here.

319751044.content: Gloria takes Ningishzida back to the intensive care unit. Ver is sipping her drink of water and idly looking around when she suddenly spots a hook on the wall. As for what it's for...

319751045.speaker: ？？？
319751045.content: That's for hanging pictures. Specifically, the one we took together the last time.

319751046.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751046.content: Oh, hello Prez. That was fast of you.

319751047.speaker: 小院长
319751047.content: The Cleansers keep on coming, so of course it's in my best interest to solve this problem as quickly as possible.

319751048.speaker: 小院长
319751048.content: I had another look down in the Plane Layer again. My sense is that the problem is not really due to the design you people came up with. The flaw may be in Gaea itself... Hold on, that's not really what I'm trying to say.

319751049.speaker: 小院长
319751049.content: Put it another way, it's not that your engineers are no good. It's because Gaea's system for clearing out world line branches is too perfect.

319751050.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751050.content: I still don't understand what you're saying... Did you see a sun there too?

319751051.speaker: 小院长
319751051.content: That's why I said your engineers are pretty good.

319751052.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751052.content: You didn't ask me here to share some engineering tips, did you? And I seem to have already told you that I don't understand what you're saying.

319751054.content: Prez rubs their eyes, as if they're forcing themselves to bite some bullet and just get on with the matter.

319751055.speaker: 小院长
319751055.content: Tell me, how many of you from the "outside" know me now?

319751056.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751056.content: Just Thoth, and Ningishzida, and I... I haven't told anyone else, and if Thoth hasn't either, it'd be just the three of us.

319751057.speaker: 小院长
319751057.content: Why haven't you told anyone else?

319751058.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751058.content: Because it looks to me that you're keeping some kind of secret, and if there's something you don't want others to know, Admin would probably feel the same way too.

319751059.speaker: 小院长
319751059.content: I hope you realize that this isn't a normal line of thought... So, what exactly is the relationship between you and this "Admin" you keep talking about?

319751060.content: Ver blushes and instinctively looks away. It is some time before she looks down and takes a big gulp of water.

319751063.speaker: 小院长
319751063.content: Because I need to know how much I can trust you.

319751064.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319751064.content: We're fine as we are. You don't have to tell me anything if you don't want to.

319751065.speaker: 小院长
319751065.content: Looks like it's not about whether I want to anymore...

319751066.content: Prez takes a deep breath, and the focus in their eyes disappears for a moment. Their countenance becomes extremely grave, and they look squarely at Ver. Their tone of voice also gradually becomes unfamiliar, although it'd seem that she's heard the exact same tone of voice somewhere just a few days ago.

319751067.speaker: 小院长
319751067.content: Actually, you were right back there in the Plane Layer yesterday. If the "me" in the Axis World has really lost their memory, I should at least remind this "me" of what I should be doing.

319751068.speaker: 小院长
319751068.content: But I must first find someone I can trust to help convey the message.

319751069.speaker: 小院长
319751069.content: It must be someone I have absolute trust in, and who trusts me absolutely, no matter what, even with our lives.

319751070.speaker: 小院长
319751070.content: I need to know what you think, as well as what the other "me" thinks. Let me reiterate, the trust must go both ways.

319751071.speaker: 小院长
319751071.content: So now, please tell me, if I, and the other "I," can place our absolute trust in you...

319761001.content: As Thoth said, CORG's most important mission, the investigation, is now completed. Except for the occasional forays into the Data Plane Layer to deal with Gaea's rejection of the world line, Ver is pretty much on vacation at this point.

319761002.content: Ver's daily morning training sessions are yielding some remarkable results. She can feel the Bane Energy levels in her body decrease, and she's also recovered her combat stamina little by little.

319761003.content: Although Lokken's job is to keep tabs on Ver, Ver hasn't seen her actually make a report to her superiors. In fact, all she's done every day is either play video games, or watch Ver and Ningishzida as the duo pass the time with various activities.

319761004.content: Together, the two would go shopping, read comic books, watch the bookstore, remodel the training room, or drop in on some minor events around the neighborhood from time to time... And of course, they'd play games. Over this time, there is also no further untoward behavior from Lokken, and the three girls gradually become more comfortable with each other.

319761005.content: It's only on her visits to Saint Sophia that Ver would put her foot down and forbid Lokken from following her. But Lokken doesn't seem to like healthcare facilities much either, and has never shown any inquisitiveness about the place.

319761006.content: The children have remained in a fairly stable condition. Ver and Ningishzida's company have also cheered them up. Gloria and Prez have almost completely let down their guard against the duo, and the mechas at the door no longer go through the step of verifying their identities on each visit.

319761007.content: However, the progress bar on the watch dial is still filling up little by little, a topic Ver, Ningishzida, and Lokken have somehow tacitly agreed never to speak about.

319761008.content: Nevertheless, the watch serves as a constant reminder of the storm that is coming.

319761010.content: Somehow, Ver has found herself in the training room this late in the night. Maybe her mind has associated this place with the peace of mind that comes with physical exhaustion, and this is its way of avoiding whatever troubles that are plaguing her.

319761011.content: She sits down in the lounge area, picks up a bottled drink, and continues reading the comic she was on earlier in the day.

319761012.content: The basement is quieter than the night outside. Here, you can't even hear the chirping of birds and insects on the roadside, nor the faint sounds of everyday life going on all around you.

319761013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761013.content:
Part 292.
The Earl's castle. A celebration...

319761014.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761014.content: Didn't the previous part end with the hero setting out to battle? So why is there a celebration happening now? That seems rather sloppy...

319761015.content: Ver is mumbling softly to herself, even though she doesn't realize it.

319761016.content: The only sound that can be heard in the otherwise empty room is the turning of pages, one by one.

319761017.content: Finally she puts down the comic book, as she can't stand hearing this sound of loneliness any longer. She reaches into her pocket, takes out something from it, and slowly leans over the table.

319761019.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761019.content: It's broken. What do I do now...

319761020.content: Ver is holding only one half of the wooden plaque in her hand, though she can't remember when it was broken. If she can't remember, it must be from the time she couldn't remember.

319761021.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761021.content: You can't hear me. What do I do...?

319761022.content: She can't hear that person's voice, nor hers for that matter.

319761023.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761023.content: This feels so odd... I wish I could show it to you.

319761024.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761024.content: Then you'd laugh at me for being silly, but console me after that. And then you'd give me a new one.

319761025.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761025.content: Or, if you didn't have another one on hand, you'd bring me something else odd or novel, and tell me that this one's even better.

319761026.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761026.content: It's like you were trying to keep a child happy... so take it that I'm a child too this time, then.

319761027.content: Ver is no longer looking at the plaque. Instead, she lowers her gaze even further.

319761028.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761028.content: If you can hear me, how about giving me some suggestions for what to do?

319761029.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761029.content: There are so many things I don't understand.

319761036.content: Finally, Ver picks up a pen from somewhere, and writes the name "#{nickname}#" on the remaining half of the plaque. Then, she goes on her tippy toes to place the plaque on the very top of the bookshelf.

319761037.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761037.content: You'll be here with me during training, then.

319761041.content: Ver turns around a little awkwardly to see Ningishzida standing there. Ningishzida is also acting pretty gawkily herself, what with her stiffly clinging on to the door and not daring to move an inch.

319761042.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761042.content: Why are you here too? Can't get to sleep?

319761044.speaker: 宁希达
319761044.content: It's been almost a week since we last saw Tho-Tho. And we haven't seen much of the Captain Thoth from here, too. Makes me feel a little uneasy.

319761045.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761045.content: Maybe she's held up by something? I'm sure she'll be back soon. She doesn't seem like someone who doesn't keep her word.

319761047.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761047.content: Ningishzida, is there anything you wish to do? Like, your dreams, wishes, stuff like that.

319761049.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761049.content: Not that sort of wish. I mean for yourself. Do you have any?

319761050.content: Ningishzida looks up at the ceiling for a while, then finally looks over at the bookshelf in the lounge area.

319761051.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761051.content: Please don't say "an inexhaustible supply of comic books."

319761052.speaker: 宁希达
319761052.content: Can't I? Then I've nothing else. I used to think that I would never ever finish reading all the comic books I bought, but now there're only a few volumes left…

319761053.speaker: 宁希达
319761053.content: So, why not wish for world peace? With world peace, there'll be no more fighting, everyone will be happy and healthy, there'll be endless comics to read, and endless snacks to eat...

319761054.speaker: 宁希达
319761054.content: Come to think of it, that'd be paradise!

319761055.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761055.content: Mmm... I also believe that Gaea will become a place like this one day.

319761056.speaker: 宁希达
319761056.content: Wow. You're sounding real motivational right now.

319761058.speaker: 宁希达
319761058.content:
I see that you're quite the romantic type, Norn.
And that plaque you placed up there just now, what's that...?

319761060.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761060.content: It's a gift from a friend. I broke it by accident, but I've no idea where the other half is.

319761061.speaker: 宁希达
319761061.content: Shall we go look for it tomorrow then?

319761062.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761062.content: I don't think it's anywhere we can possibly find it... it might be somewhere like the Source Layer or something...

319761063.speaker: 宁希达
319761063.content: Okay then... But you'll never know?

319761064.speaker: 宁希达
319761064.content: Even if it is broken, the two pieces were originally part of the same thing, and don't they say that "like attracts like"? So they'll find each other?

319761065.speaker: 宁希达
319761065.content: For all you know, you may just recover the other piece one day and fix it whole again.

319761066.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761066.content: What kind of a theory is that?

319761067.speaker: 宁希达
319761067.content: This is from a series called "Ningishzida's Life Experiences"! I mean, take a look at the people around you. Don't you get along very well with all of them?

319761068.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761068.content: Ha... But wouldn't it be the other way round? That people spend more time with you because they get along with you?

319761069.speaker: 宁希达
319761069.content: No, no, it's not the same. What I'm talking about is really profound. It's called destiny.

319761070.content: Ningishzida's eyes dart around a little, as if she's run out of ways to justify her "theory." She then runs to the side with an awkward smile and picks up the tablet.

319761071.speaker: 宁希达
319761071.content: It's only a couple of hours till 5:30 AM anyway. We might as well start now.

319761072.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319761072.content: But wouldn't we wake Lokken with the noise? Even if she's on the rooftop, she seems to have the hearing of a bat.

319761073.content: Ningishzida scratches her head a little, then looks down at the time before cracking a smile of relief.

319761074.speaker: 宁希达
319761074.content: Nope, it's going to be alright. She can't hear us when she's gaming.

319771001.speaker: 洛肯
319771001.content: I went to bed early yesterday.

319771002.content: A rather spirited Lokken has just stuck a piece of luncheon meat into her mouth, and is now playing with the knife and fork in her hands. She looks back and forth at Ningishzida and Ver, who are both sitting opposite her and sporting dark circles under their eyes, and smiles playfully.

319771003.speaker: 洛肯
319771003.content: It's fine. Whatever little noise you were making in the training room is much quieter than what I've had to endure at the research institute.

319771004.speaker: 宁希达
319771004.content: Don't you usually play till four in the morning or something?

319771005.speaker: 洛肯
319771005.content: Well, you get tired of doing that after a while. Or for that matter, anything else for an extended period of time.

319771006.speaker: 洛肯
319771006.content: Like, don't you guys feel anything? Watching the days go by just like that...? It's like you're just passively waiting for lightning to strike and kill you.

319771008.speaker: 洛肯
319771008.content: I knew you two would get it if I were to put it this way. I wouldn't even have bothered if I thought of you as people with zero sense of urgency.

319771009.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771009.content: Well, no one is stopping you from doing whatever it is that you wish to do.

319771010.speaker: 洛肯
319771010.content: The problem is that there's nothing left to do.

319771011.content: She's turning the dinner knife nimbly between her fingers. The blade flies across her plate like a windmill turning, cutting the fried egg into 36 evenly sized pieces.

319771012.speaker: 洛肯
319771012.content: Don't you think this situation is ridiculous? Here we are on vacation, while there are all these awful things to be uncovered and dealt with, and there's nothing we can do about it.

319771013.speaker: 洛肯
319771013.content: Aren't we just waiting to die if we can't do the things we should be doing?

319771014.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771014.content: Don't say that. If you're assisting in the experiment, you're giving CORG a hand. Isn't that helping mankind?

319771015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771015.content: Although you can't eliminate the Visbanes with your very own hands, you still have to focus on what you have to do right now. And that includes moving forward one step at a time, meals included.

319771016.speaker: 洛肯
319771016.content: Helping mankind... Fine. You're not wrong to say that too.

319771017.speaker: 洛肯
319771017.content: Let's wait for Thoth to come back then. Hopefully that means we get some entertainment.

319771018.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771018.content: But which one are you referring to? "Tho-Tho" or "Thoth"?

319771019.speaker: 洛肯
319771019.content: The one from the outside. She's been gone almost a week, hasn't she?

319771020.speaker: 洛肯
319771020.content: ... Are you really gonna call her by that name? I have to tell you, she may look non-threatening, but she isn't easy to deal with either.

319771021.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771021.content: But she was the one who told us to use that name.

319771022.content: Lokken shrugs, then looks down at her plate again. She creates a mini skewer of egg bits with her fork, and shoves everything into her mouth.

319771023.content: Ver doesn't dwell on the subject further. She's about to continue eating when a message suddenly flashes on her terminal. One look at the message, though, and her jaw drops. Her eyes also slowly light up.

319771024.speaker: 宁希达
319771024.content: Did you win the lottery or something?

319771025.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771025.content: Tho-Tho says she's coming back tomorrow.

319771027.speaker: 洛肯
319771027.content: So we are getting some entertainment, after all.

319771028.content: A smile also appears on Ver's face. Perhaps it's not just because of Thoth's impending return, but also because of another line in the message that she didn't read out loud:

319771032.content: Ver is up on the roof of the bookstore. There, she uses the light coming from Lokken's gaming device to hone in on her; there she is, sitting on the edge of the rooftop.

319771033.speaker: 洛肯
319771033.content: Is there anything I can help you with?

319771035.content: But Lokken's eyes are still firmly fixed on her screen. Ver scratches her head awkwardly, but walks to her side nevertheless.

319771036.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771036.content: Did you really mean what you said at lunch? Do you really feel that we're just wasting time here, sitting around and doing nothing...?

319771038.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771038.content: Do you have any wishes then?

319771040.content: Unsure if Ver is poking fun at her, Lokken takes a quick glance at her. Seeing that Ver is actually serious, she shakes her head in amusement.

319771041.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771041.content:
Don't be like that. I'm not kidding around here.
I've been thinking a lot over the past few days, about what else I can possibly do for all of you.

319771042.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771042.content: Take my friend at Saint Sophia for example. Her wish is to get well and see the world outside the medical center. In my world, this was something she never got to do because she eventually passed away.

319771043.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771043.content: Therefore, I'm wondering if everyone has a wish they want fulfilled. Maybe I can help that way...

319771044.speaker: 洛肯
319771044.content: Wow. You were a model student in school, weren't you?

319771045.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771045.content: Nothing of that sort. So? Do you have any?

319771046.content: Lokken licks her lips, cocks her head, and thinks for a moment.

319771047.speaker: 洛肯
319771047.content: What about... become the most powerful Modifier? Do you have a way for me to do that?

319771050.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771050.content: Are you referring to your ability to absorb Divine Power from others?

319771051.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771051.content: So you attacked me the other day in order to fulfill this wish?

319771052.speaker: 洛肯
319771052.content: You're far from enough for me to do that. I'd need to find a hundred or so of you.

319771053.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771053.content: Then absolutely no way, then. That's no solution at all.

319771054.speaker: 洛肯
319771054.content: Whatever. I told ya, I'm not interested anyway...

319771055.speaker: 洛肯
319771055.content: About that day: doesn't it annoy you to talk about it? Aren't you mad at me?

319771056.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771056.content: Nope. I mean, I suppose I won in the end...

319771057.speaker: 洛肯
319771057.content: Sure. You could certainly say that.

319771058.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771058.content: Don't you have any other wish you want fulfilled? Just know that I may not be able to help you with everything.

319771059.content: Lokken takes a deep exhale, then presses the pause button on her gaming device before waving the device at Ver.

319771061.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771061.content: Sure... But how about you answer my question first? Do you have any other wish you want fulfilled?

319771062.speaker: 洛肯
319771062.content: I suppose "game with someone" would count as a wish?

319771064.speaker: 洛肯
319771064.content: I can't be bothered to think of anything else. There aren't that many things I want, anyway.

319771065.speaker: 洛肯
319771065.content: What are you waiting for? Just take it while I'm still in the mood.

319771066.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319771066.content: ... Then, may you never be lonely again in the future.

319771067.content: Lokken doesn't respond. After a moment of silence, she tugs at Ver to sit down and thrusts the gaming device into her lap. Then, she leans back to face the sky above.

319771068.speaker: 洛肯
319771068.content: I'm sleepy. I think I'm gonna go to bed early today.

319781001.speaker: 托特
319781001.content: "Earthquake Aftershock," "Geologic Activity in Nordburg Resulting from Construction," "Illegal Chemical Lab Explosion," "Subterranean Monster..."

319781002.content: Thoth has made herself comfortable on the lounger behind the cashier's as she trawls the online discussion boards. Every new theory she's seen has been even more outrageous than the last. She turns off her terminal, and waves to the two culprits who're standing in front of the counter as punishment.

319781003.speaker: 托特
319781003.content:
Don't just stand there like dummies.
I'm cool as long as the bookstore is okay. They won't be able to trace what happened back to this place.

319781004.speaker: 托特
319781004.content: You folks got along fine over the past week?

319781005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319781005.content: Mmhmm. Lokken has been a great help to us. We've been hanging out quite a bit too.

319781006.speaker: 洛肯
319781006.content:
All you had to do was say thanks.
I take it that my mission is over and I may make my exit now?

319781007.speaker: 托特
319781007.content: Do you wish to go back?

319781008.speaker: 洛肯
319781008.content: Well, I have to find out if the higher ups want anything else from me.

319781009.content: With another shrug, Lokken gets off the wall she's been leaning on and walks towards the door without even saying goodbye.

319781010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319781010.content: Huh? Wait a second, you're leaving?

319781011.speaker: 洛肯
319781011.content: Duh. When the mission's done, you go back and wait for the next one.

319781012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319781012.content: It just feels a bit sudden...

319781013.speaker: 托特
319781013.content: I guess I don't need to go back and write a report and do a physical then.

319781014.content: Laughing suddenly, Thoth takes out a flash drive and tosses it to Lokken.

319781015.speaker: 托特
319781015.content: There, your next mission. You'll be hanging around here a bit longer. Go find somewhere to read it over. Remember, this is top secret.

319781016.speaker: 洛肯
319781016.content: Found a new reason to keep me on as a bodyguard?

319781018.content: Lokken laughs as she stows away the flash drive. Stuffing her hands into her pockets, she takes her leave from the bookstore.

319781019.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319781019.content: I'm sorry, Tho-Tho. I thought fainting was the most I had to worry about. I didn't think I'd lose control like that.

319781020.speaker: 托特
319781020.content: As for you, not doing anything that will make you faint.

319781022.speaker: 托特
319781022.content: Also, what's with that nickname? Did the other me teach you guys that?

319781024.speaker: 托特
319781024.content: If I didn't, she wouldn't be me.

319781025.speaker: 托特
319781025.content: Anyway, let's get back to business. I've already taken care of things on my end, so I'll remain here with you two until the experiment is finished.

319781026.speaker: 托特
319781026.content: As for Verthandi and Tarina's illnesses...

319781028.content: Thoth takes a compact, but weighty suitcase out from under the table. Ver and Ningishzida haven't seen it before—it definitely didn't come from the shop.

319781029.speaker: 托特
319781029.content: I had someone look over the examination report. Ver has heart failure, but the cause in unclear. The safest option is to conduct a heart transplant.

319781030.speaker: 托特
319781030.content: I custom ordered this artificial heart from Shashvat, her body won't reject it. Saint Sophia can handle the operation.

319781032.content: Ver reflexively looks down at her own chest. Her heart is beating vigorously and feels perfectly healthy.

319781033.speaker: 托特
319781033.content: As for Tarina... Her condition is very rare. There's no treatment for it.

319781035.speaker: 托特
319781035.content: I haven't finished. As you both know, computing power is the foundation of Gaea. Human soul data may not depend on this computing power, their bodies are still the product of real-time calculations.

319781036.speaker: 托特
319781036.content: "Enabling humans to live on in human form"—This is Gaea's basic function. Issues don't normally occur, but there are always exceptions.

319781038.speaker: 托特
319781038.content: Yes. The reason is unclear, but... Gaea gave her defective human permissions, and there are deficiencies in the corresponding computing power support as well. Ultimately, this is the result... Symptoms resembling an autoimmune condition.

319781039.speaker: 托特
319781039.content: Fortunately, the deficiencies aren't severe based on her symptoms. There may not be a radical cure, but there is a way to bring it under control before the experiment ends.

319781040.speaker: 托特
319781040.content: And that would be to use your Divine Grace in the place of computing power to jumpstart her disordered functions. It's not difficult, but it will take training.

319781041.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319781041.content: ...I think I know what to do.

319781042.content: Ver responds almost instantly. She goes behind the counter and grabs Thoth's hand, attempting to use her Divine Power to channel the computing power granted to her by Gaea, convert it into Divine Grace, and direct it into Thoth's body.

319781043.speaker: 托特
319781043.content: Well, what do you know. Who taught you that?

319781045.content: The look of surprise on Thoth's face softens, then she lets out a soft sigh. Rising to her feet, she picks up the suitcase and gives Ver a clap on the shoulder.

319781046.speaker: 托特
319781046.content: Come on, let's go to Saint Sophia.

319791002.content: After hearing Thoth's plan, the Prez's brows furrow as the youth ponders for a moment, chin resting on one hand. After gesturing to Gloria to follow, the Prez looks at the three visitors standing in a row.

319791003.speaker: 小院长
319791003.content: There are a few issues concerning Saint Sophia's internal affairs. I'll need to discuss this with Doctor Gloria.

319791004.speaker: 小院长
319791004.content: That reminds me—Have you noticed any suspicious characters around here recently?

319791005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791005.content: I don't think so. Who are you referring to?

319791006.speaker: 小院长
319791006.content: I can't shake the feeling that someone's got their eye on this place again.

319791009.content: Having said too much, the Prez gives a shake of the head before turning to leave with Gloria.

319791010.content: Each with a glass of water in hand, the three watch as the Prez and Gloria disappear around the corner, then exchange dubious glances.

319791011.speaker: 宁希达
319791011.content: What did they mean by "internal affairs?"

319791012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791012.content: And why did the Prez seem so troubled?

319791013.speaker: 托特
319791013.content: I think I can answer both of your questions.

319791014.speaker: 托特
319791014.content: Did you notice that the Prez's reaction to the suggestion of a heart transplant concerned the artificial heart itself?

319791015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791015.content: Oh! You'd think that they'd ask about the procedure if they weren't sure, right?

319791016.speaker: 托特
319791016.content: Right. It's a natural response. Plus, cardiac defects aren't difficult to detect, so they probably already planned to give Ver a heart transplant.

319791017.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791017.content: Then why haven't they done it yet?

319791018.speaker: 宁希达
319791018.content: I've discussed this with Doctor Gloria before. I think she said that some other condition could be causing her symptoms, so a heart transplant might not help.

319791019.speaker: 托特
319791019.content: But it could at least ease the symptoms and aid her recovery. The true cause could even be uncovered during the surgery.

319791020.speaker: 托特
319791020.content: Artificial hearts aren't that expensive. I can't think of another reason not to proceed with a transplant... unless they believe there are other risks.

319791021.content: But this is only a guess on Thoth's part. When the Prez and Gloria return to the lobby ten minutes later, they agree to go through with the two treatments.

319791022.speaker: 小院长
319791022.content: But on one condition: Doctor Gloria will handle Ver's entire procedure—alone. That means you'd stay out of it too, Doctor Ningishzida.

319791023.content: Finding the lobby a bit too cramped for the hours long wait, the three end up in Saint Sophia's courtyard.

319791024.content: Petals like golden rain fall from the osmanthus trees to the ground, where the wind sweeps them off into the loneliest corners.

319791025.content: Ver comes to her little haven. Looking at the piles of debris in the corner, the thought of sitting inside no longer enters her mind.

319791027.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791027.content: I used to hide out here when I was little. I'd get my skirt all dirty sitting on the ground.

319791028.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791028.content: Doctor Gloria never said a word, but sometimes she'd catch me late at night and take me back inside to sleep. It always seemed like she'd been searching for me for hours.

319791029.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791029.content:
Now I know that she was just letting me hide here.
There's no way she couldn't have found me in a place this small.

319791031.speaker: 托特
319791031.content: Looking at ants by the flower beds.

319791032.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791032.content: I was wondering why I couldn't hear her...

319791033.speaker: 托特
319791033.content: Pure and simple people like her are a rare breed.

319791034.speaker: 托特
319791034.content: Looking at you now, it's hard to imagine that you were so withdrawn as a child.

319791035.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791035.content: Doesn't everyone change as they grow up? The Admin, Tarina, Doctor Gloria, my parents, teachers, and classmates, everyone at Aether Gazer... and you guys—

319791036.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791036.content: So many people have helped me, shown me how to live a happy life, and taught me what it means to help others. I think I'm really lucky.

319791037.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791037.content: What about you, Tho-Tho? Have you changed at all since you were little?

319791038.speaker: 托特
319791038.content: That's a bit of a long story. I'll tell you when we have the time.

319791039.speaker: 托特
319791039.content: Or, if I feel like writing an autobiography someday, I can send you a copy.

319791041.speaker: 托特
319791041.content: Just a little. Novels, essays, and the like.

319791043.speaker: 托特
319791043.content: Alright. I'll give them to you if you'll write reviews.

319791044.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791044.content: Uh... You mean I'd have to do homework too...?

319791045.content: While Thoth and Ver are chatting about novels, Ningishzida suddenly comes running over with a big grin on her face.

319791046.speaker: 宁希达
319791046.content: Hey, over here! The surgery's over!

319791047.speaker: 小院长
319791047.content: Hold on, stop right there... What are you all doing in here?

319791048.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791048.content: We heard the surgery was successful.

319791049.speaker: 小院长
319791049.content: I only told Gloria to let you know... Well, it looks like she only informed you of the outcome.

319791050.speaker: 小院长
319791050.content: Ver's only just come out of surgery. She's weak right now, so there'll be no visiting her for the next six hours. End of discussion.

319791051.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791051.content: Oh, I see... And what about Tarina?

319791052.content: Seemingly only just remembering this matter now, the Prez facepalms and nods.

319791053.speaker: 小院长
319791053.content: Don't tell me all three of you want to go see her.

319791056.content: Ver walks over to the Prez's side, then turns and sticks out her tongue apologetically at her two companions.

319791057.content: Thoth smiles helplessly and nods, then drags Ningishzida out of Saint Sophia before she can say anything.

319791058.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791058.content: So, that's what we'd do, more or less.

319791062.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791062.content: No. Just close your eyes and think happy thoughts, and it'll be over in no time.

319791063.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791063.content: Your birthday is soon, isn't it? Once you're all better, let's go out and throw you a birthday party...

319791064.content: Ver holds Tarina's hand as she directs her Divine Grace into Tarina's body in a trickling stream.

319791065.content: Commanded by Ver's complete and total focus, the Divine Power seems to coalesce with the computing power applied to Tarina's body by Gaea, searching for gaps and filling them...

319791066.content: Though she's not sure how it works, Ver is certain that she's participating in Gaea's life-sustaining process. It's a wonderful, sublime, and intoxicating experience that transcends individual consciousness.

319791067.content: "Control yourself." The whole time, Ver replays Gengchen's words in her head. Once she can no longer sense areas in need of repair, she promptly withdraws her Divine Grace.

319791070.content: Tarina looks over at the Prez, who has already turned on the room's vital signs analyzer. Reading through the report until the "Saint Sophia" logo at last comes into view, the Prez finally lets out a deep sigh.

319791072.content: Ver and Tarina look at each other, not sure what the Prez means.

319791073.content: The Prez closes the report. With steady breaths and biting a lip, the youth looks at the two of them with what appears to be a smirk, then, with some effort, finally regains a neutral expression.

319791074.speaker: 小院长
319791074.content: Come back to visit more often if you have time. I'll keep an eye on her in the meantime.

319791075.content: Though said in a roundabout way, the meaning of the Prez's words is crystal clear. Ver and Tarina's faces beam with kindred, heartfelt smiles of joy as they clap their hands together in unison.

319791077.speaker: 塔琳娜
319791077.content: Whoops, did I hit your watch?

319791078.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791078.content: No, no, it's fine, it just...

319791079.content: Ver quickly silences the alarm beeping from her watch, but the Cleanser invasion indicator continues to flash on the watch face.

319791080.speaker: 塔琳娜
319791080.content: Do you have work to do? Don't let me keep you if you do.

319791081.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319791081.content: Sorry, of all the times... I guess I'll be going now.

319791082.content: The curves of her mouth evening out into a soft smile, Ver pats Tarina's head as she and the Prez nod to each other. She then leaves Saint Sophia.

319801001.speaker: 小院长
319801001.content: What are you guys doing back here?

319801003.content: Though momentarily dumbfounded before finally realizing what Ningishzida means, the Prez doesn't turn her away, instead looking at Ver and giving her a nod.

319801004.speaker: 小院长
319801004.content: After you left earlier, I fully re-examined both of them. The results were good.

319801005.speaker: 小院长
319801005.content: Gloria went to make dinner, she said she wanted to whip up something nice to celebrate. Tarina went to help her.

319801006.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319801006.content: Tarina can already leave her room?

319801007.speaker: 小院长
319801007.content: Her bodily functions have just started to recover, so she can't be out for too long. Dinner will have to be in her room as well. It should be just about ready now.

319801008.speaker: 小院长
319801008.content: A little activity is good for her... The main thing is that she's in high spirits.

319801010.content: A delectable aroma fills Tarina's room—If blindfolded, one could easily mistake it for a restaurant. The little master of ceremonies herself is seated at the table arranging a fruit platter.

319801011.content: Turning to see who's come in, Tarina's eyes widen enthusiastically as she greets them.

319801012.speaker: 塔琳娜
319801012.content: Hello there, I don't think we've met.

319801013.speaker: 托特
319801013.content:
I'm Thoth.
Nice to meet you, Tarina.

319801014.speaker: 小院长
319801014.content: Thoth here was the one who came up with the treatments for you and Ver.

319801015.speaker: 塔琳娜
319801015.content: Nice to meet you... and thank you very much. I'm so glad you could come.

319801016.speaker: 托特
319801016.content: Think nothing of it. Why don't we sit down and eat?

319801017.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319801017.content: Do we have enough food? If not, I could help! I've learned a lot recently.

319801018.speaker: 塔琳娜
319801018.content: There's plenty. If anything, I was thinking that Doctor Gloria made too much before you all arrived.

319801019.speaker: 塔琳娜
319801019.content: What we do need are more utensils... I'll go get them. You all go ahead and take a seat.

319801020.speaker: 宁希达
319801020.content: Wait up! I'll go with you.

319801021.content: Initially wanting to stop Tarina, the Prez decides not to upon seeing Ningishzida go after her.

319801022.speaker: 小院长
319801022.content: You two sit down, I'm going to check on Ver.

319801024.speaker: 小院长
319801024.content: She just came out of the med-pod and is still in the recovery room. Prolonged immersion in the restorative solution can have some, uh, lingering after-effects.

319801025.content: Ver nods in half-understanding as she watches the Prez leave. Glancing over at Thoth in the seat next to her, Ver sees her scrolling through her terminal with a slight frown.

319801027.speaker: 托特
319801027.content: Some news from the outside. The Karasugo family in Sasanami is having some problems. The Quake Damage Control Department and the Aether Gazer members still in the area went to investigate today.

319801029.speaker: 托特
319801029.content: Yes. What's strange is that there's still no news from them, and the Izuru family hasn't been the most cooperative either. Whatever's happening in Sasanami may be more complex than it seems.

319801030.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319801030.content: With everyone from the Pheasant Squad there, I'm sure it'll be fine... Still, I wonder when their mission will end.

319801032.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
319801032.content: Yeah. I've never been out of touch with #{nickname}# for this long.

319801033.speaker: 托特
319801033.content: If you ask me, there's nothing wrong with a brief separation. It makes both parties all the better by the time they meet again.

319801034.speaker: 托特
319801034.content: Why not have a think about whether there's anything you can do now to make your reunion a little more exciting?

319801035.content: Thoth laughs, then casts her gaze over Ver's shoulder to the hallway. The Prez is walking in, holding little Ver by the hand. She looks quite healthy.

319801039.speaker: 小薇儿
319801039.content: The surgery didn't hurt, and I feel fine now. Thank you very much, Norn.

319801040.content: Thoth gently pats Ver's head, then looks over at the Prez, who's sitting beside Ver.

319801041.speaker: 托特
319801041.content: There's no need for children to be so polite.

319801042.speaker: 小院长
319801042.content: Fine. Since I'm a child too, I'll hold my gratitude then.

319801044.speaker: 小薇儿
319801044.content: Um... Where did Tarina and Doctor Gloria go?

319801046.content: Little Ver stares at the plates on the table and nods eagerly.

319801047.speaker: 小院长
319801047.content: They're taking a little while... I'll go check on them.

319801048.content: Having only just sat down, the Prez begrudgingly gets back up. But before the Prez can leave the table, the sound of something clattering on the floor comes from the hallway.

319801049.content: Unsettled looks cross the faces of everyone but little Ver as they rush out of the room.

319801050.content: Fruit and utensils lie scattered on the floor around an overturned salad bowl. Tarina stands in the hallway with her arms still extended to hold a bowl that isn't there. Her head is raised, as if looking at the ceiling, but her eyes are vacant.

319801053.content: Ningishzida hastily puts down the things in her hands and runs over to Tarina. She shakes her, but nothing happens.

319801054.speaker: 小院长
319801054.content:
This doesn't look like a flare-up...
Let's bring her into the room first.

319801056.content: As Ningishzida bends over to pick up Tarina, she spots a white light flashing outside the window out of the corner of her eye. Just as she turns to look, the building suddenly starts to tremble violently.

319801059.content: Seeing the Prez's expression go ashen in an instant, Ningishzida obeys without thinking, taking a few steps back with Tarina in her arms.
