411331052.content: I'm sorry... Of course I remember what the instructor said... I've never forgotten any of it.

411331054.content:
What I'm saying... Of course it's right.

Our purpose in life is already clear to us. We don't need anything else... All we have to do is to train... and train well...

411331055.content: (This line and the previous one are both part of the letter text)

411331056.content: A sudden palpitation in her chest causes Ten's eyes to spring open.

411331057.content: The recuperation chamber is still tightly shut, and all the darkness inside this narrow space seems to be pressing into her body. She reaches out to open the chamber door, not even stopping to calm her breathing first.

411331058.content: As soon as she sits up in her chamber, Ten sees another pair of eyes reflecting the dim hallway lights.

411331059.content:
Eight...?
Nine isn't in her chamber... Where is she?

411331060.content: My advice to you is to mind your own business.

411331061.content: Eight lies back in her recuperation chamber as if nothing happened. The door shuts over her tightly closed eyes.

411331062.content:
Should I just go back to rest too? Or should I...
Ten climbs out of her recuperation chamber.

411331063.content: The lab is eerily quiet this late at night. Only the warning signs all around are flashing dimly.

411331064.content: Knowing Nine as well as she does, Ten knows she can track her using traces she left behind. However, she's a little afraid to move forward... afraid of what she might see.

411331067.content: Nine, who's walking toward the door at this point, turns back in surprise at the sudden yell of her moniker, then takes a step back in alarm.

411331068.content: What do you think you're doing? Are you going to betray our instructor?

411331070.content: I... just... We train so hard to protect the world outside... So I thought I should at least see what that world is like for myself...

411331071.content: Nine holds herself for a moment, her expression somewhere between laughter and tears. A moment later, as if realizing what's truly important at that moment, she turns back toward the open door.

411331072.content: Ten instantly rushes to the door at full speed, her Divine Grace at full flow.

411331075.content: Nine steps through, and the heavy alloy door closes behind her.

411331076.content: A sudden palpitation in her chest causes Ten's eyes to spring open.

411331077.content: It's time to get up. The chamber slowly opens by itself, and she can feel the bright white light used to illuminate the lab also fall on her.

411331078.content: She sits up and takes a moment. But what she sees next is so unexpected, she's almost too stunned to move.

411331080.content: The girl sitting in the nearby recuperation chamber turns to look at her. It doesn't look like she's hurt in any way, and if it weren't for her unusually listless mien, Ten might've suspected that what happened the night before was just a dream.

411331083.content: What? You mean, they caught you? Did you... did you get punished?

411331084.content: Lila is fine... But they've sent her somewhere else again...

411331085.content: I didn't ask about Lila. I asked—

411331086.content: But Nine has already turned away, apparently done answering Ten's questions. She curls up into a fetal position, her head tucked deep in her knees, blocking out everything but herself.

411331087.content: Ten looks up and around. Her companions are getting up and the researchers are coming in, but no one seems to notice Nine's odd behavior. Everything appears to be happening as usual, except...

411331088.content: Today, you're taking your final training assessment.

411331089.content: All the precious test subjects, from One to Ten, are now gathered at the testing ground.

411331090.content: On a platform at the outer periphery of the testing ground, their instructor is standing behind a terminal showing various monitoring data and glancing at all the test subjects now waiting for orders.

411331091.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411331091.content: You aren't taking the "final training assessment" for this period. This is your true final assessment.

411331092.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411331092.content: You're the first cohort from the 07 series to take shape. I expect great things from you in terms of your Divine Power Devouring abilities.

411331093.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411331093.content: The person who passes this final assessment will be granted a name and become the true "0700."

411331094.content: The instructor is speaking coolly as usual. However, these words send a great ripple through the testing ground.

411331095.content: "The person who passes"... What do they mean by that?

411331096.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411331096.content: Of course, there will only be one true 0700. I only need one, after all.

411331097.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411331097.content: Eight, you have consistently been the best so far, and I expect a great performance from you today; Seven and Nine, although you've been at the bottom of the heap, today you have the same opportunity to show me what you're made of.

411331098.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411331098.content: I very much look forward to meeting the one who will walk out of here.

411331099.content: The door to the testing ground closes. The instructor, still standing up on the platform, doesn't seem to care about the facial expressions of those on the field.

411331100.content: What does the instructor mean? And just how are we being tested?

411331101.content: How? We are the best candidates to test Divine Power Devouring. With each other.

411331102.content: Eight, who's always performed the best among the pack so far, quickly grasped the meaning of the instructor's words. She looks around the testing ground, and realizes that everyone is eyeing her, the "best student," warily.

411331103.content: Of course... I am the best.

411331104.content: And so, she unleashes her mechanical tentacles.

411331105.content: Weapons pierce both other bodies and other weapons. In a flash, the peace in the testing ground has evaporated, leaving behind only flows of Divine Grace slamming into each other and machine debris everywhere.

411331107.content: Ten takes a step back in confusion as she watches all these figures that look almost just like herself. In her mind's eye, their figures are superimposed with those of the targets in her memory training, as well as all those Visbanes in the videos...

411331108.content: For a moment, Ten's visual system is seemingly unable to distinguish between friend and foe, and her tentacles tremble beside her. She quickly takes a look around, hoping to find someone she can see clearly.

411331109.content: That's right, there's the girl who's always standing next to her. Hopefully she's still—

411331112.content: The girl falls to the ground before her.

411331114.content: The mechanical tentacle is retracted from Nine's bloodied chest, and Ten reaches out to catch her in her shaking hands. Behind Nine's fallen body, she can see Eight's face, devoid of any emotion.

411331116.content: Is that how it is? So, unleashing her tentacles at her sisters and thrusting them into their bodies is just a way to enhance her Divine Power, huh?

411331117.content: The figure in front of her is now perfectly superimposed with her training targets, and the Divine Power in her body, combined with some other kind of energy, has reached a boiling point. Ten looks up at Eight, now brandishing her tentacles too.

411331118.content: I'm sorry! I'm so sorry! But I don't want to die!

411331119.content: So... I'm not... the best... after all...

411331121.content: The tentacles stab their target again and again.

411331124.content: She's never had so much Divine Power, but Ten can't even summon the strength to move her tentacles.

411331125.content: She waits for a while, but no one comes along to finish her off. So, she slowly turns around and gets down on her knees to try and pick up the dying girl she's been protecting all this time.

411331126.content: But Ten's grossly weakened arms can't even hold up Nine's mechanical body, so she just bends over, trying to get closer to her. She places her grime-caked cheek against Nine's mangled chest.

411331128.content: There's still a tiny trace of Divine Grace left in her body. Maybe if Ten could carry her to the repair shop right now, she could survive... But Ten no longer has any strength left in her, and the door of the testing ground remains steadfastly closed.

411331129.content:
(Coughs) Is it over...?
Ten, looks like you're graduating...

411331130.content: No, not yet... There's still you.

411331131.content: The girl's face, already drained of the life-giving properties of Divine Power, is pale and cold. She moves her lips to force a smile.

411331132.content: Then... you should... take my Divine Power as well...

411331133.content: Yesterday, when I went outside... there was this glass hallway... I saw these little sparkles up there in the sky, which Lila called "stars"...

411331134.content: The instructor said yesterday that... I'd be able to go outside when I graduate... Ten, it's up to you now... You've gotta destroy all those Visbanes, and see the outside world. For all of us.

411331135.content: Nine raises her hand, but her fingers slip before they can come in contact with Ten's tentacle. All she can do now is to look Ten squarely in the eyes. Ten raises her mechanical limb, and, like she'd just done countless times to the others, stabs it into Nine's broken chest.

411331136.content: The very last trace of Divine Power escapes from the body formerly known as Nine.

411331137.content: How should she feel now? Sated? Satisfied? Ten doesn't know.

411331138.content: She sits down slowly, and her mind goes blank for a while. Then, all of a sudden, she feels something poke her in the hand, and she quickly picks it up. It's a small Assistant Mecha, scuffed up from the battle.

411331140.content: The little Assistant Mecha pauses mid-operation for a few seconds, and then pops out a robotic arm. Ten has no desire to lift even a finger at this point. Then, as if it was hit by something invisible, the arm retracts on its own accord.

411331142.content: With that, the Assistant Mecha's screen goes dark. It, too, is now no more.

411331143.content: The door of the testing ground is finally open, and the researchers, delighted that the experiment has finally produced some results, enter with great excitement.

411331144.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411331144.content: Congratulations, you're the best of this series.

411331146.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411331146.content: You're the true beginning of the 07 series.

411331147.content: She's a 00 who has absolutely nothing.

411331150.content: The girl with the grime-caked face looks up and around blankly at the debris scattered all over the testing ground.

411331151.content: That's right... It's not true that she has absolutely nothing!

411331152.content: She should be feeling happy right now! She's the new best tool in the fight against the Visbanes.

411331153.content: She still has her instructor, and she'll get a lot more in the future, as long as she's good and kills all the Visbanes...

411331155.content: Her mechanical parts start to move, and a slightly exaggerated smile appears on her face. She drags her battered and broken body out of the viscera-covered testing ground, and walks to the person who's been instructing them all this time.

411331157.content: She looks on with much eagerness. The person she's looking at finally turns her eyes away from the data on the terminal screen with a look of indifference.

411331158.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411331158.content: Thanks for your hard work. But the experiment is a failure.

411331160.content: She stands there blankly, looking at the smile on her instructor's face that seems both loving and derisive at the same time. The latter comes down from the platform and extends a gentle hand to her.

411331161.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411331161.content: Yes. You all truly were a massive disappointment.

411331162.content: "Failure"? "Disappointment"? Did she not just walk over there... over the bodies of her dead sisters?

411331163.content: Ten's body may be brimming with Divine Power, but her brain has stopped working at this moment. All she registers is the sight of her instructor smiling at her as she wipes the filth of battle off the girl's cheeks.

411331164.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411331164.content: You may choose a name for yourself. You won it from all of them, after all.

411331166.content: The name that she'd typed casually into the Assistant Mecha's system is the first thing that comes into her mind at this moment. She dispenses with the broken memories that follow, and again looks eagerly at the person in front of her. Is her instructor going to acknowledge her now?

411331167.speaker: 洛肯
411331167.content: What do I do next? Since I'm the strongest, do I go eliminate the Visbanes now?

411331170.content: Her instructor's hand is no longer on her, and the pitying smile has disappeared along with it. She has even walked around Lokken without so much as a second look.

411331171.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411331171.content: I already told you, the experiment is a failure. Forget everything. You're not good enough.

411331172.speaker: 洛肯
411331172.content: What do you mean... I'm "not good enough"?

411331173.content: Even though she's absorbed everyone's Divine Power, she's still not good enough...?

411331174.speaker: 洛肯
411331174.content: No, ma'am, that can't be true! I can do it, I swear!

411331175.content: Lokken turns around quickly to catch up with her instructor. She even reaches out in a bid to grab that gentle hand that was proffered to her earlier. However, all she gets is a cold, hard look from her instructor in return.

411331177.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411331177.content: Obey, Lokken. You will stay here and stand by for further orders.

411331178.content: The strength has left Lokken's fingers again, and her mind goes blank. Her instructor's expression, her gaze, and her words all echo in her mind...

411331180.content: Everything that's happened, all the sacrifices, all the hopes and expectations, all the promised missions... Did they mean nothing at all???

411331181.speaker: 洛肯
411331181.content: Just why am I... standing here now...?

411341001.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411341001.content: Mission check complete. Mechanical check complete. Subject Lokken has returned.

411341002.speaker: 洛肯
411341002.content: Is it over yet? This takes ages every time.

411341003.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411341003.content: The checks wouldn't take so long if you minimized the damage to your mechanical parts during your missions.

411341004.speaker: 洛肯
411341004.content: Can't you just fix it up real quick? It's not like you're short on materials or something.

411341005.content: Report, checks, then repair. This is how the process has always been. Lokken heads to the repair shop.

411341006.content: She'd taken a bite from a Visbane on her right leg during the last mission. There are signs of Bane Energy corrosion on the biological tissue, as well as physical damage to the internal mechanical structure that has deformed a now-numb nerve.

411341007.speaker: 洛肯
411341007.content: Have you visited Molander lately, Director?

411341008.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411341008.content: No. You can always put in a request if you have something to report.

411341009.speaker: 洛肯
411341009.content: "Request"... Oh right, I suppose I'm a member of CORG too now.

411341010.content: But what request would she conceivably put in?

411341011.content: Everything has already been arranged for her. Between the research institute and the outfield missions, all she has to do is to follow what she's told, every single step of the way.

411341012.content: Lokken does not speak further about the request, and walks into the repair shop. During the repair process, her cognitive pathways are blocked, plunging her into a deep ocean devoid of all light and sound, an ocean that allows her to forget everything, including herself.

411341013.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411341013.content: Mission check complete. Mechanical check complete. Subject Lokken has returned.

411341014.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411341014.content: What have you been doing between completing your missions and returning to the institute? I have to warn you, the source code decomposer—

411341015.speaker: 洛肯
411341015.content: Look. I know better than you what that thing in my head can do.

411341016.speaker: 洛肯
411341016.content: I just got lost, that's all. But no one saw me, and I made it back on time anyway.

411341017.content: The researcher doesn't respond, and simply looks at Lokken's face. Lokken is also aware that a piece of her right cheek has been torn off. The resulting hollow makes her look a lot like a skeleton.

411341018.content: No sane person would go gallivanting on the streets looking like that, right?

411341019.speaker: 洛肯
411341019.content: Has the Director... given any new missions lately?

411341020.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411341020.content: No. Stand by for further orders at the research institute.

411341021.content:
Stand by, stand by...
She continues to wander in what is an empty room, where no one asks after her and no one cares. She's no better than a decorative painting hanging on a wall.

411341022.content: Actually, might she have been better off as a painting? Or a training target, whose value is realized the moment it is destroyed.

411341023.content: No, no! She's not something easily discarded! She can become more powerful, and therefore more valuable.

411341024.content: That's right, all she has to do is to become even stronger.

411341026.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411341026.content: Let me think about it... Hold on, you mean right now? But we haven't even repaired you yet!

411341027.speaker: 洛肯
411341027.content: What, repaired this? It's not a problem.

411341028.content: She glances at the training room, her eyes seemingly not focused on anything. She's just taking one step forward at a time.

411341029.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411341029.content: Mission check complete. Mechanical check complete. Subject Lokken has returned.

411341030.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411341030.content: This joint operation went pretty well. But you've taken quite a bit of damage this time. You'll need to rest for a while.

411341032.content: Lokken returns to her senses and looks up. Almost half of her limbs have taken some kind of damage. She's covered in large wounds, and only one of her scarlet eyeballs remains, hanging from a grotesquely contorted eye socket.

411341033.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411341033.content: Y-you should go for repairs, right away...

411341034.speaker: 洛肯
411341034.content: That... Modifier we worked with this time. How is she?

411341035.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411341035.content: That's a bit out of the blue. Looking at the mission feedback, she's already gone back to receive treatment.

411341038.speaker: 科尔盖研究员
411341038.content: Don't you already know? The Modifiers are a humanoid evolution of Gaea's self-check programs. Their purpose is to fight the Visbanes.

411341039.speaker: 洛肯
411341039.content: No, no, you can't be right...

411341040.content: How is it that she can smile and laugh so freely?

411341041.content: How is it that she has all these companions around her, ones she doesn't have to kill?

411341042.content: How is it that she could reach out to Lokken like that so naturally, as if she too, were deserving of love and care?

411341043.speaker: 洛肯
411341043.content: Then what am I, chopped liver?

411341044.content: Why is it that I have to be locked up in this research institute, with something that could kill me at any time inside my head, while I wait for a new mission day after day after day?

411341045.content: Why is it that those people, who are weaker than I am, are allowed to come and go freely? Shouldn't I just absorb their Divine Grace and become stronger then?

411341047.speaker: 洛肯
411341047.content: How am I different from those "Modifiers"???

411341048.content: She laughs and raises her hand to touch herself, feeling the exposed metal frame beneath the bionic material. It feels broken and cold, giving off no discernible signs of life.

411341049.speaker: 洛肯
411341049.content: Ha... So I'm not the same as those Modifiers.

411341050.content: She's just a tool created by mankind.

411341051.content: Precious things like jewels are meant to be carefully protected and displayed where all can see; tools like shovels, on the other hand, are meant to be purchased from stores and thrown into cold, damp garden corners.

411341052.content: That's just how it is. That's what tools are destined for.

411341053.content: She's walking rather unsteadily, as her balance system has also been damaged. As her body sways from side to side, her vision begins to fracture as well. She reaches out to the side to keep herself upright.

411341054.speaker: 洛肯
411341054.content: Does the Director ever read the mission reports that are sent in?

411341057.speaker: 洛肯
411341057.content: She'll come to acknowledge me when I become the strongest of them all and kill off all the Visbanes. All of mankind will remember me then.

411341058.content: She staggers a few more steps, her body broken, then slumps against the wall of the repair shop and slowly closes her eyes.

411351002.content: A brisk-sounding voice rings out from the other end of the hall, and Prez's facial expression immediately returns to normal. However, Ver is still staring at them in a bit of a daze, unable to come back to her senses.

411351003.content: Ningishzida is holding something in her hand, and is walking over to her, flanked by Tarina on the right and little Ver on the left.

411351004.speaker: 宁希达
411351004.content: Guess what I'm holding in my hand!

411351006.content: Ningishzida gives the square object sealed with brown paper in her hand a little shake, and three pairs of wide eyes look at Ver expectantly.

411351007.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411351007.content: Um... I've got no idea. Care to give me a hint, Ver?

411351008.speaker: 小薇儿
411351008.content: No, no, you have to guess it yourself, Norn.

411351009.content: Seeing the girl shaking her head earnestly, Ver turns back to look at Prez for help, only to see Prez also shaking their head blankly.

411351010.speaker: 塔琳娜
411351010.content: Actually, this is related to that wish I made earlier.

411351011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411351011.content:
Tarina...
Oh, I remember now! Is it a print of the photo we took earlier?

411351012.speaker: 宁希达
411351012.content: Ding ding! You got it right!

411351013.content: Ningishzida tears the packaging off the frame and holds it up to show it off. Heads of different sizes have now come together to admire the photo.

411351014.speaker: 小薇儿
411351014.content: Why did I pose for the picture like that...?

411351015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411351015.content: My face looks so weird here.

411351016.speaker: 塔琳娜
411351016.content: But I really like this photo. I like how full of life everyone is here.

411351017.speaker: 宁希达
411351017.content: And what is this lump... Is that Prez??? Hmm... I must say, this is very on-brand for Prez alright...

411351018.content: The girls look at Prez, who's standing next to them, and burst out into laughter. Ningishzida breathes out deeply to suppress her laughter, then hands over the framed picture.

411351019.speaker: 宁希达
411351019.content: Where are you going to put this up, Tarina?

411351020.speaker: 塔琳娜
411351020.content:
Over here. See, Doctor Gloria has already put in a hook for me.
(Sighs)

411351021.content: The hook is rather high up on the wall, and Tarina makes several attempts to hang the picture while standing on tiptoe before someone else smoothly takes over the task.

411351022.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411351022.content: Let me do it. Hmm... does it look level to you?

411351024.content: Ver takes her hands off the picture and walks a few steps back. The photo is now hung squarely on the white wall, and the sunlight coming in from the side through the window is shining on the radiant smiles of the girls.

411351025.speaker: 宁希达
411351025.content: Heh. Looks like both the lighting in the photo and the lighting here are good.

411351026.speaker: 宁希达
411351026.content:
But I also want to take a picture with everyone too...
Let's go outside to take in the sunshine and take another photo when Ver and Tarina are feeling better. Kachaa, kachaa!

411351027.content: Ningishzida raises her hands to mimic the action of photo-taking, and places the "photo frame" formed by her fingers in front of little Ver. The girl dodges out of the "frame" and runs behind Tarina with a smile on her face.

411351028.speaker: 塔琳娜
411351028.content: Sure! Let's take another picture then.

411361002.content: Ningishzida lifts the drink in her hand up to the light. Against it, the ice in the glass has created a shadow in the shape of a cat's head on the back of her hand.

411361003.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411361003.content: Oh, it's a kitty cat. Cool...

411361004.speaker: 宁希达
411361004.content: It tastes good too. Hey, Norn, could I try the dessert you ordered?

411361006.content: The two girls stick their dessert spoons into their mouths, and the sweet taste of cream spreads on their tongues. In times of calm, sugar is equal to happiness, and looks of bliss appear on both their faces.

411361007.speaker: 宁希达
411361007.content: Oh by the way, how has your training been lately? You mustn't keep anything from Doctor Ningishzida.

411361008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411361008.content: It's been going very well! A lot of Bane Energy is consumed each time.

411361009.speaker: 宁希达
411361009.content: Every time? It hasn't decreased over time?

411361010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411361010.content: I don't think so. Should it?

411361011.speaker: 宁希达
411361011.content: If what you have is Bane Energy corrosion, the Bane Energy in the body should be "drawn down" over time. But then again, Norn, the Bane Energy corrosion is happening in your heart, which is quite a rare presentation in itself...

411361012.content: Ningishzida is rubbing her cheeks while thinking. When she looks up again, she sees a curious Ver looking at her intently. She feels the fierce urge to hold up her hands together to hide her face.

411361013.speaker: 宁希达
411361013.content: Um... by right, the current plan should be working fine. We may have to take another look at your training though.

411361014.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411361014.content:
I understand. After all, this is a complicated situation.
There's still so much we don't know about Bane Energy and Visbanes...

411361015.speaker: 宁希达
411361015.content: That's right. Stuff like Visbanes and Turing and Gremory... I'd never have imagined their existence even if I'd read another hundred comics.

411361016.speaker: 宁希达
411361016.content: Oh by the way, Norn... Do you think they're here in Molander City now?

411361017.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411361017.content: I think so. I mean, the hyperspace is only so big.

411361018.speaker: 宁希达
411361018.content: That's true. So do you think they're very close to us now...? That's such a frightening thought.

411361019.content: Ningishzida suddenly stops eating her dessert. Now, she's staring at the spoon with visible worry. Ver is about to comfort her when she suddenly puts her spoon down and looks up gravely.

411361020.speaker: 宁希达
411361020.content: You know where Turing is staying, don't you? Do you want to go spy on him, see what he's doing?

411361021.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411361021.content: Spy? On Turing?! N-Ningishzida, are you drunk or something? Is there alcohol in your dessert or what?! Aren't you afraid of what might happen???

411361022.speaker: 宁希达
411361022.content:
Nah, I don't really drink.
Remember the last time you told me that I'd become braver in the future and even go fight a Cognizant Visbane in Sasanami? I thought about it, and I feel like I should start practicing from now on.

411361024.content: Ningishzida nods. Then, all of a sudden, she makes a grab for Ver's shoulder as she stares at Ver with her pink eyes matter-of-factly.

411361025.speaker: 宁希达
411361025.content: If... Just if, anything happens later, remember to take cover behind me. After all, I'm ten years behind you, and I need all the practice I can get.

411361027.content: The two sneak to where Turing is staying after taking their afternoon tea. But the area around Turing's place is peaceful and quiet like any other ordinary neighborhood. It looks like they've made a wasted trip. However, the two then discover that Turing's door has been left ajar.

411361028.speaker: 宁希达
411361028.content: Did we just stumble on one of Turing's schemes??? Wouldn't that make me even more capable than I'll be ten years down the road???

411361029.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411361029.content: I'm not quite sure about that...

411361030.content: That being said, Ver is feeling just as curious. The two girls hesitate for a while before finally mustering up the courage to push the door open. They cautiously enter the space.

411361031.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411361031.content: Those are maps on the wall... Of all ten Sephirah Zones.

411361032.speaker: 宁希达
411361032.content: Does Turing have schemes brewing in each and every Sephirah Zone...?

411361033.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411361033.content: That'd make sense... But these are all standard-issue maps from CORG.

411361034.speaker: 宁希达
411361034.content: Look, I see bananas from Shashvat on that table over there. Might Turing be targeting Shashvat next?

411361035.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411361035.content: But I also see tea from Xu Heng and tinned fish from Jokurr. These are all things you can purchase from the shops here.

411361036.speaker: 宁希达
411361036.content: That's true... I don't think we've found any leads then.

411361037.content: The two girls let out a sigh. Then, Ver notices that the terminal screen beside her has lit up, and just as she's about to move closer for a look she senses Ningishzida stiffly step up next to her and then tug at her sleeve with a trembling hand.

411361038.speaker: 宁希达
411361038.content: N-N-N-Norn... R-r-r-run... I'll... I'll cover you...

411361039.content: Ver turns back and instantly feels the world spin around her. The door to the inner room has been pushed open, and Turing is now standing between Ningishzida's petite figure and the door, his face devoid of any expression.

411361041.speaker: 图灵
411361041.content:
Good afternoon.
Now, if you'd let me pass...

411361042.content: Ningishzida, her hand still on Ver's sleeve, moves awkwardly to the side. Turing walks in a small semi-circle around them, puts down the cup in his hand, and sits down in front of the terminal.

411361043.content: Turing doesn't seem to be making a move, and Ver heaves a sigh of relief. Although she knows just how terrifying Cognizant Visbanes can be, after their previous encounters Ver is convinced that Turing wouldn't hurt her out of the blue.

411361044.content: She tentatively takes two steps closer while dragging the human-sized keychain who still insists on standing in front of her.

411361047.content: Although Ver doesn't play chess much, she understands the broad strokes thanks to the folks at Aether Gazer who have a keen interest in the game. She looks at the terminal screen. Turing, who's playing black, has only a few pieces left on the board. Clearly, he's losing the game.

411361048.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411361048.content: Looks like you'll have to throw in the towel soon?

411361049.speaker: 图灵
411361049.content: I'm up against someone really good.

411361050.speaker: 图灵
411361050.content: We've played a number of games recently. He's an adept offensive player, and I lose more than I win.

411361051.content: Turing falls silent, and the two girls simply watch the game with some focus for a while. His opponent tries to box him in with several checkmates, but none of these attempts succeed. Finally, a prompt declaring a draw pops up on the terminal.

411361052.speaker: 宁希达
411361052.content: I can't believe it! He actually won!

411361053.speaker: 图灵
411361053.content: I didn't. It's just that I didn't lose the game either.

411361054.content: Ningishzida is spooked as soon as Turing starts speaking again, though she doesn't forget to "protect" Ver. She closes her eyes tightly and raises one arm in front of Ver's face.

411361055.speaker: 图灵
411361055.content: Although my opponent built up quite the advantage at the beginning, I held on to my last few pieces and dragged the situation into a stalemate. So, even though he had the upper hand, ultimately he couldn't beat me.

411361056.speaker: 图灵
411361056.content: I might not have been able to win, but I didn't lose either. This is the strength I can seek out in difficult situations.

411361057.content: Turing falls silent again. Ningishzida plucks up the courage to open her eyes a little, and realizes that Turing has gone to get himself a drink of water. It's only then that she realizes that Turing was simply chatting with them.

411361059.content: Turing doesn't respond. Instead, he turns to look at the two of them, and finally articulates the question that's been hanging in the air all this time.

411361060.speaker: 图灵
411361060.content: So, what are the two of you doing here at my place?

411361061.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411361061.content: Nothing! We were just... wandering around and suddenly, suddenly, we thought to drop by for a look, that's all.

411361062.content: It's a completely unconvincing statement, but one that's also 100% true. Ver looks at Turing's questioning gaze nervously, afraid that he'd ask another question that she wouldn't be able to answer.

411361063.speaker: 图灵
411361063.content: ...Then go back if you're done looking.

411361064.speaker: 图灵
411361064.content: I'm waiting for something that has nothing to do with you. So, it's better for us to continue to keep an appropriate distance from each other.

411361065.content: Turing turns his gaze back to the terminal, starts a new game, and returns to playing chess with total focus.

411361067.content: The two girls share a look with each other and silently leave the room.

411371001.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411371001.content: Are we not allowed inside now?

411371002.speaker: 格罗娅
411371002.content: Yes. Something's happened with the kids, and we're performing a full examination now.

411371003.content: Ver and Ningishzida, who've come to visit the children with a light heart, look at each other. They both see surprise in the other's eyes.

411371004.speaker: 宁希达
411371004.content: What exactly happened? Do you need any help?

411371005.speaker: 格罗娅
411371005.content: Thank you for your offer, but it isn't necessary. Dangerous complications can occur for them at any time, and this isn't unusual at all... Please wait out here if you choose to stay.

411371006.content: Gloria then puts her gear back on and turns back to the ward.

411371007.speaker: 宁希达
411371007.content: Although I've always known that Ver and Tarina are ill, I thought they were both in stable condition given how they looked the last few times we saw them...

411371008.speaker: 宁希达
411371008.content: I hope they'll pull through... Norn? Norn?

411371010.speaker: 宁希达
411371010.content: You had this terrible look on your face. Are you really alright?

411371011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411371011.content: Me? Yeah, I'm okay. I just allowed my mind to wander a little, that's all. You know, I'm well known in Aether Gazer for my ability to stay unfazed.

411371012.content: But Ningishzida continues to look at her worriedly. Ver does her best to avoid Ningishzida's gaze, but in the end, she simply can't keep the smile on her face anymore. She gently grasps Ningishzida by the fingertips, puts her head on the girl's shoulder, and closes her eyes tightly.

411371013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411371013.content: I know, I know... But I still hope that they...

411371014.content: Ningishzida holds her hand without saying a word, waiting for the time to pass, until the door to the ward is pushed open again.

411371016.speaker: 格罗娅
411371016.content: They're stable for now. I told Ver that you two are here. It really made her happy. She's waiting for you inside.

411371018.speaker: 格罗娅
411371018.content: The problem is still there—all we've done is to buy some time. In a month, if we still don't have a treatment plan, I'm afraid...

411371019.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411371019.content: So we only have a month left...

411371020.content: Ver mumbles to herself. The deadline in her memory that she's been unwilling to face is now drawing closer and closer. Could it be that even if she had to do it again, even if it were a false salvation, she wouldn't be able to do it?

411371021.speaker: 宁希达
411371021.content: Norn? The girls are waiting for us inside.

411371023.content: Ver, with her fists clenched, takes a few deep breaths, then smiles again and starts to stride forward. Ningishzida glances at her worriedly from behind and hurriedly follows.

411371024.content: The duo enter the ward. Little Ver and Tarina are together. While they look a little pale, they don't seem to be in a serious condition.

411371026.speaker: 宁希达
411371026.content: We're here to play with you again! Remember the game we played the last time?

411371028.speaker: 塔琳娜
411371028.content: Come and sit over here, Norn.

411371030.content: In the bright afternoon sun, the shadows have retreated to the corners. There only seems to be enough room in the small ward for laughter and joy. Outside the window, the shadows of osmanthus trees flutter, with the petals piled on the ground serving as the only reminder that the osmanthus flowers are about to fully wither.

411371031.content: Ver and Ningishzida bid goodbye to the children. Ningishzida pulls Doctor Gloria aside to ask something, while Ver slowly takes two steps forward.

411371032.content: Once you leave an atmosphere of laughter and joy, silence seems to be everywhere. The tragedy in Ver's memory has returned to her. She looks up blankly and realizes that someone's standing in front of her.

411371034.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411371034.content:
Prez...
Ver and Tarina... They have one month left. Only one month left...

411371036.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411371036.content: There's another way? You mean to save them?

411371037.content: The person in front of her slowly nods in the face of her eager gaze. The figure in front of her reminds her strongly of the countless other figures in her memory that make her feel at ease. She curls her fingers into her palms tightly.

411371039.speaker: 小院长
411371039.content: Yeah. So you don't have to worry too much.

411371040.speaker: 小院长
411371040.content: Ningishzida's back. The two of you should head back now. See you next time.

411381001.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411381001.content: Cleanup complete! Are we heading back now?

411381002.speaker: 托特
411381002.content: Hold on, didn't I say before that Cleansers can also appear on the Surface Layer? Since we aren't rushing to go anywhere, let's hang back a while and see if we can discover anything.

411381003.content: Ver nods obediently. Then, she watches Thoth produce some kind of device and perform a scan with it in every direction as she leads the way.

411381004.speaker: 托特
411381004.content: Oh, by the way, how have you folks been while I was away?

411381005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411381005.content: We've been doing pretty well! Let me think...

411381006.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411381006.content: We haven't had any trouble from Turing and Gremory. I've got no idea what they're doing, but they don't seem to be up to any sort of mischief.

411381007.speaker: 托特
411381007.content: They probably are working on something. But since they can't leave the hyperspace anyway, we can just let them be.

411381008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411381008.content: Other than that, besides dealing with the Cleansers and training, I've just been hanging out with Ningishzida.

411381009.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411381009.content: Oh, right, and there's Lokken too! She's been at the bookstore all this time, and sometimes she hangs out with us. She can be a little odd at times, but she's actually not a bad person.

411381010.speaker: 托特
411381010.content: Sounds like you folks are getting along well. So nothing's bothering you, then?

411381011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411381011.content: Not really... Ningishzida and I often visit Tarina and Ver at the medical center. I've been worried about them for a while, but fortunately we got some good news today.

411381012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411381012.content: Why have we stopped here, Tho-Tho?

411381014.content: Ver walks a little faster, not sure what's going on, and looks in the direction Thoth is pointing to. The pure white space in front of her seems to be covered in double images, and beyond the blurry halo there appears to be a hint of color.

411381015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411381015.content: It feels like the Plane Layer and the Surface Layer have somehow overlapped with each other... Could the Cleansers have entered the Surface Layer from this place?

411381016.speaker: 托特
411381016.content: All it takes is one simple test to find out.

411381017.content: Thoth takes out a pen and simply hurls it into the distorted space, then starts a timer with Ver.

411381018.content: The two experience a brief moment of mild dizziness. They look around, and spot the pen that Thoth just threw out.

411381020.speaker: 托特
411381020.content: The Plane Layer is starting to bleed into the Surface Layer. There's nothing we can do about that, and all we can do is work even harder and perform more cleanups.

411381021.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411381021.content: I don't mind the hard work as long as we can keep the hyperspace going for just a little longer.

411381022.speaker: 托特
411381022.content: Do you have plans with Ningishzida to visit the medical center again?

411381023.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
411381023.content: Yup! Heh, we want to go and see them again when they get a little better.

411381024.speaker: 托特
411381024.content: Well, the treatment plan should work. You should spend whatever time that's left with them.

411391002.speaker: 格莫瑞
411391002.content: Don't you worry. It's all been taken care of.

411391003.content: Turing nods, then looks over at the chess game on the screen. Though it looks like he'd be able to win it within ten moves, he cuts off the power in the house without any hesitation.

411391004.speaker: 格莫瑞
411391004.content:
Are we leaving now?
Then the thing about the medical center...

411391005.speaker: 图灵
411391005.content: There's no need to dwell on that. We've found the thing we've been looking for.

411391006.speaker: 图灵
411391006.content: Who'd have thought that the Origin was trapped inside the seal? So that's why no one's seen it before.

411391008.speaker: 图灵
411391008.content: Even if Gaea does have the ability to do that, it wouldn't have this sort of thought. Otherwise, Modifiers, Visbanes, and you and me... None of us would exist.

411391009.speaker: 图灵
411391009.content: Given CORG's ignorant response, it can't be them either.

411391011.speaker: 图灵
411391011.content: One can count the number of Prime Modifiers on one hand: there's only Odin in Ain Soph, Gengchen in Xu Heng, Brahmā in Shashvat, Amaterasu in Sasanami, Zeus in Omorfies, and...

411391012.content: Turing looks down at his arm and shakes his head.

411391013.speaker: 图灵
411391013.content: The only one whose whereabouts are unaccounted for is Zeus. But I don't believe she's the one who left that seal. This isn't her area of expertise.

411391014.speaker: 图灵
411391014.content: Remember the thing that Novich mentioned? The "Isolation Hold"?

411391015.speaker: 格莫瑞
411391015.content: Are you suggesting that place is...

411391016.speaker: 图灵
411391016.content: It's unlikely. Novich said that the "Isolation Hold exists in the '11th Sephirah Zone' which can only be activated with an intact Sephirah Core."

411391017.speaker: 图灵
411391017.content: I don't believe he'd dare lie about something that's so easy to verify. It's unnecessary for him to do that, too.

411391018.speaker: 格莫瑞
411391018.content: Since he knows so much, we should at least listen to what he says.

411391020.content: After finally checking the room thoroughly for possible leads, Turing opens the door, glances at the lights of the town outside the window, and then looks up at the empty night sky.

411391022.speaker: 图灵
411391022.content: If the Origin first left this place and then became trapped in the Isolation Hold, then we have an explanation for the current situation. But what happened in between would be more complicated than I originally thought.

411391023.speaker: 图灵
411391023.content: Things with the Sephirah Core are proceeding smoothly. Now, all we have to do is find the truth that can connect the past and the present...

411391024.speaker: 图灵
411391024.content: You don't have to follow me since I don't have a clear goal for now.

411391025.speaker: 格莫瑞
411391025.content: Now that my identity's been exposed, there's nowhere else I can go anyway.

411391026.speaker: 图灵
411391026.content: Isn't there anything you wish to do? Apart from living amongst mankind?

411391027.content: Gremory lowers her gaze and ponders for a while. Then, she placidly shakes her head, and opens up a Source Layer crack next to her.

411391029.speaker: 图灵
411391029.content: Then let us keep moving toward the truth. For only the truth treats all existence equally.

411391030.speaker: 图灵
411391030.content: I sense that we aren't too far away from the truth now.

411401001.content: Thoth is standing at the edge of the gradually collapsing hyperspace and looking toward the town square. She can see the complex energy flows spread through the remaining streets along with the two fast-moving figures, staining the gradually fading world like ripples reflecting the sky as they move along.

411401002.speaker: 托特
411401002.content:
It's incredible how much more powerful she is now... even more so than when she was back at Xu Heng.
Might this be the real reason Paracaesar allowed her in here in the first place...?

411401003.content: A shrill notification interrupts Thoth's thoughts. She looks down and sees an incoming call on the terminal. A quick glance at the other party's name, and she quickly straightens out her facial expression.

411401005.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411401005.content: I seem to recall ordering a complete pullout, including that of Verthandi.

411401006.speaker: 托特
411401006.content: And you should be able to see everything that's going on in here. Won't you reconsider rescinding that order?

411401007.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411401007.content: I don't like to use the approach of using results to justify myself. Find a way to stop the battle.

411401008.speaker: 托特
411401008.content: As you know, I have the right to ignore any order that leads to certain death.

411401009.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411401009.content: If you were assigned by Red Fox and Kamau to the Egregious Crimes Department for the purpose of making my life more complicated, I suggest you switch to an easier job.

411401010.speaker: 托特
411401010.content: It's probably better for everyone that you keep thoughts like this to yourself, Director.

411401011.speaker: 托特
411401011.content: And I'm being serious. It appears to me that Ver is now fully capable of dealing with the Controller. So for now safety concerns cannot be the reason for her to pull out from here.

411401012.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411401012.content: You know that the coming of that Controller is just the beginning of other things.

411401013.speaker: 托特
411401013.content: Then at least give her a chance. Let her decide the outcome at this "beginning"... with the Controller, and with herself.

411401014.content: The line goes silent for a moment, as if another pair of eyes are looking at the battle in the distance along with Thoth, across the void.

411401015.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411401015.content: Come back now since you aren't any help there anyway.

411401016.speaker: 托特
411401016.content: Do you need me there for something?

411401017.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411401017.content: We're running low on computing power. Verthandi's forced migration is also ready... But don't worry, we aren't triggering it just yet.

411401018.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411401018.content: I'm the one who'll be answering to Aether Gazer. You must believe that I wouldn't cause her any harm.

411401019.speaker: 帕拉凯瑟
411401019.content: You have 30 seconds. I want to see you emerge from the transportation capsule in the next 30 seconds.

411401020.content: Then the line is cut. Thoth looks at Ver for a few seconds. then calls up the command to return to the Axis World.

411401021.speaker: 托特
411401021.content: ...I'll be waiting for you out there.

411401022.content: A press of a button, and her body turns into a stream of data which then disappears into this broken world...

1109701001.speaker: （休）
1109701001.content: I'm sorry, Admin. There are some formatting issues with this combat report and I need you to work on this again.

1109701002.speaker: （我）
1109701002.content: Oh...? Alright, then. I'll make the necessary changes to it.

1109701003.content: I'd written this report after staying up all night to watch a bunch of combat videos... Maybe I got the formatting wrong because I was so tired.

1109701004.speaker: （休）
1109701004.content: You look like you stayed up till really late... It's time we hire you an assistant...

1109701005.speaker: （休）
1109701005.content: Let's put that report aside for now. Are the meeting materials for today ready? May I take a look at them?

1109701007.speaker: 我
1109701007.content: Oof... Hmph. So it was all just a dream...

1109701008.content: I work hard enough as it is during the day. Can't I relax a little in my dreams...? No, I'm having these dreams because of work.

1109701009.speaker: 我
1109701009.content: (But… I'm heading to Omorfies on a work trip today!)

1109701010.content: I have to pull myself together. I hear that Hades has arranged a dinner for me at the Society of Muses. Mintha and Leuce's cooking is something definitely worth looking forward to.

1109701011.content: Also, I haven't seen Oneiroi for a long time. I wonder if I can get to talk to her before she falls asleep this time, heh...

1109701013.speaker: 琉刻
1109701013.content: Mintha, Lady Hades seems really troubled.

1109701014.speaker: 明塔
1109701014.content: Leuce, as the best maids, we should help lighten Lady Hades's burden.

1109701016.content: I arrive at the Society of Muses at the appointed time. However, the atmosphere here today feels somewhat different from the Society of Muses I'm used to.

1109701017.content: Hades is on the sofa, holding her head and sighing. Her two maids are standing by with expressions more serious than usual.

1109701018.content: And there is Oneiroi, who's holding a paintbrush in front of the canvas. She's either thinking or in a daze.

1109701019.speaker: 我
1109701019.content: Is this a bad time for me to be here...?

1109701020.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109701020.content: No, you came at just the right time, #{nickname}#.

1109701021.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109701021.content: Even the greatest of artists sometimes get mired in their own vision, just like an astronomer who's so focused on a singular astronomical object he loses his eyes on the broader star-filled sky...

1109701023.content: Do all of you Astral Council senators speak like this? Forget it, I should say hello to Oneiroi first. I mean, I don't get to see her awake very often.

1109701025.speaker: 我
1109701025.content: Yeah, it's a gift for you. I came across it at a store in Core City, and I thought the sheep design on the cup looked similar to that sheep of yours, Oneiroi.

1109701026.speaker: 我
1109701026.content: Oh... Do you think it's because Drowsie was in the designer's dreams?

1109701027.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701027.content: Maybe... I've been playing hide-and-seek with Drowsie lately, and it's been getting harder and harder to find it...

1109701028.speaker: 我
1109701028.content: I never knew Drowsie is such a naughty little thing...

1109701029.content: I look at the harmless-looking sheep plush sitting quietly in Oneiroi's arms.

1109701031.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701031.content: It's just that I haven't had time to play with Drowsie lately...

1109701033.speaker: 琉刻
1109701033.content: The young lady has been worried about her painting exam. She's already failed it once. If she fails the make-up exam as well...

1109701036.speaker: 我
1109701036.content: Is that why you've been painting this whole time, Oneiroi?

1109701038.content: Oneiroi nods somewhat dejectedly. I can't help but touch her on the top of her head.

1109701039.speaker: 我
1109701039.content: Well, you sure are being diligent about it at least...

1109701040.speaker: 我
1109701040.content: Could you show me what you're painting?

1109701041.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701041.content: Only if you promise not to laugh at me, #{nickname}#...

1109701042.speaker: 我
1109701042.content: Why would I do that? I promise I won't laugh at you.

1109701043.content: Oneiroi turns the easel with both hands toward me.

1109701045.content: My reaction is no exaggeration at all. I can't help but let out an exclamation the moment I see the painting.

1109701046.speaker: 我
1109701046.content: This is the library at Stellaris Academy, isn't it?

1109701047.content: I recognize the building at first glance since I've been to Stellaris Academy before, and the library with its spire is one of the most iconic buildings of the institution.

1109701048.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701048.content: Yeah. How amazing you recognized it right away, #{nickname}#...

1109701049.speaker: 我
1109701049.content: Nah. I recognized it right away because you painted it well, Oneiroi.

1109701050.content: The brushstrokes on the painting are fine and delicate, and the oils are layered exquisitely to convey light and color. They are a sharp contrast to the young girl who's holding the brush like a crayon in front of her.

1109701051.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701051.content: But... my teacher doesn't think so.

1109701052.speaker: 我
1109701052.content: Huh? And which teacher is that?

1109701053.content: One cannot blame me for getting a little carried away here. Even though I'm not a professional painter, to my eyes this painting is definitely of a very high standard.

1109701054.speaker: 明塔
1109701054.content: It's the young lady's painting teacher.

1109701055.speaker: 琉刻
1109701055.content: It's the teacher who always gives the young lady a failing grade.

1109701056.speaker: 我
1109701056.content: Wha...? I can't possibly see why...

1109701057.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109701057.content: What the teacher said was, Oneiroi's paintings are no longer as imaginative as before.

1109701058.content: I'm still scrambling for something to say when Lady Hades joins the conversation.

1109701059.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109701059.content: In other words, there's no difference between her painting and a photo with boosted saturation and contrast levels.

1109701060.speaker: 我
1109701060.content: Then... if we're to go by what the teacher said, as long as Oneiroi paints like she did before there'll be no problem at all, right?

1109701061.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109701061.content: That's right. But artistic creation isn't something that can be reverted to a previous state simply by wishing it.

1109701062.speaker: 我
1109701062.content: Hmm... Would you show me some of your paintings from before, Oneiroi?

1109701063.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701063.content: Only if you promise... not to laugh at me, #{nickname}#.

1109701064.speaker: 我
1109701064.content: Didn't I say that I wouldn't laugh? And I didn't laugh at you just now, did I?

1109701065.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701065.content: Hmm... Yes, you are a good person who keeps their promises, #{nickname}#.

1109701066.content: Oneiroi then looks up and says earnestly after thinking for a moment. A look at that face would make anyone's heart melt.

1109701067.content: How could anyone in this world give a failing grade to a child like this...? How unreasonable.

1109701069.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701069.content: Ah... You said you wouldn't laugh, #{nickname}#.

1109701070.content: I can't help but "break" my promise as I flip through the portfolio Oneiroi has brought me.

1109701071.speaker: 我
1109701071.content: Oh, but I'm not laughing at you or your work, Oneiroi. I just think your paintings are so interesting and adorable.

1109701072.speaker: 明塔
1109701072.content: What a horrible adult you are. You clearly broke the promise you made to the young lady, and you're still making excuses.

1109701073.speaker: 琉刻
1109701073.content: Mintha is right. You really are a horrible adult.

1109701075.speaker: 我
1109701075.content: I'm sorry, Oneiroi. I shouldn't have chuckled. I am a horrible adult indeed.

1109701076.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701076.content: You aren't a horrible adult, #{nickname}#... I know that.

1109701078.content: What a little angel she is... I stroke Oneiroi's head in admiration, then shift my gaze back to the portfolio in my hand.

1109701080.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701080.content: Yes. The toasted marshmallows will rise into the air and become clouds.

1109701081.speaker: 我
1109701081.content: And that one over there is burnt?

1109701082.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701082.content: Yes. The burnt marshmallows will turn into dark clouds, and then it rains.

1109701083.speaker: 我
1109701083.content: I see. It seems that we have to thank Drowsie for both good and rainy weather.

1109701084.speaker: 我
1109701084.content: Is this painting of... Mintha and Leuce? Why do they look so huge here?

1109701085.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701085.content: Mmm... Because they are the generals of the Demon King's army who're leading an army of puppets from the underworld.

1109701086.speaker: 我
1109701086.content: Huh? Mintha and Leuce are... oh you mean the story in this painting?

1109701087.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701087.content: I should also let you know that the Demon King is Hades.

1109701088.speaker: 我
1109701088.content: Ahahaha, I don't know why this seems surprisingly believable... (Clears throat) I didn't say anything...

1109701089.content: I quickly retract my statement as I can feel a dangerous gaze drilling into me from behind my head. I'm even sweating a little.

1109701090.speaker: 我
1109701090.content: By the way, why would Mintha and Leuce become part of the Demon King's army and attack the castle you and Drowsie are defending?

1109701091.content: I ask as I point at the Oneiroi standing on the city wall with Drowsie on the drawing.

1109701092.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701092.content: Because they want to rob Drowsie and me of our snacks.

1109701093.speaker: 明塔
1109701093.content: Miss Oneiroi, I'm just holding on to your snacks for you while you go to bed at night.

1109701094.speaker: 琉刻
1109701094.content: Ms. Oneiroi, the real demon king's name is Dental Caries.

1109701097.speaker: 我
1109701097.content: I seem to finally understand what the teacher said... If I were to put aside the issues of technique and simply focus on intuitive feeling, I do prefer her earlier paintings too.

1109701098.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109701098.content: Ha, Admin. You do have a certain sense for the aesthetic after all.

1109701100.content: I stroke Oneiroi on the head, now lowered in dejection.

1109701101.speaker: 我
1109701101.content: But since she was able to produce those paintings before... surely she'll be able to do it again if we are to reproduce the conditions of the time...? Maybe?

1109701102.speaker: 我
1109701102.content: How did you come to create all these fun and imaginative paintings, Oneiroi?

1109701103.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701103.content: I was just painting what I saw in my dreams...

1109701104.speaker: 我
1109701104.content: So, why can't you just keep on doing that...?

1109701105.content: An uneasy feeling comes over me. Could it be that...?

1109701106.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701106.content: I don't quite remember the dreams I have these days...

1109701107.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701107.content: The only thing I remember is that the dreams I've been having every night are more or less the same.

1109701109.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109701109.content: Do you want to... take a look for yourself inside Oneiroi's dreams, Admin?

1109701110.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109701110.content: I believe you just might uncover something.

1109701112.content: I can't help but look over at Oneiroi. For something like this, it's necessary that I get the consent of the owner of the dream.

1109701113.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109701113.content: Do you want to come play in my dream, #{nickname}#...?

1109701115.content: I've barely finished speaking when a small hand grabs my sleeve. I look down and see her little face looking up at me.

1109701118.content: My heart seems to be beating fast, and my eyelids are heavy with sleepiness. What is going on...?

1109702002.content: One would have thought I am in a fairytale world. No, this is a fairytale world.

1109702003.content: The "ground" here feels soft and springy with every step I take, as if it's a road paved with bricks made out of popping candy.

1109702004.content: I see the marshmallow clouds that I saw in Oneiroi's portfolio just moments ago. There's a rich and sweet smell, as if they're freshly toasted.

1109702005.content: What has caught my eye the most is the Ferris wheel with no visible frame or axle against the lavender sky. It's like a glowing planet circling the center of the Milky Way.

1109702006.speaker: 我
1109702006.content: I think I understand now why Oneiroi loves to sleep so much...

1109702007.content: Who wouldn't want to sleep 20 hours a day if they could immerse themselves in a place like this in their dreams?

1109702009.content: Oneiroi looks at me with her head tilted to one side in apparent puzzlement.

1109702010.speaker: 我
1109702010.content: Yes, I do. It's like a giant amusement park where you will never get tired of playing.

1109702011.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702011.content: Where I will never get tired of playing... Nope. That's not right.

1109702013.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702013.content: I've been a bit lost about what to do here lately... I'm often so bored that I find myself wanting to sleep…

1109702014.speaker: 我
1109702014.content: How does it feel like to fall asleep inside a dream, I wonder...?

1109702015.content: But how could that be... Would I really feel bored in a dream like this?

1109702016.speaker: 我
1109702016.content: That might be because you've never been to an adult's dream, Oneiroi. That I would call boring.

1109702017.speaker: 我
1109702017.content: While I can't speak for other people, my own dreams, for example, are just a world of black, white, and gray compared to what you have here...

1109702018.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702018.content: I want to see an adult's dream.

1109702020.content: Oneiroi blinks her eyes at me without a trace of sleepiness. In fact, she looks really curious.

1109702021.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702021.content: I want to see the dream of an adult... especially yours, #{nickname}#!

1109702022.speaker: 我
1109702022.content: Maybe next time, when we get the chance, heh... but I think you'll regret it after seeing it, Oneiroi.

1109702023.speaker: 我
1109702023.content: Anyway, I'm here to play with you, Oneiroi. So let's have ourselves some fun!

1109702024.content: Between Oneiroi and I, I'm the more excited child...

1109702025.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702025.content: Sure! What should we play? How about... we start with hide-and-seek?

1109702026.content: Oneiroi holds up her finger in thought for a moment, and finally gives an answer that is far from surprising.

1109702027.speaker: 我
1109702027.content: You really like hide-and-seek don't you, Oneiroi?

1109702028.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702028.content: Okay, go hide yourself, #{nickname}#. I'll be "it."

1109702029.speaker: 我
1109702029.content: Huh? Are you sure? Shouldn't we play rock-paper-scissors to decide who'll be "it"???

1109702030.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702030.content: Nope. Because once I hide myself, you won't be able to find me, #{nickname}#...

1109702031.speaker: 我
1109702031.content: That's true… It's my first time here after all. I'll have done a great job if I don't get lost here by the end of this.

1109702032.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702032.content: Yeah. Alright, now hide yourself, #{nickname}#. You have 60 seconds... One, two, three...

1109702033.content: Oneiroi couldn't wait to announce the start of the game. I chuckle to myself as I watch Oneiroi turn around and cover her eyes with her hands.

1109702034.speaker: 我
1109702034.content: (Alrighty... where should I hide? Where would it be the hardest to find me?)

1109702035.content: After some looking around, I decide to climb up to the attic of the clock tower.

1109702036.content: It's a real picture of whimsy up here. Behind the huge dial, a beautiful star map is rotating quietly, and above me there are tiny stars floating in the air which look like they were cut out of a picture book.

1109702037.speaker: 我
1109702037.content: (What constellation is this… is this the Summer Triangle?)

1109702041.content: Oneiroi's voice sounds out behind me just as I am fully engrossed in the star map behind the dial.

1109702042.content: I am so startled, I almost roll over and fall off the ladder leading to the attic. Thankfully, Oneiroi catches me by the waist from behind.

1109702043.speaker: 我
1109702043.content: Ah, I'm so sorry... I was too caught up in looking at the stars...

1109702044.content: I find myself in a rather awkward position with Oneiroi supporting me from behind. Then, she climbs up to the attic and sits down on the floor, making the space seem a little cramped.

1109702045.speaker: 我
1109702045.content: How did you find me so quickly...?

1109702046.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702046.content: It's because I know every square inch of this place...

1109702047.content: Oneiroi rubs her eyes, as if she's a little bored. The light from the tiny stars is shining down on her rosy cheeks.

1109702048.speaker: 我
1109702048.content: ...You were just lucky! Let's try again!

1109702049.content: For some unknown reason, I've suddenly developed this unwillingness to admit defeat.

1109702050.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702050.content: Will you do a better job of hiding this time, #{nickname}#?

1109702052.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702052.content: And will you promise me not to yell like you did just now, #{nickname}#...?

1109702055.speaker: 我
1109702055.content: (I've been wanting on go on the Ferris wheel for a while. I suppose it'd be hard to spot me from the outside if I were inside a Ferris wheel cabin...?)

1109702056.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702056.content: It is good manners to get off the Ferris wheel after riding one full round, Admin.

1109702058.speaker: 我
1109702058.content: Ah, there's a big box over there that says "Ripe Juicy Mangoes". If I go inside...

1109702061.speaker: 我
1109702061.content: That's right, they say that there's no better way to hide than to hide in plain sight… So if I were to put on that mascot costume, I should be able to blend into the parade…

1109702062.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702062.content: #{nickname}#, you got Kani's signature move wrong.

1109702063.speaker: 我
1109702063.content: Ugh. I should have done my homework...

1109702066.content: As I take off the heavy and stuffy mascot costume, I finally admit defeat.

1109702067.speaker: 我
1109702067.content: Oneiroi, I don't think there's anybody in this world who can beat you in hide-and-seek.

1109702068.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702068.content: ...Which is why nobody comes to play hide-and-seek with me now.

1109702069.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702069.content: I just... know all of this too well.

1109702071.speaker: 我
1109702071.content: I'll come back here to play again, Oneiroi. It's been fun playing hide-and-seek with you.

1109702072.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702072.content: Hmm. Even if... you get caught so quickly?

1109702073.speaker: 我
1109702073.content: It's fun to be caught by you, too Oneiroi! I never know where you'll appear from.

1109702074.speaker: 我
1109702074.content: But I'm really running out of stamina today, so how about we do something easier on the body now?

1109702075.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702075.content: Sure... Something easier on the body... But hide-and-seek is easy.

1109702077.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702077.content: Then what do you want to play, #{nickname}#?

1109702078.speaker: 我
1109702078.content: May I... visit that haunted house rollercoaster ride?

1109702079.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702079.content: Sure, if you wish to go, #{nickname}#...

1109702080.speaker: 我
1109702080.content: Why do I feel like a child who can't be taken along for an adults-only ride? Ahahahaha...

1109702081.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702081.content: Yes, and I'm the adult here! Let's go, #{nickname}#! Let's go take that...

1109702082.content: Oneiroi has suddenly become energetic for some reason. She holds out her hand to me with her chest puffed out like a little adult.

1109702083.speaker: 我
1109702083.content: Mmm. Thank you for taking me along, then... Oneiroi.

1109702085.speaker: 我
1109702085.content: Wow... I can really feel the haunted house atmosphere here...

1109702088.content: Unlike me, who's looking around excitedly, Oneiroi has already quietly settled into her seat with her seat belt fastened. She's now holding on to the safety bar above the seat and ready to go.

1109702089.speaker: 我
1109702089.content: (Oh no, I've really become the kid who's being chaperoned by an adult at the amusement park...)

1109702090.speaker: 我
1109702090.content: Why do you look more like an adult than me, Oneiroi?

1109702091.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702091.content: That's because I am the adult.

1109702093.content: A great big smile appears on the young face. But before my heart has the time to be melted by that lovely smile, the rollercoaster starts to move.

1109702094.content: My heartbeat gradually quickens with the sound of the rollercoaster's wheels rolling rhythmically along the rails. But...

1109702095.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702095.content: There'll be a vampire on the left.

1109702097.content: The rollercoaster car accelerates all of a sudden, and on a wall to our left, just as Oneiroi predicted, a vampire with sharp fangs flashes past.

1109702098.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702098.content: To your front. Here comes the mummy.

1109702100.content: The mummy jumps onto the track, and is then knocked away by the rollercoaster car just before it bites us.

1109702101.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702101.content: Mmm... The clown should be coming up next.

1109702102.content: A clown-shaped balloon wearing a huge top hat rather crookedly appears in front of us, along with some really odd sound effects.

1109702104.content: Oneiroi's predictions have all more or less come true. But...

1109702105.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702105.content: How do you find it? Did I do a good job keeping you safe, #{nickname}#?

1109702106.speaker: 我
1109702106.content: Well, thanks to you, Oneiroi, I didn't get scared at all during the ride... But that seems to miss the point of the haunted house rollercoaster ride somewhat.

1109702108.content: Oneiroi's head is cocked to one side. She's also muttering to himself, as if she's thinking about something.

1109702109.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702109.content: I knew it. This place is no longer fun...

1109702110.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702110.content: That's why I don't remember a thing when I wake up...

1109702112.content: I look at Oneiroi with her downcast eyes and a sense of anxiety comes over me.

1109702113.speaker: 我
1109702113.content: Ah, I could certainly use some food and drink after playing hide-and-seek and riding the rollercoaster. How about we go to a café? Didn't we pass one on the way here? What's it called again...?

1109702115.speaker: 我
1109702115.content: Yep, that's right, that's the one.

1109702116.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702116.content: Okay... Come with me. I'll take you there.

1109702117.content: Thankfully, Oneiroi is a child after all. The adult-sounding task of taking me to the café has swept all the gloom away from her face.

1109702118.content: Even though I feel a little embarrassed, I gladly hold onto her hand.

1109702120.content: I clearly ordered black coffee without sugar or cream in it. But the coffee served up by Mr. White Bear, who's wearing an apron with the word "barista" on it, feels and tastes like a cup of thick syrup.

1109702121.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702121.content: Do you not like your coffee, #{nickname}#...?

1109702124.content: I reach over for Oneiroi's cappuccino. Just one sip later, I understand that my cup is indeed free of added sugar.

1109702125.speaker: 我
1109702125.content: Yours is really sweet too, Oneiroi...

1109702126.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702126.content: Do you not like sweet stuff, #{nickname}#...?

1109702127.speaker: 我
1109702127.content: Mmm, how do I put it...? I think maybe when we grow up and grow older, what we consider as "sweet" also changes?

1109702129.content: A gleam appears in Oneiroi's eyes, probably because of the phrase "grow up."

1109702130.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702130.content: Adults like to drink bitter-tasting beverages, am I right?

1109702131.speaker: 我
1109702131.content: Um... well... That's not quite exactly the case either?

1109702134.content: Oneiroi carefully takes my cup of coffee and takes a big glug of it with an extremely serious look on her face.

1109702137.content: Oneiroi's eyes are closed and her brows, furrowed, as if she's thinking about some difficult and obscure problem.

1109702138.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702138.content: I knew it. It's so bitter...

1109702140.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109702140.content: But if this is the taste that adults like...

1109702143.content: I am dumbfounded by the sight of Oneiroi picking up the cup and knocking back the coffee like a child mustering up the courage to take their medicine.

1109702145.speaker: 我
1109702145.content: You don't have to force yourself to drink this, Oneiroi. You'll grow up in due time...

1109702146.speaker: 我
1109702146.content: (Hmm, but I don't think the appearance of an awakened Modifier will become any more mature over time...?)

1109702147.content: I'm sorry, Oneiroi, I say to myself as I stroke her hair while choosing not to tell her the truth.

1109702149.content: Oneiroi's eyes are closed and her head is moving gently left and right. She's also mumbling as if she's falling asleep.

1109703001.speaker: 休
1109703001.content: Admin, the assistant I hired for you has reported for work today.

1109703003.speaker: 休
1109703003.content: Given your workload and the importance of your work, the management feels it necessary to take some of the pressure off you.

1109703005.speaker: 休
1109703005.content: You should help her familiarize herself with the job as soon as possible. And don't forget your tasks for this week.

1109703006.speaker: 我
1109703006.content: (Isn't this adding to my workload instead???)

1109703007.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703007.content: Hello! I look forward to working with you...

1109703009.speaker: 我
1109703009.content: Oneiroi, would you pinch me on the arm please?

1109703010.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703010.content: Huh? Is this part of the assistant's job too?

1109703011.content: Oneiroi looks at me in puzzlement, her head tilting to one side.

1109703012.speaker: 我
1109703012.content: Not really... I just want to check if I'm dreaming.

1109703013.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703013.content: Ah... You'll wake up once you find out that you're in a dream, #{nickname}#... Would that be alright?

1109703015.content: I instinctively refuse to wake up from the dream. Of course, it's not because I like my work too much, but because...

1109703016.speaker: 我
1109703016.content: Oneiroi as my assistant... If this is a dream, I really hope I'll never wake up from it...

1109703017.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703017.content: If that's what you really want, #{nickname}#, it's not impossible...

1109703018.speaker: 我
1109703018.content: Heh, there's no need for us to go so far. Besides, everyone will get really worried if I don't wake up...

1109703019.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703019.content: So, what does an assistant do? What should I do?

1109703020.content: Oneiroi isn't really paying attention to what I'm saying. Instead, she's looking here and there in my office, seemingly eager to start work.

1109703021.speaker: 我
1109703021.content: Hmm, let me see... Today I have to organize the combat videos from the last mission and then send the files to everyone's terminals.

1109703022.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703022.content: Is this what you call a "terminal"...?

1109703023.speaker: 我
1109703023.content: That's right. Okay, I'll send you everyone's contact info so you can save it in yours... Okay, done.

1109703024.content: The transfer process is completed almost instantly as I simply copy the address book from my terminal to hers.

1109703025.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703025.content: Will I be able to use this to contact Hades and the others...?

1109703026.content: Oneiroi looks at the terminal, deep in thought.

1109703027.speaker: 我
1109703027.content: Mmm... Why don't you give it a try?

1109703028.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109703028.content: What? You're now working as the Administrator's assistant at Aether Gazer?

1109703029.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703029.content: Yeah! I'm at work today like an adult...

1109703030.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109703030.content: Heh, break a leg, Oneiroi. Be the most capable assistant you can be!

1109703031.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703031.content: Okay! I'll be the most cable assistant I can be, Hades...

1109703032.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703032.content: So, what exactly is a "cable assistant"?

1109703033.speaker: 我
1109703033.content: Heh, she meant "capable." Simply put, it means someone who is able to do their work the way they've been asked to.

1109703034.content: After proudly assuring Hades of her competence, Oneiroi turns around and asks me.

1109703035.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703035.content: Hmm... That's what I thought more or less. Yeah.

1109703036.speaker: 我
1109703036.content: Look at you, Oneiroi. You're really an adult now.

1109703037.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703037.content: Mmhmm... So, let's get started on the assistant's job!

1109703038.speaker: 我
1109703038.content: You're really motivated... just like when I first started working here.

1109703039.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703039.content: Are you saying you aren't motivated at work now, #{nickname}#?

1109703040.speaker: 我
1109703040.content: AHAHAHAHAHA.... Shh... I mustn't let Miss Shu hear this.

1109703041.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703041.content: Don't tell me you're one of those deadbeat adults, #{nickname}#???

1109703042.speaker: 我
1109703042.content: Not at all! And where did you hear the term "deadbeat" from???

1109703044.speaker: 我
1109703044.content: I see... Anyway, you'll soon understand why so many adults hate work...

1109703045.speaker: 我
1109703045.content: Oof... We've been working for an hour without realizing it. Do you want to take a break?

1109703046.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703046.content: I don't need a break yet... This is so fun!

1109703048.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703048.content: This is a perfect Extremity Dodge... Filing in the "Verthandi-Dodge-Success" folder...

1109703049.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703049.content: Hmm, Ver was knocked down here. It must have hurt... Filing under "Verthandi-Dodge-Fail"...

1109703050.speaker: 我
1109703050.content: Looks like you already got the hang of the task, Oneiroi. But it's also important that you get enough rest at work...

1109703051.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703051.content: Lil' Osi's Ultimate Skill is so cool! I wonder if I can learn such a powerful move, since we have the same build... Oh no, I almost forgot to classify it!

1109703053.content: I never expected Oneiroi to be so enthusiastic about this video sorting task, a task that has given me the yawns just about every day.

1109703054.speaker: 我
1109703054.content: (Looks like I really have found a capable assistant...)
