1109703055.speaker: 我
1109703055.content: Since Oneiroi is working so hard, I have to work harder too!

1109703056.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
1109703056.content: Combat videos received! Thank you for your hard work, Admin, and Admin's assistant!

1109703057.speaker: 奥西里斯
1109703057.content: Thank you to Admin and Admin's assistant! I'm not sure if you'll like it, lil' assistant, but here's a little origami fox I folded! Consider it a souvenir from Aether Gazer...

1109703058.speaker: 霍德尔
1109703058.content: T-thank you, you two! (Whimpers) I made so many mistakes this time... I'll watch the videos carefully to learn from this experience!

1109703060.speaker: 我
1109703060.content: Are you happy, Oneiroi? To be thanked by everyone?

1109703061.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703061.content: I am happy... So work is such a happy thing...

1109703062.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703062.content: How sly adults are. To gatekeep work from us.

1109703063.speaker: 我
1109703063.content: Heh... Then, feel free to be a sly adult like us for the rest of the day, Oneiroi! How about that?

1109703065.content: Oneiroi looks up at me and flashes me a sunflower-like smile that I've never seen before in her own dreams.

1109703066.speaker: 我
1109703066.content: But hey, work is not all it is to adult life.

1109703067.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703067.content: Oh? What else is there then...?

1109703068.speaker: 我
1109703068.content: For example, there's also... Afternoon tea! One perk of working at Aether Gazer Division Nine is that there's free afternoon tea every day at 3 o'clock.

1109703069.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703069.content: Afternoon tea... Mintha and Leuce make very good afternoon tea. Is there afternoon tea here too?

1109703070.speaker: 我
1109703070.content: Uh huh. It may be a little different from what Mintha and Leuce and the others make, but... Do you want to try it, Oneiroi?

1109703071.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703071.content: A different sort of afternoon tea... Sure.

1109703072.speaker: 我
1109703072.content: Then let's keep working! If we can finish our tasks for today by 3 o'clock, we'll be able to enjoy afternoon tea on Aether Gazer's terrace in the sky while looking at Ain Soph's skyline and streets at the same time...

1109703073.speaker: 我
1109703073.content: Although to be honest I don't think that's very likely...

1109703074.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703074.content: But it's still possible, isn't it #{nickname}#? Because today you have your cable assistant with you!

1109703076.speaker: 休
1109703076.content: Admin, it's time to meet with Winter Squad for the mission, but neither of them has shown up yet. Have you contacted them?

1109703078.speaker: 休
1109703078.content: Then please find a way to contact Winter Squad as soon as possible. I'll try to push back the mission departure time on my end.

1109703081.speaker: 我
1109703081.content: That's Vidar and Leviathan. There may only be the two of them in the squad, but they work well together as they're master and student.

1109703082.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703082.content: Plus, they're both from the polar region. So, they're our top candidates for any missions we have in colder climes.

1109703083.speaker: 我
1109703083.content: Oh wow. You already memorized all the information I gave you this morning. That's amazing!

1109703084.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703084.content: Mmhmm! I also remember that Overture Squad consists of Verthandi and Lil' Osi; Ookuninushi and Heimdall are the core members of the Cryptics; and the sole member of Undertaker Squad is Hel...

1109703085.speaker: 我
1109703085.content: That is all correct! Wow! You're my "cable assistant" indeed!

1109703087.content: Although Oneiroi is acting a little shyly, the elation on written on her face is hard to hide.

1109703088.speaker: 我
1109703088.content: So our mission now is to locate Winter Squad. They haven't shown up to the mission meeting as agreed probably because Fenrir went missing or something...

1109703090.speaker: 我
1109703090.content: Oh, that might not have been in the dossier. Fenrir is their sled dog. They say that he's been with them in the polar regions since before they joined Aether Gazer.

1109703091.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703091.content: ...So, the Admin job also includes tracking down lost puppies too...?

1109703092.content: I look at Oneiroi, again with her head tilted to one side, with some puzzlement.

1109703093.speaker: 我
1109703093.content: The job of the Administrator is to provide support and assistance to the Modifiers of Division Nine. So in this sense, it is indeed the job of the Admin...

1109703094.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703094.content: So Admin's job is very much like the assistant's job!

1109703095.speaker: 我
1109703095.content: Ha, I knew I could always count on you.

1109703097.speaker: 利维坦
1109703097.content: Mission...? Oh that's right, today is the day Master and I are supposed to go on a mission!

1109703098.speaker: 我
1109703098.content: Since you remember, get yourselves here as soon as you——

1109703099.speaker: 利维坦
1109703099.content: Admin, I need your help over here right now! Master, she's having a fever again!!!

1109703101.speaker: 维达尔
1109703101.content: ...I'm sorry for dropping the ball at a time like this.

1109703102.speaker: 我
1109703102.content: No, this isn't your fault, Vidar.

1109703103.speaker: 利维坦
1109703103.content: Admin, could we ask Ookuninushi to repair the chip in Master's body just like the last time? Would that help Master recover?

1109703104.speaker: 我
1109703104.content: Yeah, that should work... But even if we were to ask the Cryptics to start repairing the temperature control chip right now, it'll take at least a day or two to finish. That means the mission——

1109703105.speaker: 利维坦
1109703105.content: Hey! Can't you get another squad to take over the mission! Just look at Master now! Or I can go alone! Ah, but we'll still need someone to take care of Master...

1109703109.content: Oneiroi and I scramble to soothe Leviathan, who looks like she's about to bug out.

1109703110.speaker: 我
1109703110.content: This mission is in the polar region, which is the home turf for you and Vidar. Besides, the other squads are also busy...

1109703111.speaker: 维达尔
1109703111.content: I'm fine. I should be able to take on the mission...

1109703112.speaker: 利维坦
1109703112.content: I don't care! I won't allow you to go on a mission when you're sick!

1109703113.content: I am in agreement with Leviathan here. You should not force yourself to go on the mission when you're unwell, Vidar.

1109703114.speaker: 我
1109703114.content: (It'll take some time to fix the chip, so I should contact Miss Shu now to get some help...)

1109703115.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109703115.content: I think there might be a way...

1109704001.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704001.content: I think there might be a way...

1109704002.content: I hear a surprising interjection just as I pull out my terminal to contact Miss Shu.

1109704003.speaker: 利维坦
1109704003.content: Really??? Do you really have a way to help my Master...??? Wow!!!

1109704005.content: Before I can even open my mouth to inquire further, Leviathan has already rushed toward Oneiroi excitedly. Unfortunately, she stumbles, and this almost causes the both of them to fall to the ground.

1109704006.speaker: 我
1109704006.content: I understand how you feel, Leviathan. But you have to be a bit more careful.

1109704007.content: I hurriedly extend both my arms to support the two flailing girls. Even I am surprised at my reaction speed and skills.

1109704009.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704009.content: It's alright. Tenny and I are fine... Thanks, #{nickname}#.

1109704010.speaker: 我
1109704010.content: That's okay. Like I said, the job of the Admin is to provide support to the Modifiers. Physical support is of course also included.

1109704012.content: The two girls look up at me at the same time without saying a word. Their big, sparkling eyes are flickering at the same frequency, making them look like twins.

1109704013.speaker: 我
1109704013.content: ...What is it? Is there something on my face?

1109704014.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704014.content: Tenny, Hera says that adults can be quite pretentious and pompous sometimes.

1109704015.speaker: 利维坦
1109704015.content: Mmhmm! I've seen that before myself.

1109704016.speaker: 我
1109704016.content: Oh, for goodness' sake, the two of you... Never mind that for now. Oneiroi, you just said you might have a way. What is it?

1109704017.speaker: 利维坦
1109704017.content: Yeah, yeah, what is it? What is it??

1109704018.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704018.content: Um... stop shaking me like this, Tenny... (Clears throat)

1109704019.speaker: 维达尔
1109704019.content: Leviathan, no one can say anything if you're acting like this...

1109704020.content: Together, Vidar and I slowly pull the overexcited Leviathan off Oneiroi and hold her in place so that Oneiroi can start talking.

1109704021.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704021.content: Vidar, do you feel sleepy right now?

1109704023.content: Vidar tilts her head in confusion at the question. And she's not the only one who's confused here.

1109704024.speaker: 利维坦
1109704024.content: Master keeps very regular hours, and she doesn't have the bad habit of staying up late. So she never ever feels sleepy in the afternoon.

1109704025.speaker: 维达尔
1109704025.content: I'm not sure if it's because of my elevated body temp, but I do feel a little sleepy…

1109704026.speaker: 利维坦
1109704026.content: Um... did Leviathan actually get this question in the Great Master Quiz wrong?!

1109704027.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704027.content: If you do feel sleepy right now, the problem will be easy to solve I think.

1109704028.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704028.content: Please lie down on a bed, Vidar, and fall asleep as fast as you can...

1109704030.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704030.content: Mmhmm. It's probably what you're thinking of, #{nickname}#.

1109704031.speaker: 利维坦
1109704031.content: Huh? What are you people saying? Why is it that I'm not getting a single word here? Huh...?

1109704032.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704032.content: I want to go inside Vidar's dream and bring out an undamaged chip from there.

1109704033.speaker: 利维坦
1109704033.content: Huh??? Can you actually do that? You're amazing, Oneiroi!!!

1109704034.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704034.content: It's only possible because the chip is relatively small... If it were something bigger, it'd be a very dangerous thing to do...

1109704036.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704036.content: Also. Please... keep this a secret. You can't tell anybody about this.

1109704037.speaker: 利维坦
1109704037.content: Yeah, I promise I won't tell anybody!

1109704038.content: Looking at the two girls with their pinky promise, I feel a bit relaxed at this sight.

1109704039.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704039.content: The same goes for you, #{nickname}#. You can't tell anyone about this. Especially Hades...

1109704040.speaker: 我
1109704040.content: Alright. I'll pinky-swear to it too then.

1109704041.content: Oneiroi stares at my outstretched hand, ponders for a moment, and then firmly hooks her tender little finger onto mine.

1109704042.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704042.content: Promise me that you will keep what happens today a secret, #{nickname}#...

1109704043.speaker: 我
1109704043.content: I promise I'll keep what happens today a secret.

1109704044.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704044.content: And you must also promise that you'll keep playing with me in the future.

1109704045.speaker: 我
1109704045.content: Surely there's no need to pinky-swear for this... But I have to ask you, has it really been fun for you? I mean, it's just the life of an office slave you're experiencing with me...

1109704047.content: I can feel the hook on my last finger getting stronger in an instant. I smile in resignation and then solemnly make my promise.

1109704048.speaker: 我
1109704048.content: I promise that I will continue to play with Oneiroi in the future. For the next 100 years at least!!!

1109704049.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704049.content: For the 100 years at least... heh heh...

1109704050.content: Oneiroi murmurs these words to herself, and a look of contentment gradually appears on her face.

1109704051.content: The other girl next to her, on the other hand, has other ideas.

1109704052.speaker: 利维坦
1109704052.content: May I go inside Master's dream too?

1109704053.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704053.content: Mmm... as long as the owner of the dream doesn't find out...

1109704054.speaker: 我
1109704054.content: Would that be hard for you to do, Leviathan?

1109704055.speaker: 利维坦
1109704055.content: Not at all! I'll be good. Master won't notice that I'm there!

1109704056.speaker: 我
1109704056.content: Looking at how excited you already are now...

1109704058.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704058.content: Well... come with us then, Tenny. May we do that, #{nickname}#?

1109704059.speaker: 我
1109704059.content: Hmm? Well, you're the one who's making the dreamscape, Oneiroi. I leave it to you to decide.

1109704060.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704060.content: But I'm your assistant right now, #{nickname}#.

1109704061.speaker: 我
1109704061.content: Then, I trust your judgement, Oneiroi. After all, you're my most capable assistant.

1109704063.content: Oneiroi nods vigorously at my words. Then, with an extremely serious expression, she proclaims the start of the dream-making.

1109704064.content: I have to say, while Oneiroi's decision may have been made out of kindness, it was also an extremely correct one.

1109704065.content: Although we aren't familiar with Vidar's dream environment or her habits, but thanks to Leviathan, we are able to approach Vidar without being discovered.

1109704066.content: Then, just as Vidar is busy with Fenrir, she quietly creeps up on her from behind and renders her unconscious with an anesthesia gun, then removes the temperature control chip from her body.

1109704067.speaker: 利维坦
1109704067.content: (Whimpers) I'm so sorry, Master... But this is all for the good of the real one out there...

1109704068.content: Then, she wanders around in her master's dream, making sure to check out every nook and cranny. It is a long time before she leaves reluctantly. But that's another story for later.

1109704069.speaker: 我
1109704069.content: (Sighs) We missed afternoon tea after all...

1109704070.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704070.content: Is there a particular time for afternoon tea?

1109704071.speaker: 我
1109704071.content: Not really. But the food and drinks can run out. So if you show up too late, you're likely to be disappointed.

1109704072.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704072.content: We were in the dream for too long...

1109704073.speaker: 我
1109704073.content: Yeah. I still don't know if it was the right decision to take Leviathan inside with us, ha.

1109704074.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704074.content: But it was so fun, and we were so happy...

1109704075.speaker: 我
1109704075.content: That's right. It's been a while since I last felt this happy at work. And this is all thanks to you, Oneiroi.

1109704077.content: Oneiroi doesn't reply. I turn around and see that her attention is now on a device in the corner of the lounge bar.

1109704079.speaker: 我
1109704079.content: Oh, that's a cookie machine I bought not too long ago. It's the latest model.

1109704080.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704080.content: A cookie... machine? So I can make cookies using just that?

1109704082.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704082.content: But when you make cookies, don't you have to use a cookie cutter on the dough… place the cookies on a baking sheet, then bake the cookies in the oven?

1109704083.speaker: 我
1109704083.content: Yeah, you folks in Omorfies are still using the more traditional method. Want to see some Ain Soph magic, Oneiroi? You know, to make up for missing out on afternoon tea?

1109704085.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704085.content: So I tap here first, then here, am I right?

1109704086.speaker: 我
1109704086.content: Not bad, Oneiroi. Looks like you already got the hang of it.

1109704087.content: As I watch Oneiroi busily tap away on the operating screen with her tiny fingers from the side with my arms folded, I feel like a parent watching a child trying to cook for the first time.

1109704088.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704088.content: What flavor do you like for your cookies, #{nickname}#?

1109704089.speaker: 我
1109704089.content: What, me? You should just make something you like, Oneiroi.

1109704090.content: But Oneiroi shakes her head in response.

1109704091.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704091.content: I want to make something you'd like, #{nickname}#, because...

1109704092.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704092.content: It's been a while since I had so much fun, and it's all thanks to you, #{nickname}#. In my dreams——

1109704093.content: Oneiroi suddenly puts her hand to her mouth, as if she's accidentally let something slip. She looks at me cautiously.

1109704095.content: I feel rather uneasy. It's as if a balloon has just been pricked burst somewhere I can't see.

1109704097.content: Well, since Oneiroi said so, I could certainly ignore it—or so I think.

1109704098.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704098.content: Anyway... I'm so thankful to you, #{nickname}#. Thanks to you, I get to experience for myself the "work" that adults do...

1109704099.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704099.content: It's made me realize that work is about providing help to others, and receiving gratitude and happiness…

1109704100.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704100.content: So, you deserve a reward, #{nickname}#! Choose a flavor, #{nickname}#.

1109704102.content: Can adults really accept rewards as freely as children do?

1109704104.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704104.content: Huh? I thought you didn't like sweet stuff, #{nickname}#?

1109704105.speaker: 我
1109704105.content: It's not that I don't like it. It's the adults who don't like it. Now I like sweet things just like you, Oneiroi.

1109704107.speaker: 我
1109704107.content: Huh? Are the cookies done already? I knew I made the right decision by buying the latest model... Thank you.

1109704108.content: I reach out my hand, but Oneiroi doesn't place a cookie on my open palm.

1109704112.content: Oneiroi reaches to me to place the cookie in my mouth. Though it feels a little awkward, I give up all thought of resistance.

1109704114.content: Like a child, I open my mouth wide obediently. The girl opposite me smiles in satisfaction.

1109704115.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704115.content: Heh... How is it? Is it yummy, #{nickname}#?

1109704117.content: The sweetness of the chocolate and the aroma of freshly baked cookies fills my palate, leaving me with no reaction other than amazement.

1109704118.content: A small, happy smile is reflected in my widened eyes.

1109704119.speaker: 我
1109704119.content: You must be a baking prodigy, Oneiroi. I mean, your first attempt at making cookies has turned out to be so delicious.

1109704120.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704120.content: That's because I'm your cable assistant, #{nickname}#!

1109704122.speaker: ？？？
1109704122.content: Is there anything I can help you with...?

1109704123.content: Unexpectedly, the repeated use of the phrase "assistant" has triggered something in the Aether Gazer service AGI Mecha, and it is now gliding toward us with red and blue indicator lights flashing.

1109704125.content: We look at each other and burst out laughing at the same time, almost choking on our cookies as a result. Maybe the mecha can fetch us both a glass of juice after all...

1109704126.speaker: 我
1109704126.content: Ha... I have never been so happy while at work. It's like I'm in a dream or something...

1109704128.content: It's like a school of fish has sudden entered a cold ocean current, or like the fragments of a comet suddenly passing through a window in the night. An indescribable sense of incongruence attacks my nerves.

1109704131.speaker: 我
1109704131.content: (What is happening to me...? Did I say something wrong???)

1109704132.content: I struggle to suppress the dizziness that I'm feeling and regain my composure. However, my field of vision is growing white from the edges, as if I'm looking at an overexposed photo.

1109704133.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704133.content: This is your dream, #{nickname}#, and I wasn't the one who woke you... You were the one who wanted to wake up, #{nickname}#...

1109704135.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704135.content: But it's alright, #{nickname}#. Don't be afraid...

1109704136.content: Someone is holding me by the hand. It's a soft touch that feels oh-so-warm even as my consciousness gradually blurs.

1109704137.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704137.content: Don't be afraid... Even if you forget this dream later, #{nickname}#, I'll help you recall it...

1109704138.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704138.content: Bye bye, #{nickname}#... You must come and play with me again next time. It's a promise...

1109704139.content: Her voice grows increasingly distant until it disappears like a floating feather.

1109704143.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109704143.content: Wow, that must have been quite the nap you just had, Admin! You're at the Society of Muses. Where else could you be???

1109704145.content: I take a good hard look around me. I am indeed lying on the sofa at the Society of Muses, and there's a gorgeous chandelier right above my head. And—Lady Hades is looking at me with a look of amusement on her face.

1109704146.speaker: 我
1109704146.content: How did I fall asleep...? I remember I was looking at Oneiroi's portfolio, and then...

1109704147.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109704147.content: And then you were probably affected by Oneiroi's sleepiness and ended up mirroring it, then fell asleep on the sofa with her as you were looking at the portfolio.

1109704149.content: I can only accept what Lady Hades says for now. After all, there's no other reasonable explanation. However, I have a niggling feeling that there's something important I've forgotten——

1109704150.speaker: 我
1109704150.content: Ah! I was helping Oneiroi figure out how to pass the painting exam, wasn't I???

1109704151.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109704151.content: If you're talking about that, the matter has been resolved.

1109704152.speaker: 哈迪斯
1109704152.content: Oneiroi woke up just before you did, and she's already hard at work at her easel. It looks like she found some precious inspiration in her dream just now.

1109704153.speaker: 我
1109704153.content: Is that so...? I should go take a look...

1109704154.content: I am barely off the sofa when I hear the sound of feet thumping down the stairs.

1109704155.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704155.content: Hey, #{nickname}#, you're awake... Good morning! Even if it's evening time now...

1109704157.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704157.content: Did you have a good nap, #{nickname}#?

1109704158.speaker: 我
1109704158.content: Yes, I did sleep rather soundly... It feels like I had a very relaxing dream, so wonderful, like I entered someone else's dream within my dream... Oh by the way, Oneiroi, it seems like you were also——Um!!!

1109704159.content: Oneiroi rushes into my arms all of a sudden, which really surprises me.

1109704160.speaker: 俄尼里伊
1109704160.content: Shh... That's a secret, #{nickname}#. You promised not to tell anybody!

1109704161.speaker: 我
1109704161.content: Huh. That sounds rather familiar, now that you mention it...

1109704162.content: I stroke Oneiroi's soft hair, and slowly, some vague memories, like floating glowing feathers, land cleanly onto my palm.

1109704163.speaker: 我
1109704163.content: It's a secret between you and me, Oneiroi, and it's about the dreams.

412011002.speaker: ？？？
412011002.content: What is it? Don't all fairy tales start with this sort of opening line?

412011003.speaker: ？？？
412011003.content: As long as the story is situated far enough away from the present, people won't care if the story is true or false. If you just say "a long, long time ago" without saying how long exactly, those people who usually love poring over the details won't care either.

412011004.speaker: ？？？
412011004.content: In short, what I want to tell you today is a story about growing up. As for our protagonist...

412011005.speaker: ？？？
412011005.content: Ha, they're just an adorable child who loves to dream.

412011007.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412011007.content: Hmm, I think I fell asleep by accident...?

412011009.content: Oneiroi turns over in a daze. This places a sudden squeeze on Drowsie, which she is holding in her arms, and the resulting cry wakes her up instantly.

412011010.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412011010.content: Oh, I'm so sorry Drowsie. I didn't know you're here.

412011013.content: Oneiroi sits up and looks at Drowsie, who is pacing in a circle anxiously.

412011014.content: Something seems to be glittering in Drowsie's fleece. Oneiroi takes a closer look, and sees that the glint is very similar to the reflection one sometimes sees on candy wrappers. But before Oneiroi can see more clearly, Drowsie runs away.

412011015.speaker: 小困
412011015.content: Zzz... zzzzz... (Things have become rather odd!!!)

412011016.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412011016.content: What is rather odd? Hold on, Drowsie! Where are you going???

412011017.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412011017.content: That's weird. And where am I...?

412011018.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412011018.content: I seem to be in a dream... But it also feels like I'm not. Were there two suns in the sky before?

412011019.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412011019.content: No, I must find Drowsie first. Or has Drowsie already returned home?

412011020.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412011020.content: Madam Housekeeper should be waiting for me too... The Sweet Dream House is along the third row on the left, under the 24th star.

412011022.content: Oneiroi starts pointing at the giant screen full of stars above her as she counts.

412011024.content: She stops counting abruptly. A few rounds of restarting from zero later, the result remains the same: there's no 24th star along the third row on the left-hand side of the sky.

412011027.content: Oneiroi takes a single step forward, but stumbles and nearly trips over something under her foot. She steadies herself with some difficulty, raises her foot, and looks down.

412011029.content: There are, in fact, several pieces of candy scattered on the ground, and in the sunlight, they've formed a glittering line. The glint here is similar to what Oneiroi saw on Drowsie's fleece earlier.

412011030.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412011030.content: Did Madam Housekeeper give these to me?

412011031.content: The housekeeper could have given these to her on the sly before she left the last time. For some reason, she's always giving Oneiroi candy in the sneakiest of ways rather than just giving her the treats outright.

412011032.content: Putting the question of the origin of the extra candy aside, Oneiroi realizes that she doesn't know the way back home from this place.

412011034.content: Oneiroi runs and runs, but ends up bumping into what feels like a wall. She looks up and sees that the "wall" is actually an armor-clad soldier with a giant poker card on his head.

412011036.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412011036.content: Oh, um, hello... Have you seen a sheep about this big come this way by any chance?

412011038.content: The Poker Soldier raises the plushie in his hand.

412011040.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412011040.content: Drowsie! Why do you have Drowsie???

412011041.speaker: 扑克士兵A
412011041.content: It's such a wonderful and rare thing! Our mistress will be so happy when we give it to her.

412011042.speaker: 扑克士兵B
412011042.content: You know, this little girl looks kind of familiar. Is she the one on that wanted poster?

412011043.speaker: 扑克士兵A
412011043.content: Wow, you're right. We really are in luck today. Let's grab them both and present them to our mistress.

412013001.speaker: ？？？
412013001.content: You jerk! Why have you abducted my child?

412013003.content: The soft and woolly creature standing in front of Oneiroi appears enraged, and keeps ramming at her with her body.

412013004.content: However, her fleece is so fluffy and soft that the admittedly fierce attacks feel no different from bouncing off a soft mattress again and again.

412013006.speaker: ？？？
412013006.content: Looks like you're a child yourself too! Where are your parents? Why did you abduct my Lamby? What exactly do you want???

412013008.speaker: 羊妈妈
412013008.content: Stop denying it. The one in your hand is my...

412013009.speaker: 羊妈妈
412013009.content: Hmm, hold on... I don't think my Lamby is as white, or as black...

412013010.content: Oneiroi, still not quite sure what's going on, lifts up Drowsie so that the mama sheep can have a better look.

412013011.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412013011.content: Are you talking about this? This is Drowsie, one of my best friends. I'm sorry but I didn't understand a word you said...

412013012.content: The mama sheep looks up at the half-black and half-white lamb and studies it for a while. A look of embarrassment appears on her face.

412013013.speaker: 羊妈妈
412013013.content: No, no, I should be the one saying sorry... "Drowsie," that's a cute name.

412013014.speaker: 羊妈妈
412013014.content:
Drowsie looks so much like my own child that I thought you'd abducted him.
But why were you fighting with those soldiers just now? And how did they all lose to you...?

412013015.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412013015.content: They wanted to take me away, and I don't want to be taken away... That's all.

412013016.speaker: 羊妈妈
412013016.content: So they are the baddies. I really made a mistake back there.

412013018.speaker: 羊妈妈
412013018.content: I don't think so. But he left home without telling me.

412013019.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412013019.content: What does he look like? Maybe I can help find him.

412013020.speaker: 羊妈妈
412013020.content: He looks very much like me. The color of his fleece and his appearance are both very similar to mine, only that he's smaller.

412013021.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412013021.content: Okay... I'll keep an eye out for him then.

412013022.speaker: 羊妈妈
412013022.content: Oh, what's your name by the way? Seems rude of me to talk to you for so long without asking.

412013024.speaker: 羊妈妈
412013024.content: "Oneiroi"... It's rather difficult to pronounce, but when you do pronounce it, it feels as cozy as a marshmallow melting in your mouth...

412013025.speaker: 羊妈妈
412013025.content:
But why are you out here on your own, Oneiroi? Where are your parents? And where are you going?
If you're in some sort of trouble, just tell me. Maybe I can help. You're still a child, so don't try to handle everything by yourself.

412013026.content: The mama sheep lobs too many words and questions at Oneiroi all at the same time, causing her to stand there in a daze for a moment.

412012002.content: It's only after quite a bit of exertion by Oneiroi that the bricks holding down the rather big fellow come off it.

412012003.speaker: ？？？
412012003.content: Thank you so much. Now, I'd like to ask you and Ms. Woolly over here to stand back a little, lest I end up hurting you by accident.

412012004.speaker: 羊妈妈
412012004.content: "Ms. Woolly"? I rather like this name.

412012006.content: The giant creature was unable to move earlier as its joints were previously held down by the bricks. Now that Oneiroi has removed these weights, it's able to break through the remaining restraints around it with a few swings of its arms.

412012007.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412012007.content: Mmm... Doesn't it hurt to do that?

412012008.speaker: 机器人
412012008.content: I'm a robot, which means that I don't have any sensory systems, including that for pain. And giving me a sense of pain would raise a host of moral and ethical questions, which is why people don't usually give robots sensory systems at the time of manufacture.

412012010.speaker: 机器人
412012010.content: So I don't hurt at all, beep beep.

412012011.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412012011.content: That's good to know. And why are you here?

412012012.speaker: 机器人
412012012.content: I'm afraid I can't answer your question because my thought thinking module is missing. You can understand it as... I don't have a brain.

412012013.speaker: 羊妈妈
412012013.content: But how can you move if you don't have a brain? I don't even think people can survive without one.

412012014.speaker: 机器人
412012014.content: Like I said, I'm a robot. I work differently from ordinary people. The lack of a brain isn't really a big deal since all I need are programs telling me how to operate.

412012016.speaker: 机器人
412012016.content: Having said that, I'd prefer to get my brain—no, my thought thinking module back. There must be something important in it.

412012017.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412012017.content: But how do you look for something when you don't even remember how you lost it?

412012018.speaker: 机器人
412012018.content: I'm unable to provide you with a definitive answer for now. But my information retrieval module is proof that as long as we find the Dream Master, we can find the answer that we want.

412012019.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412012019.content: "Dream Master"... it feels like I've heard this phrase before... Do you want to come with us then?

412012021.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412012021.content: We're going to the Sweet Dream House.

412012022.speaker: 机器人
412012022.content: Location name not found in database. Please define the location "Sweet Dream House."

412012023.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412012023.content: Mr. Robot keeps saying things that I don't understand...

412012024.speaker: 羊妈妈
412012024.content: The "Sweet Dream House" is a house that's made of cookies and candy. However, in order to get there, we first have to find a long, long gallery.

412012025.speaker: 机器人
412012025.content: ...That sounds like a rather wonderful place, beep beep. Who knows, maybe the Dream Master likes to hang out there too.

412021001.content: The robot says that its memory module is still intact, and that there's some map information in it. So, instead of relying on the vague memories of the mama sheep, it's probably a better idea to use hard data.

412021002.content: And so, the group moves off according to the robot's directions, and ends up walking in circles around the houses.

412021003.content: Oneiroi isn't too worried though, because the sun remains high overhead. This means that she still has plenty of time.

412021004.content: ...But that's assuming that things are working normally. Oneiroi looks up at the two suns in the sky, and suddenly a frightening thought pops up in her mind:

412021005.content: What if the suns are broken? What would that mean?

412021006.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021006.content: How much longer do we have to walk, Mr. Robot?

412021007.speaker: 机器人
412021007.content: We have to take a right turn at this intersection, beep beep...

412021008.speaker: 羊妈妈
412021008.content: But the last time we were at this intersection, we took a right turn, and we ended up back here anyway.

412021009.content: As they pass the same clock tower for the third time, the mama sheep insists on taking the route she remembers, and they finally get to their destination.

412021010.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021010.content: Yes, this is the place! Thank you, Mama Sheep.

412021011.speaker: 羊妈妈
412021011.content: (Sighs) I should have trusted my memory more.

412021012.speaker: 机器人
412021012.content: My apologies. I guess I should stop trying to be brave until I find my thought thinking module...

412021013.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021013.content: It's okay, Mr. Robot. You were just trying to help. There's nothing wrong with that...

412021014.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021014.content: Anyway, once we pass through that long hallway over there I'll be home. Let's go!

412021015.speaker: 羊妈妈
412021015.content: Oh, so this is a gallery too. There are so many beautiful paintings here. Who painted them?

412021017.speaker: 羊妈妈
412021017.content: Wow, that's amazing! I guess it makes sense, since this is the hallway that leads to your home.

412021018.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021018.content: This hallway has a name too. It's called the "White Night Gallery."

412021019.speaker: 羊妈妈
412021019.content: That has a nice ring to it, like your name. What are the paintings about?

412021020.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021020.content: Things that happened to me while I was playing here. When I'm happy, I like to record what's going on in my paintings.

412021021.content: Mama Sheep is silent for a while, although it looks like she has something to say.

412021022.speaker: 机器人
412021022.content: So what were you doing when all these were happening, beep beep?

412021024.content: After a close look at the paintings before her, Oneiroi comes to realize that she has zero recollection of the events depicted in them.

412021025.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021025.content: I don't remember at all... Drowsie, do you remember these?

412021027.speaker: 羊妈妈
412021027.content: You said that when you want to paint when you're happy. But when I look at these paintings, I keep feeling that...

412021028.speaker: ？？？
412021028.content: I keep feeling that you weren't that happy...

412021029.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021029.content: Yeah, I get what you mean... But I can't paint at all when I'm not happy. This is really strange...

412021030.speaker: ？？？
412021030.content: So, you weren't happy in here at all, am I right?

412021031.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021031.content: Huh? No, that's impossible... I really like playing with everyone. Of course I'm happy...

412021032.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021032.content: These paintings... I don't remember them at all...

412021035.speaker: 机器人
412021035.content: You were staring at your paintings and then started talking to yourself. Ms. Woolly was so worried about you and kept trying to rouse you, but that didn't seem to work.

412021037.speaker: 羊妈妈
412021037.content: Well, you looked a little upset while you were "distracted"...

412021038.speaker: 羊妈妈
412021038.content: Since you don't remember these paintings at all, maybe someone placed them here as a prank. So don't take this too seriously.

412021039.speaker: 羊妈妈
412021039.content: We'll paint together when you get home, okay?

412021040.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021040.content: Paint together... Yeah!!! Let's go back now then.

412021041.content: Oneiroi turns around, and her eyes meet with another pair, one that can only be described as jewel-like. For some reason, this feels really, really familiar...

412021043.content: It's only at this point that everyone else notices the little girl, who's about the same height as Oneiroi, standing quietly to the side.

412021044.speaker: 机器人
412021044.content: Looks like we were all a little distracted just now. I mean, we didn't even notice that there was another person next to us.

412021045.speaker: 羊妈妈
412021045.content: Hey, young lady. Are you here to look at paintings in the gallery?

412021047.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021047.content: Who are you, and why are you standing here?

412021048.speaker: ？？？
412021048.content: Puppet has no name. Puppet came over when Puppet saw you folks.

412021049.speaker: 羊妈妈
412021049.content: Well Ms. Puppet, it doesn't look like you know this place very well.

412021050.speaker: 人偶小姐
412021050.content: Yeah. I was originally brought here by my strings. And then the strings broke and I became lost.

412021051.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021051.content: So, are you looking for those strings of yours?

412021052.content: Ms. Puppet ponders a while, nods her head, and quickly shakes it.

412021053.speaker: 人偶小姐
412021053.content: I want to look for my strings, but I want to come with you folks too.

412021054.speaker: 机器人
412021054.content: Miss, these two things don't have to be mutually exclusive. If you come with us, we can also help you find your strings.

412021055.speaker: 羊妈妈
412021055.content: Plus, you must be so lonely being out here by yourself.

412021056.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021056.content: Of course you can come with us if you wish.

412021057.speaker: 人偶小姐
412021057.content: Then let's go... Puppet is happy.

412021058.speaker: 人偶小姐
412021058.content: Are those folks behind us coming along too?

412021059.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412021059.content: Behind us...? Oh no, the Poker Soldiers are here again!!!

412022001.speaker: 机器人
412022001.content: I'll stay here and try to hold them back. Keep running.

412022002.content: The robot uses its heavy arms to strike at the Poker Soldiers again and again. Seeing the robot's fierce attacks, the Poker Soldiers immediately retreat, and do not make any attempts to step forward.

412022003.content: Then there is a cracking sound... like the sound of biscuit wafers breaking into two.

412022004.content: At first, the sound was very faint. But as the robot pounds on the ground over and over, the sound becomes increasingly frequent, until it no longer sounds like wafers breaking but more like the sound of sand and gravel crashing down.

412022005.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412022005.content: No, it's getting too dangerous... Get over here, Mr. Robot!

412022006.content: The robot swiftly runs forward, a trail of cracks swiftly developing on the ground in its wake.

412022007.content: Very soon, it manages to make its final leap, and the road behind it shatters completely. The Poker Soldiers chasing the robot have no time to react, and they all fall into the bottomless starry sky.

412022008.speaker: 机器人
412022008.content: Wow, that gallery is real fragile. Thank goodness that road didn't get me... Had it taken me, beep beep, I might have to play cards with those soldiers for the rest of my life...

412022009.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412022009.content: It wasn't like this before... I laid those bricks myself. They were very heavy and very solid.

412022010.speaker: 人偶小姐
412022010.content: Now that the road is gone, how do we get back?

412022011.speaker: 机器人
412022011.content: Here's my suggestion: if you're strong enough of a jumper, you can use the hovering rocks to hop back to the other side.

412022013.speaker: 羊妈妈
412022013.content: Let's not worry about that for now. At least we're close to our destination, aren't we?

412022014.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412022014.content: Yeah. the Sweet Dream House is right over there.

412022015.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412022015.content: And you don't have to worry about the gallery, everyone. Madam Housekeeper over at the Sweet Dream House is incredible. She'll be able to fix the place.

412022017.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412022017.content: Mmhmm. As long as it's in the dream, she can do something about it.

412022018.speaker: 羊妈妈
412022018.content: Then she'll also be able to help find my Lamby.

412022019.speaker: 机器人
412022019.content: And she'll be able to locate my thought thinking module too. Who knows, she might just be the "Dream Master" I'm looking for.

412022020.speaker: 人偶小姐
412022020.content: And I'll be able to find my strings.

412031001.content: The scenery around the Sweet Dream House is a stark contrast to the other places they've seen.

412031002.content: Here, the sunlight is enveloped in a light pink veil, and there's also a faint sweet smell in the air.

412031004.content: Oneiroi's voice echoes up and down the empty hall. This, particularly in light of the overflowing number of desserts present, causes a sense of incongruity.

412031006.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031006.content: Mmm. Madam Housekeeper, are you there?

412031007.content: Oneiroi's voice echoes back and forth five times along the smooth surface of the lollipop before it finally dissipates. After she calls a third time, the housekeeper finally appears.

412031008.content: A tall figure, dressed in purple and black, emerges from the candy bushes at the back of the structure.

412031009.speaker: ？？？
412031009.content: Who is it...? Oh, it's you, Oneiroi.

412031010.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031010.content: What took you so long, Madam Housekeeper?

412031011.speaker: 管家
412031011.content: I'm sorry. I was attending to something.

412031012.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031012.content: Attending to something... Oh, by the way, I have something to ask you.

412031013.speaker: 管家
412031013.content: (Clears throat) It's a good thing you're back, miss. Please don't leave this place on a whim again.

412031015.speaker: 管家
412031015.content: Let's get inside now. And who are these people behind you?

412031016.speaker: 机器人
412031016.content: Would she have noticed me earlier had I been bigger and taller, beep beep?

412031017.speaker: 羊妈妈
412031017.content: Please, you're already blocking the rest of us from view as it is.

412031019.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031019.content: These are the new friends I made on my way home.

412031020.speaker: 管家
412031020.content: Your new friends, miss? I see... Welcome to the Sweet Dream House!

412031021.speaker: 管家
412031021.content: Let me get you some sweets and drinks. What would your friends like to have, miss?

412031022.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031022.content: Why don't you just ask them?

412031023.content: The housekeeper simply looks at Oneiroi indifferently as she bends over her.

412031024.content: Oneiroi has no choice but to ask her friends one by one, then convey the information to the housekeeper, who quickly gets the food ready.

412031025.speaker: 管家
412031025.content: I've also put your toys back in their right place. I hope your new friends can integrate into this big family of toys as soon as possible...

412031026.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031026.content: You're mistaken, Madam Housekeeper. These are my friends, not toys.

412031027.speaker: 管家
412031027.content: I think, Oneiroi, you should make some friends more worthy of your station.

412031029.content: The housekeeper does not answer. Instead, she looks at the giant robot, the fluffy ball, and the inorganic, human-shaped entity behind Oneiroi and shakes her head.

412031030.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031030.content: Oh, by the way, Madam Housekeeper, they have something to ask of you!

412031031.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031031.content: They all lost something. I thought you'd be able to help them.

412031032.speaker: 管家
412031032.content: I might be able to help if this were any other day. But right now, there are more important matters that demand my attention.

412031033.speaker: 机器人
412031033.content: So, by "more important matters" and "right now," do you mean that once you're done with them you'll be able to help us with our problems?

412031034.speaker: 机器人
412031034.content: That sounds like something worth looking forward to. I'm not afraid of waiting, for I'm a robot, beep beep beep, what I am least afraid of is waiting.

412031035.speaker: 管家
412031035.content: ...I suppose you can understand it that way.

412031036.content: The housekeeper's face is devoid of expression. Or rather, the shape of her head does not allow her to express any emotions through her face.

412031037.speaker: 管家
412031037.content: If there's nothing else, I have to go now.

412031038.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031038.content: Yeah... No, wait, I have another question for you.

412031040.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031040.content: Out in the hall, along the third row on the left-hand side. There are only 23 stars left.

412031041.speaker: 管家
412031041.content: Maybe the 24th star has moved somewhere else. To another home.

412031042.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031042.content: But why would the star do that?

412031043.speaker: 管家
412031043.content: You don't have to worry about that, miss.

412031044.speaker: 管家
412031044.content: I am your housekeeper, and I'll take care of everything here for you, miss. If you have to worry about something, it means I'm not doing my job right.

412031045.speaker: 管家
412031045.content: So, please have fun with your new toy—no, new friends, miss... I'll take my leave now.

412031046.content: The housekeeper turns into a shroud of mist and disappears into the air.

412031047.speaker: 羊妈妈
412031047.content: Your housekeeper has a really odd way of speaking. But at least she seems willing to listen to you.

412031048.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031048.content: No, she isn't like this usually. Maybe she's just tired...

412031049.speaker: 人偶小姐
412031049.content: Oneiroi, it's so great that you have a housekeeper to take care of you.

412031050.speaker: 机器人
412031050.content: Looking at the current situation, if I were Oneiroi, and my powerful housekeeper was willing to listen to me, would I actually have more power than this housekeeper?

412031051.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031051.content: I don't quite understand what you're saying... Hmm, does Mr. Robot think that he's better than the housekeeper?

412031052.speaker: 机器人
412031052.content: No, no, no, I wouldn't dare to think so. Just pretend that I didn't say anything.

412031053.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031053.content: Okay... Anyway, welcome to my home, everyone!

412031054.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031054.content: This place is very interesting, and all the toys inside are my favorites.

412031055.speaker: 人偶小姐
412031055.content: And there's a puppet here too.

412031056.content: Ms. Puppet is looking at a puppet sitting in the corner. Compared to her, this puppet looks rather crudely made, for its limbs can move only when manipulated by someone else.

412031057.content: As for Ms. Puppet, although she was controlled using strings earlier, now that the strings are broken, she can still walk on her own volition.

412031058.content: Ms. Puppet holds the puppet up to the window, its gemstone eyes facing out.

412031059.speaker: 人偶小姐
412031059.content: Look at the world outside. It's so big. If you want to see it, I can help you.

412031060.content: While the puppet can't speak, a ray of light seems to flash in its gemstone eyes.

412031061.content: That's probably just the sunlight from the outside being refracted, Ms. Puppet thinks.

412031062.speaker: 机器人
412031062.content: Oh, a toy train set? Looks good. If I could transform myself, I'd transform into a car so that I can speed around however I wish.

412031063.content: The toy train, originally designed for children, is even smaller compared to the giant robot. It tries to add another car to the train, but its clumsy fingers simply cannot get the tiny hook into the right place.

412031064.content: The robot eventually gives up after a string of failed attempts. However, as it stands back up from the floor, it accidentally kicks a section of the track and causes it to dislodge. The toy train, having come to this section around the same time, runs off the track.

412031065.content: But the train does not tip over or stop. Instead, it simply keeps on moving forward, off the track.

412031066.speaker: 机器人
412031066.content: If this were not in the Sweet Dream House but on an open plain, I believe that this tiny train would be able to reach the edge of the world in a few decades.

412031067.speaker: 机器人
412031067.content: Unfortunately, things never go the way we wish them to, so it's better for the toy train to continue going in circles around the toy track.

412031068.content: The robot bends down, picks up the train, and puts it back on the track.

412031069.speaker: 羊妈妈
412031069.content: Sweet little Oneiroi, I think I have to say goodbye to you now.

412031071.speaker: 羊妈妈
412031071.content: I'm only here to look for my child. There's no need for me to stay any longer since he isn't here and you've arrived home safely.

412031072.content: Ms. Puppet and the robot, having lost interest in the offerings of the Sweet Dream House and failing to find what they were looking for, also return to Oneiroi to tell her that they're leaving.

412031073.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031073.content: Mmm, I get you… You all have more important things to do, and I can't possibly keep you all around just to play with me.

412031074.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031074.content: Bye, Mama Sheep, Mr. Robot, and Ms. Puppet. If you like, you can always come and play with me in the future!

412031075.speaker: 羊妈妈
412031075.content: What a sweet child you are. If my Lamby were here, he'd definitely have a lot of fun playing with you.

412031076.speaker: 机器人
412031076.content: I should probably have my thought thinking module back the next time I'm here, and I'll be able to answer your questions then. Even if one of them is about how to make a three-day-old hamburger taste as yummy as a freshly baked cake...

412031078.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031078.content: I'll head out with you. I have to get the housekeeper to fix the section of the White Night Gallery that's collapsed anyway.

412031079.content: Oneiroi walks to the door and turns the candy cane handle clockwise twice as usual. However, the door doesn't open as expected.

412031081.content: Oneiroi tries to turn the candy cane handle counterclockwise, but the door remains stubbornly closed. Then, after several unsuccessful attempts, the candy cane falls off the door.

412031082.speaker: 羊妈妈
412031082.content: What is it, little Oneiroi? Is there a problem?

412031083.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031083.content: The door's broken and I can't open it... But it's okay, I can ask the housekeeper for help.

412031084.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031084.content: Madam Housekeeper? Madam Housekeeper? Are you there?

412031085.content: Again, the housekeeper only appears after she calls out to her three times.

412031086.speaker: 管家
412031086.content: What can I do for you?

412031087.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031087.content: My friends want to leave, but the door is broken and can't be opened.

412031088.speaker: 管家
412031088.content: You shouldn't be opening that door in the first place.

412031090.speaker: 管家
412031090.content: It's very dangerous outside. Neither your friends nor you should head out.

412031091.speaker: 人偶小姐
412031091.content: So... has anyone else noticed that she's no longer calling her "miss"...? Is that a problem?

412031093.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031093.content: But we just came in from the outside. It's real sunny and bright out there. Doesn't seem dangerous at all.

412031094.speaker: 管家
412031094.content: Are you sure? You lost your way outside, and were even pursued by those strange soldiers.

412031095.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031095.content: ...Okay, then. I mean, you are the housekeeper of the dream. You must know everything.

412031096.speaker: 管家
412031096.content: I can forget about how you sneaked out the last time. But from now on, you will not leave the Sweet Dream House again.

412031098.speaker: 管家
412031098.content: It will keep you safe from harm.

412031099.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031099.content: I just want to go out and play. Can't I do that?

412031101.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031101.content: Then how long will I have to stay in here?

412031106.speaker: 管家
412031106.content: You may be wondering if you're being locked up here because you did something wrong.

412031107.speaker: 管家
412031107.content: But as your housekeeper, I don't have the power to punish you. What I do have is an obligation to keep you safe.

412031108.speaker: 管家
412031108.content: The outside world is so very dangerous. But at the very least, I'm able to ensure the safety of this Sweet Dream House. Isn't that a good thing for you?

412031109.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031109.content: But, if that's the case... Won't you be very tired, Madam Housekeeper? From having to take care of everything?

412031110.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031110.content: I don't want things to be this way... Besides, it's not like I'm completely helpless. I was able to give everyone a hand on my way back just now, you know.

412031111.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031111.content: If it's really as dangerous out there as you said, maybe I can help solve some of the problems there...

412031112.speaker: 管家
412031112.content: You don't have to. I repeat, it is my duty to protect you, and I will do my job right.

412031113.speaker: 羊妈妈
412031113.content: But can you really protect little Oneiroi forever like you said?

412031115.content: The housekeeper doesn't respond to Mama Sheep's query, and the air in the house becomes still for a moment. However, this doesn't seem to faze Mama Sheep, and she continues to speak.

412031116.speaker: 羊妈妈
412031116.content: Little Oneiroi tells me that you're a very good housekeeper.

412031117.speaker: 羊妈妈
412031117.content: But since you're unable to bring Oneiroi back directly from the outside to the Sweet Dream House, it proves that you aren't an omnipotent god.

412031118.speaker: 羊妈妈
412031118.content: There'll always be surprises in the long "forever" that you talk about. How is little Oneiroi, who's become used to being coddled, going to face those difficulties alone when something unexpected does happen?

412031119.speaker: 管家
412031119.content: Your argument is nothing but a perversion of logic, and your assumptions are simply invalid.

412031120.speaker: 羊妈妈
412031120.content: But this "keeping her safe" you speak of seems a bit too optimistic.

412031121.speaker: 管家
412031121.content: I think I have explained myself enough.

412031122.speaker: 管家
412031122.content: Since you regard them as friends, you probably won't be too bored staying here in the Sweet Dream House with them then.

412031123.content: The housekeeper disappears in a wisp of black smoke.

412031126.speaker: 机器人
412031126.content: When exactly will she finish whatever urgent matters she's busy with, beep beep? I'm still waiting for her to help me get my thought thinking module back.

412031127.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031127.content: "Urgent matters"... Or is something bad really happening in the world outside...?

412031128.content: Oneiroi walks to the window. The toy puppet is lying on the floor with darkness reflected in its eyes. She picks it up and puts it back in the cabinet.

412031129.content: It should be sunny outside the window. It's always sunny outside the window.

412031130.content: Oneiroi has always liked to sit by the window and watch the pure golden light fall on the objects on the ground.

412031131.content: However, right now, there's a deep purple hue obscuring what used to be a clear view.

412031132.content: The color is dark and abnormal. Its dense undercurrent is pouring down from the dome, passing through the thin windows, and pressing down heavily on her heart.

412031133.speaker: 羊妈妈
412031133.content: What's wrong, little Oneiroi...? Could something bad really have happened...?

412031134.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031134.content: This is... the color of nightmares...

412031135.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412031135.content: The beautiful dream has become a nightmare...

412041001.speaker: 人偶小姐
412041001.content: The sky is so, so dark. I hate it.

412041003.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412041003.content: There's a nightmare over our heads... Something has gone wrong in the dream.

412041004.speaker: 机器人
412041004.content: Then the housekeeper must be busy dealing with this, right? Didn't you say she's very powerful and there's nothing she can't do as long as it's in the dream?

412041005.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412041005.content: Yes, but... I've never seen the sky like this before.

412041006.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412041006.content: Whenever something strange happened in the past, Madam Housekeeper would resolve it very quickly. But now, there hasn't been a change in the sky even after all this time.

412041007.speaker: 羊妈妈
412041007.content: ...What's more, that it's supposedly dangerous outside is exactly why she stopped you from leaving here...

412041008.speaker: 机器人
412041008.content: It all sounds a bit complicated, beep beep. I just want to know when my problem can be solved.

412041009.speaker: 羊妈妈
412041009.content: We aren't able to answer this question of yours even though we have brains.

412041010.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412041010.content:
I think someone once told me that if what's outside has turned into a nightmare, I have to resolve the problem as soon as possible.
It was a very important person who said that to me... But I just can't remember who she is now...

412041011.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412041011.content: No, I have to head out there.

412041012.speaker: 机器人
412041012.content: So now we have a common goal again. The last time, we both hoped to help you find your way home; this time, we want to escape from this house.

412041013.speaker: 机器人
412041013.content: Which means I now can do what's needed. Oneiroi, given the current situation, I assume you aren't too concerned about a big hole in the wall of your house, am I right?

412041015.speaker: 小困
412041015.content: Zzzzzz! Zzzzzzz—! (The robot wants to smash a hole in the wall!)

412041016.content: The robot takes a few steps back, then bends its "knees" and arches its "back" as it prepares to make a sprint.

412041017.content: But Mama Sheep, having recognized the robot's intention, rushes forward to stop it. She jumps in front of the robot, blocking its view of the way ahead.

412041018.speaker: 机器人
412041018.content: Ms. Woolly, are you trying to stop us from leaving this place?

412041019.speaker: 羊妈妈
412041019.content: I'm just trying to stop you from acting rashly. If we were to use brute force now, the noise would definitely draw the attention of the housekeeper.

412041020.speaker: 羊妈妈
412041020.content: Think about it: since she's chosen to confine us here, what would she do when she finds out that we've escaped?

412041021.speaker: 机器人
412041021.content: Unable to execute the "think" command without my thought thinking module, beep, beep... Just kidding. I understand what you're saying, but I really can't think of another way...

412041022.content: There's now a faint cracking sound that is becoming louder and louder.

412041023.content: The group has heard this sound before. It's like the sound of a biscuit wafer being broken into two, just like what they heard before the gallery collapsed earlier.

412041025.content: Having located the source of the sound, Oneiroi picks up Drowsie, who is butting up against the wall while trying to do something.

412041026.content: Drowsie's face is covered in a mess of colors, just like a painting canvas. A closer examination reveals that these colors have come from melted candy, and a piece of the wall where it was has been gnawed off.

412041027.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412041027.content: The Sweet Dream House is made up of candy and cookies... That's right, we have another way!

412041028.content: Oneiroi immediately calls her friends over.

412041029.content: Since the walls of the Sweet Dream House are edible, we can all try to make a hole in the wall by eating our way through it. Then we'll be able to leave.

412041030.speaker: 人偶小姐
412041030.content: Puppets can't eat candy. The stickiness will jam up our joints.

412041031.speaker: 机器人
412041031.content: As a robot, I do not possess the capability to consume food, beep beep.

412041032.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412041032.content: I see... It's okay, I can handle it.

412041033.speaker: 羊妈妈
412041033.content: I can help too. So let's get down to it.

412041035.speaker: 羊妈妈
412041035.content: I quite like this bitter taste, though. And little Oneiroi, you mustn't take so much candy. Eating too much candy will give you tooth decay!

412041036.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412041036.content: I think I probably won't want to eat candy for a long, long time after today...

412041038.content: A short while later, a hole finally emerges in the wall.

412041039.content: Oneiroi clambers through the hole while holding Drowsie in her arms. Mama Sheep and Ms. Puppet also manage to pass through with few issues.

412041040.content: However, the robot is having some trouble with the tiny hole. It goes on all fours with its back to the hole, then barely manages to fit its legs into it.

412041041.content: However, its progress stops as it attempts to move its broad shoulders past the wall. The ones already outside try to give him a helping hand by tugging on his legs, but to little avail.

412041042.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412041042.content: Come to think of it, the robot has rather broad shoulders...

412041043.speaker: 羊妈妈
412041043.content: Should we try to eat around it a little more?

412041044.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412041044.content: But the robot has formed a tight fit around the edges of the hole, leaving no room for anything to be broken off.

412041045.content: Everyone is racking their brains for another solution when they hear a sound from inside the Sweet Dream House. The robot's legs start moving wildly at the same time.

412041046.speaker: 羊妈妈
412041046.content: So in the end, we've come back to this...

412041047.content: Sure enough, cracks start appearing in the wall, and the existing hole quickly grows bigger and bigger until the robot's fist pokes out.

412041048.content: The robot quickly takes advantage of this new wiggle room to push his way through. But naturally, this movement causes quite a bit of noise.

412041049.content: A bunch of Poker Soldiers are now converging on them because of this noise.

412041050.speaker: 羊妈妈
412041050.content: Guess we couldn't avoid it after all...

412041051.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412041051.content: Don't worry, I don't think Madam Housekeeper is around...

412042001.content: All the Poker Soldiers who've come upon hearing the noise have been knocked down. Moreover, there's no sign of Madam Housekeeper, which is perhaps a blessing in disguise.

412042002.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412042002.content: Huh? What did we just step in? Why does it feel so sticky?

412042003.speaker: 人偶小姐
412042003.content: It's a liquid. A brown liquid.

412042005.speaker: 机器人
412042005.content: Hey, look behind you, beep beep. The house is melting.

412042006.content: The Sweet Dream House has taken on a rather blob-like appearance at this point. There's a huge hole in its roof, and a thick black syrup is oozing out from the circle-shaped wound.

412042007.content: The doors, windows, and decorations on the house are either deformed or collapsed. The originally beautiful and exquisite "Sweet Dream House" is now a mass of dark chocolate sludge.

412042008.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412042008.content: That isn't my home... It isn't...

412042009.speaker: 羊妈妈
412042009.content: Well, that just means I haven't truly fulfilled my promise to bring you back home.

412042011.speaker: 羊妈妈
412042011.content: Cheer up, kid. We'll keep on moving forward with you.

412042012.speaker: 机器人
412042012.content: Well, I haven't found my thought thinking module yet anyway. And if this place is a fake, the Dream Master certainly isn't here.

412042013.speaker: 人偶小姐
412042013.content: I have to keep looking for my strings too. Besides, I would like to be with everyone too.

412042014.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412042014.content: Okay, let's keep moving then... Oh, by the way.

412042015.content: Oneiroi picks up Drowsie and pulls out a handful of candies from its fleece. Even though the sun isn't shining on them, the candies are still glittering brightly.

412042016.content: And there it is: the glittering route made of candy that she saw not too long ago.

412042018.speaker: 羊妈妈
412042018.content: Then let's not waste any more time. Let's go.

412042019.speaker: 羊妈妈
412042019.content: I wonder where my Lamby is now... Well, I'd be lying if I said that I'm not worried at all when my child is out alone outside...

412042020.speaker: 人偶小姐
412042020.content: He'll be alright... He'll be alright...

412042021.speaker: 羊妈妈
412042021.content: Ha, my dear adorable Ms. Puppet. I appreciate the thought.

412042022.speaker: 羊妈妈
412042022.content: Yes, he'll be alright, I'm sure... After all, he's a brave little adventurer!

412042024.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412042024.content: I'm using the candies as markers.

412042025.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412042025.content: If we find ourselves here and see the candies again, we'll know that this is all fake.

412042026.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412042026.content: But I'll have to scatter them in a way that's different from that previous place.

412042027.speaker: 羊妈妈
412042027.content: It's amazing how much candy there is on Drowsie.

412042028.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412042028.content: I never knew either. It seems there's an endless supply...

412042029.speaker: 机器人
412042029.content: Actually, there are quite a few empty spaces inside my chassis, beep beep. If you need a place to store candy, you're welcome to pour them in here.

412042030.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412042030.content: Wouldn't that make your body really heavy?

412042031.speaker: 机器人
412042031.content: It's already heavy to begin with. A few candies won't make too big of a difference.

412042033.speaker: 羊妈妈
412042033.content: Eating too much candy causes tooth decay. I really hope all that candy I ate just now hasn't done too much damage...

412042034.speaker: 羊妈妈
412042034.content: You really are quite talented, little Oneiroi. Look at how prettily you've scattered the candies.

412042036.content: The group set out on their journey again, toward the light.

412052001.speaker: 羊妈妈
412052001.content: I'm not quite sure any of us are in these circumstances.

412052002.content: There are bricks scattered around the collapsed White Night Gallery, and gingerbread people and paper figures lying everywhere on the few platforms that are still intact.

412052003.content: The group wanders among the crowd for some time before they finally find someone who's still conscious.

412052004.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412052004.content: Please tell me, Mr. Cookie, what happened here?

412052005.speaker: 饼干先生
412052005.content: This um... (coughs)... I'm not sure where to start...

412052007.speaker: 饼干先生
412052007.content: Did you know, young lady, that in the dreamscape there's a Dream Master, someone who's in charge here, so to speak?

412052009.speaker: 饼干先生
412052009.content: Some time ago, and I'm not sure what happened, but the previous Dream Master went missing, and they were replaced by a new one... (coughs)

412052010.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412052010.content: Slow down, please. There's no hurry...

412052011.speaker: 饼干先生
412052011.content: She said she wants to create a dream that can keep a little girl imprisoned forever.

412052012.content: Mr. Cookie continues to cough, and he's coughing up crumbs as he speaks. These crumbs fall to the ground, and some of them become lodged in Mama Sheep's fleece. Mama Sheep shakes herself in a vain attempt to get the crumbs off her.

412052013.speaker: 饼干先生
412052013.content: From that time on, things started to become really bad. Our lives have been turned upside-down every day since...

412052014.speaker: 饼干先生
412052014.content: Those Poker Soldiers have been forcing us to build things like hallways and houses every day to exact measurements, as if... we're making a copy of some other place...

412052015.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412052015.content: "Keep a little girl imprisoned forever"... "making a copy of some other place"...

412052016.content: Mr. Cookie finally pauses after that long speech, and finally gathers his strength to look up.

412052017.content: There's a sharp intake of breath as he recognizes the little girl in front of him wearing a bow on her head and a poofy dress, and holding a black-and-white lamb in her arms. His coughing becomes more intense.

412052018.speaker: 饼干先生
412052018.content: You... (coughs)... that little girl the new Dream Master is always talking about... the one she's pulling out all the stops to imprison...

412052020.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412052020.content: Mmm, though I already more or less guessed it... But why is the new Dream Master doing this?

412052021.speaker: 饼干先生
412052021.content: Who cares about that? You should run far, far away while you still can... (extended cough)

412052022.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412052022.content: But I have no idea where I should be running to...

412052023.speaker: 饼干先生
412052023.content: See those candies on the ground? Maybe you'll be able to get out by following them. I think that must be from a story I've heard before...

412052024.content: Oneiroi looks over at where Mr. Cookie is pointing. Indeed, there's a line of glittering candies on the road ahead. She turns back and sees that the rainbow bridge is still behind her, which means that these are not the ones that she just scattered.

412052025.content: The line of candies stretches all the way to the mist-clad houses in the distance. Oneiroi is looking at the farthest candy she can see when a sudden sound beside her disrupts her thoughts.

412052028.content: Then there is one final hack, and Mr. Cookie starts breaking up into the disturbed air. Now, what's left of him are only brittle crumbs on the ground.

412052030.content: Oneiroi stares at the bits and pieces of paper and cookie crumbs all over the ground in a daze. But before she can get over her sadness and confusion, the sound of Ms. Puppet's joints moving and clacking comes from not far away.

412052031.speaker: 人偶小姐
412052031.content: Over there, over there. Someone's still fighting.

412052032.speaker: 人偶小姐
412052032.content: They're all in danger. I think, I think, we should go there…!

412061001.content: The place that Ms. Puppet is talking about is not connected to the platform where the group is standing. Oneiroi tries to visualize a rainbow bridge in her mind, and once again she succeeds in creating a means of passage.

412061002.content: Past the rainbow bridge, a curious Oneiroi looks down at her feet, and discovers that the soles of her feet are now covered in the beautiful, bright light of the rainbow.

412061005.content: But Oneiroi isn't able to react in time. All she feels is something soft ramming into her. The impact isn't enough to knock her off her feet, though it does cause her to stumble forward a few steps.

412061006.content: She gathers her senses and looks behind her. There's a frightened-looking gingerbread man lying on the back of a marshmallow-like creature. The gingerbread man moves his body a little, and he is overjoyed from the realization that his body is still intact.

412061008.content: The gingerbread man hops off the lamb's back, thanks the lamb solemnly, and leaves. Mama Sheep's voice rings out from behind.

412061013.speaker: 小羊
412061013.content: Um, I'm so sorry that I bumped into you. I was just trying to catch that gingerbread man...

412061014.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061014.content: You don't have to be sorry. And you did save that gingerbread man.

412061015.speaker: 羊妈妈
412061015.content: Ugh, do you know how long I've been looking for you??? And what in the world is going on here?

412061016.speaker: 小羊
412061016.content: I'm sorry, mama... So, I was exploring and adventuring like I usually do, and I ended up here. The sun, which was high above my head the whole time, became covered by purple fog in an instant. It became really dark around here, and I couldn't see a thing.

412061017.speaker: 小羊
412061017.content: It was a long time before the fog lifted a little and I could see slightly more clearly. But then I saw all these people with poker cards on their heads coming out of that mist. They had these long guns and started attacking everyone as soon as they appeared.

412061018.speaker: 羊妈妈
412061018.content: What? Let me look at you. Are you hurt?

412061019.speaker: 小羊
412061019.content: Don't worry, mama, I'm an adventurer! But I seem to have lost my sword, and now I can only rely on my fleece to protect everyone...

412061020.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061020.content: How do you plan to do that?

412061021.speaker: 小羊
412061021.content: Many, many gingerbread people and paper figures are falling from the sky, and they get hurt if they hit the ground. So, I catch them with my fleece, just like I did just now.

412061022.speaker: 小羊
412061022.content: I didn't have the time to tell you when I left this time because I was in such a hurry, mama... I'm sorry. But I can't go home yet. I have to stay here and save as many people as possible.

412061023.speaker: 羊妈妈
412061023.content: But there are so many people here. How are you going to save them all? And you really should have told me before you left...

412061025.content: Lamby's eyes are downcast, like he's expecting to be told off by his mother. However, Mama Sheep doesn't say a thing. Instead, she produces a sword, which is rather round-looking like the both of them.

412061026.speaker: 羊妈妈
412061026.content: I haven't been looking for you because I want to drag you back home with me. And when have you known me to do that anyway?

412061027.speaker: 羊妈妈
412061027.content: I just wanted to tell you that you left in such a hurry you even forgot to take your sword. Here, take it.

412061028.speaker: 小羊
412061028.content: Huh? My Sword of the Brave? So I didn't lose it after all...

412061029.speaker: 羊妈妈
412061029.content: Now that you have it, you'll be better able to protect everybody.

412061030.content: Lamby takes the sword, nods to his mother, then turns and runs into the chaos.

412061031.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061031.content: Lamby is so amazing... He's going to save so many more people.

412061032.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061032.content: There's hope for the other residents. But Mr. Cookie...

412061033.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061033.content: It seems that I can't do anything...

412061034.speaker: 羊妈妈
412061034.content: You look awful, little Oneiroi. Are you hurt? Take a rest if you have to. Don't push yourself too far.

412061035.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061035.content: I'm not hurt, I'm just feeling upset that I can't seem to do anything while Lamby is keeping everyone safe...

412061036.speaker: 羊妈妈
412061036.content: You're wrong about that. We've already been through so much getting here. And there are some things only you can do.

412061038.speaker: 羊妈妈
412061038.content: Like the rainbow bridge, for example.

412061039.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061039.content: If that's the case, I'd like to give it a shot...

412061040.speaker: 小羊
412061040.content: Look out behind you! They're surrounding us again!

412061041.content: Lamby dashes over from a spot not far away, and slashes heavily at the Poker Soldier who's trying to launch a sneak attack from behind the resident. This turns the Poker Soldier into a black fog.

412061042.speaker: 小羊
412061042.content: Everyone, stay behind me! There are quite a few enemies...

412061044.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061044.content: Maybe Madam Housekeeper wouldn't be so adamant if I could protect myself, or even everyone else...

412061045.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061045.content: Besides, I know that I... can fight!

412061048.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061048.content: My name is Oneiroi, and I want to... fight together with you!

412061049.speaker: 小羊
412061049.content: Okay, Oneiroi. Let's keep everyone safe together!

412061050.content: Oneiroi starts to channel her power, and a pink light flows through the swarm of enemies, causing them to become sluggish.

412061051.content: Lamby then takes advantage of this opening to rush forward and swing his sword at them. The Poker Soldiers, unable to dodge, are knocked down one by one.

412061052.content: Oneiroi and Lamby are working together in perfect sync. However, the enemies keep on coming, and with each dash Lamby ventures deeper and deeper into the enemy camp.

412061054.content: By the time Lamby realizes what is happening, he's been surrounded by a group of Poker Soldiers who are all pointing their spears at him.

412061055.speaker: 扑克士兵
412061055.content: Stay down if you know what's good for you, you runt! We're not interested in you anyway. What we want is our free labor!

412061056.speaker: 扑克士兵
412061056.content: Just get out of here like we say and we won't hurt you. Otherwise, you only have yourself to blame!

412061057.speaker: 小羊
412061057.content: Wow, can your lines get any cheesier? Does anybody actually back down when you say that?

412061058.speaker: 扑克士兵
412061058.content: So you're refusing to leave? Then take this!

412061059.content: Oneiroi tries to use her power to stop the enemy's actions, but they're already too close to Lamby. It'd be too late even if she were to use her full power.

412061060.content: Thanks to his battlefield experience, Lamby manages to just barely dodge the first wave of attacks. However, as his stamina depletes, his speed and agility also take a dip, and wounds start to appear all over his body.

412061061.content: Oneiroi tries again and again to reach Lamby by running into the mass of people. However, the enemies keep on coming, much more quickly that she can eliminate them, and she just can't get close enough.

412061062.speaker: 扑克士兵
412061062.content: So you think you can fight? Let's see how much longer you can hold on!

412061063.speaker: 小羊
