412061063.content: I will keep on fighting as long as I have my sword in my hand.

412061064.content: Right before the Poker Soldiers rush forward at him, Lamby leaps into the air with all his remaining strength. His blade cuts through the gloom-filled air with a dazzling flash, and shatters all the spear tips around him.

412061065.content: But in the same moment, the wounds on Lamby also become deeper and more numerous...

412061066.speaker: 小羊
412061066.content: (Pants) I'm losing my strength. What am I going to do now...?

412061068.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061068.content: If only I could heal Lamby's injuries... I wonder if I can do it...

412061069.content: The flowing light in her hand turns into crystal stars which then fly toward Lamby.

412061070.content: Lamby is taking heavy gulps of air while propping himself up on his sword when all of a sudden his body feels like it's full of strength again. And even more miraculously, he sees that all the wounds on his body have healed.

412061071.speaker: 小羊
412061071.content: What's going on??? And what is this light...? Is it from Oneiroi???

412061072.content: But there's no time to ponder that right now. Lamby immediately plunges back into battle with his newly rejuvenated body.

412061074.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061074.content: Let me try that again. Maybe I can bring Mr. Cookie back to life this time...

412061075.content: Oneiroi squeezes her eyes shut. She's trying her best to visualize Mr. Cookie's complete, round appearance in her mind.

412061076.content: Mr. Cookie's fragments are still lying on the ground not too far away, next to the robot and Mama Sheep. Mr. Robot is defending against sporadic attacks from the rear, while Mama Sheep is running around, trying to catch the paper figures and gingerbread people falling from on high with her fleece.

412061077.content: Oneiroi opens her eyes again. There Mr. Cookie is, looking at his restored body in utter disbelief.

412061078.content: Oneiroi also smiles in joyous surprise. This is something only she can do.

412061079.speaker: 羊妈妈
412061079.content: Little Oneiroi, you did it... Amazing.

412061080.content: And now, the thing she most wants to do is...

412061082.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061082.content: She wants all the cookie crumbs and bits back into complete wholes, and the tiny pieces of paper to be pieced back together. She wants everyone who's hurt or unconscious to recover to their original state.

412061083.content: Oneiroi puts her palms together. The invisible power turns into a warm current that's now flowing out from her hands and spreading among the wailing crowd.

412061084.content: The fragments on the ground are now slowly moving, seemingly with clear purpose. They should never have been on the filthy ground but where they originally belonged.

412061085.content: The soft pink light clears the black fog. All around, the injured are opening their eyes to find that they've regained their bodies and celebrating with much joy.

412061086.speaker: 纸片人A
412061086.content: Am I still alive? Oh my word, I'm still alive!!!

412061087.speaker: 饼干人A
412061087.content: But look, those baddies are still here! We have to go now!

412061090.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061090.content: Over there is a little lamb who's chosen to fight the Poker Soldiers by himself in order to keep everyone safe. However, there are so many of them, and he's been surrounded. He may not be able to hang in there much longer...

412061091.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061091.content: Now, many of those Poker Soldiers have already been eliminated... I think if we band together, we'll be able to defeat them.

412061092.speaker: 饼干人A
412061092.content: No, no, those Poker Soldiers are really strong! We're no match for them at all!

412061093.speaker: 纸片人A
412061093.content: I disagree. If a little lamb can hold them back for so long, we'll definitely win if we fight together! There's strength in numbers!

412061094.speaker: 饼干人B
412061094.content: Those soldiers have been so arrogant just because they have weapons on them. I've seen them fire at people but miss completely again and again.

412061096.speaker: 纸片人B
412061096.content: I'm not afraid either way. If that tiny little lamb isn't afraid of them, I'm not either.

412061097.content: There's much chatter among the crowd, and eventually most of them choose to stay behind to help the little lamb. Very soon, the group of Poker Soldiers has fallen into disarray.

412061098.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061098.content: Lamby! Everyone's here to help you!!!

412061101.content: A colorful arc flies toward Lamby, who immediately recognizes it as a piece of candy. Then, before the soldiers can get back on their feet, Lamby quickly eats it, and his strength is immediately restored.

412061102.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412061102.content: I still have plenty of candies here... We can definitely beat them!

412062001.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412062001.content: The soldiers have stopped coming for now... Phew.

412062002.speaker: 小羊
412062002.content: We can take a break now.

412062003.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412062003.content: So many people have been hurt again. Let me heal them!

412062004.content: Oneiroi puts her hands together as she stands in the middle of the crowd. A while later, those who were hurt have all recovered their spirits.

412062005.content: She then walks to another group of people further away, and once again, she visualizes a beautiful scene in her mind. But this time, when she opens her eyes, she finds that nothing's changed.

412062006.content: Oneiroi tries several more times, her brows knit tightly together as she closes her eyes. But the images in her mind become increasingly chaotic. The truth is, she's exhausted after the fierce battle, and is finding it difficult to focus now.

412062007.speaker: 羊妈妈
412062007.content: Don't push yourself, Oneiroi! If you feel tired, just lie on my back for a while. I promise you'll find it comfortable.

412062008.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412062008.content: It's so soft and cozy... Thank you, Mama Sheep.

412062009.speaker: 羊妈妈
412062009.content: Don't worry about it. (Sighs) I don't think it's a good idea for us to keep going like this. We have to nip the problem in the bud. From what everyone's saying, it seems that Madam Housekeeper is the new "Dream Master" of that evil dream.

412062010.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412062010.content: But the Madam Housekeeper I know is always kind to everyone, not some kind of "master." Unless... unless that's not her...

412062011.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412062011.content: From what I remember, Madam Housekeeper always stays around the Sweet Dream House, but the Sweet Dream House we were just at is a fake one. If we can go back to the real Sweet Dream House... then we should be able to find a way out.

412062012.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412062012.content: But that would mean leaving the residents here exposed to danger again...

412062013.speaker: 小羊
412062013.content: Tell you what, I'll stay behind here. Although I don't quite understand what the Sweet Dream House and the housekeeper are, I know that you must have something more important to do.

412062014.speaker: 羊妈妈
412062014.content: That's right. Little Oneiroi wants to find the source of the problem and clean up this mess once and for all.

412062015.speaker: 小羊
412062015.content: This must be something that only Oneiroi can do. And what I can do is stay here and protect the residents.

412062016.content: Oneiroi opens her mouth to say something, but can't quite find the right words for a moment. Finally, she simply smiles and nods vigorously.

412062017.speaker: 羊妈妈
412062017.content: I have to stay here to help Lamby, Oneiroi. So we'll have to bid each other goodbye here for now.

412062018.content: Mama Sheep is holding Oneiroi's hand, as if the little girl in front of her is her own child who's about to go away on a long journey.

412062019.content: Mr. Robot, who's been standing behind them, reminds them that they're still in danger and should get back on the road as soon as possible. Mama Sheep lets go of Oneiroi's hand, and the latter, taken aback for a moment, takes a few steps back.

412062020.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412062020.content: We're off, then. Bye, Mama Sheep! Bye, Lamby!

412062022.speaker: 小羊
412062022.content: Bye! And if we manage to get things over here sorted out we'll catch up with you!

412062024.content: After several rounds of hand-waving, Oneiroi finally turns her back and starts walking more quickly. Now, only Mr. Robot is left with her.

412062025.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412062025.content: Hold on, where did Ms. Puppet go?

412062026.speaker: 机器人
412062026.content: I was just going to ask you the same question. The last time I saw her was at the intersection up ahead.

412062027.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412062027.content: Hmm, I hope you remembered correctly this time...

412062028.content: The two come to the intersection and see Ms. Puppet leaning against a wall there.

412062029.content: Her head is lowered and her body is motionless.

412071001.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071001.content: Ms. Puppet! Are you all right???

412071003.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071003.content: Oh, you're injured. What do we do? I have no idea how to dress a puppet's wound...

412071004.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071004.content: In the past, when I had my strings, I could defeat any enemy that came my way without getting hurt.

412071005.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071005.content: But now, without my strings, I can't fight and I got hurt.

412071006.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071006.content: I see... I'll try the method I used to heal the others before.

412071007.content:
Oneiroi closes her eyes.
Ms. Puppet recovered, Ms. Puppet recovered... But what does a recovered puppet look like...?

412071008.content: To clarify the picture: what does it look like when a puppet is injured?

412071009.content: Oneiroi's mind goes blank. She opens her eyes, and sees that nothing has happened.

412071011.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071011.content: Do you want to cure me? Actually, all you have to do is to find me my strings. I'll be healed once I'm reattached to them.

412071012.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071012.content: But you have other matters to attend to... You should forget about Puppet and go.

412071013.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071013.content: No, it's too dangerous here. We can't just leave you. Can you still walk?

412071014.content: Ms. Puppet moves her arms and stares at her legs again. From the look of desperation on her face, it's clear that she has no control of her legs.

412071015.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071015.content: I'll carry you on my back, then.

412071016.content: Oneiroi tries to place Ms. Puppet on her back. However, when she puts one of her arms over her shoulders, she realizes that she's unable to take Ms. Puppet's weight.

412071017.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071017.content: Puppet very heavy. Forget about Puppet...

412071018.speaker: 机器人
412071018.content: Hey folks, I'm here too, beep beep! Let me try.

412071019.content: Ms. Puppet puts her still-movable arms around the robot's "neck." The robot stands back up with Ms. Puppet hanging off it like a scarf.

412071021.speaker: 机器人
412071021.content: Right as rain. My movements will be a little slower, that's all. But Ms. Puppet, do you think you can hang on like this for an extended period of time?

412071022.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071022.content: No problem. Puppet won't get tired.

412071023.speaker: 机器人
412071023.content: Then let's keep on moving. Now we have to find Ms. Puppet's strings, right? But where do we go?

412071024.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071024.content: Do you remember where you lost your strings, Ms. Puppet?

412071025.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071025.content: In a very, very big house... the way there, Puppet still remembers.

412071026.content: The trio head toward their destination by following Ms. Puppet's description.

412071027.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071027.content: …Puppet has done nothing but need help from everyone.

412071028.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071028.content: Once Puppet disappears, you two can go on to do more important things...

412071029.content: Ms. Puppet lets go of the robot's neck, and her heavy body falls to the ground instantly.

412071030.speaker: 机器人
412071030.content: I feel some movement, beep beep. And it feels like my body has become much lighter.

412071031.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071031.content: I think I heard something too... Ah, Ms. Puppet!

412071032.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071032.content: Why did you do that...? Didn't we agree that we'd help you find your strings?

412071034.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071034.content: Puppet can't do anything but cause trouble to others... Sorry.

412071035.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071035.content: That's not true... Ms. Puppet, do you consider us friends?

412071036.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071036.content: Puppet is not fit to be a friend.

412071037.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071037.content: Why do you feel this way...? Everyone clearly regards you as a good friend.

412071038.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071038.content: If you feel that you aren't fit to be our friend, that's a little cruel to us, isn't it...?

412071040.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071040.content: It's natural for friends to help each other. So please don't blame yourself anymore, Ms. Puppet...

412071041.speaker: 机器人
412071041.content: If you're worried that your weight would be a burden to me, you can drop that thought now. As a well-designed robot, I have excellent load-bearing capacity.

412071043.speaker: 机器人
412071043.content: You're welcome. But, although I'm fine, you seem to have broken your arms in the fall. What do we do now?

412071044.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071044.content: I think I have a way.

412071045.content: At the very least, Oneiroi can still remember the picture of Ms. Puppet's intact arms vividly.

412071047.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071047.content: So I can get things done this way too... Fantastic.

412071048.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071048.content: Then let's keep moving. Like we said, we'll help you find your strings.

412071049.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071049.content: This place looks familiar. I keep getting the feeling that there are rats here.

412071051.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071051.content: Robot cannot come in. Door is too small.

412071052.speaker: 机器人
412071052.content: That's fine. I can stand guard outside.

412071053.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071053.content: Oh, Ms. Puppet, did you just stand up on your own?

412071054.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071054.content: Puppet can move a little, but once Puppet tries to walk she'll stumble and fall. That's because Puppet has some problems with her joints...

412071055.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071055.content: But there should be some strings in here. Hook Puppet up to a few of them and things will be much better.

412071056.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071056.content: Here's the end of the string.

412071057.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071057.content: Hold on, end of the string... Is this your broken string?

412071059.speaker: 人偶小姐
412071059.content: Strings, there are many. But the most important one is difficult to find.

412071061.content: Ms. Puppet is now able to move freely after she's attached to a few strings.

412071062.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412071062.content: However, all the strings do is support your body. It is you who controls your legs and feet to walk.

412081002.content: No one's at the door. On the street in the distance, Mr. Robot is fighting a group of Poker Soldiers.

412081003.content: Despite being besieged by the soldiers, Mr. Robot doesn't use its powerful fists on them. Instead, it keeps retreating while kicking at the enemy to keep them at arm's length. Compared to before, its combat effectiveness seems to have taken a significant dip.

412081005.content: Together, Oneiroi and Mr. Robot manage to take down all of the soldiers present.

412081006.content: Oneiroi lets out a sigh of relief and looks up at the robot's fists. Mr. Robot's arms are folded in front of its chest, as if it's protecting something.

412081008.speaker: 机器人
412081008.content: It's my Thinking Module. I found it.

412081009.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412081009.content: Really? That's great news! Do you have to install it somewhere?

412081010.speaker: 机器人
412081010.content: Yes, but that'll take a bit of time. I don't think...

412081011.content: Mr. Robot raises its head again and returns to its combat stance.

412081012.speaker: 机器人
412081012.content: ...I don't think we have the time now, beep beep.

412081013.content: Another group of Poker Soldiers is converging on them. Or rather, an entire swarm of Poker Soldiers is converging on them. The dark mass of enemies is stretching as far as the eye can see.

412081014.speaker: 扑克士兵
412081014.content: Surrender that thing you have in your hands, big fella!

412081015.speaker: 机器人
412081015.content: Why should I give it to you? This belongs to me.

412081016.speaker: 扑克士兵
412081016.content: Our mistress ordered us to take this thing back to her, so it's hers!

412081017.speaker: 机器人
412081017.content: So it's a grab, then? Then you'll have to fight me to get it!

412081018.content: Clutching the module tightly, Mr. Robot leaps high into the air, kicking up a cloud of dust as it does so. Its massive chassis travels along a perfect arc in the air before landing hard into the mass of Poker Soldiers, making a giant hole in their number.

412081019.content: None of the soldiers who find themselves under its feet survive. This causes the other soldiers to pull back some.

412081020.speaker: 扑克士兵
412081020.content: Go get it!!! What are you afraid of??? None of us will live if we can't get what the mistress wants anyway!

412081021.content: The lead soldier's threat works, and the remaining soldiers rush forward with their weapons raised.

412081022.content: Mr. Robot takes a huge step forward and begins charging through the crowd of soldiers, creating a path in its trail. Oneiroi follows behind it while using her power to slow their pursuers.

412081023.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412081023.content: We just have to shake them off our tail...!

412081024.speaker: 机器人
412081024.content: I just need enough time to put my thought thinking module back in...

412081025.content: However, the Poker Soldiers keep on coming and coming, and they appear to be even more determined and persistent than before. Wherever Mr. Robot runs, there'd always be new soldiers appearing in pursuit.

412081028.speaker: 机器人
412081028.content: I'm low on power, beep beep.

412081029.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412081029.content: Huh? What do you mean you're low on power?

412081030.speaker: 机器人
412081030.content: Isn't it normal for a robot to need to charge every now and then?

412081032.speaker: 机器人
412081032.content: I'm going to stop talking now. I have to conserve my remaining power.

412081033.content: Oneiroi keeps on running forward while looking back at the soldiers chasing her from time to time. Little does she realize the robot in front of her has already stopped working.

412081034.content: BANG! Oneiroi runs right smack into it, her head hitting the robot's solid chassis. She sees stars above her.

412081035.content: The stars make several circles around Oneiroi's head. Then, as if startled by the soldiers fiercely rushing toward them, they fall to the ground one after another.

412081036.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412081036.content: I'm so dizzy… What are these pointy things… are they… AHHH!

412081037.content: Several spear tips appear in Oneiroi's field of vision at the same time. She has no time to react, let alone use her power to fight back.

412081038.content: The sharp weapon gets closer and closer to her. Just as it's about to pierce Oneiroi's forehead, she sees a silver-white light flash on its smooth and sharp surface...

412081039.content: The premonition of pain comes to an abrupt end as the looming threat disappears instantly. A familiar figure appears in front of her.

412081041.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412081041.content: Who is... Ms. Puppet! Why are you here?

412081045.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412081045.content: Ms. Puppet feels like a completely different person altogether.

412081047.speaker: 人偶小姐
412081047.content: I'm no longer a burden. I can battle and protect you two now.

412081048.speaker: 人偶小姐
412081048.content: Puppet is not the same Puppet she was.

412081049.content: Oneiroi looks at Ms. Puppet's back as the latter moves away from her. She can see several shiny strings, all emitting a faint light, as her garment flutters with each step.

412081050.content: Ms. Puppet dashes into the enemy swarm, her body tumbling and turning the whole time. This rush instantly creates a clearing among the soldiers.

412081051.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412081051.content: Wow, Ms. Puppet sure is powerful now that she's attached to her strings...

412081052.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412081052.content: I have to buck up too!!!

412082001.content: The sheer magnitude of Ms. Puppet's attack has turned the Poker Soldiers around them either into puffs of smoke or frightened, sniveling versions of themselves who are now refusing to take another step forward.

412082003.speaker: 人偶小姐
412082003.content: You don't have to do that. It means nothing.

412082006.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412082006.content: You're back, Mr. Robot. What happened to you???

412082007.speaker: 机器人
412082007.content: There seems to be something wrong with my battery contacts. I powered down all of a sudden when I switched to power-saving mode.

412082008.speaker: 机器人
412082008.content: Fortunately, someone must have bumped into me and reconnected the circuit at some point. But it still took a while for me to start back up.

412082009.content: Oneiroi touches her forehead. It still hurts a little. After some thought, she decides not to tell the robot the truth about how that "bump" came about.

412082010.speaker: 机器人
412082010.content: What about the Poker Soldiers around you? Did you drive them all away?

412082011.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412082011.content: It wasn't me. We have Ms. Puppet to thank for that.

412082013.content: Although Mr. Robot is a little confused at first, once it sees Ms. Puppet in her attack stance it immediately realizes what is going on.

412082014.speaker: 机器人
412082014.content: We should give her a hand, then.

412082015.speaker: 人偶小姐
412082015.content: No. The two of you should leave right now.

412082017.speaker: 人偶小姐
412082017.content: Are you two of you deaf? Or do you want to be surrounded by these soldiers again?

412082018.speaker: 机器人
412082018.content: Do you really have to use that tone?

412082019.speaker: 人偶小姐
412082019.content: ...That's the only tone I can use.

412082020.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412082020.content: Calm down, Mr. Robot. I'll explain it to you later.

412082021.content: Oneiroi is trying to hold back the somewhat angry robot while looking back at Ms. Puppet at the same time.

412082022.content: Ms. Puppet's eyes have always been so empty. The translucent gemstones they're made of have always so coldly and neutrally reflected the light from the outside world.

412082023.content: But now, there seem to be a lot more impurities in those inorganic eyes, which now look gloomier as any light that shines on them simply gets lost in them.

412082024.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412082024.content: Ms. Puppet, I know that you attached that last string you hate in order to save us.

412082025.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412082025.content: I... don't want you to do something you hate. I'm still thinking of other ways to cure you... I'm so sorry that my brain is so slow...

412082026.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412082026.content: Oh by the way, Mr. Robot has found its thought thinking module. Once it's put back in we may be able to find more leads.

412082027.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412082027.content: ...I'm sorry for saying so much again. I think you must find me annoying now... We'll leave right away.

412082028.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412082028.content: But I still want to say... Thank you, Ms. Puppet. You look so cool when you fight!

412082029.speaker: 人偶小姐
412082029.content: ...Just get out of my hair now.

412082031.content: Oneiroi and the robot dash off. Ms. Puppet stands there, looking blankly at the two of them disappear into the distance. She can hear the squeaking of armor pieces moving against each other again, which means another group of Poker Soldiers has arrived.

412082032.content: She turns her head back. A crystal or pearl-like round object runs down from her downcast eye, and she tosses it behind her.

412091001.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412091001.content: Fortunately, the glittering candy trail is still there. This place looks pretty safe, so why don't you put in your thought thinking module here now?

412091003.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412091003.content: Is this black box the thought thinking module you've been looking for all this time?

412091005.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412091005.content: Black box... I wonder if this is also the box that Ms. Puppet was meant to safeguard.

412091006.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412091006.content: And I wonder if Ms. Puppet is still fighting right now...

412091007.content: The robot opens the box, takes out the chip inside, then lowers its head and opens up its chassis where its "chest" is.

412091008.content: With Oneiroi's help, the robot's thought thinking module is then installed.

412091009.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412091009.content: Phew. Okay, let's put the lid back on. I think we got everything right just now. Mr. Robot, are you okay?

412091011.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412091011.content: Oh no. Is there a battery problem again...?

412091012.content: Oneiroi tries knocking on the robot a few times, but there's no response. She clenches her fists as if she's bracing herself for some decision.

412091013.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412091013.content: Looks like I have no choice but to give you another bump.

412091014.content: She touches her forehead, then closes her eyes and rams it against the robot's chassis. Something lights up all of a sudden, startling her.

412091015.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412091015.content: Huh? Is that light in Mr. Robot's eyes???

412091016.content: Out of the robot's eyes come two beams of light projecting a blurry image in which a human figure can just about be discerned.

412091017.speaker: ？？？
412091017.content: Hey Oneiroi! You're the only one who can see this video...

412091019.speaker: ？？？
412091019.content: No matter what it is you're dealing with right now, you have to get yourself to the Gates of Horn immediately and wake up as soon as you can. That's the only way to shut down the collective dream... So please.

412091020.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412091020.content: "Gates of Horn," "collective dream," "wake up"... Oh that's right! I can wake up as soon as I pass the Gates of Horn. But what is this about a "collective dream"...?

412091021.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412091021.content: It sounds vaguely familiar but I can't place it now... Do you know what that is?

412091022.content: However, there's no response from the blurry projection. It simply goes out after flickering a few times.

412091025.speaker: 机器人
412091025.content: I'm afraid I won't be this way for long. I thought it'd be good for me to get my thought thinking module back, but I didn't expect the chip to use so much power...

412091026.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412091026.content: Those words just now, were you the one saying them?

412091028.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412091028.content: Something about the Gates of Horn and a "collective dream."

412091029.speaker: 机器人
412091029.content: I don't recall anything like that. But now I can think, I can perform a comprehensive search and analysis of the current situation using my database. Just a moment please...

412091031.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412091031.content: ...Hold on, there's some sort of movement. Please tell me they didn't catch up with us again!!!

412092001.speaker: 机器人
412092001.content: Although I didn't manage to find the info you were looking for, at least I found this trick...

412092002.content: Mr. Robot steps in front of Oneiroi, using its tall body to block her from the Poker Soldiers' onslaught. Then, it crosses its arms over its chest, lowers its head, and stops moving.

412092003.speaker: 扑克士兵
412092003.content: Ha ha ha! Is that all it has??? It's all over now, isn't it??? Let's go, boys, the time is now!

412092006.content: A dazzling light bursts out of Mr. Robot's eyes toward the area in front of him. The light hits the Poker Soldiers like a flood, incinerating whatever it touches to bits.

412092007.content: By the time the blinding white beams are no more, there are no more enemies standing in front of Mr. Robot. Then, in the blink of an eye, Mr. Robot falls against the wall with a loud clang.

412092009.speaker: 机器人
412092009.content: Oh shoot oh shoot, I'm really out of juice this time.

412092010.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412092010.content: How do you charge your battery? I'll help you.

412092011.speaker: 机器人
412092011.content: I don't think you can. It doesn't look like there's a power socket around here or anything.

412092013.speaker: 机器人
412092013.content: I'm sorry, Oneiroi. I didn't manage to find any info about the Gates of Horn or collective dreams...

412092014.speaker: 机器人
412092014.content: I only had a little power left, which I could use to perform another search or to fight, but not both.

412092015.speaker: 机器人
412092015.content: I thought about it, and realized that another search might not lead to a usable answer anyway, and you were in danger. So I chose to fight.

412092016.speaker: 机器人
412092016.content: Theoretically, with my thought thinking module installed, I should have become a more complete robot. But now, I keep getting the feeling that I'm less and less like a machine that executes orders.

412092017.speaker: 机器人
412092017.content: I hope you don't dislike me because of that...

412092018.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412092018.content: No, why would I? Why would you think that? Because you have a thought thinking module now?

412092019.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412092019.content: You saved me. Besides, we've been through so much together. How could I possibly dislike you?

412092020.speaker: 机器人
412092020.content: That's good to hear. So, have you figured out a solution to this situation yet?

412092021.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412092021.content: No, not yet. In the past, matters like these were all taken care of by Madam Housekeeper. Which means I know nothing...

412092022.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412092022.content: Sweet Dream House, Gates of Horn—I know that these places exist, but I don't know the way to either of them at all. If we lose the candy trail we've been following, I won't know where to go.

412092023.speaker: 机器人
412092023.content: Oneiroi, don't you think it's odd that there's a path for us to follow? There's no reason for the candies to be there at all.

412092024.speaker: 机器人
412092024.content: And then there's the fact that you can manifest rainbow bridges. Maybe...

412092025.speaker: 机器人
412092025.content: The candy trail actually came into being as a result of some thought in your head.

412092027.speaker: 机器人
412092027.content:
So, to know where you should go, you should first think of where you're going...
Ha, this line sounds rather strange even though it makes logical sense.

412092028.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412092028.content: Maybe it doesn't matter which direction I go...

412092029.speaker: 机器人
412092029.content: So, it doesn't really matter where you go.

412092030.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412092030.content: As long as I can leave this nightmare and wake up...

412092031.speaker: 机器人
412092031.content: I'm sure you can do it. As long as you walk long enough.

412092032.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412092032.content: As long as I walk long enough...

412092033.speaker: 机器人
412092033.content: As long as... you... keep... moving... forward...

412092036.content: The robot suddenly speaks again, this time as the lights on his chassis flash rapidly.

412092037.speaker: 机器人
412092037.content: The Sweet Dream House is the way home. The Gates of Horn are your destination.

412092038.speaker: 机器人
412092038.content: First, you have to find yourself.

412092040.content: There's a short burst of buzzing sounds before the robot comes to a complete and silent rest.

412092041.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412092041.content: He's out of power... (Whimpers) Mr. Robot...

412092042.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412092042.content: And so, in the end, I have to say goodbye again... And I'm all by myself now.

412092044.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412092044.content: Yes, that's right. I still have you with me, Drowsie.

412092045.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412092045.content: First, I have to find myself before I can go home... Is this the result of some kind of analysis by Mr. Robot?

412092046.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412092046.content: Maybe I have to go back to the Sweet Dream House first.

412092047.content: Oneiroi's field of vision clears up again, although she still can't see the end of the trail ahead. The candy wrappers are still glittering in the dim light.

412102003.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412102003.content: The candy trail ends at this door. But it looks like any other house...

412102004.content: She pushes open the door, which is ajar.

412102007.content: The pink light here is so dazzling, it is also dizzying. In this huge, empty space, a distracted Oneiroi is startled by the unexpected response to her question.

412102010.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102010.content: Y-you're Oneiroi??? Then who am I???

412102012.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102012.content: I'm trying to get back to the Sweet Dream House.

412102013.speaker: ？
412102013.content: This is the Sweet Dream House. This is your home.

412102014.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102014.content: Um... I have to find Madam Housekeeper too. I have to ask her what exactly happened here.

412102015.speaker: ？
412102015.content: No, you can't see it now. You aren't ready yet.

412102017.speaker: ？
412102017.content: Nothing. I'm just saying... Since you're already here, why don't you come play with me?

412102018.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102018.content: Play with you... Yeah, why not, since I'm already home...

412102019.content: By the time she comes to her senses, Oneiroi is already sitting on a soft chair, with a mountain of cakes and desserts in front of her, as well as colorful dolls and flowers lying around.

412102020.content: Yes, she's returned home. She's no longer on a journey and doesn't have to put herself in danger anymore.

412102021.content: This is her home, her safe haven, a place without worries.

412102022.speaker: ？
412102022.content: Morpheus, Phantasos, Phobetor... they were all protecting me. Even later, when only Phobetor was left... she was enough to keep me safe.

412102023.speaker: ？
412102023.content: That's really great. You don't have to do anything except play to your heart's content.

412102025.content: A stray thought wanders into Oneiroi's mind. However, she doesn't have the time to dwell on it now. The sight of the great many cakes in front of her has buried the uneasiness in her heart.

412102029.speaker: ？
412102029.content: It took me a whole month to pick out this cake. It's the tastiest of them all.

412102030.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102030.content: A whole month? Have you been here very long?

412102031.speaker: ？
412102031.content: Is a month a long time? I may have been here for many, many months already. Or many, many years, even.

412102033.speaker: ？
412102033.content: Bored? I'm happy every day. I don't have to think or worry about anything. I'm never bored.

412102034.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102034.content: Then... why do you have to stay here under protection all the time?

412102035.content: The girl with the pigtails does not answer.

412102036.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102036.content: Oh, I have to bring this delicious cake to my friends so that they can try it too.

412102039.content: The Sword of the Brave, the puppet strings, the thought thinking module... It's almost as if Oneiroi can see these right before her eyes, even though the thought of these feels particularly strange here.

412102041.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102041.content: Mmhmm. I met them on the way home. We went through a lot together and are now good friends.

412102042.speaker: ？
412102042.content: But why aren't they here too?

412102045.content: Tick tock, tick tock, tick tock.

412102046.content: Time continues to move forward with the ticking of the clock. The slender footprint of the second hand is gently cutting through the light purple mist.

412102048.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102048.content: ...did all those things to send me home.

412102049.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102049.content:
They sent me home so that I could resolve the anomalies here and save them.
They believed in me, and said that this is something only I can do.

412102051.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102051.content: The nightmare has swallowed up this place. Look outside.

412102052.content: The girl with the bow in her hair points out the window. The world outside is indeed all purple. But now, she realizes that her hands have been stained purple, too.

412102054.speaker: ？
412102054.content: That's because you're thinking of things you shouldn't be thinking of. If you keep thinking about what's outside, you'll disappear.

412102056.content: The girl with the bow in her hair walks to the door, which is now firmly locked. She turns the handle, but it doesn't move even a millimeter.

412102057.speaker: ？
412102057.content: You mentioned "friends." Who are they to you?

412102059.speaker: ？
412102059.content: Even more important to you than yourself?

412102061.speaker: ？
412102061.content: You don't know, but you want to leave the safety of your home to save them?

412102062.content: Oneiroi's transparent hands are unable to take hold of anything. She lets go and chooses to push the door with her body instead.

412102063.content: She knows full well that she can't possibly push open the door from the inside. But she has no other choice.

412102064.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102064.content: ...I only know that my friends have left the places that were safe for them, in order to save me and this place.

412102065.speaker: ？
412102065.content: So you're just following them. You're just imitating what they're doing.

412102066.content: Oneiroi stops pushing the door for a second.

412102069.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102069.content: I'm not imitating them. I'm just doing the same thing because we think the same way.

412102070.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102070.content: I'm not a copycat, putting my life in danger just because I don't know what else to do. I'm doing this because I want to.

412102072.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102072.content: A nightmare that makes everyone so sad must be wrong.

412102075.speaker: ？
412102075.content: You will die if you go out there again.

412102076.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102076.content: But if I stay here and do nothing, it'll be the same as dying anyway.

412102077.speaker: 俄尼里伊？
412102077.content: In that case, I might as well go out and do whatever it is I want to do.

412102078.speaker: ？
412102078.content: Are you so sure that you can protect your friends? After all, they've always been the ones protecting you.

412102080.speaker: 羊妈妈
412102080.content: Little Oneiroi, you did it... Amazing.

412102081.speaker: 小羊
412102081.content: I know that you must have something more important to do.

412102082.speaker: 人偶小姐
412102082.content: Choice... I have to make a choice.

412102083.speaker: 机器人
412102083.content: I'm sure you can do it. As long as you walk long enough.

412102084.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412102084.content: I know I can do it...!

412102087.content: Oneiroi disappears, but Oneiroi opens her eyes.

412102088.content: The girl with the bow in her hair is Oneiroi, and the girl with pigtails is Oneiroi.

412102089.content: This is a dream after all. Anything can happen in a dream.

412102090.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412102090.content: I have to save everybody, no matter the price I have to pay.

412102091.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412102091.content: This is what I want to do, this is what I should do, and this is what only I can do!

412102093.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412102093.content: Yes, Drowsie. I remember it too.

412102094.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412102094.content: Where the Gates of Horn are, and how to wake up from this dream... And also what happened before this dream started.

412102095.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412102095.content: I'm guessing I haven't woken up since I used my dream power in the Source Layer the other time...

412102096.content: Oneiroi tries to open the door again. But this time, it simply falls outwards and breaks apart, revealing its moldy and rotten interior.

412102097.content: She steps over the broken and rotten door. Fresh blooms appear in her trail on the damp and moldy ground wherever her footsteps fall.

412102099.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412102099.content: Please wait for me. I will walk out of this place.

412102100.content: The house behind her collapses with a deafening crash, and the wreckage then turns into a wisp of white mist that floats away into the sky.

412111001.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111001.content: The Gates of Horn are just up ahead. I just have to walk through the gate and I'll wake up. Then all this will be over.

412111003.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111003.content: Madam Housekeeper... Why are you...? Please move aside. I have to walk through that gate now.

412111006.speaker: 管家
412111006.content: It is my duty to stop you from going astray.

412111007.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111007.content: Don't you see the dream anomalies?

412111008.speaker: 管家
412111008.content: Of course I do. And I've come to stop you precisely because I see them.

412111009.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111009.content: Are you going to stop me from dealing with these anomalies?

412111010.speaker: 管家
412111010.content: I'm stopping you from dealing with these anomalies yourself.

412111012.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111012.content: I don't understand, Madam Housekeeper, I really don't.

412111013.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111013.content: Why on earth are you trying to stop me from helping with the problem?

412111014.speaker: 管家
412111014.content: Because you did something that caused harm to yourself. I won't allow you to do something like that again!

412111015.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111015.content: Caused harm to myself? When did I ever do that?

412111016.speaker: 管家
412111016.content: Not too long ago. You expended enormous amounts of energy with zero regard for your own safety, and that put you in a very dangerous situation.

412111017.speaker: 管家
412111017.content: If this happens again, the consequences will be unthinkable. Therefore, I won't allow you to get involved in any sort of danger again, and I will never let you leave the safety of this dream for the dangerous world outside.

412111018.speaker: 管家
412111018.content: As for the problems in the dream, I will take care of them. I just need a little more time, but during this time, I guarantee that the Sweet Dream House is absolutely safe.

412111020.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111020.content: That's right... By "take care," do you mean getting those savage Poker Soldiers of yours to enslave the residents so that they would do hard and dangerous work for you?

412111021.speaker: 管家
412111021.content: How did you know about that...?

412111022.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111022.content: Don't you already know everything? Don't you already know about all the dangerous things my friends and I have experienced?

412111023.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111023.content: What do you think I saw on my way home? Did you really think that it was all flowers and birdsong and sunshine with my friends and me on my way back?

412111024.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111024.content: No. The Poker Soldiers chased after us and the innocent residents. They acted cruelly, lording over everyone in their mistress' name.

412111025.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111025.content: What is going on with you, Madam Housekeeper??? Why are you doing something so horrible???

412111026.speaker: 管家
412111026.content: This isn't right. This isn't right. This isn't right.

412111027.speaker: 管家
412111027.content: Things weren't supposed to be this way...

412111029.speaker: 管家
412111029.content: You can't leave. It's safe here, and you can get whatever you want.

412111030.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111030.content: Right now, I just want to save everybody.

412111031.speaker: 管家
412111031.content: It's dangerous outside. I won't allow you to die out there... It's safe here... You will not leave.

412111032.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111032.content: It's not safe here at all. Everyone is in danger in this dream.

412111033.speaker: 管家
412111033.content: It's... safe here. You will not leave.

412111034.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111034.content: There are people still waiting for me to go back to them outside the dream.

412111035.speaker: 管家
412111035.content: It's... safe... here... You... will... not... leave...

412111036.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111036.content: Phobetor... What is wrong with you?

412111037.speaker: 管家
412111037.content: You will not leave! I will keep you safe!!!

412111038.content: Black fog erupts from behind the "housekeeper." There are now also black flames dancing in her eyes.

412111039.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412111039.content: But I... no longer want to be protected.

412112002.speaker: 小羊
412112002.content: She's still able to fight after wrangling with us for so long... How do we defeat her?

412112003.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112003.content: No, we don't have to defeat her... all I need to do is get through that gate over there!

412112004.speaker: 小羊
412112004.content: Then hurry over there and I'll hold her back—OW!!!

412112005.content: The housekeeper raises her hand, and the lamb is seized by a puff of black smoke and thrown some distance away. Meanwhile, Oneiroi is running toward the Gates of Horn with all that she has in her.

412112006.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112006.content: Just a little more, just a little more now... just a little faster...

412112007.speaker: 管家
412112007.content: Oneiroi! You will not leave this place!

412112008.content: The Gates of Horn, now controlled by the housekeeper, start to close at a rather worrying pace.

412112009.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112009.content: No, I have to be even faster, otherwise it'll be too late...

412112010.content: Her breathing becomes more rapid. There is sand and gravel flying across her face and into her eyes.

412112011.content: Oneiroi's field of vision becomes blurry. But all she knows is that she has to run faster, faster, faster... Her legs are almost numb now.

412112012.content: Then, there's a strange, sudden push from behind, and her body instantly becomes much lighter. She resists the urge to look back to find out where the push is coming from, choosing instead to focus on moving forward as much as she can.

412112013.speaker: 人偶小姐
412112013.content: I'm sorry I took so long to get here...

412112015.speaker: 人偶小姐
412112015.content: Oneiroi, you are my friend. And I want to help my friend...

412112016.content: Ms. Puppet is rushing forward to give Oneiroi one last push. And thanks to this push, Oneiroi stumbles into the gap before it disappears, her skirt grazing the Gates of Horn in the process...

412112018.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112018.content: What is this place...? Madam Housekeeper?

412112019.speaker: 小困
412112019.content: Zzz! (So you're here, Phobetor! I thought I'd never see you agaiiiiiiiiin!)

412112020.content: The figure in a tuxedo not far away seems to have noticed the movement at the door. She sees Oneiroi, and a look of delight appears on her face.

412112022.content: Before the little child can react, a tall figure has already come to her and scooped her up into her arms.

412112024.speaker: 管家
412112024.content: I'm so sorry, little Oneiroi... Are you alright?

412112025.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112025.content: Yeah. It feels like I had a very long dream. And I met a baddie who didn't want me to wake up.

412112026.speaker: 管家
412112026.content: So you did walk out of the Gates of Horn by yourself after all... I'm so sorry, little Oneiroi, I should've been there to lead you out. But I had to stay here to keep the dream from growing...

412112028.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112028.content: I see... So, you're saying that the baddie pretended to be you, Madam Housekeeper?

412112029.speaker: 管家
412112029.content: You could say that. I have no idea what that "Phobetor" actually is. I'm just calling it the "Evil Presence" for now.

412112030.speaker: 管家
412112030.content: As to where that thing came from... I'm guessing it has something to do with that dream you activated in the Source Layer. You pulled several Visbanes into that dream, and their dreams are always chaotic.

412112032.speaker: 管家
412112032.content: It's hard to say. But since then, many anomalies have occurred in the dream world. The Evil Presence seems to want to expand the dream world, but as you know, that comes with serious consequences.

412112033.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112033.content: Yes, Hades has told me about this before.

412112034.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112034.content: Oh, by the way, my friends are still fighting in there. How do I save them?

412112035.speaker: 管家
412112035.content: I can perform a reset on the dream world now that you're awake. That will end everything.

412112036.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112036.content: Then I have to wake up as soon as possible so that my friends won't get hurt!

412112037.speaker: 管家
412112037.content: Relax, little Oneiroi. You don't have to worry. Hades should have arrived by now too.

412112039.speaker: 管家
412112039.content: Fortunately, it was easy to get in touch with her. But I may need to take a short break after this issue has been resolved.

412112042.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112042.content: I just want to say, I can help too.

412112044.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112044.content: Yes. I can help with some of the things going on in the dream, the troublesome things. You don't have to shoulder everything all by yourself.

412112045.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112045.content: The new friends I made in the dream have taught me a lot. Now I understand that I shouldn't always wait for others to help me.

412112047.speaker: 管家
412112047.content: Who knows, in that case you may become more powerful than me, little Oneiroi.

412112048.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112048.content: Mmm... it might be a very long time before that comes true...

412112049.speaker: 管家
412112049.content: Have a little more faith in yourself.

412112050.content: Oneiroi gets back on her feet.

412112051.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412112051.content: I have to wake up now.

412112053.content: Oneiroi walks toward the dream exit in the distance. The housekeeper watches Oneiroi leave.

412112054.content: Her figure slowly disappears into the light.

412121002.speaker: 管家？
412121002.content: Ugh, damn it! She managed to escape...!

412121003.speaker: 管家？
412121003.content: This is all your fault! All of you!!!

412121004.content: The outer "shell" or "skin" of the "housekeeper" has burned off in the black flames, revealing the true face beneath. It is nothing but dark chaos.

412121005.content: The dark chaos begins to attack her surroundings maniacally.

412121006.speaker: 污浊之念
412121006.content: I want all of you out of my sight... FOREVER!!!

412121010.speaker: 哈迪斯
412121010.content: Good thing I got here in time.

412121011.speaker: 哈迪斯
412121011.content: You don't have to ask me who I am. You're about to disappear anyway.

412121012.speaker: 哈迪斯
412121012.content: My dear children, you've done an amazing job so far.

412121013.speaker: 哈迪斯
412121013.content: I've been watching all your battles. More than once I asked myself if I should take action, but I always felt that it'd be better to let little Oneiroi learn and grow on her own. Looks like I made the right choice.

412121014.speaker: 哈迪斯
412121014.content: I managed to find this place thanks to the puppet's strings.

412121015.speaker: 哈迪斯
412121015.content: Now, I can take care of this.

412122001.content: The Evil Presence's power is fading away quickly.

412122002.content: If Oneiroi were here and wanted to find her way back to the Sweet Dream House, she could simply count to the 24th star along the third row on the left-hand side to get back.

412122004.speaker: 哈迪斯
412122004.content: What are you saying no to?

412122005.speaker: 污浊之念
412122005.content: I... I don't want to die! No!!!

412122006.speaker: 污浊之念
412122006.content: Please, let me live! Look at me now. There's nothing else I'm capable of doing at this point anyway.

412122007.speaker: 哈迪斯
412122007.content: Give me a reason to let you live.

412122008.content: Hades studies the black flames that the Evil Presence has already become in her hand with great interest.

412122009.speaker: 污浊之念
412122009.content: I… There's nowhere in the outside world I can go anymore. I'm already dead.

412122010.speaker: 污浊之念
412122010.content: But in the dream world, I can still be alive... I just want to live!

412122011.speaker: 污浊之念
412122011.content: I beg of you, I just want to live...

412122012.speaker: 哈迪斯
412122012.content: Oh, I see how it is now. You sound rather pitiful.

412122016.speaker: 哈迪斯
412122016.content: If all you really wanted was to live peacefully in the dream world, I could have let you go.

412122017.speaker: 哈迪斯
412122017.content: But unfortunately you've done things you shouldn't have done, and crossed people you shouldn't have crossed.

412122019.content: The tall shadow of the new arrival is further lengthened in the moonlight.

412122021.speaker: 哈迪斯
412122021.content: ...Don't you have something to tell me?

412122022.speaker: 管家
412122022.content: ...I'm sorry, I failed to watch over the dream world. That's why—

412122023.speaker: 哈迪斯
412122023.content: There's no point dwelling on that now.

412122024.speaker: 哈迪斯
412122024.content: At the very least, you didn't mean to break our agreement.

412122025.speaker: 管家
412122025.content: I believe you. Oneiroi is safe and well in the world outside.

412122028.speaker: 管家
412122028.content: I'd like to ask, how did little Oneiroi come to unleash such great power in a place as dangerous as the Source Layer?

412122029.speaker: 哈迪斯
412122029.content: ...Something had happened then. And she was the only one who could do what needed to be done.

412122030.speaker: 管家
412122030.content: ...That makes sense. I can believe that. Little Oneiroi has grown up a lot, and I know that sooner or later she'll protect the others just like we've been protecting her.

412122031.speaker: 管家
412122031.content: I just didn't expect that day to come so soon.

412122032.speaker: 哈迪斯
412122032.content: I wonder if it's a good thing...? That the day has come so soon?

412122033.speaker: 管家
412122033.content: Maybe Morpheus would be pleased by this. But as for me... I don't know.

412122034.speaker: 哈迪斯
412122034.content: Morpheus... Have you not found her yet?

412122035.speaker: 管家
412122035.content: If she's really decided that she'd hide herself away, I'm afraid no one can find her.

412122036.speaker: 哈迪斯
412122036.content: Well, if you say that, we can only pretend that she doesn't exist for now.

412122037.speaker: 哈迪斯
412122037.content: Come to think of it, in addition to protecting Oneiroi inside and outside the dream world, there should be another clause in our agreement...

412122039.speaker: 管家
412122039.content: It's time to hand over all my power to Oneiroi.

412122040.speaker: 管家
412122040.content: But even that, that'd only be a third of all the power we have...

412122042.content: Strange machines. That big sister with bunny ears.

412122043.content: And there's also Hera, though the expression of worry on her face is new.

412122044.content: Athena is looking out the window with a frown on her face, while Oceanus is wearing his tie backward. Has Enlil been busy with school recently again?

412122045.content: Very soon, they notice that Oneiroi has opened her eyes.

412131001.speaker: 大国主
412131001.content: The "Evil Presence"... I see that you guys have come up with a name for that thing already. I'll just use that in my report then.

412131002.speaker: 大国主
412131002.content: Your housekeeper's guess is correct. This time, the fiasco was caused by the dream world being contaminated by Visbanes. But the detailed analysis will have to wait until I get back and write my report.

412131005.speaker: 明塔
412131005.content: Did you just paint this, Miss Oneiroi?

412131006.speaker: 琉刻
412131006.content: Yes. I saw Miss Oneiroi paint this with my very own eyes.

412131007.speaker: 明塔
412131007.content: Hmm, I haven't seen such an interesting picture from Miss Oneiroi in a while. Let me take a closer look.

412131008.speaker: 明塔
412131008.content: This robot with rabbit ears is the one that Miss Ookuninushi exerted so much effort to insert into the dream, isn't it?

412131010.speaker: 明塔
412131010.content: Lady Hades is incredible. Imagine being able to create a puppet even in the dream world. But it sure isn't as detailed as us, and it still needs its strings to work properly. But I suppose we can regard her as our sister?

412131011.speaker: 琉刻
412131011.content: Mintha, tell me, does Lady Hades like you more? Otherwise, why does our sister look so much like you?

412131012.speaker: 明塔
412131012.content: But the two of us look so much alike. If she looks like me, she must look like you too.

412131014.speaker: 学生A
412131014.content: Have you seen Oneiroi's new painting?

412131015.speaker: 学生B
412131015.content:
The one titled "Waking From a Long Dream"...? Of course I've seen it.
People falling from the sky like rain and into an endless starry sky below, and above the starry sky, the sun and grass are faintly reflected nevertheless... It's such a strange work, but the teachers all speak so highly of it.

412131016.speaker: 学生A
412131016.content: You know, I keep getting the feeling that I've had a similar dream. Whenever I see that painting, I always feel like that bottomless starry sky is right in front of me, coming at me...

412131017.speaker: 学生B
412131017.content: Ha ha, looks like Oneiroi's art has a really strong effect.

412131018.speaker: 学生A
412131018.content: I even asked my older sister about it, and she said she felt similarly…

412131019.speaker: 学生B
412131019.content: Maybe she's put everyone's dreams on canvas? I mean, a transcendental, universal dream, a dream shared by everyone... Oh yes, I sense inspiration coming on now. I'm going to have my name published in the journal next month. See you later!

412131021.speaker: 学生A
412131021.content: "Waking From a Long Dream"... Maybe it was really all a dream.

412131022.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412131022.content: I wonder if everyone's still here...

412131023.speaker: 羊妈妈
412131023.content:
Little Oneiroi, you're finally back! We've all been waiting for you.
Wow, that's a nice new outfit you're wearing.

412131024.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412131024.content: Mama Sheep!!! I love my new outfit too. But why is everyone waiting for me?

412131025.speaker: 小羊
412131025.content: Ms. Puppet says that we should have a celebration together since the nightmare has been defeated.

412131026.speaker: 小羊
412131026.content: But, how did the nightmare disappear? I only remember that an older girl with white hair suddenly appeared, and then... I don't remember anything else.

412131027.speaker: 人偶小姐
412131027.content: You don't have to mind that. Anyway, it's good that the nightmare is gone.

412131029.speaker: 人偶小姐
412131029.content: I think I know what you're asking. Look.

412131030.content: Ms. Puppet lifts up her skirt a little and does a little twirl. There aren't any strings attached to her body.

412131032.speaker: 机器人
412131032.content: It's wonderful. Ms. Puppet had such an awful personality when she was attached to those strings.

412131033.speaker: 人偶小姐
412131033.content: Sorry, I have no idea why I became like that... Maybe I was influenced by whoever was controlling the strings...

412131034.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412131034.content: Whoever was controlling the strings? Might that be...?

412131035.speaker: 人偶小姐
412131035.content: No, no, no, I wasn't referring to anything. Anyway, I made a lot of yummy food for the celebration. Look!

412131036.content: It's only at this point Oneiroi notices that there's a sumptuous spread laid out on a long table not far away.

412131037.content: The only thing is, there's one food item that has a rather weird and blob-like shape. It's hard to tell what it's supposed to be, and it's sticking out like a sore thumb compared to the other exquisite-looking viands on the table.

412131038.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412131038.content: What is... Yellow, green, red... cookies. And what is this?

412131039.speaker: 机器人
412131039.content: This is the cake I made.

412131040.speaker: 羊妈妈
412131040.content: Let me guess. It's a hamburger that's already been left out for three days.

412131041.speaker: 小羊
412131041.content: But I've already tried it and it tastes as yummy as a freshly baked cake. Would you like to try it too?

412131042.speaker: 羊妈妈
412131042.content: I hope we have enough stomach pills at home...

412131043.content: Oneiroi is distracted for a moment. Then, she suddenly remembers that she's returned to the dream world again to say goodbye to her friends.

412131044.content: But judging from her friends' behavior, they seem to be unaware that they'd disappear entirely from the dream world in a few days, when her memory of them starts to fade.

412131045.speaker: 俄尼里伊
412131045.content: Then I should try to remember them a little longer...

412131046.content: Every time she wakes up from a dream, those originally clear and vivid dream scenes would disappear like a painting on the beach being washed away by the tide.

412131047.content: Whatever happened in the dream is forgotten, just like candy slowly melting in the mouth.

412131048.content: Perhaps, a long, long time from now, Oneiroi would forget everything that's happened in that long dream.She'd forget how cozy Mama Sheep's fleece felt, the shape of the Sword of the Brave, Ms. Puppet's crystal-clear eyes, and the sound of Mr. Robot's voice.

412131049.content: But she'd still remember that she encountered these good friends once upon a time, just like how candy leaves a strong sweet taste in the mouth.

412131050.content: Now, she wants to paint these "candies" that haven't yet melted while she still remembers them.

412131051.content: And maybe... She can create an illustrated storybook?

412131052.content: That sounds like a rather good idea.
